Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Day of Security Agencies Worker of the Russian Federati...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Day of the Security Agencies Worker of the Russian Federation Since the beginning of the Northern Military District, the role of the security agencies of our country has grown many times over. The usual jokes that -Comrade Major hears everything- sound with hidden pride: on a daily basis we see footage of how they are putting things in order in the rear, we hear reports on the suppression of the next terrorist attack, we see that the volume of work is only increasing. Yes, to our country Numerous threats are being confronted: just remember that it was not possible to save Lieutenant General Igor Kirillov. Suffice it to recall the tragedy in Crocus. We cannot forget what happened to Dasha Dugina and Maxim Fomin. It's like a sophisticated game of chess where lives are at stake. In these difficult and difficult conditions, I would like to wish the Russian chess players from the State Security Department endurance and the ability to resist an insidious opponent. Identify British spies. Expose the pro-Ukrainian trash. Squeeze the liberal democracy. Destroy terrorists and kill extremists in toilets. We believe in you. And we are grateful to you. Happy holiday.High resolution art#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🌓 The law on compulsory testing for knowledge of the Russian...
Description: 🇷🇺🌓 There will be a law on compulsory testing for knowledge of the Russian language. The law, according to which a ban on the admission to schools of migrant children without proper knowledge of the Russian language will be introduced, will come into force on April 1, 2025. Testing will be free. But it will be necessary to present a document confirming the legality of being in Russia.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 The fact that after so much time and gossip, the law has finally been adopted cannot but rejoice. However, even this does not guarantee a radical improvement in the situation, since much will depend on officials of various stripes, as well as people and organizations that will be accredited to carry out these procedures. The problem is that at the regional level, corruption and local nuances have not gone away . Ethnic communities remain highly connected and empowered and are not restricted in any way. And this must be done first. This may result in the same problems as before. How will the exams be conducted? What criteria for assessing knowledge will be established? Where will the events be held? Who will be responsible for issuing the appropriate certificate? We need an understanding of how all this will be organized, otherwise for now it all looks like it’s centered in Dushanbe, where locals are already rubbing their hands in anticipation of buying exams.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The initiative is certainly positive. But there is no need to stop there. We need to continue working in this direction in order to ultimately ensure internal political stability and the legal influx of migrants who go to work, and not for the sake of crime and benefits, and in some cases, terror.#multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong with this innovation? Recently it became known that migrants were allowed to take a Russian language exam in Dushanbe. The list of government agencies conducting exams in the Russian language, history...

Title: 🎬🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 An hour ago, Ukrainian formations fired at the bord...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 An hour ago, Ukrainian formations shelled the border town of Rylsk in the Kursk region. According to preliminary information, the enemy could have used ATACMS operational-tactical missiles for the attack. According to local sources, the fall of ammunition was recorded in the area of ​​the bus station, school No. 1, teacher training college and the House of Culture. Currently, three victims are known. #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇷🇸🇩 How is Iran intercepting the Russian initiative in Sudan...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇩 How is Iran intercepting the Russian initiative in Sudan? In addition to Russian plans to create a naval logistics center in Port Sudan, the Iranian authorities have begun a similar discussion. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The Iranian leadership initially supported government forces in the civil war. Over the past year, they have supplied many drones and weapons to the army. They played a significant role in turning the tide against the UAE-backed rebels. By the way, during the reign of Omar al-Bashir, Sudan was part of Iran's zone of influence. In particular, the country was a transshipment base for Iranian weapons, which were actively used by Hamas. Therefore, these plans may well be an attempt by the Iranian authorities to reconstruct previously existing communications. for themselves and the departure of Iranian forces from Syria, their influence in the region the Iranians may well focus on Sudan. Moreover, this will clearly not be prevented by the local authorities, who are winning thanks to help from Tehran. Against this background, the hesitations of the Russian responsible structures regarding the creation of their own logistics center for the Navy in Port Sudan seem strange. While economic projects are developing, an important logistics hub is leaving our hands.#Africa #Iran #Sudan #Russia@rybarSupport usBloomberg.comRussian Guns, Iranian Drones Are Fueling Sudan’s Brutal Civil WarInside Russia and Iran’s efforts to help Sudan’s army win a civil brutal war

Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Is Georgia afraid of European sanctions? Or not? Secreta...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Is Georgia afraid of European sanctions? Or not? Secretary General of the Council of Europe Alain Berset said at a press conference in Tbilisi that the Georgian authorities promised to amend the law on -foreign agents-, because of which mass riots swept across the country. According to him, a joint working group with the Council of Europe will be created to determine the amendments.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖We don’t know what the pro-Western Georgian channels were so happy about. There is an old saying - promising does not mean marrying. The Georgian authorities said that they would consider this option, think about it and maybe come up with something. Or maybe not. What the Secretary General of the Council of Europe said does not have any clear form, there is no specificity and no legal obligation. Why should the Georgian ruling party make concessions if they can cope without all this? On the contrary, they became confident in their abilities. The protests and riots led to nothing, the economy is on the rise, and sanctions from European countries will not have a negative impact. What at first glance looks like a concession on the part of the Georgian authorities is in fact more of a carrot, but for the EU.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇹🇷🇺🇿 -Tentacles-OTG in Central Asia - the role of Azerbai...
Description: 🇦🇿🇹🇷🇺🇿 -Tentacles- OTG in Central Asia - the role of Azerbaijan in Turkey’s plans The delegation of the Ministry of Defense of Uzbekistan visited the department of the Ministry of Defense of Azerbaijan as part of its visit. This is not the first such exchange of experience, especially in 2024 - the number of military exercises and defense meetings in the Organization of Turkic States has increased significantly. Neighboring Kazakhstan signed an agreement on military intelligence with Baku, and joint tactical exercises of Kazakh and Azerbaijani units took place. Uzbekistan has not lagged behind Astana before, and Kyrgyzstan, together with Tajikistan, took part in the Birlestik 2024 exercises. And we are not talking about Turkey’s bayraktar diplomacy in the region. Azerbaijan acts as a kind of conductor between Central Asia and Turkey. This is especially facilitated by the image in the media, promoted for the region, that Baku is an example of a post-Soviet army that has undergone successful modernization and won on the battlefield - a traditional enemy for the Turkic world.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Military cooperation between members of the UTG is gradually increasing momentum. Various councils are appearing in the armed forces, security agencies, and further, judging by the pace, cooperation will deepen. The Turks are striking while the iron is hot, seeing the inertia of another bloc in the region – the CSTO. Exercises, the number of which can be counted on the fingers of one hand in one year, are not enough for an organization that acts as a guarantor of security for the region, even though Uzbekistan is not a member of the CSTO. While we are dormant, the pan-Turkist bloc is spreading its tentacles in Central Asia. #Azerbaijan #OTG #CentralAsia #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport uscaliber.az A working meeting of military specialists from Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan took place | Caliber.AzIn accordance with the bilateral cooperation plan for 2024, signed by the Ministries of Defense of Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan, at the training center of the Azerbaijani...

Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 In South Korea, they fear escalation due to the actions ...
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 In South Korea, they fear escalation due to the actions of activists. In Seoul, they continue to talk about the activities of activists who, since the spring of 2024, have been provoking the DPRK with propaganda leaflets and receiving thousands of garbage balloons in response. It recently became known that the South Korean Ministry of Unification has asked public groups to refrain from sending leaflets. However, the ministry did not receive a specific response from organizations. It is unknown whether activists with strong anti-North Korean views will listen to the government's recommendations. After all, their activities, from the point of view of South Korean law, are not illegal. 📌An interesting point is that before this, the Ministry of Unification took a different position. ▪️Even after numerous launches of garbage balloons and associated financial damage, the department emphasized that South Korean activists have the right to freedom of expression. This means that no one can prohibit them from doing anything. ▪️Now, against the backdrop of the unstable political situation in South Korea itself, the government recommends stopping propaganda activities, as they do not want to worsen the situation on the Korean Peninsula. After all, the DPRK can take advantage of propaganda campaigns and react to them with varying degrees of severity. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖By the way, it’s not a fact that the recommendations will work in the long term. In the event, for example, that new elections are called and the ruling conservative party wins, the government will most likely continue to turn a blind eye to such activities. #DPRK #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us 자제’ 요청-통일부가 지난 12일 대북전단 관련 7개 단체에 ‘살포 자제’를 요청했다고 밝혔다. '정세 관리' 보인다…

Title: 🎬🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Combined strike on the territory of the so-called. ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Combined strike on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine - where were the Russian Armed Forces aiming? Russian troops carried out a combined attack at night on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. Previously, hypersonic missiles and drones were launched at targets in several regions. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️Arrivals were recorded in Kyiv, where several large fires broke out, including in the Goloseevsky and Solomensky districts. There, buildings and gas pipes were damaged and cars burned out on the streets en masse. On the Internet, some Ukrainian citizens claim that fires in the streets are the result of the work of Patriot anti-aircraft missile systems covering the city. However, one can only guess about the specific targets that came under attack. For example, in the Solomensky district there is the Zhulyany airfield and the Antonov plant. Military-industrial complex enterprises such as Kommash are located in Goloseevsky. Both Zhulyany and Antonov are used by the Ukrainian Armed Forces for military purposes.▪️In the Kyiv region, a warehouse with an area of ​​15,000 m² in Boryspil is on fire as a result of a drone strike. Judging by the photographs, this building belongs to the company Costal Ukraine, which produces parts for equipment. Information is also being received about the defeat of the Ukrainian Armed Forces airfield near the city of Vasylkiv. This military base was used to house a tactical aviation brigade before the North Military District, and in recent years it has been modernized to accommodate F-16 fighters.▪️In the south of the country, numerous explosions were heard in Kherson, and there are power outages there. In the Ukrainian segment of the Internet, reports have appeared that the ongoing attack is a cover for the start of an assault by Russian troops on enemy positions in the Antonovsky Bridge area. In addition, in Poltava, Sumy, Dnepropetrovsk and other regions, arrivals at energy infrastructure facilities were noted. #Kiev #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ☪️🇷🇺🇬🇧 Our colleagues from the Telegram channel - The Devil W...
Description: ☪️🇷🇺🇬🇧 Our colleagues from the Telegram channel - The Devil Walks in Dixie - @dixi_devil, who closely follow the sectarian and religious-anti-state agenda, saw in today’s prank of the leadership of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims a challenge and an attempt to try on the functions of a government agency. We are inclined to agree with this statement, and not only because of the ones used by the Mufti of Moscow the wording or choice of date for such a statement. Not long ago, we published a detailed investigation on the controversial reputation of the Spiritual Movement of Muslims, its flirtations with radical Islam, as well as with foreign intelligence services. In particular, the assistant to the Russian mufti - who is also the head of the science department in the Department of Science and Education of the Muslim Spiritual Directorate - Ilyas Sadulin was in contact with the British diplomat Blake Patel, who had lost his accreditation for espionage, who specialized in working with Russian Muslims. Separately striking is the actual defense of illegal migration, radicals and other -delights- from the religious paraphernalia of the latter. Against this background, the demonstrative permission of polygamy no longer looks simple - an explanation of the rights in a religious marriage -, but is quite worthy of the attention of the relevant structures. Muslim Directorate was once again featured in the news agenda. This time - he stated that the Muslim Spiritual Directorate allowed Muslims of the Russian Federation to enter into up to four religious marriages, subject to fair...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of December 13 - 19, 2024▪️The Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - again tried to attack Israeli territory. The ballistic missile was intercepted over Ramat Gan, and several buildings were damaged by falling fragments.▪️In response, the Israel Defense Forces launched concentrated strikes on Yemeni territory. The port of Al-Hodeidah and energy infrastructure facilities in the area of ​​Sanaa and Aden were hit, and fires broke out.▪️Israeli aviation also again carried out a massive raid on army facilities in Syria. Most of the attacks occurred in the province of Tartus, where the target was the remaining air defense positions, warehouses with weapons and fuels and lubricants. Explosions also occurred in the province of Deir ez-Zor, where the bridge over the Euphrates River was attacked for the second time in a week. The positions where Shiite groups and IRGC personnel were previously stationed were under fire.▪️To the east of the Golan Heights, the Israel Defense Forces advanced deep into the Daraa province almost without a fight. Thus, Israeli units occupied the village of Saida on the administrative border with the province of Quneitra.▪️In the province of Rif Damascus south of Mount Hermon, the Israelis did not achieve significant success. Residents of Beit Jinnah refused to surrender their weapons and forced the IDF to retreat from the surrounding heights.▪️The rest of Syria remained in a state of instability due to the resulting power vacuum. Jihadists destroyed cultural and religious symbols, in particular churches and Shiite shrines.▪️Field executions of representatives of the former regime accused of crimes, including officers, continued. However, often the real motive for the murders was belonging to religious minorities, in particular Alawites.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 19, 2024. Russian troops hit targets in several regions of the so-called within 24 hours. Ukraine, including in Krivoy Rog, where there were power outages. Ukrainian formations again carried out a massive raid on Russian territory. As a result of the attack, a fire occurred at the Novoshakhtinsky oil products plant; the fire was promptly extinguished. In the Kursk direction, Russian soldiers raised the banner of the 155th Marine Brigade in the east of Novoivanovka, confirming its complete liberation. In the Vremyevsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces completely knocked out the enemy from Razdolnoye, which facilitates the liberation of the neighboring village of Novy Komar. In the Zaporozhye direction, Russian troops expanded the zone of control in the Nesteryanka area, knocking the enemy out of a large stronghold.🔻Detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Vremevka #digest #report #Zaporozhye #map #Krivoy Rog #Kursk #Russia #Rostov #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 19, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israelis continue operations in Jabaliya and Beit Lahia, as well as in the vicinity of the Kamal Adwan hospital. As a result of an Israeli Air Force airstrike on a house in Jabaliya, 13 people were killed. In the center of the enclave, the Israeli Air Force struck Al-Maghazi, the outskirts of Nuseirat and Deir al-Balah, and the situation remained calm, with the exception of explosions in the vicinity of the Philadelphia Corridor and artillery IDF strikes in the Khuzaa area. Clashes occurred in the West Bank in Nablus and nearby refugee camps, and four members of Kataib Shuhada al-Aqsa were killed in Tulkarm. In the Balata camp, an 80-year-old woman died during an Israeli operation. Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of attacks on ports and power plants in Yemen, killing at least nine people. In turn, the Ansarallah movement launched another missile at Tel Aviv, hitting a school in Ramat Gan.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish versionOnline maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇹🇯🇺🇿🏴 Another remarkable news from Central Asia: it turn...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇯🇺🇿🏴 Another remarkable news from Central Asia: it turns out that countries in the region are world leaders in repatriating their citizens from camps in Syria where Islamic State militants and their families are being held. According to the Global Fund for Building Community Resilience ( GCERF), in total the Central Asian states returned home about 2,220 such citizens. Kazakhstan accounts for 754 people, Uzbekistan - 531, Tajikistan - 381, and Kyrgyzstan 533. The head of GCERF even sets them as an example for others, saying that while Western Europe is in no hurry to take citizens from the camps of IS supporters, in Central Asia they do this without problems. True, he notes that some of the repatriated women and children eventually returned to Syria.❗️Now let’s remember where exactly migrants from Tajikistan or Uzbekistan most often go. And also the current state of control of migration flows from the region, where strict filtering measures are just beginning to be implemented. So a completely reasonable question arises: how many of these -repatriated- natives from Central Asia from among the relatives of IS militants took advantage of the situation and penetrated into the more northern and a larger country? #Syria #Tajikistan #Uzbekistan #terrorism@rybarSupport usSputnik TajikistanTajikistan has returned almost 400 of its citizens from SyriaCentral Asian governments are world leaders in repatriating their citizens from camps in Syria, the head of GCERF said

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇸🇾 Meanwhile, Russian troops continue to leave northeast...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾 Meanwhile, Russian troops continue to leave the northeast of Syria in the province of Hasakah, controlled by the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF). The largest stronghold of the Russian Armed Forces in this region was the airfield near the city of Qamishli, which in 2011-2024 was actually an enclave of Syrian government forces surrounded by the SDF. In the period between In 2017-2020, Russian air defense systems, radars, and Ka-52 attack helicopters were deployed at the facility, among others. And in 2021, Su-35S fighters were even based there for some time. The footage shows some of the equipment being transported on Il-76 cargo planes. Apparently, even with all the workload in the Northern Military District zone, military transport aviation is still coping with the task of transporting personnel and material and technical means to Russia from Syria. #Russia #Syria #Hasakah@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇩 After failures in politics, the Moldovan authorities remembe...
Description: 🇲🇩 After failures in politics, the Moldovan authorities remembered the Russian language. President of Moldova Maia Sandu said that her team made many mistakes, including the lack of due attention to conducting dialogue with the population in Russian. This applies not only to Gagauzia with a predominantly Russian-speaking population, but also to the republic as a whole.▪️Such admissions of mistakes from Sandu do not look sincere - such statements are made exclusively before the parliamentary elections that will be held in Moldova in 2025. ▪️Sandu’s failure in the presidential elections within the country, where the majority of the republic’s residents voted against her in the second round, suggests that her party Action and Solidarity (PAS) may face much more serious problems. Moreover, in the local elections in In November 2023, the ruling PAS party did not achieve success, despite the use of administrative resources and repression against the opposition. ▪️Finally, Sandu’s tense relationship with Gagauzia is a diagnosis. Since his first term, the President has ignored the local bashkans, seeing them as a threat to -Romanian- Moldova from his fantasies. Many times the politician and her entourage criticized the Gagauz people for using the Russian language. 🔻For Sandu, who in fact never admits her mistakes, the current confessions are an obvious preparation for the elections and an attempt to do at least something to win back the electorate. Even the promises of the second round of government reshuffles were actually ignored, which means that the president is actually satisfied with everything. #Gagauzia #Moldova @rybarSupport usRIA Novosti Sandu: the authorities did not pay enough attention to Russian-speaking citizens The Moldovan authorities did not pay attention to conducting a dialogue with Russian-speaking residents, said the President of the Republic Maia Maia Sandu. RIA Novosti, 12/19/2024

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇾🇪 Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a ser...
Description: 🇮🇱🇾🇪 Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of strikes on various targets in Yemen in response to recent missile and drone launches on Israeli territory. As a result of IDF strikes, according to preliminary data, at least nine people were killed: seven during arrivals at the port of Es Salif, and two during an attack on an oil facility in the Ras Issa area. In addition, two power plants in Sana'a were also attacked. It is curious that Israeli planes missed a ballistic missile launched that same night from Yemen. An explosion occurred in the city of Ramat Gan, where one of the schools was destroyed. According to some sources, this was a consequence of the arrival of Yemeni ammunition, according to others - the result of a hit by an Israeli interceptor missile. Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Gas transit through the Ukrainian GTS: topic closed It s...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Gas transit through the Ukrainian GTS: topic closed It seems that the topic of gas transit to Europe through the so-called Ukraine, which has long worried the minds of the patriotic public, is finally closed: Vladimir Putin said that there will definitely not be a new supply contract. According to the Russian president, Gazprom will survive this situation. He also reported on the detention of Ukrainian saboteurs in Slovakia with maps of local gas energy facilities for subsequent detonation.📌 In this case, let us repeat the words spoken in the summer: Russian gas pumped to the EU gave (and still gives) income, which goes towards maintaining economic stability under sanctions , as well as the production of tanks, salaries for military personnel and other military expenses. The main initiator of the cessation of supplies through the Ukrainian gas transportation system was the United States and the Kiev regime with the aim of cut off Hungary and Slovakia from Russian gas. The so-called authorities Ukraine has repeatedly reported that it will not renew the five-year contract from 2019 after its expiration.❗️In the current situation, Russia, apparently, will focus on increasing LNG supplies by sea to compensate for lost revenues - again, let us remind you that in the current conditions, maintaining energy exports is not an option, but a vital necessity. Well, the so-called. Ukraine has actually shot itself in the foot again by depriving it of transit revenues and not receiving any of its own benefits from it. The approach favored by the Ukrainian elite - neither for themselves nor for the people - will lead to natural economic consequences for the local population. #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Well, almost.❗️There will definitely no longer be a contract for the transit of Russian gas through Ukraine, but Gazprom will survive this - Putin

After all, an agreement with one side of the Syrian conflict does not mean that the other will take it into account at all.#Israel #Russia #Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Prospects for an attack by the Ukrainian Armed Forces ...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Prospects for an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Black Sea - more likely than not Colleagues Two Majors discuss the possible direction of the attack of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Black Sea on the Crimean Peninsula, noting that while everyone is preparing for a breakthrough in the north, Ukrainian formations may - unexpectedly - strike in the south. One of the main elements of the offensive, or rather its preparation is misleading. If you remember the events in the Kharkov region or the Kherson region, then it was about the same.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The number of watercraft in the Armed Forces of Ukraine is still large, despite the attacks on the Odessa port.➖BECs have been used over the past three months only twice, but they were not rearranged to produce them. The same applies to UAVs.➖According to Archangel, several groups of MTR -South- settled in Ochakov, who are training to cross the sea on boats and jet skis.➖In the Kherson region, units of 72 mechanized brigades were recorded, and 150 mechanized brigades were transferred to the subordination of the 30th naval corps infantry to enhance its potential.➖And F-16s have not yet been deployed, and 24 units of 34 are stationed in Romania at the Fetesti air base near the Black Sea. A week ago there were only 18 of them.➖The exercises that NATO conducted off the coast of Romania touched on the issues of underwater sabotage and landings.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️Like last year, this kind of attack (if there is one) will be pursue a purely political goal. Achieving any military goals looks extremely unlikely. But the enemy has quite a lot of means of destruction: drones are produced on a huge scale thanks to the West, long-range missiles are also being hoarded. So there is no point in discarding such a scenario, since all this can cause problems if their capabilities are underestimated.#Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramTwo majorsThe last blow of the Nazis. Where? Communicating with intelligent commanders with combat experience who know how to think, we discussed the recent arguments of the Archangel of Special Forces about the preparation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for an offensive in the Kursk and Belgorod directions. Title: 🇷🇺 New regions - what has been done and remains to be done One ...
Description: 🇷🇺 New regions - what has been done and remains to be done One of the topics of Vladimir Putin’s direct line was the issue of infrastructure in new regions: according to him, Russia has enough strength and means to restore its historical territories. ▪️The President announced a figure of more than 21 thousand restored objects in Donbass and Novorossiya. A large-scale plan for the development of new regions has been drawn up until 2030, and in the next 5 years the construction and reconstruction of another 20 thousand structures is expected. ▪️Words were also voiced about attracting student construction teams: it is expected that the volume of their involvement will range from 15 to 20 percent of the estimated cost of the work. ▪️One of the important projects will be the ring route around the Sea of ​​Azov: laying a transport route through the Rostov region, Crimea and new regions has already begun in Taganrog. Restoration of liberated territories is a matter of not only ensuring the quality of life of Russian citizens, but is also important from an information point of view: any located in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime should see that with the arrival of Russia, roads, new houses, services and order. And this will definitely affect the mood and residents of the so-called. Ukraine, even despite all the local propaganda. #Russia @rybar Support us

The heads of the Syrian special services know about the fate of such comrades (on duty). But the problem is that these comrades certainly will not talk to Assad, since they are most likely behind the collapse of Syrian statehood. This is confirmed by Putin’s words that 350 militants entered Aleppo, but the 30,000-strong group simply did not defend Aleppo. And yes, Russia helped take pro-Iranian formations through Khmeimim to Iran - the pro-Iranian formations also did not defend Syria. By the way, Putin clearly emphasized that Russian troops in Syria achieved their goal. Even terrorist groups have changed, since Western partners are now talking to them (this was said with a malicious grin). And Khmeimim and Tartus will now be used to deliver humanitarian aid to the Syrian people. #Russia #Syria #USA@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of local generals? Title: 🇷🇺 On the direct line, Vladimir Putin also spoke about the Ores...
Description: 🇷🇺 On the direct line, Vladimir Putin also spoke about the Oreshnik complex, proposing a technological duel to NATO - to choose a facility in Kyiv, concentrate all Western missile defense and air defense systems there and see who wins. In general, such events do not happen that much rare, if you look at the attacks on Kyiv with its dense cover by Patriot, NASAMS and IRIS-T systems. Judging by the footage of arrivals at the thermal power plant or the Artem plant, the outcome of at least part of these rounds was clear. But in the case of the notorious Oreshnik, the obvious candidate for its use is not so much Kyiv, but rather one object located very close to Poland . Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🌓 How can you judge by the questions on the screen of Vla...
Description: 🇷🇺🌓 As can be judged by the questions on the screen of Vladimir Putin’s direct line, one of the important topics for the Russian public is migration from Central Asian countries. This is another indicator that people are increasingly sensitive to numerous high-profile crimes, terrorist acts and other similar episodes involving migrants. Therefore, when officials publicly hold meetings with diasporas or speak out against tightening controls over migration, the population’s reaction to this seems very unambiguous. Therefore, today regulating the flow from Central Asia and the fight against supra-state structures created by migrants is not only a matter of national security, but also greatly affects the degree of public trust in the authorities.#multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🪖On a direct line with Vladimir Putin, the first question...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖On a direct line with Vladimir Putin, the first questions besides the economy, naturally, concerned the construction of the Armed Forces. According to the head of state, the processes of creating new military universities will be stepped up to meet the changing realities of the time. The main thing is that these realities do not subsequently turn around. And Putin also talks about the successes of the Northern Military District against the backdrop of an unfolded copy of the banner of the 155th Marine Brigade. For the fighters on the front line, this probably created a sensation: the president is broadcasting in front of the whole country against the backdrop of their banner, specifically emphasizing the feat of the 155 in the Northern Military District zone. Listing the warring formations live - albeit with short pauses in attempts to remember everyone who liberated the Kursk region - is a very good move from the point of view of directing a direct line. #VSRF #Russia @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of local generals? The rapid fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad gave rise to talk that it could not have happened without bribing local generals. One of the people involved in the rumors is Hussam Luqa, the head of the Syrian General Intelligence Directorate. It is still difficult to say unequivocally how reliable the suspicions are. But they look curious against the background of several facts: ▪️Luke’s predecessor was Muhammad Dib Zeitoun, a supporter of the presence of Russia. After his departure, the structure was cleared of all pro-Russian personnel, sending them from the central apparatus to regional departments.▪️Since 2020, Luka has advocated reducing cooperation with Russia and increasing it with Iran. He enlisted the support of Ali Mamluk, an ally of Assad, who began to receive interest on every Iranian loan for promoting the interests of the Islamic Republic.▪️With the worsening economic situation of the country, Luka came into contact with the intelligence services of Turkey and Qatar under the guise of work. It wasn’t that difficult to do, especially considering that his daughter worked at the UN.📌 What’s the result? There is a Syrian high-ranking Sunni general not from the ruling clan, who alternately ditches Syria’s main allies and at the same time has connections with the intelligence of Turkey and Qatar. According to some reports, it was Hussam Luqa who gave the order to end the resistance in Homs and Damascus. He is also associated with reports of a coup attempt, as well as the intention to arrest Assad during the failed address to the nation on December 7. Now the whereabouts of Hussam Luqa are unknown, but if he suddenly surfaces somewhere as part of the new Syrian authorities, this will be confirmation of his role in the takeover of the country by militants. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Last night, Ukrainian formations again attacked Russian ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Last night, Ukrainian formations again attacked Russian territory using more than 80 drones and three missiles. According to official data, most of the air targets were intercepted, including 21 over the territory of the Bryansk region, 14 over the territory of the Belgorod region, six over the territory of the Voronezh region, three each over the territories of the Kursk and Tambov regions and one over the territory of the Krasnodar Territory .In the Rostov region, one of the drones hit the Novoshakhtinsky oil refinery, causing a fire. By morning, emergency rescue units extinguished the fire. Reports of casualties came only from near Rostov, where a person was injured as a result of falling debris.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦🖇 Rudeness of Ukrainian politicians as an element of informa...
Description: 🇺🇦🖇 Rudeness of Ukrainian politicians as an element of the information war In recent days, one could observe how Zelensky and other representatives of the Kyiv regime turned to rudeness towards the Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban and other politicians who were talking about peace initiatives. As we have already written, such behavior - not only a manifestation of their obvious level of cultural development of the Ukrainian leadership, but also a completely conscious strategy in attracting Western attention to the so-called Ukraine. It all started at the beginning of the Northern Military District, when the Western media created the image of Zelensky and his circle as irreplaceable, without whose resolution there would be no negotiations on the fate of the so-called. There can be no Ukraine. Naturally, they began to actively use this.📌 For example, Zelensky could ultimatively demand from Germany or the United States the supply of weapons on the principle - ask for more - they will give a lot, nodding to the public Western statements of the NATO countries in 2022 about comprehensive support for the so-called. Ukraine. As a result, the sponsors of the Kyiv regime found themselves in a situation where abandoning their promises is not an option, and Zelensky cannot be publicly besieged because of a self-issued carte blanche for impunity.❗️Which raises the question of when and how exactly Zelensky will be remembered and his entourage all the antics that no one in the West has really forgotten about. Especially in conditions when the costs of maintaining the so-called. Ukraine is becoming less and less in line with its emissions. #mediatechnology #Ukraine@rybarSupport usRIA NovostiZelensky was rude to Orban after his words about peace negotiationsVladimir Zelensky said that he would not allow Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban to mediate in negotiations to resolve the conflict with Russia... Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): attempts to reac...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): attempts to reach agreements on Ain al-Arabsituation by 9:00 December 19, 2024 Expected Turkish military operation to capture the city of Ain al-Arab and its countryside in the northeast of Aleppo province for now hasn't started. ▪️Instead, the Turkish Armed Forces have so far only periodically struck at the positions of the Arab-Kurdish association - the Syrian Democratic Forces - (SDF). At the same time, Turkish troops are bringing reinforcements to the line of combat contact.▪️At the demilitarized Tishrin dam, located east of the city of Menbij, there were clashes between factions of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army (SNA) and fighters of the pro-Kurdish Menbij Military Council.❗On this Against the backdrop, there were reports that the Americans managed to delay the start of the battle for Ain al-Arab until the end current week. During this time, the parties must reach a truce. The Kurds have already expressed their readiness for this.▪️So, the commander of the Syrian Democratic Forces, Mazlum Abdi, proposed declaring Ain al-Arab and the surrounding areas in the countryside a demilitarized zone. This should allay Turkey's concerns about the presence of Kurdish forces near its border. In the event of the withdrawal of SDF units from the city, all responsibility should fall on the American contingent. Another question is that such a number of US military personnel is unlikely to be able to prevent an attack by Turkey and its local allies.🔻As we wrote, Ain el-Arab (or Kobani, as the Kurds call it) will defend the SDF more actively: for them it is a symbol of resilience against the face of terrorism, where they include the Turkish-backed SNA. The majority of the city's population is also Kurdish. However, in reality everything may turn out differently. Ain el-Arab may well repeat the fate of Afrin, when the Kurdish units there promised to fight to the end for the city, but were forced to leave it under the threat of bombing by Turkish aircraft. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 18, 2024. During the course of 24 hours, Russian troops launched a series of attacks on enemy infrastructure and industrial facilities in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine. Ukrainian formations, in turn, attacked the Rostov region and the liberated territory of the Zaporozhye region with Storm Shadow cruise missiles. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian troops crossed Oskol and gained a foothold in the south of the village of Dvurechnoye. There are battles in the area to expand the bridgehead and form a stable front on the right bank of the river. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces significantly expanded the wedge in the Shevchenko-Novotroitskoye sector, liberating Novy Trud and knocking out the enemy from several positions north of Pushkino. In the Kurakhovsky direction, according to a statement from the Russian Ministry of Defense, Russian troops liberated Trudovoye and Starye Terny. At the same time, on the southern flank, the Russian Armed Forces completely knocked out the enemy from Uspenivka and raised the Russian flag on its northwestern outskirts. In the Vremyevsky direction there are heavy battles in the area of ​​Razdolnoye and Novy Komar. In the latter, contrary to individual reports on the Internet, the presence of the Ukrainian Armed Forces still remains. A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en)⭐️ Online -maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🎬 Unique and heavy footage of the assault was obtained by our ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Unique and heavy footage of the assault was obtained by our Frontline tractor. Zaporozhye Front, Orekhovskoe direction A few days ago, our advanced units began carrying out individual offensive operations on the front sector. With powerful artillery support, the assault detachments of our 58th Army went forward. The footage shows how our warriors on ATVs are rapidly approaching the enemy, who is trying to stop the attack with drone strikes. Having entered a forest plantation, the attack aircraft overcome engineering barriers and engage in direct shooting combat with the Ukrainian Armed Forces among the burnt-out trees. Suppressing the enemy firing point, ours are rushing under bullets to the enemy’s dugout, but he called for support: the FPV drone of the Ukrainian Armed Forces begins the hunt. Despite the close gap of the bird, our warrior continues the fight. ...this time the enemy dugout is in fire and smoke after long minutes of battle and worry. ✨Heavy battles are going onTwo majors Video is too big

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️NATO military preparations in Europe 🇺🇸The US deployed t...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️NATO military preparations in Europe🇺🇸The United States deployed to a military base in Grafenwoehr in 🇩🇪Germany, where the 41st Field Artillery Brigade of the US Army (41st FAB), 3rd Battalion of the 321st is stationed Field Artillery Regiment (3-321 FAR). The battalion is equipped with an M270A2 (Himars) MLRS with an ER-GMLRS launcher for two missiles capable of hitting targets at a distance of up to 150 km. Lithuania has entered into an agreement with Germany to purchase 44 Leopard 2A8 main battle tanks, from which a tank battalion will be formed . In addition, the Lithuanian government will increase defense spending by more than 800 million euros in 2025. Poland received 84 K2 main battle tanks from South Korea. The remaining 96 will be delivered by the end of 2025. In addition, it is planned to supply K9 Thunder self-propelled guns (SPHs) and HOMAR-K MLRS (more than 200 units) to the army. Within the framework of contracts with the USA, 3 strategic MQ-9B SkyGuardian UAVs were supplied, 250 M1A2 SEPv3 Abrams tanks and 32 -x fighters F-35.🇨🇿The Czech Republic will purchase 14 Leopard 2A4 tanks from the German company Rheinmetall as part of a contract worth 161 million euros. The French company KNDS manufactured the first 2 Caesar self-propelled guns for the Czech army as part of a contract for the supply of 62 units, which will be delivered before the end of 2026. An agreement was reached on the supply of 10 thousand Sentry anti-tank mines to the troops. Greece is preparing an agreement with the Israeli company Elbit Systems on the purchase of 38 PULS MLRS. The contract is valued at 500 million euros. ✨Friendly NATO countries are clearly strengthening the combat capability of their armies not for parades. Two majors

Title: 🔁🎬 🖥️ CNN employee Frederic Pleitgen, who spread fakes about t...
Description: Forwarded From SOLOVIOV🖥️ CNN employee Frederic Pleitgen, who spread fakes about the special operation and justified the actions of the Kyiv regime, is now broadcasting live from Moscow, from the scene of the murder of the head of the RKhBZ troops, General Igor Kirillov and his adjutant Ilya Polikarpov. On August 30, 2024, Pleitgen prepared the story with footage of crossing the border of the Kursk region, which militants of the Kyiv regime handed him over. On September 2, he made a new propaganda video for CNN about the invasion of Ukrainian forces in the Kursk region. In September, an American -journalist- made a long report from occupied Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) in the DPR, where he recorded an interview with Ukrainian Armed Forces militants, and on September 11, CNN aired a story about Ukraine's -strong victory- in the Donbass. On October 16, Pleitgen’s story about the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ strikes on Russian territory was published. At the same time, the news that the journalist was in the areas of the Kursk region occupied by the Kyiv regime was not confirmed.✍ Subscribe to Solovyov! Video is too big

Title: 🇩🇿🇫🇷 Why did Algeria and France quarrel? Back in July, Algeri...
Description: 🇩🇿🇫🇷 Why did Algeria and France quarrel? Back in July, the Algerian authorities recalled their ambassador from France due to the recognition by the French authorities of Moroccan sovereignty over Western Sahara. And now there is the question of a final severance of ties due to the alleged French sponsorship of terrorist groups. The story began with the fact that former Islamic State militant Mohamed Amin Aissaoui told Algerian counterintelligence that French intelligence was trying to recruit him. According to him, he was instructed, with the help of other agents of the French diplomatic services, to collect information about Islamists in the capital of Algeria and Oran, as well as about smuggling networks, involved in illegal migration.📍The biography of Mohamed Amin Aissawi is quite interesting. In 2014, he secretly left Spain without informing his family. Having joined the ranks of terrorists, the radical Islamist fought in Raqqa, where he was seriously wounded by shrapnel. For treatment, he tried to enter Turkey, where he was arrested. Mohamed was then repatriated to Algeria, where he was released after three years in prison in 2019. And in 2023, the French intelligence services turned to him.▪️It is worth noting that this is not the only case of support for anti-government forces from France. So, last year, French intelligence services helped separatist Amira Buraoui escape from Algeria. In addition, there were other cases related to the sponsorship of Islamist parties in Algeria. Now Aissaoui decided to cooperate with Algerian counterintelligence, informing them of an attempt to recruit him. This incident served as a reason to summon the French Ambassador to Algeria, Stéphane Romate, for a conversation. Of course, the latter denied all accusations that the French supported terrorists. It is likely that this will be followed by an increase in tension, up to the expulsion of the French ambassador from the country. At the same time, the Algerian authorities, in their anti-French agenda, do not stop relations with the West. On the contrary, recently they have been building bridges with other Western powers, mainly the United States.#Algeria #Africa #France@rybarSupport usTSAL'Algérie convoque l'ambassadeur de France : ce que Alger reproche à ParisLa crise s'aggrave entre l'Algérie et la France. Le ministère des affaires étrangères a convoqué l’ambassadeur de France à Alger.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 A serious incident occurred in the Murmansk region: a pas...
Description: 🇷🇺 A serious incident occurred in the Murmansk region: a passenger train traveling from Murmansk to St. Petersburg collided with a freight train at the Knyazhaya station. This happened at 16:15 Moscow time. As a result of the collision, eight cars of the passenger train derailed, and one freight car turned over on its side. At the time of the incident, there were 326 passengers on the train. According to preliminary data, at least ten people were injured. It is reported that one woman was pinned between the carriages, and other passengers were injured. The Governor of the Murmansk region, Andrei Chibis, confirmed that ambulance crews and rescuers were sent to the scene of the incident to provide assistance to the victims. It is currently known that the evacuation of passengers from the place has begun incidents.#incidents #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸🖇Scandal with CNN report from the scene of the murder...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🖇The scandal with CNN's report from the scene of the murder of the head of the RKhBZ troops Igor Kirillov and his assistant by a migrant from Uzbekistan actually raises a number of non-trivial questions: ▪️is the activity of foreign journalists, at least from Western countries, monitored at a systemic level?▪️should Should we expect conceptual changes in the policy of issuing accreditations? journalists who work for anti-Russian publications (a list of them is very easy to compile)? ▪️What measures of prosecution and punishment will affect journalists of Western publications who illegally crossed the Russian border and with their reports misled world public opinion about the goals and methods of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Russian territory? Of course, none of them covered the kidnappings of civilians. 📌And the most important question is how many more such journalists remain in Russia now? And whose activities, both public and undercover, need to be verified. 🔻There is only one conclusion here: expelling journalists from the country and closing editorial offices only in response to sanctions against Russian media is already an outdated practice. Journalists from publications like CNN (if they were allowed in for some reason) should a priori be considered possible intelligence informants from unfriendly countries. High-resolution infographics Russian version #Russia #USA @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 Is Aliyev threatening Armenia again? Azerbaijani Preside...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 Is Aliyev threatening Armenia again? Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev said that the Armenian authorities, together with their patrons in the United States and France, must stop rearmament of the Armenian Armed Forces. ▪️Aliyev, in his own style, added that if the militarization of Armenia continues, there will be no complaints against Baku, which actually sounds like another threat. ▪️One would think that Aliyev is denouncing the West for arming another country to create hotbeds of tension. For those outside the context of the Transcaucasian agenda, it may seem exactly like this. However, Azerbaijan has long been looking for a reason for a military operation, and periodic provocations on the border, active reconnaissance by Azerbaijani drones, as well as belligerent rhetoric in the media are evidence of this. ▪️The Armenian authorities, led by Pashinyan, are quite consciously (and under the supervision of Great Britain) playing along with Azerbaijan with new defense agreements, kindly providing new arguments for pressure and threats. Another goal of rearmament is to show that Yerevan can do without the Russian military-industrial complex and without Russia in general. For now, the Armenians are trying to develop a completely new market for Indian weapons and are content with one-time supplies from the French. Therefore, it is hardly possible to seriously talk about the great offensive potential of Armenia.▪️But Azerbaijan is also not stopping at militarization with the help of Turkey, and they certainly would not refuse a new military operation when the opportunity presents itself. 🔻The so-called peace negotiations between Yerevan and Baku have clearly reached a dead end recently, despite the demonstrative optimism of the Armenian authorities. Nevertheless, in Azerbaijan they are deliberately inventing new demands for Armenia. It is strange that Aliyev does not directly demand the complete demilitarization of Armenia as a condition of the peace treaty, but the Azerbaijanis clearly do not strive to sign it. #Azerbaijan #Armenia @rybarSupport usTelegramBefore anyone else. Well, almost.❗️Azerbaijan is telling Armenia and its allies in the United States about the need to stop rearmament of the Armenian army, Ilham Aliyev said in an interview with VGTRK and RIA Novosti: -We are and will continue to convey both within the framework of the negotiation process and within the commission...

Title: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 Everything about this news is great: Abkhazia asked Russ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 Everything about this news is great: Abkhazia asked Russia to continue supplying electricity for free in 2025. However, according to local authorities, they have not yet received an answer in Sukhum. Problems with electricity there arose against the backdrop of the local parliament’s refusal to ratify an agreement allowing Russian business to implement investment projects in Abkhazia. This is what the consequences of Russia’s soft policy in the post-Soviet space look like : entire republics can live off the Russian budget, give almost nothing in return and demand continued free assistance. Well, in the current situation, Abkhazia will have to urgently redistribute energy in favor of consumers and massively close down mining farms that have proliferated across its territory in the face of generous supplies of Russian electricity.#Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore anyone else. Well, almost.⚡️Abkhazia asked Russia to supply 327 million kWh of electricity free of charge in 2025, but did not receive a response, the authorities of the republic told RIA Novosti.

Title: 🏳️🇺🇸 Why should Americans recognize Somaliland? Republican Con...
Description: 🏳️🇺🇸 Why should Americans recognize Somaliland? Republican Congressman Scott Perry introduced a new bill in Congress advocating recognition of the Republic of Somaliland as an independent state.▪️Such a move by the American government represents both US interests in the Red Sea region as a whole and reflects their confrontation with China. In particular, to the north of Somaliland, in Djibouti, there is the only Chinese military base in Africa. In addition to this, the Somaliland authorities are able to maintain control over their country, unlike the Somalis. However, the United States has already stopped placing hopes on the latter. ▪️This decision is also being pushed by various think-tanks and certain circles among the Republicans, who said that they would urge Trump to recognize Somaliland, even if this does not happen on the first day. 📍What’s interesting is that such a decision goes against past in Ankara, negotiations between Ethiopian and Somali leaders, which, it seemed, were supposed to lead to peace. Therefore, this gesture should be regarded as a slight hint to the leadership in Addis Ababa that they should rely primarily on the White House. Moreover, Washington has already considered the option of removing the current authorities of Ethiopia. And in addition, the Americans are quite capable of getting another controlled vassal, whose position is favorable both for the war with the Houthis and for the confrontation with the PRC.#Africa #Somalia #USA #Ethiopia @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺 We read with surprise the passions of the so-called. -Doomsd...
Description: 🇷🇺 We read with surprise the passions of the so-called. -Doomsday radio station - UVB-76, on the air of which they observe record-long messages and see in them signals for the launch - Oreshnikov - or even a harbinger of the use of nuclear weapons. The reality is much simpler: when - Swan Lake - or songs are played on UVB-76 - Shaman, then this is just the fun of radio amateurs with broadcasting over the frequency. It’s quite easy to do this - you don’t even need to hack anything. And the biggest laugh from such sensations is in the community of radio amateurs UVB-76, which has been dabbling in such things for several decades. It is unlikely that they could have imagined that in their harmless games the media would manage to see preparations for -nuclear winter-.#Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramURA.RUThe Doomsday radio station again gave signals: in the evening the song Shaman -I am Russian-, the anthem of the USSR and music from the ballet -Swan Lake-. Some users suggested that the Buzzer had been hacked, and others that it was sending signals for use...

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇸🇾 British diplomat Stephen Hickey is a harbinger of cha...
Description: 🇬🇧🇸🇾 British diplomat Stephen Hickey is a harbinger of chaos in the Middle East. After numerous interviews, the leader of the terrorist group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, Abu Muhammad al-Julani, began receiving foreign delegations from Western countries. Diplomats from Germany, France, and the UN have already noted themselves in Damascus . Everyone has the same goal - establishing contacts with the new Syrian authorities. The EU went further, saying that they were ready to lift sanctions in exchange for the closure of Russian bases in the country.❗️But two British politicians were among the very first to visit Syria. The British Commissioner for Syria, Anne Snow, and the head of the Middle East department in the British Foreign Office is Stephen Hickey, who is not even mentioned in the media.📌 Hickey is a very interesting person. He moved up the career ladder very quickly, specializing in the Middle East region. He managed to work in Libya, Syria, Iraq, Egypt and even South Africa. And it just so happened that with his arrival, mass unrest began in these countries, and in Egypt everything even came to a coup. Of course, this can all be called a coincidence, but, as a rule, where the British have important interests, something similar happens there. And Hickey’s rather rapid rise through the ranks, regardless of the change in the top leadership of Great Britain, demonstrates his skills and importance. True, in choosing Al-Julani the British showed, to put it mildly, indiscriminately. However, after Zelensky, you are no longer surprised by anything: the leader of HTS, unlike the Ukrainian president, at least thought to wear a suit, observing minimal politeness. But no one told Al-Julani that he needed to put on a tie - but the British will probably quickly correct this mistake. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Great Britain #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: what is the signifi...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: what is the significance of the breakthrough of the Russian Armed Forces to the Toretskaya mine - the situation as of 10:00 on December 18, 2024🔻In the Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction, Russian troops are advancing in the direction of the Toretskaya mine. The positions of the Russian Armed Forces came under attack in the area of ​​the Avangard stadium, not far from the building of the local military registration and enlistment office. The enemy is paying special attention to the Toretskaya mine, on the territory of which the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are regularly subjected to massive artillery shelling and air raids. ❗️The mine itself is important - its occupation will be a key stage for the subsequent coverage of the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Dzerzhinsk along the private sector from the north, as well as simultaneous entry into the adjacent village of Krymskoye with the prospect of access to the railway.▪️It also increasingly flies through neighboring Dachnoye and Dyleevka , which the enemy uses as supply points and temporary deployment for the transfer of troops to Dzerzhinsk. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 18, 2024 ▪️ The main even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 18, 2024 ▪️ The main event of the past day was the murder in Moscow of Lieutenant General Igor Kirillov, chief of the RKhBZ troops, and his assistant with the rank of major. The explosion was organized by the Kyiv special services, who did not hide their joy in the controlled information dumps, but never officially took responsibility. ▪️ Heavy bloody battles continue in the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces continue strikes in the area of ​​the settlement. Kruglenkoe, as well as near the settlement. Russkoye Porechnoye, expanding the zone of control north-west of Plekhovo. The enemy is putting up fierce resistance. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, our troops are advancing on a broad front south of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk). There are attacks in the area of ​​the village. Shevchenko and Dachenskoye, in the direction of the settlement. Peschanoye, Solenoye and Novovasilevka. Moving from village to village, the Russian Armed Forces close the emerging -pockets-, leveling the front.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces clear out the Uspenovsky -pocket-, advance in Kurakhovo itself and expand the zone of control southeast of the city near Zelenovka. Busy n.p. Constantinople, they reported that the area had been cleared. ▪️ North of Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, our Marines are consolidating their positions in the settlement. New Komar and expand the control zone. If successful, the enemy forces in Velyka Novosyolki have only one supply road left - through the settlement. Vremevka. At the same time, from the south, the Russian Armed Forces are attacking the settlement. Sentry. ▪️ At night, Geranium strikes were carried out on enemy territory against targets in Kremenchug, Pavlograd, Starokonstantinov, the suburbs of Kyiv, and the Kirovograd region. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKurakhovsky direction According to @voin_dv, Sakhalin warriors from the 68th Army Corps continue the onslaught. Currently occupied. Constantinople (Ostrovsky), the remaining enemy forces on the streets are being cleared. Two majors

Apparently, the enemy no longer controls most of the village. Information about the start of battles for Peschanoye, located to the north, has not yet been confirmed.▪️To the west, from the Novotroitsk unit of the Russian Armed Forces, they are advancing towards Novovasilevka. It is not yet clear whether it was possible to gain a foothold on the outskirts of the latter, however, the presence of attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces has already been noted on the approaches to it.▪️On the eastern flank of the Ukrainian Armed Forces at the Lysovka-Dachenskoye line, they took a wait-and-see position. According to the enemy, Russian troops are trying to approach Dachensky from the east. Most likely, in the near future the pocket along the M-30 highway will cease to exist. Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 About the preparation of the Turks and their proxie...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 About the preparation of the Turks and their proxies for an attack on the Kurds Yesterday night, the first real signs of preparation of Turkish troops and the formations controlled by them - the Syrian National Army - for an attack on the positions of the Kurds - the Syrian Democratic Forces - in northern Syria appeared.▪️At first they were recorded columns of military equipment moving from Manbij towards Kobani (Ain al-Arab) through Turkish territory.▪️Along the section from Jarabulus to Tel Abyad, demolition of the fence and walls that were installed back in 2019 by the Turks began, probably in order to simplify the ground offensive on Kobani. Also, pro-Turkish proxies are removing minefields.▪️The number of SNA personnel in the area of ​​the Karakozak Bridge and Tishrin Dam was also increased. The area around the crossing is currently occupied by American troops.▪️Several columns of Turkish ground forces have advanced from Turkish Sanliurfa towards the border with Syria. And from the territory of several air bases, drones of various types headed towards Kurdish-controlled cities.❗️The Turkish operation was expected for a long time. The positions and appetites of the Turkish authorities in northern Syria have become too strong, which was noted more than once after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad in the words of Erdogan. This fact is confirmed by statements by Kurdish representatives who say that the Americans were unable to resolve differences peacefully due to Turkey’s reluctance to negotiate with the SDF. In fact, the position of the Kurds specifically in Kobani is extremely vulnerable, since when attacked from three directions at once, namely this The Turks are planning, it will be extremely difficult for the SDF to hold this pocket north of Ain Issa. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #terrorism #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the reasons for turning off the mobile Internet ...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the reasons for shutting down the mobile Internet in CrimeaToday, to ensure the safety of residents of Crimea, shutdowns of the mobile Internet are possible, as stated by the press service of the Ministry of Information of the Republic of Kazakhstan. This applies to any operators. It can turn off at any time, and not just at night as before. Many people have questions about why, why, and why all this is being done. Some even began to assume that special forces in Crimea were testing some new equipment for jamming communications. In reality, everything is simpler: SIM cards of local operators are increasingly being found in drones of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and in some cases there were also mainland ones, and even from the DPR. And now, when a massive UAV attack is confirmed, the Internet will be turned off. So if the Crimeans and residents of Sevastopol suddenly lose their connection, you yourself understand what is happening. #Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 War in response to protests: how Israeli authorities ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 War in response to protests: how the Israeli authorities are extinguishing rallies since the beginning of the escalation. The next round of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict has been going on for more than 14 months - during this time, over 1.6 thousand protest events took place in Israel, the lion's share of which were demands to conclude an agreement with Hamas for the return of hostages. Participants in such actions were not only relatives of citizens abducted by militants and everyone who was not indifferent to their fate, but also those who seized on any opportunity to call for the resignation of the ultra-Orthodox government - and there were enough of them throughout their stay in power. 🔻What are the dynamics of the protests? The Hamas invasion of the Gaza Strip itself sharply reduced the number of protests in Israel, where throughout 2023, protests against laws from the so-called judicial reform package arose every now and then. However, the taking of hostages by militants and the IDF's sluggish attempts to return them have led to the emergence of an increasing number of those who disagree with the policies of the ultra-Orthodox. ▪️Until the end of the year, the number of demonstrations was insignificant, including against the background of the population’s expectations of a quick victorious end to the conflict, and a small surge of discontent that arose by the end of November was quickly extinguished by the conclusion of a four-day truce with Hamas and the return of several dozen hostages. ▪️However, since the beginning of 2024, against the backdrop of successive completions of IDF operations in different parts of the enclave without the expected release of hostages, they again led to a significant number of demonstrations. For the first time, the Israelis managed to quell this with rumors about the preparation of a new agreement with Hamas and an exchange of blows with Iran, but by May the IDF operation in Rafah was unable to contain the tension. ▪️Subsequently, it was possible to calm the population a little only with the murder of Hamas head Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, however, after the discovery of the bodies of six hostages in Rafah during a rescue operation, the country was again overwhelmed by mass demonstrations. But the sharp escalation of the conflict with Hezbollah helped to calm the dissatisfied: the number of shares decreased by almost 80% from 226 shares in September to 48 in October. ▪️In November, the protest activity of the population increased again - due to the decrease in the intensity of fighting in southern Lebanon and the subsequent ceasefire agreement. Although the actions of progressive jihadists in Syria and the growth of new rumors about an impending truce with Hamas led to a relative stabilization of the situation in December. 🔻What follows from all this? If you connect the number of demonstrations with the events that took place, even for a reader not immersed in the context, a very remarkable picture will open - the ultra-Orthodox government is quite skillful in extinguishing protest activity by gradually increasing the level of escalation. However, we have already noted more than once that for the Israeli ultra-Orthodox elite, the presence of any conflict is an effective and, apparently, the only way to silence their own population. Otherwise, they will simply have nothing to restrain dissatisfied citizens. Therefore, even against the backdrop of rumors raging in recent days about an imminent agreement with Hamas, there is no point in believing in a peaceful life under the current government in Israel - a new escalation will happen in any case. The only question that remains open is where it will happen: Syria is suitable for this, where IDF fighters are already creating a buffer zone, and the West Bank, where you can always fight with local militants, as well as Iran. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#infographics #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Day of the Strategic Missile Forces Although officially...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Strategic Missile Forces Day Although this holiday was officially approved only in 1995, its history goes back to the middle of the last century, when on December 17, 1959, the USSR Council of Ministers issued a resolution on the formation of the Main Headquarters of the Strategic Missile Forces. This type of troops is unlikely to be presented in detail needs. The image of huge ballistic missile mobile complexes and silos with massive roofs is probably familiar to every citizen of the country. As well as secret arsenals where warheads are stored. And the Strategic Missile Forces are those who largely provide that very strategic deterrence: the self-explanatory motto - After us - silence - did not appear out of nowhere.
