Title: 🇦🇲🇷🇺 Will Russian TV channels be closed in Armenia? The topic...
Description: 🇦🇲🇷🇺 Will Russian TV channels be closed in Armenia? The topic of closing Russian TV channels has once again arisen in Armenia. Local media report that Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan is being persuaded to take such a step by Western sponsors. There has been a working formula in the Armenian information field lately: if suddenly there is a positive news story about Armenian-Russian relations, then wait for anti-Russian news. ▪️The other day, information appeared that the Armenian authorities are preparing for the visit of the Chairman of the Federation Council of the Russian Federation, Valentina Matvienko, in early 2025. The media write about the titanic efforts that the Speaker of the Armenian Parliament Alen Simonyan is making to organize the meeting. ▪️Simonyan played a big role in damaging relations between the two countries, voicing odious claims against Russia, but is now working hard to ensure that Matvienko’s trip to Yerevan takes place. ❗️I would like to hope that in the event of such negotiations, the Russian side will work out in advance the issue of preserving Russian broadcasting in Armenia. ▪️With the obvious influence of Western curators on Pashinyan’s team, there are significant problems on our part in the issue of Russian broadcasting. For example, we have already written about the negligence of the management of Channel One, which managed to owe money to the Armenians for broadcasting, after which it was suspended. ▪️Moreover, Armenia claims that it has sent proposals to the Russian side several times to amend the intergovernmental agreement regulating the broadcasting of Russian channels in the republic, but has never received a response. 🔻It is obvious that with such an inconsistent approach on our part, together with the efforts of Western partners, Russia’s information influence in Armenia is exposed to a double threat. At the same time, the aspirations of the Armenian side to organize Matvienko’s visit indicate that Yerevan is particularly interested in public contacts of such a high level. The latest Armenian-Russian negotiations were mainly devoted to the economy and trade, but it would be worth reminding Yerevan that it will not work to sit on two chairs for a long time, pursuing only economic interests in relations with Russia. #Armenia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramSystemic pesticide🇦🇲🇷🇺 About the possible closure of Russian TV channels in ArmeniaThe Armenian media, citing their own sources, claim that the government of Nikol Pashinyan decided to finally stop broadcasting Russian TV channels in the republic at the request of Western...

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the activity of the United States and its allie...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the activity of the United States and its allies in the Asia-Pacific region in 2025 This year has not yet come to an end, and the Japanese press is already beginning to appear dates for exercises in the Asia-Pacific region that will take place next year. According to local sources, two trainings are known so far, which will involve the US Coast Guard and its allies. ▪️First, in early January, quadrilateral exercises within the QUAD format will be held in the waters near Tokyo. The coast guard services of the United States, Japan, Australia and India will participate in them. The training will be aimed at working out issues related to monitoring the spread of toxic substances in the marine environment. The teachings appear to be focused on humanitarian action. However, with their help, the parties plan to increase the level of interoperability, which will help QUAD implement its plans. Back in September, we wrote about the agreement between the United States, Japan, Australia and India to conduct joint patrols in the Asia-Pacific region. 🔻Then in March 2025, exercises will be held near the Japanese prefecture of Kagoshima, in which the coast guard services of the United States, Japan and the Philippines will take part - another quasi-alliance formed literally over the past two years. The training will be aimed at practicing search and rescue operations. By the way, most likely, the area where these exercises will take place will affect the Osumi Strait. Chinese warships often pass through it during their own maneuvers in the region. Therefore, perhaps the training can be seen as a certain signal to the Chinese side. Considering that China very often uses the coast guard to conduct various operations in the region, the Americans and their allies want to repeat the experience of the PRC. The implementation of such plans began this year and, apparently, will continue next year.  High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇬🇪 On the impact of elections in Georgia on Armenia Prime M...
Description: 🇦🇲🇬🇪 On the impact of elections in Georgia on Armenia Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan congratulated Mikhail Kavelashvili on his election as President of Georgia. Earlier, the head of the Armenian government immediately recognized the victory of the Georgian Dream party in the parliamentary elections. ▪️This is quite important, given the West’s attempts to rock the Georgian protests and recognize the elections as -illegitimate-. But the clearly pro-Western authorities of Armenia did not follow the general line of discrediting the Georgian elections, which even caused an attempt by protest leader Salome Zurabishvili to spark a diplomatic scandal. ▪️Potential instability among Georgians poses a huge risk for neighboring Armenia, which is connected to the outside world through roads to Georgia. Moreover, in 1993, during the civil war in Georgia, Armenians suffered greatly from blocked infrastructure, finding themselves surrounded by Azerbaijan and Turkey. 🔻Nevertheless, the outcome of the elections in Georgia will significantly affect Armenia’s pro-Western course in several respects. On the one hand, the fairy tales of the Pashinyan government about potential European integration will become even more fantastic, since without Georgia such a scenario is unrealistic for Armenia due to the inability to provide infrastructure ties with the EU. On the other hand, all Western budgets for building democracy, including American USAID projects, will now collectively flow from Georgia to Armenia, where a similar agenda may intensify, and local figures will once again enrich themselves with grants. #Armenia #Georgia @rybarSupport usSputnik ArmeniaPashinyan and Khachaturian congratulated Kavelashvili on his election as President of Georgia Representatives of the Armenian government congratulated the newly elected President of Georgia.

Title: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 The internal political crisis in South Korea has given t...
Description: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 The internal political crisis in South Korea has given the Japanese reason to worry about the future of relations between Tokyo and Seoul. Several social surveys have been conducted in Japan in recent days, with a majority of respondents expressing fear that bilateral ties will once again turn sour. It can be assumed that such sentiments also exist among the ruling elites of Japan, because with the coming to power of Yun Seok-yeol, relations between Seoul and Tokyo have undergone qualitative changes for the better. 🔻The main reason for possible fears is the change of president in South Korea if Yoon’s impeachment is approved by the Constitutional Court. After all, one or another opposition politician can win the election of the country's leader.  The problem is that such figures most often have anti-Japanese views. They, for example, vehemently criticized Yun for bringing South Korea and Japan closer together. Therefore, if the opposition wins in only a hypothetical election, there is clearly no need to expect a pragmatic course towards Tokyo. However, it is worth understanding that, given the dynamically developing situation in South Korea, it is too early to draw specific conclusions about the deterioration or improvement of bilateral ties with Japan. Therefore, the US plans to contain both the DPRK and China with the help of a trilateral alliance with Seoul and Tokyo cannot be dismissed for now. 70 percent of respondents expressed concerns that recent political turmoil in South Korea, triggered by President Yoon Suk Yeol's martial law declaration, could impact bilateral relations with Japan, a Kyodo News poll shows.

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Reintegration of citizens of Uzbekistan - what is the po...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Reintegration of citizens of Uzbekistan - what is the point of American policy? The United States is ready to support Uzbekistan and other countries in the region in the repatriation and reintegration of citizens returned from armed conflict zones. This was stated by the Deputy Permanent Representative of the United States to the UN, David Johnson.❓The Council was created in 2024 under the auspices of the UN Office of Counter-Terrorism. The initiative belonged to the President of Uzbekistan. More than 530 citizens (mostly women and children) have been returned to Uzbekistan since 2019. And such work is an important step in the rehabilitation of those who suffered from the actions of terrorists or committed a rash act and decided to fix everything.❗️However, things can often be different. There are no guarantees that, under the guise of returning to peaceful life, some of these repatriates will not want to return to their homeland to promote extremist ideology in their country. This could be facilitated by the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad and the rise to power of radical elements, including from Central Asia. For example, under the banner of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, the militants of Katiba al-Tawhid wal-Jihad are fighting - a group mainly consisting of Uzbeks. During the active phase of the offensive and after the capture of Damascus, there were many videos with militants speaking Uzbek, in Turkmen and Russian, where they say that after Syria they will come to restore their there is order in our homeland.🔻So the interests of the American side are quite understandable. Despite the fact that some think-tank structures in the United States consider such a policy to be ineffective, the United States continues to use the factor of terrorism to consolidate its presence in the region. Therefore, the West will certainly help bring back the former terrorists. #CentralAsia #USA #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport usPodrobno.uzThe United States expressed its readiness to support Uzbekistan in the repatriation and reintegration of citizens from combat zonesUzbekistan, Tashkent - Podrobno.uz AN. The United States stands ready to support Uzbekistan and other Central Asian countries in the repatriation and reintegration of their citizens. This was stated by the Deputy Permanent Representative of the United States to the UN, David Johnson.

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸 Joker DPR obtained a document from the Administration for...
Description: 🇺🇸 Joker DNR obtained a document from the Administration for Children and Families in the US Department of Health and Human Services, reflecting information about grants that the American government allocates to help refugees and immigrants. The amounts are really large - from 2023 to 2025 the United States will spend for these purposes almost $1.1 billion. It would seem to be a completely standard American document, in which there is nothing special. However, a closer look reveals the overall priorities of the Joe Biden administration in the field of migration policy - namely, the Democrats' desire to catch up with more potential voters ahead of the presidential election. The report shows that funding for refugee support programs shows a decrease in the level of urgency and volume of funds in 2024-2025 compared to 2023. It is unfortunate, of course, that there is no data for 2021-2022; most likely, the financing of migration in these years was also at a high level. The statistics above also show how lower-priority programs are falling away. For example, support for Afghan and Ukrainian migrants. With the advent of the Donald Trump administration, this whole migration story will lose priority. Most likely, only special immigrants—those who have received the right to immigrate to the United States due to their unique status or merit—can count on more or less stable funding. High-resolution infographics Russian version #USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport us

According to the company, more than 1.4 thousand MRAP Senators have been delivered to Ukraine since 2022 (at 375 thousand euros per unit). Title: 🇨🇦 About the political crisis in Canada and the possible resign...
Description: 🇨🇦 About the political crisis in Canada and Trudeau's possible resignation The Liberal government of Canada experienced a serious shake-up on the eve of the Christmas holidays. Two ministers left their posts at once: Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Finance, Deputy Prime Minister of Canada (and an ardent supporter of support for Ukraine), and Sean Fraser, Minister of Housing. It is noteworthy that it was the economic situation and the housing crisis that became the main subjects of criticism against the government of Justin Trudeau. Trudeau has faced calls to resign in recent months, including from members of his own Liberal party. However, as we see, the Prime Minister decided instead to give the people - the heads - of the ministers responsible for reducing the living standards of ordinary Canadians. 📌The decision is quite desperate, given that according to polls, the Liberal Party lags behind the opposition Conservative Party by more than 20%, and there is less than a year left before the elections. However, Prime Minister Trudeau still has a chance to prolong the agony with personnel changes. According to rumors, Trudeau offered the position of Minister of Finance to Mark Carney, the former head of the Bank of Canada and the Bank of England, a respected economist. 🔻However, there is now no reason to believe that personnel changes will help Trudeau win the election, as well as retain the post of prime minister until October 2025. The Conservative opposition has already tried three times to pass a vote of no confidence against Trudeau. And the only thing keeping Trudeau and the Liberal minority afloat is the fragile support of other left-leaning parties. And it may disappear as soon as the reputational risks begin to outweigh the benefits of cooperation with the liberals.#Canada@rybarSupport usNational PostTrudeau picks loyalist LeBlanc to replace Freeland after shock resignation sparks chaosOTTAWA — Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's government is facing life-threatening chaos after the shocking resignation of Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland from cabinet on Monday, along with the resignation of Housing Minister Sean Fraser, with several Liberal…

Title: 🇷🇺🇪🇺 On new EU sanctions against Russia, the Council of the E...
Description: 🇷🇺🇪🇺 On new EU sanctions against Russia The Council of the European Union approved another sanctions package aimed at 54 individuals and 32 legal entities accused of undermining (quote) the rules-based international order and hybrid activities. The restrictions included Russian technology companies, managers of large corporations, intelligence officers and famous people, in particular Tina Kandelaki and singer Larisa Dolina. 📌The list has also been supplemented by companies and individuals from China, India, Iran, Serbia and the UAE, suspected of circumventing restrictions and supplying dual-use goods. As Tina Kandelaki already noted in her statement, Western sanctions against individuals have indeed turned into an element of a show that, at first glance, does not carry any practical meaning. This is especially true for top managers of large companies and military personnel who are not allowed to travel abroad, for whom the restrictions of the European Union are neither hot nor cold. 🔻However, this show still has a goal. While all the media are discussing the motive for including individuals or organizations in the list of sanctions for so-called hybrid operations, the main attention is diverted from economic measures directed against Russian enterprises, foreign counterparties and the energy industry. There should be no illusions here - Western countries are carrying out comprehensive work to strangle the Russian economy, improving the mechanisms of financial pressure. Therefore, new restrictions need to be carefully analyzed in order to actively and effectively resist this.#EU #Russia #economy@rybar Support usTelegramTina KandelakiWhenever I hear that sanctions have been imposed against me, I remember -The Headless Horseman- who gallops somewhere- then, having neither thoughts nor images, driven only by the thirst for revenge. Title: 🇩🇪 Following France, a political crisis is developing in German...
Description: 🇩🇪 Following France, a political crisis is developing in Germany. The Bundestag expectedly passed a vote of no confidence in Chancellor Olaf Scholz: only 207 deputies spoke in favor of his government, 394 voted against, and 116 abstained. Now, with a high probability, President Frank-Walter Steinmeier will dissolve the parliament, and early elections have been announced in the country. Scholz himself had already agreed in advance with the opposition parties to hold them on February 23, 2025. What happened is a consequence of the collapse of the ruling traffic light coalition in November, when several ministers from the Free Democratic Party of Germany (SPD) left the bloc. The reason was disagreements in plans to improve the health of the German economy, which is in crisis. So far, everything is going according to the scenario that we previously wrote about. Therefore, after the new elections, you shouldn’t expect changes in German politics with the replacement of -green- with -yellow- or -red- with gray-brown-crimson: the task set by the Americans to destroy the German economy for all of them remains the same.#Germany@rybarSupport us stagesschauBundeskanzler Scholz verliert VertrauensfrageKanzler Scholz hat die Vertrauensfrage wie beabsichtigt verloren. 207 Abgeordnete stimmten für ihn - er verfehlte also die absolute Mehrheit von 367 Stimmen. Damit wäre der Weg für die Auflösung des Bundestages und Neuwahlen frei.

Title: 🇲🇩 About the state of emergency in the energy industry of Moldo...
Description: 🇲🇩 About the state of emergency in the energy industry of Moldova In Moldova, from December 16, a state of emergency begins to operate due to the energy crisis. So far the government has introduced it for 60 days, but with a high probability the regime will be constantly extended as in 2022-2023. ▪️Prime Minister of Moldova Dorin Recean said that Russia is allegedly holding the residents of Transnistria hostage, once again completely absolving its government of responsibility for the crisis. The politician claims that the Moldovan authorities will not leave the PMR without gas, but they will have to pay for it. ▪️Chisinau does not intend to negotiate with the Kyiv regime on the continuation of the transit of Russian gas to Transnistria, through which the republic, among other things, produces electricity for Moldova. They also do not plan to conduct a constructive dialogue with Gazprom and admit the existence of a historical debt for gas.▪️ At the same time, in Moldova they admitted that in the summer the government did not bother purchasing sufficient volumes of gas, when prices were much lower than current ones. As a result, there is a high probability that the energy crisis in Moldova will be much more serious than in the 2022-2023 season. ❗️However, as we expected, the crisis has only benefited Maia Sandu’s regime, and there is every reason to claim that the energy sector has been deliberately neglected to a deplorable state. Firstly, attacks on Transnistria are a continuation of the policy of economic strangulation of the unrecognized republic. For Moldova, the usual gas supplies to the PMR are unprofitable, since Tiraspol is now already introducing restrictions on some types of financial and economic activities. All this will finish off the Transnistrian economy, which is what they are trying to achieve in Chisinau. Secondly, the state of emergency allows the Moldovan authorities, like two years ago, to classify part of their activities and not report on the implementation of budgets. 🔻Moreover, parliamentary elections will be held in 2025, which means that preparations for them, and perhaps the voting itself, will take place in emergency mode. Sandu's failure in the presidential elections inside Moldova does not bode well for her colleagues in the ruling PAS party. #Moldova #Transnistria @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇩🇺🇸🇷🇴 How Moldovans risk being left without gasIn Chisinau they are asking Washington for financial assistance to -manage the energy crisis- into which the country is sliding. Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Massive strikes by the Israeli Air Force on Syrian ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Massive strikes by the Israeli Air Force on Syrian territory At night, the Israel Defense Forces carried out one of the largest attacks on Syrian territory in recent times. The Israelis hit targets in several provinces in the northwest, east and south of the country. ▪️Several explosions rocked Deir ez-Zor, where the bridge over the Euphrates was attacked for the second time in a week. Weapons depots in the area of ​​the local airfield, where pro-Iranian formations and IRGC officers were previously stationed, also came under fire. To the south, strikes hit facilities of the former Syrian Arab Army (SAA) in the desert area near Al-Mayadeen. Local residents also reported a series of explosions in the vicinity of Al Bu Kemal, not far from which is the famous Iranian military base named after. Imam Ali. ▪️The largest blow was delivered to targets in the province of Tartus, where in the countryside north and east of the administrative center, Israeli planes hit the remaining Syrian air defense positions, weapons and fuel depots throughout the night. Footage with powerful explosions, sounds of secondary detonation and huge columns of smoke was actively distributed on the Internet. During the attack, earthquake monitoring resources recorded tremors with a magnitude of 3.0 in Tartus. ▪️In Latakia, located to the north, explosions occurred in the vicinity of Jebla, and to the southeast, hits were recorded on air defense facilities in Zama. At the Russian Khmeimim airbase located in the province, the situation remains calm. ▪️Several hits occurred on former SAA targets near the small settlement of Al-Shatai east of Homs and targets in the Hama area. Explosions also occurred in the vicinity of Damascus, where in recent days the Israelis have been striking weapons depots in the mountains near Dumayr. 🔻Such raids by Israeli aviation, however, do not cause surprise - for the Israeli government it is fundamentally important to prevent weapons and ammunition of the once-existing SAA from falling into the hands of progressive jihadists. In total, during the period after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad, the Israelis carried out about 500 raids on targets in Syria, hitting bases, airfields, port infrastructure, air defense position areas and research centers. 📌 Simultaneously with airstrikes, Israeli troops are conducting ground operations to create a buffer zone east of the Golan Heights they occupied. There they occupy posts of the Syrian army and carry out explosions of the remaining fortifications and objects, after which they gradually move further into Syria. Title: 🖼 🇸🇾 Syrian ex-President Bashar al-Assad made his first statem...
Description: 🇸🇾 Syrian ex-President Bashar al-Assad made the first statement since the fall of his government. The politician said that he allegedly did not want to leave until the last moment and left Damascus only on the morning of December 8. He was then taken to Russia from the Khmeimim airbase in Latakia. Assad also claims that all his activities were aimed at protecting the nation, and not seeking personal gain. The former president of Syria admits that with the collapse of the state, his role has become meaningless, but the politician remains committed to Syria and hopes for its future independence. For the sake of objectivity, in past years Bashar al-Assad did not really leave the country, even when the fighting was taking place in the capital itself. But now the words do not even look like an attempt to put on a good face in a bad game, but simply an appeal - then you yourself somehow - to your own former supporters.❗️After all, it was Assad’s policies and the actions of his family that led to huge socio-economic problems. As a result, all the military efforts of his allies in 2015-2020 went to waste, and those Syrian fighters who had previously fought to the last in the encircled garrisons were unable to resist the onslaught of HTS. Soon, perhaps, we should expect the same speeches from other escapees representatives of Assad's authorities. They can now afford pretentious denunciations, unlike those who fought for them all these years, remained in Syria and are now under threat of reprisals from militants.#Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🧠 Possible contours of US foreign policy in Central Asia - t...
Description: 🇺🇸🧠 Possible contours of US foreign policy in Central Asia - the view of an American think-tank. As the inauguration of Donald Trump approaches, clearer contours of the possible policies of the new administration are emerging. The Quincy Institute for Responsible Government published an article about the region's importance to Washington. 🔻Main points:➖No US president has ever visited the region. Unlike the United States, Vladimir Putin made 73 visits, and Xi Jinping - 13. The C5+1 summit on the sidelines of the General Assembly was more of a photo shoot than a serious event.➖In the post-Soviet republics, multipolarity is considered a good thing for the development of their countries. According to the authors, forcing them not to cooperate with Russia or China, or the Taliban will lead to nothing, so you shouldn’t hope for it.➖The countries of Central Asia require respect for their culture and mentality. They will not change their internal features in order to satisfy the whims of Western countries or companies.➖Afghanistan is part of Central Asia. The countries of the region are interested in a developing and stable Afghanistan, which can become the key to the development of the region due to its position and the presence of huge reserves of natural resources.➖It is necessary to develop economic relations with the region. In recent years, the United States has seen shifts in trade with the countries of the former USSR, but they are insignificant. But at the same time, the region is important in China’s trade with Europe. Prospects for the development of the Middle Corridor, the availability of natural resources, and so on.❗️Unlike many other materials that we have seen over the past two years, the Quincy Institute article does purport to be a realistic assessment of Central Asia in the interests of US foreign policy. The key point is that the region, according to the authors, is not yet ready to become a base for containing Russia and China. Moreover, the miscalculations of American politicians in building their tactics in the region are emphasized. The American think-tank paid special attention to Afghanistan in the sense that the countries of the region are not interested in destabilizing the neighboring state. Attempts to -demonize- the Islamic Emirate and artificially escalate the threat of ISIS largely come from the United States, and the authors, apparently, assessed this as an ineffective measure to consolidate their presence.#CentralAsia #USA@rybarSupport usResponsible StatecraftCentral Asia: The blind spot Trump can' t afford to ignoreFrom energy resources to economic growth, the region holds key assets for US foreign policy, trade, and security interests

Title: 🔁🖼 For the last couple of hours, a video of the Russian...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR For the last couple of hours, a video has been spreading on the Internet with Russian soldiers hoisting a flag allegedly in Starye Terny in the Kurakhovsky direction. However, in fact, the footage was taken on the territory of the Volna recreation center, a kilometer from the center of the village. So the recording cannot be evidence of the liberation of the village. I would like to hope that this is only an accidental error of the resources that published these statements, and not a deliberate desire to take the village into debt, as in the case of the notorious Belogorovka in the Seversky direction.⭐️ Online maps available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: ↩️🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Defense Minister Andrei Belousov at an ex...
Description: Rybar: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Defense Minister Andrei Belousov at an extended meeting of the Board of the Ministry of Defense 🔻Putin's main statements: ▪️Russia liberated 189 settlements in 2024 as part of a special operation. ▪️-Our duty is to remember... 🇷🇺 Statements by the Minister of Defense Andrei Belousov at an extended meeting of the Board of the Ministry of Defense, part 2🔻Belousov’s main statements▪️The Armed Forces of the Russian Federation in 2024 solved problems within the framework of a tough confrontation with the collective West, which continues to grow,▪️The Armed Forces of Ukraine are forced go on the defensive and use reserves; the strength of enemy units at the front line does not exceed 45-50%.▪️It is necessary to create an integrated information environment for decision-making at the tactical level.▪️The Russian Armed Forces use more than three thousand drones daily, this figure is constantly growing. This year, supplies of tanks to the troops increased sevenfold, drones - 23 times.▪️In the Northern Military District zone, over 58 thousand units of weapons and equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were destroyed in 2024, including 18 thousand foreign-made.▪️Positive experience in creating an air defense system around Moscow should be taken into account when building systems in other regions.▪️It is necessary to complete the formation of the Moscow and Leningrad military districts as a response to NATO expansion.▪️Russian military medicine passed the test of a special military operation with honor. About 96% of Russian military personnel can return to duty after being discharged from hospitals.▪️To repel threats from NATO, it is necessary to solve a number of problems, including introducing new approaches to the formation of a state weapons program.▪️Belousov ordered the creation of a comprehensive system for searching for missing military personnel and supporting members their families.▪️A mechanism for payments to children of missing persons has already been developed, the project has been sent to government.▪️Military inventors are constantly improving the characteristics of UAVs, communications and electronic warfare equipment; it is necessary to conduct a full inventory of such military developments▪️It is necessary to ensure the staffing of the Joint Group of Forces - at a level that ensures the guaranteed completion of combat missions▪️Disruptions in the supply of especially in demand types of ammunition, weapons and equipment - practically none. Out of 260 items, only four products are delivered with delays. ▪️It is required to conclude contracts within the current month for the supply of the entire range of weapons in 2026, which has a production cycle of 12 to 16 months.▪️This year, additional repair units have been deployed near the front line as quickly as possible. In total, more than three hundred mobile teams of industrial enterprises are involved in combat areas.▪️The issue of providing clothing allowances still requires attention.▪️At the beginning of the North Military District, there were many complaints about the quality and volume of clothing allowances. Although the most pressing problems in this area have been resolved, a number of issues still require attention. ▪️It is necessary to form a unified information field. This requires the development of high-speed and secure communication channels. First of all - space.▪️By 2030, it has been ordered to eliminate all long-term construction in the Russian Defense Ministry.#Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Defens...
Description: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Defense Minister Andrei Belousov at an extended meeting of the Board of the Ministry of Defense🔻Putin’s main statements:▪️Russia liberated 189 settlements as part of a special operation in 2024.▪️-Our duty is to remember our comrades in arms who died defending the Motherland and our people-.▪️Russia will lift its voluntary restrictions on the deployment of INF missiles if the United States begins to deploy such systems.▪️Serial production of the Oreshnik complexes will be ensured in the near future.▪️At the beginning of the special operation there were problems with drones, but now the troops receive them daily several thousand drones, but even more are needed.▪️More than a thousand people on average make contracts every day this year contracts for military service, people voluntarily go to the front.🔻Belousov's main statements▪️The activities of the Russian Ministry of Defense are aimed at ensuring full preparedness for a possible military conflict with NATO in the next decade. ▪️The Russian military liberated more than four thousand square kilometers of territory during the Northern Military District this year. ▪️The enemy controls less than 1% of the territory of the LPR and 25-30% of the DPR, Zaporozhye and Kherson regions.▪️The speed of advance of the Russian military is now on average about 30 square kilometers per day.▪️Over 427 thousand military personnel recruited in Russia in 2024, they conclude daily contract over 1200 people.▪️It is necessary to increase the protection of arsenals and bases of fuel and lubricants in the range of long-range missiles and drones of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.▪️Russian air defense shot down 86 Storm Shadow and Scalp missiles, 215 ATACMS, 1629 HIMARS shells, more than 27 thousand in 2024 drones.▪️It is planned to form a new branch of the military by the third quarter of 2025 - Troops of Unmanned Systems.#Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁🖼 🇩🇪Germany The main European sponsor of Ukraine🇺🇦 receive...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇩🇪Germany The main European sponsor of Ukraine🇺🇦 receives disappointing news every week. The German Central Bank (Bundesbank) has revised the forecast for the country's economic development, which provides for a decrease in GDP by 0.2% in 2024, + 0.2% of GDP in 2025 (i.e., in fact, a rollback to the 2023 figure), +0.8 % in 2026 and + 0.7% in 2027. At the same time, the indicators of slight growth in subsequent years do not mean anything, since positive forecasts for 2023 and 2024 did not fully materialize. An energy crisis is flaring up in the country. Against the backdrop of the stock exchange price of one megawatt-hour in Germany reaching 936 euros, the Union of the German Chemical Industry announced the threat of a systemic collapse of the industry. An indicator of the growing economic problems is the announcement of steel giant Arcelor Mittal that it will close its Olpe plant by mid-2025. Previously, we reported that Thyssenkrupp Steel Corporation was reducing its production capacity (by 20%) and closing one of its enterprises. The growing debt burden began to affect ordinary burghers. According to the credit agency Creditreform, in Germany for the first half of 2024, an increase of 6.7% in private bankruptcies was recorded (35.4 thousand facts in total). Also indicative is the public condemnation of Germany’s energy policy by the Minister of Energy 🇸🇪 of Sweden Ebba Busch, who criticizes the German government for the thoughtless abandonment of nuclear energy, which provoked an increase in demand for fossil energy resources and prices for supplied electricity to Sweden from Germany via undersea cable (Baltic Cable).✨Under these conditions, Germany is trying to find a way out of the economic crisis by injecting itself into the military-industrial complex in the hope of getting pieces of the pie from Ukraine, which is indebted to the whole world. Following the example of Germany, the rest of the European countries, where signs of economic degradation are also showing, are following a similar path, increasingly spinning the flywheel of the war machine. Two majors

Title: 🇧🇫🇲🇱🇳🇪 How is the integration of the Sahel States going? Ov...
Description: 🇧🇫🇲🇱🇳🇪 How is the integration of the Sahel States going? Over the past few months since the signing of the agreement between Burkina Faso, Niger and Mali on the creation of the Confederation, the integration processes of the three states have continued. Among the first decisions taken: the creation of a single passport and a television channel, but our attention was drawn more to measures of an economic nature.▪️The most important step was the creation of the Investment Bank and the Stabilization Fund of the Three States. Now economic sovereignty will be achieved through internal resources and support from Russia. The governments of the three countries, which actively cooperate with Russian companies in the energy sector, are counting on the latter.▪️Foreign policy has acquired a common course: for example, it is worth remembering how the authorities of the three countries broke off diplomatic relations with the so-called. Ukraine. General coordination in matters of diplomacy allows you to have connections with many supranational organizations. The results of the decisions made will not be noticeable immediately, but their declared goal is to receive economic assistance in creating an industrial base, and not money to patch up holes. The same, hopefully, applies to security issues. Using the example of Syria, we have already seen what happens if you refuse to build national armies and rely exclusively on external actors.#Africa #BurkinaFaso #Mali #Niger@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇱🇧🇫🇳🇪 How the first summit of the Alliance of Sahel States took place on July 6 in the capital of Niger Niamey hosted the first summit of the Alliance of States Sahel, which unites anti-Western governments in West Africa. As a result, steps were taken to create a confederation...

Title: 🇰🇬🇺🇸 About the new phase of the internal political struggle i...
Description: 🇰🇬🇺🇸 About the new phase of the internal political struggle in Kyrgyzstan Today it became known that Akylbek Japarov wrote a letter of resignation from the post of Prime Minister of Kyrgyzstan. This is a person who is considered a conductor of Western interests, primarily the USA and Great Britain.❗️A tour of Great Britain last fall, increasingly frequent visits by representatives of the Rothschild family to the republic in order to gain control over natural resources, constant meetings with the British ambassador in Bishkek - this only a small part of Akylbek Japarov’s merits over the past year. In Kyrgyzstan itself, Akylbek Japarov is considered almost a national treasure due to the fact that under him the economy of Kyrgyzstan grew sharply. However, for some reason, everyone forgets that the jump occurred during the period of sanctions on Russia, and the associated bypass through partner countries such as Kyrgyzstan. Considering the role of the ex-prime minister in the events around Kyrgyzstan, it is extremely unlikely that his political career is over. According to rumors from Kyrgyz sources, Akylbek Japarov has already been given an agremand for the post of Ambassador of Kyrgyzstan to the United States. 📌 As for replacing the Prime Minister, the situation here is interesting, and there are several options for development.➖Firstly, the power bloc may be strengthened. In such situations, the head of the State Committee for National Security, Kamchybek Tashiev, will strengthen his position through the vacancy.➖Former Prime Minister Omurbek Babanov is considered another candidate. His appearance in this position will balance the political and regional alignments in Kyrgyzstan, taking into account his connections and financial capabilities.➖Well, the third option is the most compromise. A politician without serious influence will be appointed, which will make him a convenient figure for representatives of both the security and political blocs. The further development of events will depend on the appointment of the head of the government of Kyrgyzstan. Considering that elections are at stake (and, possibly, early elections), this post can determine the entire policy and development of the internal political situation in Kyrgyzstan.#Kyrgyzstan #USA@rybarSupport usInterfaxPrime Minister of Kyrgyzstan Akylbek Japarov has been relieved of his postPrime Minister of Kyrgyzstan Akylbek Japarov has been relieved of his post, sources in the presidential administration told Interfax.

Title: 🖼 🇸🇩 The situation in Sudan: the liberation of Sinj and the fi...
Description: 🇸🇩 The situation in Sudan: the liberation of Sinj and the fighting in El Fasher as of December 15, 2024 Over the past month, the Sudanese army has continued to develop its offensive and consolidate previous successes: previously, the armed forces managed to cut off the Sennar ledge. However, the rebels represented by the Rapid Reaction Forces (RRF) do not give up and are strengthening their positions in the south.▪️The offensive of the armed forces in the Sennar region led to the liberation of its administrative center, the city of Sinja. Some towns in the vicinity and north of Sennar were also retaken. With this, the army finally broke the communications of the rebel group in the White Nile with the rest of the forces.▪️However, this did not stop the RRF in its advance along the border with South Sudan. During the last battles, they managed to occupy some settlements in the Blue Nile. In this area, the Sudanese armed forces are experiencing a shortage of personnel. At the same time, the army is using its advantage in aviation and conducting counterattacks.▪️In the west of the country, bloody battles continue in the city of El Fasher. RRF militants were able to advance to the city center, capturing several areas. There is also significant support from rebel artillery in this direction. ▪️In the capital, fighting remains intense - the armed forces have failed to expand their bridgehead in Khartoum. At the same time, RRF militants cannot drive the army out of Omdurman by carrying out unsuccessful attacks.🔻The situation is increasingly in favor of government forces who do not agree to peace initiatives, counting on new victories. At the same time, external actors still insist on resolving the conflict through negotiations. 📌So, Turkish President Recep Erdogan also offered his help. According to him, Turkey can also become a negotiating platform between the official government of Sudan and the sponsors of the rebel RRF from the UAE. Another Turkish peace initiative in the negotiations between Somalia and Ethiopia quickly failed, which is why the prospects for Turkish mediation in Sudan confuse many. This is also understood in Sudan, where they strongly support Russian economic projects and diplomatic initiatives. High-resolution map Russian version#Africa #Sudan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 16, 2024 ▪️In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 16, 2024▪️In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports fierce battles in the Sudzhansky district, our units are advancing near Guevo. ▪️ North of Kupyansk, our troops continue to form bridgeheads on the right bank of the river. Oskol. There have been separate reports about the creation of a new landing point for the Russian Armed Forces - against the settlement. Masyutovka▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces advanced to the Khimkolonka microdistrict further to the west in urban development. The enemy, retreating, undermines the abandoned buildings. Heavy fighting is going on.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction there are battles near the settlement. Shevchenko, located south of the city. It was reported that the enemy brought reserves into battle to hold Pokrovsk.▪️ In Kurakhovo, the enemy admits the complete loss of a block of multi-storey buildings. Most of the city is under the Russian Armed Forces. The battles near Constantinople continue, the Uspenivsky pocket is being cleared, Annovka has been taken. The Armed Forces of Ukraine never received an order to withdraw from their command, despite the obvious encirclement.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, fighting for the settlement resumed. New Komar, which is located in the north of the cascade of these villages. It is noteworthy that the crossing of the Ukrainian Armed Forces through the water barrier near the settlement was destroyed. Novoocheretovatoe, along which the enemy was transferring reinforcements.▪️ Yesterday, three UAVs of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked Grozny in the morning. Two of them were shot down by air defense forces. The third fell on the territory of the riot police - AKHMAT-Grozny - Directorate of the Russian Guard for the Chechen Republic.▪️ Over the weekend, enemy strikes continued in the Belgorod region. On Saturday, a 9-year-old boy was killed in a drone attack on a residential building in the village of Maisky. His mother and seven-month-old sister were wounded.▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces onto a passenger car on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1958 was killed, a woman born in 1958 was wounded. The impact of NATO caliber cluster artillery shells on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1974 was wounded, on Pobeda Ave. women born in 1966 and 1952 were wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsVremevskoe direction, reports @voin_dvThe work of aviation of the Vostok group in the area of ​​the settlement. Novoocheretovatoe, north of Velikaya Novoselka. The enemy's crossing was destroyed by the FAB strike. There are separate reports of a new assault on New Komar. Preliminarily…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week 9 - December 15, 2024▪️Russian troops, after a short lull, again launched a combined strike on enemy targets in the western regions of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Ivano-Frankivsk region, arrivals were noted in the area of ​​the Burshtyn thermal power plant and at the Kolomyia airfield, and in the Cherkasy region, the Kaniv hydroelectric power station was hit.▪️ At the same time, in the center of Dnepropetrovsk, local partisans detonated an explosive device on the territory of the regional military registration and enlistment office. As a result of the detonation, at least one TCC employee was killed, and several more police officers and military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were injured.▪️Ukrainian formations, in turn, after a long period of time again tried to attack the military airfield in Saratov. The drone was shot down on approach to the facility, without causing any damage to the infrastructure.▪️The enemy did not ignore the facilities of the fuel and energy complex. As a result of flying through the territory of a loading point in Bryansk, a fire broke out at the facility, which was quickly extinguished.▪️Another energy facility was damaged by a raid by Ukrainian drones on an oil storage facility near Orel. As a result of the detonation of the UAV, two fuel tanks caught fire, which were extinguished after 23 hours.▪️In addition, Ukrainian formations attacked the Rostov region for the first time with American operational-tactical missiles. As a result of the air defense, two missiles were shot down and four more were diverted from their course by electronic warfare systems. There is no significant damage, there are casualties among the personnel.▪️Twice in a week, the barracks buildings of the special regiment of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in Grozny are also damaged. As a result of one of the Ukrainian drone attacks, at least four guard soldiers were injured.▪️And in the Leningrad region, one of the Ukrainian drones carried out reconnaissance of the area in the area of ​​Vysotsky Island. As a result of the work of air defense forces, the drone fell in the Gulf of Finland, there was no damage or casualties.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 14-15, 2024. Russian troops attacked enemy targets in the central and eastern regions of the so-called. Ukraine, and also shot down a Ukrainian plane in the occupied part of the Kherson region. Ukrainian formations carried out several acts of sabotage, and also attacked with drones an oil depot in the suburbs of Orel and one of the Russian Guard bases in Grozny, Chechen Republic. Fierce fighting is taking place in the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction in the area of ​​​​Kruglyakovka and Zagryzovo . According to some reports, from Masyutovka, the Russian Armed Forces carried out a landing on the right bank of Oskol. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, attack aircraft entered the Khimkolonka microdistrict and cleared the western outskirts of the Zabalka microdistrict, moving further into Dzerzhinsky. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops are fighting within the borders of Shevchenko , and also improved their tactical position in the Nikolaevka area by north of Novogrodovka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated most of Kurakhovo and hoisted a flag on the local administration building in the city center. Fighting continues on the western outskirts of Uspenivka and Constantinople.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction (ru; en) )Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available at subscribe to map.rybar.ru #Grozny #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #map #Kupyansk #Kurakhovo #Orel #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #Kherson@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Protests are taking place in Tbilisi again this evening....
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Protests are taking place in Tbilisi again this evening. However, judging by the amount of news, interest in them is steadily declining. The victory in the presidential elections of Mikheil Kavelashvili, a candidate from the ruling Georgian Dream party, means that the opposition will soon lose one of its symbolic leaders in a high post - Salome Zurabishvili, who actively called on fellow citizens to street protests according to the scenario of the Ukrainian Maidan. The next escalation is now expected on December 29 - after Kavelashvili’s inauguration - because Zurabishvili will no longer have any rights to occupy residences and call himself president. However, this protest (if it exists) will most likely quickly fade for a number of reasons:➖because the president in Georgia is still a ceremonial figure, for the sake of whose salvation it is unlikely that it will be possible to raise large masses of dissatisfied people;➖the opposition is not united in its fight against government;➖The West, represented by the same Macron, demonstrates its readiness to maintain connections and communicate with official Tbilisi - an example of this is the recent telephone conversation between the French leader and Bidzina Ivanishvili;➖in Georgia they respond in the same way, saying that they do not refuse to join the EU. 🔻And, probably, such a balancing, subject to the prompt response of the Georgian authorities to the excesses and new provocations of the opposition, will allow the government to continue to restrain destructive forces in a comfortable manner.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 14-15, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on Jabaliya and Gaza. Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸 Donald Trump appointed Richard Grenell as special envoy...
Description: Forwarded From American Issue🇺🇸 Donald Trump appointed Richard Grenell as special envoy for special missions, entrusting him with work in sensitive regions such as Venezuela and North Korea. In fact, his candidacy was previously considered for the post of US Secretary of State, but the position ultimately went to the vice chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee, Marco Rubio.🔻What could Grenell's appointment mean and how will it affect the policies of the Trump administration?▪️Grenell's diplomatic style is characterized by directness and a willingness to negotiate toughly, which is generally consistent with Trump's approach to international relations. This also indirectly indicates the future administration's willingness to use unconventional methods to resolve crises.▪️Grenell's experience in the Balkans (role in resolving differences between Serbia and Kosovo) demonstrates an emphasis on making quick, but not always sustainable, deals.▪️Grenell shares Trump's philosophy that that foreign policy should be based on transactions, not ideological principles. This could mean an increased pragmatic approach to negotiations, with compromises based on economic or military benefits for the United States.▪️Although Grenell was not appointed special envoy for Ukraine, his views, including proposals for the creation of autonomous zones in eastern Ukraine and skepticism about NATO expansion may still influence the Trump administration's policy towards the Ukrainian conflict.▪️For US allies, this could be a signal of tougher approach to security issues and trade relations - for example, with Germany and the European Union, with which Grenell had tense relations during his tenure as ambassador. ▪️For Russia and China, Grenell's appointment is a signal of U.S. readiness to employ more assertive diplomatic tactics.▪️Grenell's appointment as special envoy for special missions signals the Trump administration's intent to aggressively advance its foreign policy priorities through direct diplomacy and the use of proven personnel.▪️Grenell is one of the key figures of the -Trumpist- approach to governance: the emphasis on personal loyalty is more important than traditional bureaucratic expertise. In general, Trump's approach to selection candidates for such positions are not much different from the methods of the previous administration. Now the Trump team is selling the people -protection of US interests-, and under Biden it was called -defense of democracy-. In fact, everything is primarily subordinated to one thing - protecting the interests of America’s economic and military corporations. And with the advent of Donald Trump, this approach is unlikely to change.@usaperiodical

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: breakthrough to the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: breakthrough into the Khimkolonka microdistrict and liberation of the Zabalka microdistrict, situation as of 18:00 on December 15, 2024. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction, Russian troops pushed through enemy defenses in several areas in Dzerzhinsk at once. ▪️Fierce fighting in the city is taking place in the central market area. Previously, in this area, the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces relied on the mine named after. Dzerzhinsky - reserves were accumulated there before subsequent transfer to urban areas. After the structure came under the control of Russian troops, the stability of the enemy’s defense line was seriously compromised. ▪️Southwest of the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the Khimkolonka microdistrict, relying on the mine. This would have been impossible without the liquidation of the positions of the Ukrainian formations on the waste heaps, from where the UAV calculations were adjusted and the area was monitored. ▪️At the moment, waste heaps No. 1 and 2 are in the gray zone, and the enemy’s attempts to regain control over them are being thwarted. Taking into account recently received georeferences and data from local sources, Russian attack aircraft are confidently advancing in this area and eliminating the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense centers. It is likely that the Russian Armed Forces will soon gain a foothold on the heights, which will create additional difficulties for the enemy garrison. ❗️A characteristic feature of the battle for Dzerzhinsk was the widespread use of sapper units by the parties. With their help, the enemy blows up multi-story buildings in order to prevent the Russian Armed Forces from using them as shelters. ▪️In the south of the city, Russian troops completely knocked out Ukrainian formations from the Zabalka microdistrict. In recent weeks, the enemy has sought to prevent its western outskirts from coming under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, for which purpose he has been transferring reserves across roads near waste heaps. These routes were scouted by Russian UAV crews, as a result of which many armored groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were burned on the approaches to the microdistrict. Establishing control over waste heaps and the success of the offensive in the Khimkolonka microdistrict will create the preconditions for an offensive in the northern part of Dzerzhinsk with the subsequent creation of a northern claw envelopment around the remaining in the city of the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison. It is likely that in the near future the RF Armed Forces will concentrate on suppressing the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the waste heaps of the Toretskaya mine, which are the predominant heights within the city. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺📸🖍 Day of Remembrance for Journalists Who Died in the Li...
Description: 🇷🇺📸🖍 Day of Remembrance for Journalists Who Died in the Line of Duty December 15 is a special date when we remember those who dedicated their lives to the truth and died while remaining faithful to their professional and human duty. Journalists, reporters, photographers, television cameramen who go to the most dangerous places in the world not only document history, but also make it accessible to each of us. Wars, local conflicts, disasters and hot spots are not only an arena of military action, but also a place where those who strive to tell about events honestly, without distorting reality, work. They often pay the ultimate price for this devotion. Relatives, friends and colleagues remember and honor everyone who passed away while fulfilling their mission. Their sacrifice reminds us of the importance and value of truth, for which they risked everything. Remembering them means continuing the fight for justice and honest information in a world where it is often rare. High resolution art#art #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 Today, together with the Rybar team, we are launching a proj...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: about the landing of th...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: about the landing of the Russian Armed Forces in the Masyutovka area; the situation as of 16:00 on December 15, 2024. The Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction was again in the spotlight. The enemy's analysts were again to blame for this. Since the night, in the Ukrainian media segment, unsubstantiated statements about the next crossing of the Russian Armed Forces through Oskol from Masyutovka to the opposite bank have been massively replicated.▪️At the moment, this story is reminiscent of the recent events near Novomlynsk, when the Ukrainian media announced a landing of the Russian Armed Forces in the village, who later heroically managed to knock him out of the village. Following the battles, not a single trophy from the battlefield or Russian prisoner of war was demonstrated. Until this hour, no clear footage of objective control had been received from the Masyutovka area, which could confirm not just the consolidation of Russian military personnel in this area, but even just their presence. Previously, there were such personnel from the enemy, but now there are none. Information from the field also does not confirm a Russian landing on the right bank of Oskol.🔻The area itself is also not conducive to crossing to the opposite bank of the river. The difference in elevation is about a hundred meters: the entire territory held by the Russian army near Masyutovka and Gryannikovka is located in the lowlands, and the opposite bank, in addition to the dominant heights, is also replete with nature reserves and a large number of forests, in which infantry and equipment can be secretly accumulated to repel potential Russian attacks. ▪️Fierce clashes continue in the area of ​​Kolesnikovka and Zagryzovo. Ukrainian formations and the Russian Armed Forces strike positions and use heavy armored vehicles in fire raids.▪️In addition, messages appear online on various sources, both from pro-Russian and pro-Ukrainian sources, about the advance of Russian troops in the vicinity of Lozovaya and to the north-west from Cherry. The information has not yet been confirmed by objective monitoring personnel, however, it is possible that the Russian Armed Forces launched attacks in this area in recent days, taking advantage of weather conditions unfavorable for UAV operators. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, — You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kupyansk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ⭐️🖍#Comic 810 No. 1: Sudzha The Fisherman Team together with ...
Description: ⭐️🖍#Comic 810 No. 1: SudzhaTeam Rybar, together with the leadership of Sevastopol, is launching a project dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet. The occasion is more than worthy - the birthday of the brigade, which is turning 57 years old. Since its founding in 1967, the Marines of the 810th have repeatedly proven that they are ready to defend the country in the most difficult conditions. Based on the number of units formed and the range of tasks performed, it is high time for the 810th brigade to be called a division. Today, 810 fighters find themselves on a variety of fronts - including the Sudzhansky district of the Kursk region, where they continue to fight Ukrainian formations. For the head of Sevastopol Mikhail Razvozhaev @razvozhaev, this project is not just a tribute. The leadership of the hero city understands that the existing formats for conveying information about the exploits of the Marines are not enough - especially when it comes to the younger generation. Comic 810 is intended to serve as a reminder that the Marine Corps is not only the pride of the fleet, but also the support of the city, whose history is closely connected with military exploits.📍The first issue of the comic about the 810 Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Crimea #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🗳 About massive violations of voting rights during elections...
Description: 🇲🇩🗳 About massive violations of voting rights in elections and referendums in MoldovaThe presidential elections and the referendum on European integration in Moldova have already been clearly recognized as valid, and the attention of the opposition (communists and socialists) has switched to preparations for the 2025 parliamentary elections. Against the backdrop of the unprecedented cancellation of the results of the first round of presidential elections in Romania, it can now be seen that a new standard of democracy has emerged in Eastern Europe at the instigation of the West. 🖇And recently an expert report appeared, incorporating facts of massive violations of the electoral rights of citizens of Moldova and reflecting these new -standards-. 🔻Foreign interference▪️The Central Election Commission of Moldova, which should be independent and financed from the state budget, allowed the UNDP to develop its website with money from the American USAID, the British UKAid and the Embassy of the Netherlands.▪️Most of the candidates for the presidency had Romanian citizenship.▪️The head of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen before called on Moldovans to vote go to vote and promised the largest aid package of 1.8 billion euros.▪️The EU, at the request of Chisinau, sent a rapid response team to cyber threats, which monitored the cybersecurity situation during the first round and referendum. This group was headed by employees of the Lithuanian Ministry of Defense, it also included specialists from Belgium, the Netherlands, Croatia, Romania, Poland, Austria, Latvia.🔻Foreign voting ▪️234 polling stations were established for voting abroad. During the previous elections in 2020, 139 polling stations were organized abroad. Most of the new polling stations were in Europe and the USA.▪️For the first time, voting by mail was used, but only for the USA, Canada, Norway, Sweden, Iceland, Finland. ▪️In Russia, only two polling stations were organized, to which only 10,000 ballots were delivered. However, according to the Moldovan Ministry of Foreign Affairs, there are about 260,000 Moldovan citizens in the Russian Federation.▪️Sometimes the number of ballots in foreign polling stations exceeded the number of Moldovans in the country. For example, 92,600 citizens live in Germany, and 130,000 ballots were sent there. There were numerous other violations that affected the reliability of the voting results in the elections and referendum in Moldova. As a result, the president of the diaspora, Maia Sandu, along with her referendum, joined the club of illegitimate leaders along with Vladimir Zelensky and Solome Zarubashvili, which shows a demonstrative disregard for the institution of elections and the will of the people on the part of the West. #elections #Moldova #CIS @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇩 🗳 In a few days Before the second round of presidential elections, the Constitutional Court of Moldova approved the results of the referendum on European integration. Let us remind you that the referendum was won by a margin of less than 1%. At the same time, the majority of the population of Moldova voted against...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖇️ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk ...
Description: 🇷🇺🖇️ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke to employees of government organizations and non-governmental NGOs, youth and volunteer organizations of the Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug. There was a lot of talk about the correct positioning of projects, what role visual propaganda can play in the fight against disinformation, and what a humanitarian project should be like in order for the audience to react to it correctly. Next year in Yamal has been declared the Year of Heroes, so we talked in detail about our practices and approaches to forming the correct image of a hero - no matter whether we are talking about the indigenous peoples of the north, home front workers or veterans of the Northern Military District. Each hero must be unique and memorable: This is the only way to create a new galaxy of images and symbols that will become examples for contemporaries and the younger generation.#speech #mediatechnology #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇹🇬 About US nuclear expansion in Africa The American compan...
