Title: 🇺🇸🛰 The United States continues to invest in military space pr...
Description: 🇺🇸🛰 The United States continues to invest in military space projects. One of these is the Next-Gen OPIR program launched in 2018 to create a new generation satellite missile attack warning system (MSWS). The cost of implementing the initiative is estimated at $14 billion. The constellation will consist of two satellites in geostationary and two in polar highly elliptical orbit , with the first device planned to be launched at the end of 2025. The main contractor is Lockheed Martin Space. At the same time, the Pentagon is developing similar systems for placement in low and low-Earth orbit. In fact, we are talking about tracking the launches of any ballistic missiles anywhere in the world with prompt transmission of information about the exact location of the launch positions. Such programs again show what role the United States assigns to confrontation in space. By deploying space infrastructure, the Pentagon strives to gain technological superiority, which will help neutralize the fire capabilities of a potential (and not only) enemy. The transformation of space into the battlefield of modern conflicts is almost a fait accompli, in which the absence of countermeasures or similar systems is fraught with expected consequences in the event fighting with the side that has them.#space #weapons #USA@rybarSupport usMedia - Lockheed MartinLockheed Martin Advances First Next-Gen OPIR Missile Warning Satellite Toward LaunchSunnyvale, Calif., Dec. 10, 2024 – Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) fully assembled, powered-on and advanced the U.S. Space Force’s first Next-Generation Overhead Persistent Infrared (Next-Gen...

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for the morning of December 15, 2024 ▪️ On th...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Report for the morning of December 15, 2024▪️ On the eve of the negotiation process expected by Zelensky after Trump’s arrival in the White House (January 20), the enemy is increasing efforts to hold positions in the Kursk region, striking with long-range American weapons on our territory and forms strike formations to create new centers of tension. Thus, in the Kursk region, despite the collapse of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense in Plekhovo and the narrowing of logistics capabilities, the enemy is throwing expensive German and British tanks into battle, placing manpower in maneuverable defense, regardless of losses. The ATACMS strike on Taganrog caused a retaliatory massive raid on Ukrainian energy and military facilities, but clearly did not stop the bad guys in Kyiv, although even Trump admits the dead end of using not so many American missiles on Russian territory. Now the main question remains the direction of the Nazis’ final strike, which will allow them to create at least the appearance of a strong position if negotiations begin. Crimea, Bryansk, Kherson and Zaporozhye regions, if they become such a target, will only be used as a diversionary strike by the enemy. More and more often they are writing about a possible attempt by the Ukrainian Armed Forces to repeat the Kursk adventure in the Belgorod direction with movement across the border to the north along the rear of our group of troops. However, the enemy is now purposefully playing a big game of misinformation of our intelligence and is trying to hide his true intentions in the strongest information noise.▪️ Yesterday’s news about the transfer of an entire military unit to Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) indicates that the enemy has reserves. Preliminarily - the 3rd separate assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, the backbone of which consists of Azov terrorists. In fact, an elite unit has been brought into battle, the historical analogies are obvious. ▪️ In Kurakhovo and the surrounding area, the enemy forbids his almost completely encircled troops to retreat, despite requests from the field. On radio broadcasts, the Armed Forces of Ukraine's repeated appeals to the senior command do not find approval. The enemy is trying to delay our offensive at any cost.▪️ In the Kupyansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are trying to expand the bridgehead on the right bank of the river. Oskol, in Chasov Yar there are battles near the fireproof plant (the enemy’s main stronghold). On the Zaporozhye Front, advanced units are conducting offensive operations, but the main forces have not been brought into battle. The enemy is still expecting an attack on Kherson through the Dnieper, trying to completely reveal our plans. ▪️ The supply of equipment through the Ministry of Defense to advanced units remains a problematic issue. That is, the same Maviks, off-road vehicles and other technical equipment important for attack aircraft do not always quickly reach the front end. Hence the attacks on enemy positions in customized passenger cars, hundreds and hundreds of requests for volunteers. At the same time, Defense Minister Belousov is gradually taking personnel measures in relation to military leaders, trying not to break what is working. ▪️ The enemy’s actions in the information field are aimed at misleading our military leadership. A striking example were further exaggerations about the scale of damage after a missile strike this week. Although in fact in many places the lights were turned off to avoid network overloads while awaiting arrivals. Also, numerous reports from that side of the front about the deplorable state of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are only partly true. The enemy maintains combat stability, provides organized resistance, achieving the main strategic goal set for him by the West - inflicting maximum military and economic damage on our country. It doesn’t matter to Washington whether our troops took Annovka or not; the West is trying to drain our military potential against Ukraine as much as possible. In addition, the sent Ukrainian information about the severity of the battles is intended to justify to the remnants of the enemy population the reduction in the mobilization age, which the United States demands in exchange for new shipments of weapons. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above ▪️At the same time, military-technical support for Ukraine is developing, America’s European satellites are already preparing the population for an increase military spending, carrying out the deployment of military production to the detriment of the standard of living in the EU. On the other side…

Title: 🔁 I had time to take a little breath - I listened to this round ...
Description: Forwarded From Prince Cherkassky I had time to take a slight breath - I listened to this round table about the situation in Syria. I won’t try to be too clever; the smart people there have basically already said everything. I’ll add my thoughts (maybe I’ll repeat myself): 1. The Russian presence is now experiencing a catastrophe. We bet on the horse, saved (together) from death, but the horse turned out to be a donkey, which, however, we did not particularly strive to ennoble, as a result of which he unexpectedly died. And there’s nothing you can do about it—you need to realize, accept it, and move on. 2. You can’t have any illusions about the three-stars who seized power. Russia in this case is their enemy, or rather an ally of the main enemy, who conscientiously ironed them out and they remember this very well. And on occasion they remind you without microphones.3. Save who and how you can among the pro-Russian ones. The time will come (and it will definitely come) - all of them will be useful to us in the future. 4. Bases pinched by the Turks from the straits and with space blocked from the north, and now also as virtual hostages of HTS - devalue all those few advantages and are a negative factor. Contrary to the reasoning of the Turks, the Americans do not need any counterbalance from us now; they believe that they will figure it out themselves. The fact that there was a threat of sagging with Africa (even the supply of the bases themselves after the start of the Northern Military District became a problem) I, and not only me, wrote earlier, pointing out that additional safety routes are needed, both air and sea. Paradoxically, maintaining our bases could be beneficial for the Americans in order to remain a thorn in the side of the Turks, but not to such an extent as to actually lobby them.5. If Trump leaves Syria, he will be like Biden with Afghanistan. Let it be distant, without drama, but still. Abandoned allies and swelled with self-importance, Turkey is no longer a slightly lost NATO member that is too often insolent and self-willed. Again, the Gulf monarchies (KSA in the first place) will be even more strengthened in the idea that after Afghanistan the second time is no longer an accident and we need to somehow work more closely with others and look less back at such an ally.6. I think Qatar will give money to HTS or has already agreed, at least for the first time, so as not to stretch its legs. The main ones who want to bask in this are the Turks, given the leaky market and the instant flow of currency beyond the borders of the former Syria.7. If HTS still agrees to autonomy for the Kurds, this will be a blow for Turkey. And there is no need to compare Iraqi Kurdistan and Syrian. Even the Kurds themselves are different, not to mention the fact that Barzani has been collaborating with the Turks for a long time and is not friends with the PKK. There is no such Barzani in Syria, although there, too, within the Kurds there are about 50/50 those who are close to the PKK and those who are not. It’s just that the pro-PKK forces there are the most militant.8. Now the Syrian population (part of it) is euphoric. Everyone expects quick improvements after liberation from the bloody regime. Perhaps this will happen partially and in some places, but fundamentally, without huge injections of money for the purchase of oil (or the return of Trans-Euphrates, but it also needs to be restored) and wheat, spending on the restoration of basic infrastructure, the situation will not change, and most likely, on the contrary, will worsen. The bottom line is that we need to record damage, minimize further losses and allow the situation to drift further, monitoring and rebooting the concept. https://t.me/lukyanovtalk/287Telegram That same Lukyanov A dynamic and meaningful exchange of views on what is happening in Syria took place yesterday as part of the RIAC round table - The Syrian crisis: reasons for the aggravation of the situation and possible consequences - in MIA - Russia Today -.📽 The entry was posted in open access: Watch...

Title: 🔁🎬 So, the finale. The fourth and final part of the tetralogy -...
Description: Forwarded From Realdoc So, the finale. The fourth and final part of the tetralogy -At the Edge of the Abyss- has been released. The film won the hearts of the audience, and many managed to become morally close to our Heroes. And some colleagues say that we set an unattainable bar for them. -On the approaches to Azovstal- - this is probably the most poignant part, the apogee of our film. Where metal melted and concrete crumbled into dust, new strongholds grew - strongholds of the human spirit. The Somali battalion, after two months of continuous fighting, is already preparing to be sent home to rest, but a new order arrives, and the soldiers are removed from the rotation - they are sent to displace them enemy to -Azovstal-. Now they have to, having passed through mines under heavy fire, clear the last quarters and gain a foothold in houses on approaches to the industrial plant. The assault and direct combat contact with the enemy were filmed in the ranks of the Somalis. Having completed the task, the exhausted soldiers meet people leaving the basements - the last hostages. Those lucky enough to survive come out into the light... On that sunny day, the onset of spring was especially felt. It is important to see: WINK (4K available) KION (4K separately here) OKKO (4K, works in the CIS) Kino1TVDROM (works in the returned territories) AND a huge request to EVERY viewer: repost and forward this post to ALL friends, colleagues, admins (and similarly, a post on VK). Tell your family and friends about the film. And don't forget to subscribe so you don't miss future films: @RealdocProductions Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: battles north of Novogrodovka and...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: fighting north of Novogrodovka and in Pushkino situation by the end of the day on December 14, 2024 Fierce battles continue in the Pokrovsk direction a couple of kilometers south of Pokrovsk and Mirnograd. Russian troops became more active in several areas at the same time, getting closer and closer to the Pokrovsk agglomeration.▪️In Shevchenko, the presence of assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces was noted in the area of ​​a local school, which was fired at point-blank by an enemy tank. Judging by the weather, the events took place at least two weeks ago, so it is not yet possible to say reliably how the front line in the populated area now lies. At the same time, in neighboring Peschany, one of the largest mines of the Ukrainian steel holding, Metinvest, for the extraction of coking coal was stopped. Although the enterprise had created reserves of raw materials in advance and removed personnel, in the future the loss of coke production could have a significant impact on the enterprises of the Ukrainian defense industry.▪️ At the same time, to the east near Novogrodovka, Russian troops advanced along the forest belt near Nikolaevka towards Mirnograd. Previously, throughout October-November, there were dozens of attacks on the positions of the Russian Armed Forces near the railway by forces of the 425th Special Operations Brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Skala-, which were repelled with varying degrees of success. As soon as they were transferred as a fire brigade to the previously mentioned Shevchenko, progress was immediately achieved in the area, and the Ukrainian units transferred to replace those who left have a worse level of equipment and training. Therefore, we can expect further development of the successes of the Russian Armed Forces north of Novogrodovka in the future. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: advance in the center of Kurakho...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: advance in the center of Kurakhovo and fighting in Constantinoplesituation by the end of the day on December 14, 2024. In recent days, Russian troops have managed to achieve significant successes in Kurakhovo. Fighting also continues at the Uspenovka-Konstantinopolskoye line, where the enemy is trying to hold back the onslaught of attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces.▪️In Kurakhovo itself, units of the 5th Motorized Rifle Brigade, by installing minefields, thwarted a counterattack of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on two armored fighting vehicles in the area of ​​a garage cooperative on Zaporozhye Avenue. One armored vehicle was destroyed, the second retreated to the west. Probably, after clearing the Roevsky elevator near the southern shore of the Kurakhovsky reservoir, significant success was soon achieved. This suggests that the concentration of Ukrainian units remaining in the city is minimal, which allows the soldiers to lay minefields virtually in the gray zone right under the enemy’s nose.▪️At the same time, in the city center, stormtroopers hoisted a flag on the building of the Kurakhovo city administration on Mira Avenue. Judging by the fact that the fighters are moving around the area relatively calmly, this area was cleared of the enemy at the time the footage was taken. On Pushkin Street near school No. 2 and in the western part of Soborny Avenue, clashes are still ongoing. Nevertheless, one of the few serious defense centers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the city remains the industrial zone and the Kurakhovskaya Thermal Power Plant on the western outskirts. Whether the enemy will cling to it to the last or members of the Ukrainian formations will have to hastily flee further west in the direction of Dachnoye will become clear very soon. At the same time, footage of the hoisting of flags in the central and western parts of Elizavetovka was published on the Internet. Although the settlement was already liberated some time ago, the footage once again confirms the confident control of the Russian army over the settlement and the surrounding area. At the same time, fighting is still ongoing in Constantinople: Ukrainian formations are not giving up attempts to drop into the village, and Russian sappers are laying minefields, setting traps for Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment. Title: 🇸🇾🏴 The leader of HTS Abu-Muhammad al-Julani, as befits a man ...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 The leader of HTS Abu-Muhammad al-Julani, as befits a person whose reputation needs to be intensively whitened, often makes appearances in the international media. Today the leader of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham stated that he and his subordinates have no no hostility towards Iranians. In addition, he said that the Ministry of Defense was eliminating all armed groups, and the Syrian revolution itself was not carried out by chance - it was supposedly planned for years (this, of course, is not true).📌 And these points deserve special attention.➖The supposedly peaceful attitude towards Iran - This is outright populism. As part of the -whitening- of his reputation, the now called Ahmed al-Sharaa demonstrates his secularism. HTS militants and other factions in Syria showed their attitude towards Iran and Shiites in general after the capture of Damascus. By agreement with the Iranians, the opposition leaders promised not to touch the Shiite shrine of Seida Zeinab, but the latter was looted, and the main Umayyad mosque was called Sunni and Shiites, according to them, have nothing to do with it.➖As for the liquidation of armed groups, this was also thought out in advance management position. In Syria, under the wing of HTS there are disparate factions, each of which is now running around the country and organizing lynching. Subsequently, this could serve as a pretext for a purge, and al-Julani will appear as the one who brought order.➖And the words about a planned operation to overthrow the Assad government are just an information move to show, they say, look how we pulled it off perfectly -. 🔻In fact, the militants began intensive training only in the last year, and the ultimate goal was to take Aleppo, and at best, the entire province. But the unpreparedness of the Syrian authorities and armed forces, corruption and bureaucracy, which ate the Syrian state from the inside, did their job. When the militants began their offensive, the military retreated and the pro-Turkish conglomerate simply continued its movement until the very end.#Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇮🇷🇸🇾🏴 Leader of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham Abu Muhammad al-Julani tirelessly continues to give interviews left and right various news agencies, allegedly demonstrating your -sincere good intentions-. Title: 🇦🇲🇦🇿🇪🇺 About the EU observation mission on the Armenian-Aze...
Description: 🇦🇲🇦🇿🇪🇺 About the EU observation mission on the Armenian-Azerbaijani border Absentee discussions in the media continue between the authorities of Azerbaijan and Armenia about agreeing on the points of the peace treaty. The draft document has still not been presented to the public of both countries, and from the public claims of Baku it is clear what demands of the Azerbaijanis the Armenians cannot yet satisfy. ▪️The other day, Assistant to the President of Azerbaijan Hikmet Hajiyev said that the EU observation mission on the Armenian-Azerbaijani border should be completed. Azerbaijan is refusing to use intermediaries in the process of border delimitation and protection. Baku previously expressed serious complaints against the EU mission that works in Armenia, accusing it of binocular diplomacy. ▪️The decision to extend the mandate of the EU mission will be made at the beginning of 2025. However, back in the spring, the Armenian parliament increased the contingent of observers to 209 people, allowing them to move freely throughout the republic. 🔻Even if Baku hypothetically achieves the end of the EU mission’s mandate, the Western presence in Armenia will simply move to a different legal plane, especially considering the ambitions of the French and Americans to consolidate their position in the republic. However, now Baku and Yerevan are no longer in a hurry to sign a peace treaty, since the pushing factor in the form of the retiring US presidential administration has lost its relevance. #Azerbaijan #Armenia #EU@rybarSupport uswww.pastinfo.amBaku is haunted by the EU observation mission in ArmeniaAliyev's aide said that -the activities of the EU mission in Armenia must be completed-.

Title: 🔁🖼 At the same time, significant successes of the Russian wars ...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR At the same time, significant successes of Russian troops were also noted in Kurakhovo. Units of the 5th Motorized Rifle Brigade laid minefields and thwarted a counterattack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces using two armored fighting vehicles in the area of ​​the garage cooperative on Zaporozhye Avenue. One armored vehicle was destroyed, the second quickly turned around in a western direction. Apparently, after clearing the Roevsky elevator, significant successes were soon achieved here, and the concentration of Ukrainian forces is minimal, which allows minefields to be placed virtually in the gray zone. At the same time, in the center of the city, fighters hoisted a flag on the Kurakhovo city administration building on Mira Avenue. Judging by the fact that the fighters are moving around the area relatively calmly, this area is most likely already held quite firmly by the Russian Armed Forces. The only serious defense center of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the city remains the industrial zone and the Kurakhovskaya Thermal Power Plant on the western outskirts. Whether the enemy will be able to grab onto it or will have to flee further west in the direction of Dachny will become clear very soon.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🖼 📎🇸🇾 Protests continue to sway in Kurdish-controlled territo...
Description: 📎🇸🇾 In Kurdish-controlled territory, protest sentiments in favor of the new Syrian authorities continue to sway. Arabs, already not too happy with living together with the Kurds, hold rallies with flags of the Syrian revolution, which often, as, for example, in Raqqa, leads to forceful dispersals rallies. 📌 In such conditions, opposition factions could not help but appear on the eastern bank of the Euphrates, including on the basis of existing tribes, even those who were members of the Syrian Democratic Forces. Moreover, some of the tribal groups have already gone over to the side of al-Julani, since the Salafist ideology is closer to them. New groups are also appearing that have signs of crypto-groups, that is, virtual ones, such as Harakat Ahrar al-Jazeera. The movement appeared today and so far has only managed to acquire a flag and a small telegram channel. However, a full-fledged new group is not needed especially by the new Syrian authorities. There is already a request for -liberation- from the Kurds, but local armed factions are already active. But the very fact of the existence of such formations, in whose interests they act, testifies to the comprehensive preparation of the operation on the eastern bank of the Euphrates.#mediatechnology #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 Due to the political crisis in Seoul, new details of the...
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 Due to the political crisis in Seoul, new details are emerging about the flight of a South Korean drone over Pyongyang in October this year. A deputy from a local opposition party accused the country's former defense minister of having ordered the operation. The main purpose of sending the drone, according to the deputy, was the desire to provoke the North Koreans to retaliate. They were necessary to justify the introduction of martial law in the future. In addition, the former Minister of Defense is accused of plans to launch attacks on the territory of the DPRK, from where the garbage balls were sent. Just as in the case of the drone, such actions were necessary in order to provoke the North Korean authorities to respond.▪️The accusations sound quite logical. President Yoon Seok-yeol, in an address to the nation last week, mentioned the need to impose martial law precisely to eradicate pro-North Korean elements in the country. A response from Pyongyang would fit perfectly into this situation, since martial law would formally be introduced due to the reaction of the North Koreans. Yun, at this time, would have implemented his plans to arrest party chairmen and prohibit any political activity in parliament. 🔻However, it is worth understanding that now any such statements may simply be part of a political struggle, given the unstable situation in South Korea. Therefore, although the version of the provocation of the DPRK sounds very logical, it is too early to draw final conclusions on the situation. #DPRK #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybar🇰🇵🇰🇷 The situation on the Korean Peninsula continues to remain tense. On October 11, the DPRK reported the detection of South Korean drones in the country's airspace. According to the statement, they were used to distribute propaganda leaflets. North Koreans...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸 A former OpenAI employee was found dead in the USA - he...
Description: Forwarded From American issue🇺🇸 A former OpenAI employee was found dead in the USA - he revealed the company's secrets. 26-year-old Sukhir Balaji, an ex-OpenAI employee who had previously become an informant and accused the company of copyright infringement, was found dead in his apartment. The cause of death is believed to be suicide. Three months ago, Balaji made a statement revealing how OpenAI used materials from writers, journalists and programmers to train AI without their permission. After this, a flurry of lawsuits began against the company. Lawyers for The New York Times claim that Balaji had unique evidence that could strengthen the plaintiffs' position. Balaji was one of those who helped train the neural network and knew all the details of its work from the inside. @usaperiodical

Title: 🔁🖼 Fierce fighting continues in several areas in the Pokrovsky ...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR Fierce fighting continues in the Pokrovsky direction in several areas. In Shevchenko, the presence of Russian troops was noted in the area of ​​a local school, which was fired at point-blank range by an enemy tank. Judging by the weather, the events took place at least two weeks ago, so it is not yet possible to say reliably how the front line in the populated area now lies. At the same time, in neighboring Peschany, one of the largest mines of the Ukrainian steel holding, Metinvest, for the extraction of coking coal was stopped. At the same time, to the east near Novogrodovka, Russian troops advanced along the forest belt near Nikolaevka towards Mirnograd. Previously, during October-November, it was not possible to achieve much success here due to constant attacks near the railway 425 OSB of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Skala-. As soon as they were transferred as a fire brigade to the previously mentioned Shevchenko, things immediately went better, so we can expect further development of the successes of the Russian Armed Forces north of Novogrodovka in the future.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): capture of the T...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): capture of the Tishreen dam by the SNA and preparation for the battle for Ain al-Arab Situation as of 15.00 on December 14, 2024 In the northeast of Aleppo province, the current fighting continues between the pro-Turkish-Syrian national army- (SNA) and Arab-Kurdish -Syrian Democratic Forces- (SDF).▪️After capturing the city of Menbij and surrounding settlements in its countryside, the SNA factions occupied the Tishrin dam without a fight (it provides a significant part of the water and electricity supply to this part of the country), but soon withdrew from there. ➖ In addition, the dam also connects Menbij with the Kurdish militia-controlled city of Ain al-Arab (also known by the latter as Kobani). It is on this that the pro-Turkish forces have focused their attention at the moment.🔻We previously wrote about Turkey’s preparation of a military operation to clear Ain al-Arab of the presence of the SDF. Artillery and drones of the Turkish Armed Forces are actively working on the positions of the Kurdish detachments; Turkish reinforcements are being introduced into northern Syria every day.▪️And this is not without reason: Kobani has symbolic significance for the SDF, which defended the city from the terrorists of the Islamic State (IS). Also, the majority of the population there are Kurds, who are unlikely to be happy with the Turkish liberators.▪️For the most part, Arab Menbij became a relatively easy prey for the SNA. The local population actually forced the SDF to retreat and reach more advantageous positions in the form of Ain al-Arab. There, most likely, the Kurds will snap back more actively. Perhaps this forced the Turks, who traditionally rely in their operations on opposition formations under their control, to strengthen their group of troops in Syria. It is possible that its ground forces will be involved in the battles for Ain al-Arab. 🔻Well, while Turkey and its proxies are preparing for the operation, the government in Damascus has a slightly different view on the topic of the Kurds: according to Kurdish media, representatives of the SDF and Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) are negotiating the political process. This indirectly confirms SDF commander Mazlum Abdi, who recognized the flag of the revolution as national, and also announced his readiness to send a delegation to the capital to discuss the inclusion of the Kurdish administration in the government. Will the Kurdish - Autonomous Administration of Northern and Eastern Syria - be able to come to an agreement with the new Syrian authorities and how this will affect the course of Turkey’s actions is a question, the answer to which we will find out in the near future. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription on map.rybar.ru#Aleppo #digest #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇰🇿🇷🇺 Another important point in the context of Vladimir Vl...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇰🇿🇷🇺 Another important point in the context of Vladimir Vladimirovich’s meeting with Nursultan Nazarbayev and the division of power that took place in Kazakhstan several years ago.❗️The Russian President acted as a kind of arbiter who drove Nazarbayev and Tokayev to the corners, which allowed saving the country from worsening internal political crisis. Nazarbayev and his people were expelled from all state companies, but private large businesses remained 70-80% under his control. That is, it turned out that the first president got the money, and Tokayev got the power. The basis of Nazarbayev’s possessions is the mining of rare earth metals, banks, metallurgy, that is, such structures as Kazminerals, Kaspi Bank, Khalyk Bank - all the owners of these organizations grew up under the wing of Nazarbayeva. The oil and gas sector is completely controlled by the state. And such a stalemate has arisen between Nazarbayev and Tokayev, where they cannot get rid of each other, but they cannot live in harmony either, so Vladimir Putin periodically regulates their differences. #Kazakhstan #RussiaGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channelRybar🇰🇿🇷🇺 About the meeting Vladimir Putin with Nursultan NazarbayevYesterday evening at Novo-Ogarevo hosted a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and the first President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev. Details of the event are unknown.📌So far the reaction is interesting...

Title: 🇰🇷 Today the parliament in South Korea decided to remove powers...
Description: 🇰🇷 Today, the parliament in South Korea decided to remove the powers of President Yoon Seok-yeol. Unlike last week, both opposition parties and the ruling force took part in the voting. -204 deputies voted in favor - the opposition managed to find 12 defectors from the ruling party. Although, most likely, Yoon’s last speech played a big role here, in which he abandoned his promise to resign and continued to justify the introduction of martial law. This went against the position of the chairman of the ruling party, so he called for a vote for impeachment. Thus, the situation with the power vacuum created after the introduction of martial law is coming to an end. The country's Prime Minister Han Deok-soo will soon become acting president. However, the country's Constitutional Court must finally approve the impeachment of the president - the body has up to 180 days to consider this issue. As a result, the decision to remove Yun's powers may be reversed, and such a precedent was already observed in 2004. Therefore, the political uncertainty in South Korea does not end yet. #SouthKorea @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇰🇷 The impeachment vote in South Korea has come to an end. 204 deputies voted in favor. However, the final decision on impeachment will be made by the Constitutional Court, so for now the powers have been temporarily removed. Judges have 180 days to consider this issue...

Title: 🎬 🇸🇾🇹🇷 On Turkey's territorial claims in Syria Turkish Presi...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷 About Turkey's territorial claims in SyriaTurkish President Recep Erdogan is striking while the iron is hot: during a speech in Sakarya before members of the ruling party, he announced his intention to review the results of the First World War and include the territories of the former Ottoman Empire in the state, including and Syrian lands. The politician said that Aleppo, Idlib, Damascus and Raqqa will become our provinces like Antep, Hatay and Urfa. Ankara has previously expressed interest in Syrian territories, and now, when pro-Turkish groups are meeting in Damascus, Erdogan holds all the cards. It also became known that tomorrow, after a 12-year break, the Turkish embassy will resume work in the country. Therefore, it is possible that in Ankara they will begin to test the waters regarding the organization of a referendum on the inclusion of Syria in Turkey in the territories occupied by militants.📌 The real possibility of this scenario, however, still looks doubtful, since together with Syria the Turks will receive a territory with a huge tangle of contradictions, socially -economic, political, demographic and other problems, the unraveling of which could simply unravel Turkey’s navel. However, nothing stops Erdogan to make such loud statements purely for image reasons for the sake of shaking the air, as usual, exposing himself as someone he really is not.#Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇰🇿🇷🇺 About Vladimir Putin’s meeting with Nursultan Nazarbayev...
Description: 🇰🇿🇷🇺 About the meeting of Vladimir Putin with Nursultan Nazarbayev Yesterday evening in Novo-Ogaryovo there was a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and the first president of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev. The details of the event are unknown.📌For now, the reaction in the Kazakh media is interesting. More precisely, its absence. State channels and agencies are getting off with standard formulations, apparently not yet understanding how to react. ▪️In past years, Nazarbayev also visited Russia in December, but now this meeting is taking place in the context of a rather controversial information background surrounding relations between Russia and Kazakhstan.▪️Either films about Kazakh nationalists are promoting, then they are preventing the spread of the Russian language in Kazakhstan, or they are pursuing a policy of de-Russification of the northern regions of Kazakhstan populated predominantly by the Russian-speaking population. Although the position of the family of the former head of state was seriously shaken after the January riots and new leadership, the Nazarbayevs at the same time retained a fairly significant part of the influence in the economic sector of the country (especially among the oligarchs of the Nazarbayev era).🔻And in this context, someone may see in the meeting a signal to the political elites of Kazakhstan. In particular, those circles that are promoting Russophobia through various departments, for example, the Ministry of Science and Higher Education, or instead of promoting their own initiative to create an International Organization for the Russian Language, on the contrary, sabotage this work in every possible way. Or maybe this is just a meeting of two friends, which means nothing and is not a signal. #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usRBKVladimir Putin met with Nursultan NazarbayevRussian President Vladimir Putin met with the first president of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev, the Kremlin website says. Title: 🎬 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the situation in Georgia against the backdrop o...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the situation in Georgia against the background of the presidential elections In Georgia, for the 16th day, pro-Western politicians and citizens have been on strike in front of the parliament building. Compared to the first week, when clashes and riots regularly occurred, now the situation can be called calm.🔻However, the authorities expect new provocations due to the ongoing presidential elections in Georgia. For the first time, they pass in a new form through the Electoral College, consisting of 300 delegates. ▪️It includes all 150 deputies of the Georgian parliament and 150 representatives of local authorities. The only candidate is a representative of the ruling party - Georgian Dream - member of parliament Mikheil Kavelashvili. ▪️Now more and more people are gathering at the parliament building, demanding the repeal of the law on foreign agents, continued integration with the European Union and refusal to cooperate with Russia - in general, nothing new .Unrest is also quite expected, since with the election of a new president, the current president, Salome, will lose all control levers Zurabishvili, who is one of the main initiators of the protests. But the actions of the ruling party show that they have the situation under control. If nothing happened for the opposition during 16 days of riots, then there is no point in expecting anything now, when many leaders of opposition parties, NGOs and NGOs have been detained.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 They write that in the Kherson region there is a new round of ...
Description: Forwarded From ZHIVOV ZThey write that in the Kherson region there is a new round of the fight against white license plates on military vehicles from volunteers. Moreover, the struggle sometimes takes ugly and criminal forms. More on this later. I often travel along the Crimea-Donetsk route. Everywhere the VP posts are as healthy as possible. It’s just that no one slows down anywhere except... Kherson region. There is a stop at every post. Always. Just recently I was not far from LBS. 1/2 of the military cars have white license plates. Either they were donated by state funds, or by patrons and volunteers. The cars are officially in parts, included in all the tags, etc. If these volunteer cars are confiscated from the army because of white license plates, the motorization of the army will return to the beginning of the 20th century, only now there is nowhere to get horses. I honestly don’t understand why this is bottled neck, when you can’t put it on white numbers, but go and put it on black ones. In general, the very fact that instead of war they began to engage in self-criticism again is very worrying. We somehow succeed either in a human way or in accordance with the law. Why can’t we live in the paradigm that, according to the law, it will be humane? ZHIVOVZ

Title: 🔁 At the moment, the protection of the external perimeter of the...
Description: Forwarded From Colonelcassad (Boris Rozhin)Currently, HTS militants are actually guarding the outer perimeter of the Russian Embassy in Damascus. Moreover, they not only indicate their presence, but also practically take measures to prevent outside militants from approaching the embassy. There is a similar situation with the bases in Latakia. Negotiations with the political leadership of HTS on the future of Russian bases in Syria continue. For now, the situation is in process and there is no final agreement on preservation/withdrawal. Trade is ongoing. Well, Russian contingents in Syria continue to be drawn to Latakia, convoys with equipment are stationed in different provinces of Syria.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 14, 2024 ▪️ The main even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 14, 2024▪️ The main event of the past day was a massive strike by the Russian Armed Forces with high-precision long-range air and sea-based weapons, attack UAVs on critically important fuel and energy infrastructure facilities in Ukraine, ensuring the operation of the military-industrial complex . Not all missiles and drones reached their targets, but in cold conditions they managed to influence the operation of the enemy’s energy complex.▪️ That night the enemy snapped back. In the Oryol region, as a result of a massive attack by Ukrainian Armed Forces drones, a fuel fire occurred at an infrastructure facility. Seven aircraft-type unmanned aerial vehicles were destroyed over the Bryansk region. In the Krasnodar region, the Kyiv regime again tried to attack civilian targets. In the village of Maryanskaya, debris from one of the UAVs fell on a private house, outbuildings were partially damaged, and windows were broken.▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is advancing in forest plantations east of Novoivanovka. Artillery fire and FPV drone strikes thwarted 2 counterattacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: in the direction of Novoivanovka and in the south of the Sudzhansky district. MLRS -Tornado-S- crews are working on concentrations of manpower of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. They report the advance of the Russian Armed Forces to Kurilovka: our troops crossed the Psel River ford in the conditions of the Russian winter. Footage of an attack on a rare British heavy tank - Challenger-2 - has appeared, which once again confirms the use of the enemy’s best reserves to hold occupied positions in the region.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces have occupied Pushkino, battles are going on around the village. Shevchenko on the approaches to Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk). Information appears about the transfer of elite fascist units (terrorists from the 3rd Brigade -Azov-) to the direction.▪️ South of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces occupied the eastern part of Uspenivka. The cauldron around the villages near the river has almost closed. Dry Yaly, the area is being cleared. Our troops are also advancing at the Romanovka - Constantinople line.▪️ On the Zaporozhye front in the Orekhovsky direction, during the offensive, the Russian Armed Forces are destroying strongholds and shelters of Ukrainian Armed Forces soldiers. Heavy fighting is going on, the main forces of the Russian Army have not yet been brought into battle. The enemy positions are being ironed by the FAB with the UMPC.▪️ In the Kherson direction the situation is unchanged. At the entrance to Golaya Pristan, two enemy FPV drones attacked a passenger minibus performing a regular flight. A man died. Two more passengers, including a high school teacher and a man, were injured.▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Gruzskoye, Borisov district, a man was injured as a result of an FPV drone attack on a car. Under the attacks of Krasnaya Niva, an emergency power outage occurred in the Shebekinsky district (restored). The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors South of Kurakhovo The eastern part of Uspenivka is ours! 255th Guards Motorized Rifle Regiment - heroes! Two majors

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week 7 – 13 December 2024▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops carried out daily strikes on the capital of the Palestinian enclave. Almost every district of the city came under fire, killing several dozen local residents. ▪️At the same time, the Israeli operation continued in satellite cities, including Jabaliya. There, IDF fighters fired on the outskirts of the Kamal Adwan hospital and also carried out engineering work. ▪️At the same time, Palestinian forces were able to organize a successful ambush in the locality. The militants hit the IDF truck with an anti-tank missile. Three Israelis were killed and 18 more were injured.▪️And in neighboring Beit Lahia, Israeli troops actually did not encounter any resistance. Currently, they have managed to demolish several blocks, turning them into ruins. ▪️In the center of the enclave, the Israelis are carrying out engineering work to strengthen the buffer zone in the Netzarim corridor. The Israeli Air Force also conducted operations in Hamas-controlled settlements, including Nuseirat and Al-Breij. ▪️In turn, militants from the Kataib al-Mujahidin group routinely fired at IDF positions. As before, the attack by the Palestinian forces was ineffective.▪️In the south of the Gaza Strip, the Israelis attacked several areas of Rafah and the outskirts of Khan Yunis. The most resonant hit occurred along the Ar-Rashid coastal highway, where about 14 Palestinians were killed.▪️The presence of IDF units in the Philadelphia Corridor also remained. There, Israeli soldiers have been blowing up buildings and clearing the area for many months.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 🪖About the preparation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for an ...
Description: Forwarded From ARCHANGEL OF SPECIAL FORCES Z🇷🇺🪖About the preparation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces for an offensive in the Kursk and Belgorod directions. Over the past few weeks, we have been constantly talking about the fact that all this talk about upcoming negotiations, about existing problems in the ranks of the enemy, about the fact that the West is tired of the conflict , aimed at lulling vigilance on the eve of the Ukrainian offensive. Why do we think so? Some time ago, many thousands of enemy reinforcements, about 13 thousand people, were supposed to arrive in the Sumy region, and specifically in Shostka. But this group suddenly -dissolved-. And nowhere else were large units noted, which suggests that they are somewhere in the rear. In November and December, throughout Europe, the number of personnel with the transfer of various armored vehicles to Ukraine increased. American Bradleys were seen in Romania, Swedish tracked armored personnel carriers were seen in Germany, German infantry fighting vehicles and Leopards were seen in Poland. Another three F-16 fighters from Denmark flew to Poland a few days ago. Their total number varies from 24 to 34 according to various sources, that is, the Ukrainian air force has at least a squadron, but they are not actually used, but are protected. There have also been no strikes by Western missiles for a long time. One was recently in Taganrog with six ATACMS, and twice more, 4-6 Atakms-/Storm Shadow and SCALP missiles were attacked in the Kursk region, that is, the consumption was small. There are reserves and they are accumulating. Taking all this into account, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are preparing for an attack. And we think that the main direction will be either Belgorod or Kursk. Now these regions have been overtaken by cold weather, which means the soil will be hard and convenient for the movement of armored vehicles. Archangel of Special Forces. Subscribe.

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 13, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continue the operation in Jabaliya, where they destroyed several loaded rocket launchers. In the central part of the enclave, Palestinians fired at Israelis in the Netzarim corridor area. The Israeli Air Force attacked the Nuseirat camp: more than 40 civilians were killed and dozens were injured. In the south of the enclave in the vicinity of Rafah, there were clashes, and the IDF press service announced the discovery of tunnels and the destruction of Hamas militants. In the West Bank in Nablus and neighboring camps police operations are underway against refugees. In the south of Lebanon, fighters of the 769th brigade of the IDF discovered a large cache of weapons, including anti-tank missiles -Kornet-.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️Online- maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 13, 2024. Russian troops launched a combined attack on energy and military infrastructure facilities in territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. Ukrainian formations carried out drone raids on the border and rear Russian regions: drones were shot down, including in the Leningrad region , Vladimirskaya, Rostov and other regions. In the Kursk region, Russian units advanced in the Sudzhansky district to the eastern outskirts of the village of Kurilovka, liberating the territory on both banks of the Psel River. In the Slobozhansky direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces advanced to Volchansk, from where information was received about the enemy’s use of toxic substances. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Pushkino and are fighting in the Shevchenko area. There is also unconfirmed information about a call to Belgian. In the Kurakhovsky direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in several areas at once, advancing not only to Kurakhovo, but also at the Romanovka-Konstantinopolskoye border.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution :Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) Pokrovskoe direction (ru; en) Kurakhovo direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Vladimir #Volchansk #digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Rostov #St.Petersburg #Ukraine @ rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the deployment of a unit of the US Space Force ...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the deployment of a US Space Force unit in Japan Defense cooperation between the authorities in Washington and Tokyo continues to grow: it recently became known that a US Space Force unit has been deployed at the Japanese Yokota Air Base.▪️It consists of 10 American military personnel who will coordinate work with the American military contingent in Japan and the local Self-Defense Forces. ▪️The stated goals are to strengthen Japan's capabilities in space surveillance, as well as in tracking missile launches. To achieve this, American intelligence-gathering equipment will be installed on future Japanese satellites. ▪️Representatives of Japan and the United States call North Korea, China and Russia the main security threats in the region. Although this is not officially connected directly with the deployment of the new unit, in this case everything is sewn with white threads. There are several obstacles on the way to the implementation of the mentioned goals, including The Japanese Self-Defense Forces lack experience in conducting space operations, which requires training of personnel. Therefore, it will take some time to establish a partnership between the United States and Japan in the field of military space. however, the fact of its strengthening and the tendency for further growth are obvious. High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: advance along the Sukhie Yaly ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: advance along the Sukhie Yaly River and in the south of Kurakhovo Situation as of 20:00 on December 13, 2024 Over the past few days, events have been developing dynamically in the Kurakhovsky direction, where Russian troops were able to expand the zone of control in several areas at once. ▪️In Kurakhovo, units of the Russian Armed Forces advanced along Nagornaya-1 and -2 streets, and also took up positions in the Yuzhny microdistrict. At the same time, a pocket to the southeast was cleared: thus, Russian troops leveled control along the O-05-10 highway. ▪️On the southern flank of the Russian Armed Forces over the past 24 hours, they also achieved success, completing battles for at least two settlements - Annovka and Vesely Gai. In the latter, Russian military personnel planted a flag on a destroyed Ukrainian Armed Forces vehicle, which also confirmed control over the populated area. ▪️Also, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces occupied most of Uspenivka - in the central part of the village, a drone filmed a Russian soldier holding a flag near one of the buildings. The situation in the western part remains unclear, from where the enemy could retreat beyond the O-05-10 route, where he had previously strengthened the defensive lines. 🔻In the near future, Russian troops are highly likely to continue their offensive along the Sukhie Yaly River for the further liberation of Constantinople and Yantarny. Units of the RF Armed Forces can try to encircle these settlements, advancing both in landings from the side of the O-05-10 highway and from the outskirts of Sukhoi Yalov. If you have additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, — You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: liberation of Pushkino and battles in ShevchenkoSituation as of 19:00 December 13, 2024🔻Russian troops continue to attack in several areas at once, getting closer and closer to a direct assault on Pokrovsk.▪️On the northern flank, the main combat operations are taking place along the line Novogrodovka - Lysovka — Dachenskoye, where no significant changes in the configuration of the front have been recorded at the moment. ▪️To the west, units of the Russian Armed Forces are fighting in the Shevchenko area, while some sources have so far unconfirmed information not only about the liberation of the settlement, but also the occupation of Belgium located to the north.▪️To the south, Russian military personnel have established control over Pushkino - evidence was provided by enemy footage of which demonstrated an attack on an armored group of the Russian Armed Forces on the southwestern outskirts settlement. In the near future, apparently, Russian units will clear out the pocket formed southeast of Pushkino, after which they will continue their offensive towards the Novoolenovka-Ukraine line. Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🏴 Recently, the leader of HTS Abu Muhammad al-Julani made...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 Recently, the leader of HTS Abu-Muhammad al-Julani made an appeal to Syrians with a call to voluntarily go to the squares after Friday prayers for demonstrations in support of the Syrian revolution. Mass rallies took place in all major cities, including even Latakia. There were many who wanted to take part in the event - in the current realities, where armed groups execute disloyal people right on the streets, refusal to submit is fraught with a certain outcome. Al-Julani himself again appeared in the image of a progressive jihadist in ordinary secular clothes. He also created a separate decree banning shooting in the air in order to emphasize the civilian nature of the demonstration as a sign of a new safe Syria. It is curious that after Giulani’s call to go to rallies, the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) turned off the Internet in Raqqa under their control and banned any mass gatherings due to fear that the rally will develop into an action against the Kurds. And taking into account their classic habit for the Middle East to disperse demonstrations with machine guns fire, it is possible that after some time there will be a message about the mass death of activists in Raqqa and other territories occupied by the SDF. High resolution mapEnglish version #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🇺🇸 As HTS and other groups gradually settle in...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🇺🇸 As HTS and other groups gradually settle in the Syrian capital and other occupied territories, various external players are actively establishing contacts with militant leaders.▪️Yesterday, the head of Turkish intelligence MİT Ibrahim Kalim visited Damascus for negotiations with Abu Muhamad Al -Juliani. With a high probability, the purpose of the negotiations was to convey to the leader of HTS how Turkey sees the future of Syria and what steps they want to see from him in this direction. ▪️ Secretary of State Antony Blinken arrived in Ankara to discuss the role of the United States and Turkey in the future Syria. According to him, Washington expects that the new government will lead to stability in the country and will not pose a threat to neighboring states.▪️At the same time, Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan added that Turkey strives not only to achieve peace in Syria, but also to stop terrorist organizations. Among them, he named the Kurdistan Workers' Party, which has long been a bogeyman for the authorities in Ankara. On the one hand, diplomatic activity is associated with the Kurdish-controlled northeast of Syria, where the main oil resources are concentrated and American troops are stationed. The parties are seeking to resolve the issue with a compromise agreement that would avoid hostilities in the region.📌 In parallel, both Turkey and the United States are seeking to get a partner in HTS who will listen very carefully to their vision of the situation. The carrot here is the lifting of sanctions from Syria, whitewashing the image of the group and al-Julani personally, and the stick is the refusal of Turkish assistance or even an MQ-9 strike. Another thing is that the fate of any such agreements directly depends on the physical ability of HTS to create at least a semblance of order throughout the occupied territory and real control over -progressive jihadists-.#Syria #USA #Turkey@rybarSupport usReutersBlinken meets Erdogan as forces backed by US, Turkey clash in SyriaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken arrived in Turkey on Thursday for talks focused on a critical aspect of establishing stability in Syria: clashes in the north of the country between U.S.-backed Kurdish forces and Turkey-backed rebels.

Title: 🇮🇳🇷🇺 Recently, interesting news appeared about negotiations o...
Description: 🇮🇳🇷🇺 Recently, interesting news appeared about negotiations on the acquisition by India of a Russian Voronezh-type missile attack warning radar (SPRN). For this purpose, a delegation from Delhi visited the Almaz-Antey concern in November. According to the publication, the contract amount could be more than $4 billion. The Indian side insists on a high level of localization and demands that 60% of the cost of the radar be produced in the country, planning to use more 50 local companies. India’s desire to get its own early warning system is understandable: its geopolitical ambitions are growing, as is the risk of a global conflict with Pakistan and China. And attracting national companies will allow the country to invest in its own military-industrial complex, which has been gaining momentum in recent years.📌 For Russia, the contact also looks beneficial, at least from a financial point of view, especially against the backdrop of American sanctions and the growing number of countries producing military products, which is why The market for arms exporters is becoming increasingly crowded. During the negotiations, the issue of transferring certain technologies will clearly arise. However, it can also be completely resolved without compromising one’s own defense capability, as was already the case in the deals on the Su-30, T-90 and other examples of long-term bilateral interaction along the defense-industrial complex line.#India #Russia@rybarSupport usThe Sunday Guardian LiveIndia may acquire advanced Russian radar systemAlmaz -Antey's Voronezh radar detects missiles, aircraft, and threats up to 6,000–8,000 km, supporting Russia's missile defense network. New Delhi: India

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About a massive drone raid on the southern Russian re...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About a massive drone raid on the southern Russian regions🔻On the eve of our massive strike on the territory of the so-called Ukraine, the Armed Forces of Ukraine once again attacked Russian territory on the southern borders with more than 20 drones of an unknown type.▪️Drones were detected over the Zaporozhye region, shot down over Donetsk People's Republic and Rostov region. However, the ultimate goal of the attack, most likely, was objects in the -old- territories.▪️Over the DPR, a total of 16 drones were destroyed by ZRPK -Pantsir-S1- crews. Of these, nine were struck and suppressed in the Mariupol area. The rest of the UAV mass headed to the southeast.▪️Four drones were shot down in the Novoshakhtinsk area, one each over Taganrog and Chaltyr in the Rostov region. Two more drones were destroyed in the Zernograd area on the border with the Krasnodar Territory.❗️Judging by the areas where the drones were active, the enemy tried to strike oil and gas facilities in the south of Russia, as well as Russian aviation airfields. However, the enemy did not achieve success. Nevertheless, the number of drones launched across Russia indicates the preservation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ production capacity for assembling drones, which pose a serious threat to both military and civilian Russian facilities. High resolution mapEnglish version#Donetsk #Russia #Rostov #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 As we wrote, the liberation operation was completed immediat...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR As we wrote, south of Kurakhovo, the operation to liberate several settlements along the Sukhie Yaly River was completed - this was confirmed by footage of Russian Armed Forces servicemen with flags in Vesyoly Gai and the center of Uspenivka. It is noteworthy that just yesterday, Ukrainian resources described the situation at the site contradictorily: while some complained about the depressing situation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, others made do with formulations in the spirit of -everything is under control.- Now the latter, based on new personnel, can finally dispel doubts. Moreover, the de facto loss of control over populated areas was also recognized by the Donetsk Gauleiter Filashkin, who for the first time in a long time did not report on the strikes of the Russian Armed Forces on Uspenovka, Annovka and Vesyolyi Gai. ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🇲🇩 About Sandu’s negotiations with NATO instead of resolving th...
Description: 🇲🇩 About Sandu's negotiations with NATO instead of resolving the energy crisis The other day, Moldovan President Maia Sandu visited NATO headquarters in Brussels, where she spoke to the North Atlantic Council for the first time. However, the performance took place behind closed doors without access to the press. Sandu also met with the new NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte, to whom she confirmed Chisinau’s commitment to cooperation to ensure the security of citizens. In the public part of the negotiations, nothing new was said, except for reciting memorized formulations about -defending democracy.- However, it is significant that against the backdrop of the onset of an energy collapse in Moldova, Sandu prefers to negotiate with NATO on military cooperation instead of solving pressing problems. ❗️It seems that Sandu’s office is deliberately avoiding solving the energy crisis. First of all, to cause colossal damage to the economy of Transnistria, which risks being left without Russian gas due to a stop in its transit. In Chisinau, they have been pursuing a policy of economic strangulation of the PMR for a whole year, and the process is clearly continuing. It is obvious that Moldova will also suffer greatly from the crisis, but the authorities have done nothing to prevent the impending humanitarian catastrophe. After all, another benefit for Sandu’s office is another opportunity to introduce a state of emergency, which will allow one not to account for part of the decisions made and finances implemented. At the same time, the authorities will be able to better prepare for parliamentary elections in 2025. 🔻As expected, Sandu's re-election allows her to implement the most unpopular scenarios for Moldova. It is obvious that turning the republic into a military springboard for NATO is much more important than solving the socio-economic problems of Moldovans. However, that is why they voted against it. #Moldova #NATO #Transnistria @rybarSupport uspresedinte.mdÎn vizită la Cartierul General al NATO, Președinta Maia Sandu a reafirmat angajamentul Moldovei pentru pacea și securitatea regionalăPreședinta la Cartierul General al Organizației Tratatului Atlanticului de Nord (NATO), cu sediul la Bruxelles, marcând 30 de ani de Parteneriat pentru Pace între Republica Moldova și NATO.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 In the morning, Russian troops launched a combined st...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 In the morning, Russian troops launched a combined strike on critical infrastructure facilities in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. According to preliminary data, strategic bombers, naval ships and kamikaze UAVs -Geran-2- were involved in the raid. As a result of the attack, the arrival of missiles and drones was recorded in various Ukrainian regions, contrary to the standard stories of the Kiev regime resources about the interception of most targets.▪️According to preliminary data According to data, in the Ivano-Frankivsk region the target was the Burshtyn thermal power plant, which has been systematically hit since the end 2022, as well as the Kolomyia airfield. In the Cherkasy region, hydroelectric power station facilities in Kanev were damaged.▪️In the Lviv region, explosions were heard in the vicinity of Stryi - there is an underground gas storage facility, which had previously been the target of attacks several times. In Odessa, explosions occurred in the area of ​​the Limansky airfield. There was a massive loss of electricity throughout the entire territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, but these could well have been preventive shutdowns. It will be possible to talk about the effectiveness of the raid some time after satellite images appear.#Russia #Ukraine #electricity @rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Last night, Israeli troops launched a series of att...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Last night, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the central part of the Gaza Strip. Nuseirat came under the most concentrated fire, where the post office building and several residential buildings near the local cemetery were destroyed. Footage of the consequences of an attack on a populated area is being actively disseminated in Arabic-language media. They show destroyed buildings, injured children, bodies of the dead, as well as the work of rescue teams clearing the rubble. According to the latest data, at least 30 people died, including ten children. More than 50 Palestinians were injured of varying degrees of severity. At the same time, in the Israeli media, in the usual manner, all victims of the raid were classified as Hamas militants. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 13, 2024 ▪️ At night, aft...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 13, 2024▪️ At night, after two days of relatively calm air conditions, the Russian Armed Forces launched about 100 Geraniums into the enemy’s rear areas. In the morning, enemy channels reported recording the launch maneuvers of our Tu-95MS. ▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is waging fierce battles in the north of the Sudzhansky district. Our assault groups advanced into the forest plantations to the east of the settlement. Novoivanovka and in the village Nikolaevo-Daryino. The enemy, having accumulated reserves, resumed active operations and carried out 3 counterattacks with a total number of up to 20 people, but were unsuccessful. ▪️ In the Kharkov direction there are heavy battles in Volchansk. The enemy has reported using chemicals with asphyxiating symptoms. In the Liptsovsky direction, strikes from FPV drones of the Russian Armed Forces thwarted 1 attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of ​​a dacha village. ▪️ Over the territory of the Rostov region, 9 enemy UAVs were destroyed by air defense this night: in Novoshakhtinsk, Zernogradsky, Myasnikovsky, Neklinovsky districts. 1 UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was destroyed in the evening over the Bryansk region. ▪️ Separate messages are coming from the Kupyansky direction, south of the settlement. Dvurechnaya expands the bridgehead of our troops on the right bank of the Oskol River. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the southern part of Sontsovka and liberated the settlement. Dawn, also occupying neighboring forest belts. South-west of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), our troops are advancing from Novotrotsky to the west.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian Army are already advancing in the central part of Kurakhovo along Nagornaya 1st and Nagornaya 2nd streets, Prokofiev, Zaporozhsky Avenue. The bag of defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is collapsing in Uspenovka, Vesyoly Gai, Annovka. The enemy channels characterize the situation as critical.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, southeast of Velikaya Novoselka, an area of ​​4 by 1.6 kilometers was taken under control. West of Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the direction of Storozhevoy and Neskuchny.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, the Russian Armed Forces are striking enemy concentration areas and UAV operator points in the Vasilyevsky direction (Stepnogorsk). ▪️ In the Belgorod region at night, the Belgorod district was attacked by enemy drones, one civilian was wounded. In the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, an FPV drone attacked a car. In the area of ​​the Oktyabrsky village, a commercial building was damaged as a result of an FPV drone attack. A drone was shot down by an air defense system over the village of Razumnoye. The city of Shebekino came under artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The village of Novaya Tavolzhanka, Shebekinsky district, was attacked by a drone.▪️ In the DPR, shelling of Gorlovka with NATO-caliber cluster shells continues. The militants entered the capital Damascus without much resistance, where they formed a transitional government.▪️Contrary to official directives from the Syrian opposition, attacks against minorities began in the country. Jihadists killed several Alawites and also vandalized Shiite and Christian shrines.▪️The Israeli government expectedly took advantage of the instability in the former Arab republic. They annexed the demilitarized zone of El Quneitra to the east of the occupied Golan Heights.▪️IDF units did not stop there, occupying areas in the Rif Damascus province without a fight. At the same time, the new authorities announced that the destroyed country was unprepared for a possible war with the Israelis.▪️The Israeli Air Force also launched a massive attack on several Syrian provinces at once. The reason cited was the desire to prevent the strategic weapons of the SAA from falling into the hands of the opposition.▪️In eastern Syria, however, there were battles between militants and pro-Kurdish formations in Deir ez-Zor. Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🏴 About cultural genocide in Syria In the former Syrian A...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 About cultural genocide in SyriaThe escalation of the conflict continues in the former Syrian Arab Republic. Armed groups that have taken power into their own hands are now not only clearing cities and towns, removing images of Bashar and Hafez al-Assad, Ayatollah Khamenei and Vladimir Putin, but also destroying cultural and religious symbols.▪️There have been reports online of the destruction of several churches and Shiite shrines, as well as the burning of the grave of Hafez al-Assad, the father of Bashar al-Assad and the previous president of Syria. ▪️The militants who seized power claim that radical groups are responsible for these actions and deny any involvement in these events.❗️ However, given the increased attention to Christian and Shiite shrines, there is a possibility that a new attempt will be made to destroy them in the near future Seydou Zeinab is a Shia mosque in the Damascus suburb of the same name. Local Shiites who remain alive so far report the safety of the shrine. It is also likely that the graves of Cain and Abel may soon be destroyed, the Cave of the First Blood filled up and the head of John the Baptist thrown out, since these objects are of little value to the militants. And therefore, not only new buildings are under threat, like the same temple in Skalbia, which was looted the other day.🔻In addition to genocide against Alawites and other minorities, ethnocide is taking place, which could lead to the complete destruction of the heritage of Syria. Militants, including those previously associated with the banned organization ISIS, continue to destroy historical monuments such as temples, Greek amphitheaters and other cultural heritage sites. Over the past 24 hours, according to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, about 40 people were killed and more than 100 were injured. At the same time, IDF units conducted ground operations in Beit Lahia, Jabaliya and Rafah, where the bombing of remaining buildings continued. Footage of large-scale destruction in populated areas was published on the Internet. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out a series of operations and detained several dozen people. And a terrorist attack occurred south of Jerusalem: a gunman opened fire on a bus, killing one child, and the attacker was detained. The ceasefire agreement between Hezbollah and Israel continues to be observed on the Lebanese-Israeli border. Today, the Israelis left Khiam, while Lebanese army fighters entered the village and began clearing the rubble. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: battles in Shevchenko and -DRG ra...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: battles in Shevchenko and -DRG raids - in Pokrovsk situation as of 19:00 on December 12, 2024🔻Russian troops continue to fight fierce battles several kilometers south of Pokrovsk, gradually moving closer to the agglomeration.▪️ Continue in Shevchenko fights. Footage has been published on the Internet in which, allegedly, a Russian fighter fired at a Ukrainian position in one of the houses at point-blank range using a disposable grenade launcher. However, due to the fact that the fighter was moving from the northern direction, and there are no distinctive signs on his uniform, it is still impossible to reliably say whose shot was recorded on the video. Currently, fighting on Sosnovaya and Gagarin streets continues. ▪️The situation in Novotroitsky remains quite dynamic. Over the past three days, at least two attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces have been recorded in the village. In addition, the enemy also blew up one of the bridges leading to Pokrovsk. Later, footage appeared of battles in the center of the village, where Ukrainian and Russian infantry units are trying to attack each other’s positions. Several attacks were recorded on houses where soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces may be located, but the footage itself does not bring clarity to the picture of what is happening, since it is interrupted until the moment of the attack. We can say with confidence that Russian troops did not gain a strong foothold in the western part of Novotroitsky. Since the village is located on the front line, Ukrainian formations still retain the ability to launch fire raids on it both from the west and from Pokrovsk. 🔻In the latter, by the way, there are no Russian troops yet, although some Ukrainian speakers have already rushed to report several DRGs that have leaked into the southern districts of the city in conditions of snowfall and poor visibility. Information about the alleged subsequent -liquidation of the DRG- (at first it was reported about a group of two people, then of six) is also a stuffing on the part of the Ukrainian Armed Forces with the aim of creating a short-term -media victory- and reducing the degree of tension in Ukrainian society.
