Title: 🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong...
Description: 🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong with this innovation? The other day it became known that migrants were allowed to take the Russian language exam in Dushanbe. The list of government institutions conducting exams in the Russian language, history and legislation of Russia included the Moscow Center for Educational Quality at the Sakharovo branch in the capital of Tajikistan.📌 From a logical point of view, this measure, in theory, should have simplified the admission of foreigners coming to work , since the same procedures would not have to be carried out in Russia. However, taking into account all the events when migrants were even given passports illegally for money, there are some doubts about this. And foreign specialists, by the way, heard about this innovation and were incredibly happy. Someone simply said that it would be easier to pass, and someone said that you could simply buy the exam in your home country. And some went further and asked whether it was possible to immediately obtain a residence permit and citizenship. There are strong suspicions that this process will not be transparent. If in Russia migrants managed to smuggle their families and obtain citizenship illegally, then what can we expect from the center in Dushanbe? I would like to believe that those who started all this are aware of the possible consequences and will take appropriate measures.#Russia #CentralAsia# Tajikistan@rybarSupport usTelegramMultinationalMigrants were allowed to take the Russian language exam in Dushanbe - MEDIAForeign specialists are very happy and are already interested in prices. Title: 🇺🇸 Donald Trump's team continues to surprise Americans with mor...
Description: 🇺🇸 Donald Trump's team continues to surprise Americans with more and more unusual attacks and eccentric candidates for certain positions. This time, Robert Kennedy Jr., whom Trump appointed as Secretary of Health and Human Services, is trying to promote his daughter-in-law Amaryllis Fox-Kennedy to the post of first deputy director of the CIA. Kennedy Jr. is convinced that Amaryllis, who worked as a CIA officer under unofficial cover with 2002 to 2010, will be able to prove that the agency was involved in the death of his uncle, President John F. Kennedy, in 1963. The pretext for the appointment of Kennedy Jr.’s daughter-in-law to one of the senior positions of the CIA was, of course, chosen very well. 🔻However, what real reasons could be hidden behind it? ▪️Well, first of all, this is control over the internal processes of the CIA. Having a trusted person at the highest level allows you to monitor and correct actions that may further affect the political landscape. ▪️And since Kennedy Jr. lost to Trump in the primaries, then in the future Amaryllis can help her father-in-law amass political capital - this will help strengthen the influence of the Kennedy clan on American politics, as well as restore their historical reputation.▪️And, in the end, In the context of political polarization in the United States, access to key intelligence structures can be an effective means of predicting the actions of opponents and forming one’s own strategy.#USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: 🖇🇷🇺 About the trial against the niece of the ex-president of B...
Description: 🖇🇷🇺 About the trial against the niece of the ex-president of Bashkiria The niece of the ex-president of Bashkiria and the publisher of the opposition portal -Proof-Raufa Rakhimova will have to answer for discrediting the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. Previously, the court sentenced her to a fine of 30 thousand rubles, but the defendant did not admit guilt. As in two other cases under the same article. Now another one has been added to them, and at the trial the media manager stated that another protocol on an administrative offense had been drawn up against her. 📌We have repeatedly written about Rakhimova, whose newspaper is part of the opposition conglomerate - Syndicate-100 - along with other anti-Russian foreign agent resources. -Proofs- is known for fakes about Russian military personnel and new waves of mobilization, popularization of Bashkir extremists and separatists, for example, Fail Alsynov and Ruslan Gabbasov. The publication also became the mouthpiece of the Russian opposition in the region, mobilizing for unauthorized public actions, one of which led to mass unrest in Baymak.▪️Rakhimova’s close ties with radical Bashkir nationalists are confirmed not only by her relevant public statements, but also by the fact that among them employees was listed as extremist foreign agent Gabbasov, who lives in Lithuania, supports the Armed Forces of Ukraine and spreads ideas separatism among the inhabitants of Bashkiria. ▪️Colleagues also report that in November of this year, Rakhimova most likely held negotiations in Moscow with a number of large media outlets with the aim of selling a toxic asset before escaping from Russia.▪️Nevertheless, at the trials the woman tries to express -love for the Motherland- , in every possible way convincing the court of his approval of the special operation in Ukraine, patriotism, etc. As before, political commentator -Proofs- Ramil Rakhmatov, who has short-term participation in the SVO, helps support this myth. So this time, right before the trial, Rakhmatov went to the combat zone with a humanitarian convoy to use this fact to whitewash his leader. Before this, Rakhmatov had already come to court to support his employer for medals, thus exploiting the theme of a special operation to protect an anti-Russian figure. At the same time, in his articles he called the experts of Russian courts -nonentities- and -varieties of a known substance,- and before that he even threatened journalists with physical violence. 🔻Under the leadership of Rakhimova, the publication -Proofs- was repeatedly brought to administrative responsibility for abuse of media freedom. The latest case is the spread of fakes about the organization of mass riots. Now the authorities are actively taking on the owner of the portal herself. In light of the general activities of the editorial office and the emerging trend, the imminent deprivation of the license seems to be the logical end of this anti-Russian publication. #Russia #separatism #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramKommersant BashkortostanThe Supreme Court of Bashkortostan yesterday upheld without change the resolution of the Kirovsky District Court of Ufa, which imposed a fine of 30 thousand. rub. media manager, publisher of the portal -Proofs- and niece of the ex-president of Bashkortostan Murtaza Rakhimov, Raufa Rakhimova. Title: 🖼 🇸🇴Situation in Somalia: crisis in Jubaland Summary for Novem...
Description: 🇸🇴The situation in Somalia: the crisis in Jubaland Summary for November 22 - December 12, 2024 The political crisis in Jubaland has reached the peak of escalation. In the city of Ras Kamboni, where Somali troops and local militias from among the Jubaland Dervish forces had previously been sent, clashes took place.▪️During short fighting, a brigade of the Somali army, trained in Turkey, Gorgor, suffered heavy losses and partially surrendered to the separatists. while other soldiers fled to Kenya. The surrounding areas of the city also came under the control of local forces. After a break with the federal authorities, the Jubaland authorities abandoned dialogue and proceeded to escalate the conflict. It’s interesting that they took their elite abroad in advance. Thus, the Minister of National Security of Jubaland was taken out of the country under the escort of Ethiopian troops.🔻And all this is happening against the backdrop of negotiations on reconciliation between Somalia and Ethiopia, held in Ankara. According to the final communique, both sides agreed on mutually beneficial commercial agreements and sustainable access to the sea. ❗️But this does not mean that the Ethiopian authorities will stop secretly supporting separatists in Somaliland and, now, in Jubaland. Due to the rapprochement of the leadership in Mogadishu with the Egyptians, who are the Ethiopians’ rivals in the struggle for regional influence, other provocations should be expected. Moreover, the true intentions of the Ethiopians were emphasized by the visit of the head of the administration of the Ethiopian national district of Somalia to Hargeisa to meet with the President of Somaliland.▪️In addition to the events in Jubaland, the situation in the fight against terrorism also remains stable and tense. Some al-Shabab attacks take place near the capital. At this time, in autonomous Puntland, the armed forces are preparing an offensive against the Islamic State militants hiding in the rugged mountains. The latter, with the help of Western media, have managed to turn into almost the main base of the international terrorist group. We will find out what they really are in the near future. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Somalia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇫🇷🇺🇸 About the military cooperation of Armenia with Franc...
Description: 🇦🇲🇫🇷🇺🇸 About the military cooperation of Armenia with France and the USA Representatives of the military departments of Armenia and France signed a defense cooperation program for 2025 in Yerevan. The parties noted the strategic importance of the relations between the two countries, which include military planning, education and exercises. The Armenian Ministry of Defense did not provide more detailed details of the agreement. Recently, a meeting between Armenian and US Defense Ministers Suren Papikyan and Lloyd Austin also took place in Washington. A short summary from the Pentagon noted that such a meeting took place for the first time in 20 years, and the parties confirmed the strategic partnership of the two countries in achieving lasting peace in the South Caucasus. Both news feeds predictably caused a storm of emotions in the Armenian information field, but it is significant that, at least publicly, neither the French nor the American sides promised anything fundamentally new for Armenia in the field of security. Perhaps we can note the promises of the Americans to develop a new military uniform for the Armenians. 🔻Apparently, it is important for the outgoing administration of President Joe Biden to outline American priorities in Armenia. Moreover, as we wrote, it is still unclear what role the South Caucasus will play in Donald Trump’s policies. However, the State Department adviser is already working hard in the Armenian Ministry of Defense, and they promise to reform the Armenian army to NATO standards. For the government of Nikol Pashinyan, both events are important in domestic political terms, creating the appearance of building a new security system for Armenia, and even more so after Yerevan’s regular claims against the CSTO. However, as current practice shows, relying solely on external assistance in regional contradictions does not necessarily protect against complete collapse. #Armenia #USA #France @rybarSupport us. 2025 November 10-ին ՀՀ News News News The նախարարության…

Title: 🇩🇪🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Crisis in Syria: what will happen to the Islamic S...
Description: 🇩🇪🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Crisis in Syria: what will happen to the Islamic State? The other day, US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said that IS militants could take advantage of the collapse of the Syrian government and restore their combat effectiveness in the Middle East. But the head of the Pentagon is disingenuous : The group is already gradually increasing its activity. Even during the offensive of the pro-Turkish conglomerate, IS terrorists resumed attacks in the Syrian desert. A few days ago, the Americans, as they say, carried out an operation against them, hitting about 75 targets, but did not provide any facts, so we cannot take the press release of the joint central command at its word worth it.❗️A huge role in the possible restoration of the combat potential of the Islamic State was played by the terrorists themselves from the Idlib reserve, who freed everyone along the way prisoners from all prisons, including notorious ISIS thugs. Does anyone seriously think that the extremists have reformed while in prison? They became even angrier - much more likely. And the unrest, lynching, and lynching that are now happening are only to the advantage of the Islamic State.🔻And this applies not only to Syria or neighboring countries. In Europe, the radicals weren’t hiding much anyway, but now they’ve raised their heads high. In Germany, three IS supporters were detained with rifles and ammunition in the states of Hesse and Baden-Württemburg. And this is just the beginning, since with the waves of refugees, not only civilians fleeing war, but also terrorists or supporters of extremist ideology will infiltrate into the EU countries.#Germany #Syria #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the night drone raid on Crimea That night, Ukra...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the night drone raid on Crimea This night, Ukrainian formations again attacked Crimea. But it was not a massive and terrifying attack, as Ukrainian resources called it. The Ukrainian Armed Forces used only eight drones.▪️The alarm about the danger in the air in Crimea and Sevastopol lasted for more than two hours due to the fact that the enemy launched drones one or two at a time, but no more. Because of this, the air defense work was long.▪️The first UAV was shot down by a Su-34 fighter 30 km west of Cape Tarkhankut. The next one was two hours later in the area of ​​Cape Khersones in Sevastopol - apparently he was flying to Sevastopol Bay.▪️Then two UAVs were destroyed on approach to the Balaklava Thermal Power Plant, another drone was destroyed over Cape Fiolent from the air defense missile system -Pantsir-S1-. Half an hour later, two more drones were suppressed 5 km west of Sevastopol and another one was shot down in the area of ​​the thermal power plant.❗️The attack was expected and completely standard without any changes. It is not entirely clear what type of drone was used. We do not rule out that this was again the same know-how of the Ukrainian regime, which intercepted the MiG-29 the day before yesterday. However, the danger of new attacks remains. The enemy's actions show that preparations are underway for massive raids and missile strikes, so it is better to remain vigilant in the next few days. High resolution mapEnglish version#Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

The driver continued on his way and reached a checkpoint at the entrance to the Israeli capital - the victims were treated there, but a twelve-year-old child received non-life-threatening injuries. Meanwhile, the attacker tried to escape, but was quickly detained in the Bethlehem area by Israeli soldiers. The terrorist turned out to be a resident of Beit Ava - apparently, searches will be carried out in his house in the near future. 📌Such incidents are nothing new for the Palestinian Authority - they occur quite regularly. At the same time, Hamas often calls such terrorist attacks a response to the Israeli Defense Forces’ aggression in the Gaza Strip. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇺🇦🇵🇱🇫🇷 By the way, about Macron’s peacekeeping mission a...
Description: Forwarded From Warsaw Mermaid🇺🇦🇵🇱🇫🇷 By the way, about Macron’s peacekeeping mission and how it is perceived by the Poles. Despite the active resistance to this idea in the media from officials at various levels, one cannot help but recall Jaroslaw Kaczynski’s statements regarding this kind of mission. In the fall of 2022, during a pre-election tour of Polish cities, the leader -Rights and Justice- compared the Northern Military District in Ukraine with a series of armed conflicts on the territory of what was then Yugoslavia in 1990-2001. At the same time, he stated that the situation in Ukraine now is much worse. There was a war in Yugoslavia, but it was of a special nature. There were many fronts, many opponents, and everything happened on a territory that was clearly smaller than the territory of Poland, because Yugoslavia is 240 thousand km. The war was such that they shot here and danced there. I say all this from my own experience, because I was there. In any case, this had little to do with what was happening in Ukraine,- the politician said then. Here are the supporters of organizing a certain -peacekeeping mission- in Ukraine: they seriously believe that a -humanitarian- intervention in Yugoslavia in the form of a reset more than 30 thousand cluster bombs - it was something between dancing and shooting. Now think about the nature of the intervention awaiting Ukraine. #Poland #Ukraine@pl_syrenka - Poland is not a foreign countryTelegramRybar🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Poland tomorrow to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of the so-called. Title: 🔁🎬 We have already published the advantages of disposable bulle...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors We once already published the advantages of disposable loaded belts for machine guns 🇷🇺 The footage shows the method of storing ammunition in a box (7.62x51, .308) NATO ⚡️ Please note: disposable belts are stored immediately equipped with 200 pieces. in vacuum packaging, not in iron zinc.✨That is, when working with NATO machine gun belts, the algorithm is as follows: opened the box, loaded the weapon with the finished belt, and started shooting. Ours needs to: open the iron zinc with cartridges, find a clean machine-gun belt, equip it manually or using a Rakov machine, only after all these long manipulations will the machine-gun crew be ready for battle. These procedures are not always convenient to carry out in the mud of trenches. We ask our dear gunsmiths to pay attention to the approach of evil foreigners to the use of modern technologies in the military industry. Two majors

Title: 🇨🇳🇹🇼 About new Chinese exercises in the Asia-Pacific region.....
Description: 🇨🇳🇹🇼 About new Chinese exercises in the Asia-Pacific region New military maneuvers of the Chinese army have begun. According to reports from Taiwanese and Western sources, about 90 PLA ​​Navy ships are participating, deployed not only near the island, but also in other areas, as well as Chinese aircraft.▪️The official goals and objectives of the exercise remain unknown. Chinese authorities have yet to make any announcement regarding the training, although it is believed to have started on December 9. In general, the maneuvers are actively discussed only in Taiwan, as well as in the Western press. However, taking into account both the statements of Taiwanese sources and the areas of activity of Chinese aviation and naval forces, several conclusions can be drawn. ▪️Firstly, the exercises are not only aimed at containing Taiwan. Chinese forces are conducting training both near the island and in the South China and East China Seas. The Chinese are believed to be active throughout almost the entire First Island Chain, a strategically important area stretching from Japan to Southeast Asia. The first chain of islands actually encircles the entire coast of China. Control over it, which the Americans are striving for, makes it possible to contain the PRC militarily. During the current exercises, the Chinese are working on measures to limit access to it from the inside. Therefore, Chinese technology was observed both near the Philippines and near the Japanese islands. ▪️Secondly, the main purpose of the exercises is most likely not to punish Taiwanese politicians. Yes, the leader of the island, Lai Qingde, last week visited American territories in the Pacific Ocean in transit, which the Chinese authorities did not really like. However, comparing the areas of previous exercises, which began after the actions of the Taiwanese and surrounded only the island, with the current ones, it becomes clear that the matter lies not only in the activities of the local administration. 🔻Perhaps such large-scale exercises are intended to send a signal to the future American administration and the elected US President Donald Trump. This is necessary to show China's influence on the first island chain and prove China's willingness to take control of it. Let us emphasize that the Chinese authorities have not yet made any substantive comments on the ongoing exercises. Therefore, the situation may become clearer after they are completed. High resolution mapEnglish version#China #Taiwan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 12, 2024 ▪️ In the evenin...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 12, 2024▪️ In the evening, the enemy attempted a massive UAV raid on Sevastopol, the governor reported that air defense and Black Sea Fleet units shot down 5 UAVs, 2 drones were suppressed by electronic warfare. There were also reports of downed targets over the sea. At the same time, several heads of regions wrote about the missile threat, in some it has already been canceled. At Sochi airport, the plan -Carpet-▪️ was introduced. At 00:55 in Grozny, a drone was shot down over the barracks buildings of a special police regiment of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the Chechen Republic. 4 guard soldiers were slightly injured. The personnel on duty at that time were in premises protected from such attacks, Kadyrov wrote.▪️ During the day, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported that six American-made ATACMS ballistic missiles were used in the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ attack on Taganrog last night. -This attack by Western long-range weapons will not go unanswered, appropriate measures will be taken,- the defense department stated.▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops continues its offensive in the north of the Sudzhansky district, and has advanced east of the settlement. Novoivanovka, as well as in forests near the village. Malaya Loknya. A new element of the situation, according to local assessments, was the refusal of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to carry out counterattacks, the enemy’s concentration on holding positions and the creation of tension in other sections of the state border. The advance of the Northerners continues in the forest areas to the west of the settlement. Plekhovo. During the cleanup, 1 serviceman of the 129th TrO brigade was captured; in total, 502 servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are in captivity.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone of control to the south of the city. Fighting is taking place on the outskirts of Vozrozhdenie (New Labor), near Shevchenko and in the Novotroitsky area. ▪️ The group of troops - East - south of Kurakhovo is gradually moving on the right bank of the river. Dry Yaly. Fighting continues in the area of ​​the settlement. Merry Guy and Constantinople. Intense fighting is taking place northeast of Velikaya Novoselka; the Ukrainian Armed Forces are counterattacking in the area of ​​Novy Komar and Razdolnoye. South of Velikaya Novoselka, the enemy, with the support of armored vehicles, attempted to attack our positions in Oktyabr (Blagodatnoe) and was destroyed. There is an advance of the Armed Forces in the Ravnopol area, our units are gradually advancing through forest belts. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Situation in the South Donetsk direction, reports @voin_dv: Fierce fighting continues along the entire front line. ▪️In the area south of Kurakhovo, gradual progress is being made on the right bank of the river. Dry Yaly. Fighting continues in the area of ​​the settlement. Funny…

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 11, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked Jabaliya and Beit Lahia. The southern quarters of the capital of the Palestinian enclave were also hit, and there were no casualties. In the central part of the enclave, Nuseirat remained under the most concentrated fire, where six people were killed. In the south, engineering work is underway in the Philadelphia Corridor. Police raids continue in the West Bank. In Nablus, Palestinians fired at an Israeli civilian vehicle, injuring three adherents of Braslav Hasidism. Yemen's Houthis reported a combined attack on supply ships and US Navy destroyers in the Gulf of Aden. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 11, 2024. Ukrainian formations used six ATACMS operational-tactical missiles to strike the Taganrog aviation scientific and technical complex in the Rostov region. In the Bryansk region, the enemy attacked the territory of the Druzhba oil pipeline with drones. At the same time, over the Black Sea, the air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces intercepted the drone missile of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Peklo-. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian units reached the western outskirts of Novy Trud (Vozrozhdeniye), knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several forest belts and forest areas. In parallel with this, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the northern outskirts of Shevchenko and in the Novotroitsky area. In the Kurakhovo direction, Russian troops are liquidating a pocket south of Kurakhovo. The attack aircraft knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from most of Vesyoly Gai and almost completely cleared the southern bank of the Sukhie Yala River. At the same time, from the north they are advancing on Uspenovka, the liberation of which will close the encirclement ring around the enemy garrison in Annovka. In the Vremyevsky direction, the Russian Aerospace Forces attacked the enemy crossing in the Novoocherevatoy area. At the same time, heavy fighting is taking place in the vicinity of Novy Komar and Razdolnoye. A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en) )Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en) ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ru#Bryansk #Vremevka #digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Rostov #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: fighting in Novotroitsky situatio...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: fighting in Novotroitsk situation towards the end of December 11, 2024🔻Russian troops are consolidating on the western outskirts of the settlement of Novy Trud (Vozrozhdenie). Probably, the enemy was also knocked out of the forest to the south near the railway, since without control over him an attack towards the village would have been impossible.▪️With the liberation of Novy Trud, the Russian Armed Forces provide a bridgehead for encircling enemy positions in Zeleny and Dachenskoye from the west, simultaneously with thereby attacking from the east from Lysovka. In the future, this will make it possible to eliminate the pocket along the section of the M-30 highway between Dachensky and Novy Trud.▪️ At the same time, the enemy made an unsuccessful attack attempt in the village of Shevchenko. Two armored vehicles of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and a tank were blown up at minefields on the northern outskirts of the village by the Russian Armed Forces. Exactly how they were installed - from the air or by sappers manually - is not yet known. It is possible that at the moment the village has already been taken under control by Russian troops.▪️To the west, fighting continues in Novotroitsky, on the eastern outskirts of which Ukrainian formations are trying from time to time to organize fire raids under the cover of armored vehicles. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like we highlighted the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botMap in high permissionEnglish version#digest #map #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybar⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ruSupport us

Title: 🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Pola...
Description: 🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Poland tomorrow to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of the so-called. Ukraine within the framework of a possible agreement between the United States and the Russian Federation. Details of the plan are not disclosed, but it is known that it is based on the Korean scenario. According to it, a foreign contingent of peacekeeping forces is introduced to the demarcation line. Macron's idea received tacit approval from the UK in November. Poland's participation in this strategy is presented as decisive due to its military potential and geographical location. And it is clear why the French President expects special support from the Poles: after all, in this way they would be able to legally approach Vskhodny Kresy. It is interesting that there has already been a reaction to Macron’s plan in Warsaw: the head of the Polish Ministry of Defense, Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh, said that the sending of Polish soldier on so-called Ukraine is out of the question, since the key role here should be played by NATO, and not by individual countries. At the same time, after a long time, the Poles again started talking about legalizing their mercenaries who are fighting for the Armed Forces of Ukraine illegally - Officially this should be punishable by up to five years in prison. The details of the initiative are unknown, but they say that the bill provides for forgiveness and oblivion of crimes and misdemeanors from February 24, 2022 to December 31, 2026 for joining the Armed Forces of Ukraine without the consent of the competent authority of Poland. That is, in addition to the fact that the Poles will be allowed to fight unhindered in .n. Ukraine will also be allowed, in fact, to do it as it pleases - no criminal prosecution is provided for. In this situation, it will be possible not to take the Poles prisoner. However, it is worth understanding that in reality we are not talking about a peacekeeping mission as such - that is, the deployment of blue helmets, which will essentially perform police functions in no man's land: for Neither people nor special equipment will be enough for this. 🔻The conversation concerns the introduction of a limited contingent of NATO troops, who could thus simply take over Ukrainian territory. And this, in turn, means a truly serious military escalation with the Russian Federation. As a result, the parties will probably not reach any solution: none of the European governments is ready to take on such responsibility and thereby face the threat of a nuclear strike. But for now, you can distract yourself from internal political crises, economic collapse and social tension, and pretend to be hegemons, pretending that the fate of the entire Western world depends on the participation of France or Poland.#Poland #France #Ukraine@rybar together with @pl_syrenkaSupport usTelegramVarshavskaya mermaid🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 Poland is expecting a visit from French President Emmanuel Macron. He intends to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of Ukraine within the framework of a possible agreement between the United States and the Russian Federation. The Polish media are delighted: leave France...

Title: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🌓 And again about the British influence on the migration...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🌓 And again about British influence on the migration situation in Russia. In recent days, the topic of the migration situation in Russia, the possible consequences and the destructive influence of Western intelligence services (primarily the UK) on what is happening has been raised in the highest political circles.➖Today, the director of the FSB Alexander Bortnikov, who stated that the activities of Western intelligence services are aimed at creating artificial hotbeds of tension through ethno-confessional specifics.❗️This is a serious fact, since the head of such a structure as the FSB personally drew attention to this problem.➖Before this, State Duma deputy Andrei Lugovoi spoke about the same, who noted the urgent need for a legislative settlement of migration issues and preventing hostile activities of foreign agents in this direction. The role of Western intelligence services and the organizations they feed on the territory of Russia is extremely high, if not called key at all. It was the discovery of these facts that became the reason for their expulsion in September of this year, and then again in November. The program to undermine the internal political situation in Russia was born back in the 90s, but only at the beginning of this century did intensive work begin on the implementation of a multi-year project aimed at the destruction of Russia from the inside.🔻And the actions of Great Britain in this direction are easy to determine if you can look into the details. Recently, the British MI5 and MI6 were prohibited from accepting -white citizens- for internships. Minorities fell into new categories (blacks, Asians, Arabs, and so on). It would seem, why would the British infringe on the rights of the indigenous population? But under the guise of working on the Western agenda, the British made a significant feint to create personnel intelligence officers for foreign intelligence, including from representatives of the nations of Central Asia. The British have made similar steps throughout their history. During the Great Game in Afghanistan, foreign intelligence schools functioned in India, where recruitment was carried out from among the population inhabiting the region, with subsequent transfer to the zone of Russian influence. A very similar scheme, isn’t it? Only instead of professional intelligence officers, thousands of migrants from Central Asia arrive in Russia, more than half of whom have a vague history. For what purpose is this being done - you can see the answer in the migration situation in Russia.#Great Britain #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usThe TelegraphWhite British students not allowed to apply for security services internshipDecision described as 'blatant discrimination' and 'racist' as MI5, MI6 and GCHQ try to increase diversity among their ranks

Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 The United States, the Philippines and Japan continu...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 The United States, the Philippines and Japan continue to strengthen their security cooperation. ▪️Recently, the first round of trilateral maritime dialogue took place, at which the authorities of the countries discussed the issues of the South China Sea. ▪️The parties criticized the actions of the PRC in the water area, and also promised to further increase cooperation. Conducting joint exercises with other partners in the region was also discussed. ▪️In general, nothing new was said by representatives of the USA, Japan and the Philippines. Important agreements and even hints of them were also absent. This is largely explained by the format of the meeting - the level of representatives was quite low, and the dialogue itself is more of a platform for discussing problems, rather than something more significant. ▪️However, despite the lackluster nature of the event, its holding is another sign of growing close ties between the Philippines, the USA and Japan. Of course, there is no talk of a conventional analogue of a military alliance in the region yet, but the formalization of cooperation between the three countries is happening right now. 📌By the way, it’s funny that the incident with the use of lasers by the Chinese was revealed the day before the meeting. It originally happened last week, but the video appeared only recently. Of course, it is impossible to prove a direct connection between these events. However, it is difficult to deny the fact that before such negotiations in the South China Sea, similar incidents or exercises occur, only heating up the situation. #USA #Philippines #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usINQUIRER.NETPH-US-Japan maritime talks flag 'unlawful' Chinese behavior in West PH SeaMANILA, Philippines – The Philippines, United States and Japan raised -serious concerns- over China's repeated blocking and harassment of Philippine vessels in the West Philippine Sea during their inaugural trilateral maritime talks in Japan.

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): militants tak...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): militants capture the administrative center of the region, situation as of 17.00 December 11, 2024. In the province of Deir ez-Zor, fighting continues between the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) and associations led by - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- (HTS) and -Syrian National Army- (SNA).▪️Pro-HTS militants -Department of Military Operations - completely took control of the city of Deir ez-Zor and the military airport located there. The Kurds did not offer resistance and went to the opposite bank of the Euphrates. ▪️In the Kurdish media, the retreat from previously taken (actually handed over by the SAR armed forces who fled from there) territories was explained by some agreements with the terrorists - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - concluded through the mediation of the Americans. The condition was the non-entry of pro-Turkish SNA factions into the populated area, in particular such as -Tajamua Ahrar al-Sharqiya-, whose members maternity hospital from these lands. However, soon footage appeared in which they, contrary to promises, show off in Deir ez-Zor.❗The statements about the agreements between HTS and the SDF look remarkable. It is worth noting that reports of ties between the two sides, bypassing Turkish warnings, began to appear long before the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad. And then the commander-in-chief of the SDF, Mazlum Abdi, officially declares the readiness of the pro-Kurdish administration to cooperate with the new authorities in Damascus, confirming the existence of contacts through the same United States and at the same time criticizing Assad.▪️Amid the ongoing clashes, information appeared about a split in the ranks of the Military Council of Deir ez-Zor - - an American-backed Arab formation within the Syrian Democratic Forces responsible for this province. Some of the fighters, led by commander Abu al-Harith al-Shaaiti, deserted and joined the -legitimate opposition- and -progressive jihadists-, while some remained loyal to the leadership of the SDS. At the same time, the scale of the split is unknown. However, the most interesting thing is just beginning: in order to put the squeeze on the Kurds in Deir ez-Zor, the militants will have to move to the western bank of the Euphrates. There, in addition to oil and gas, there are American military bases in the Conoco and Al-Omar fields. By retreating to these territories, the Syrian Democratic Forces most likely expected to receive support from the US Armed Forces: they say they certainly will not allow the Turkish mercenaries - to brazenly walk around in their zone of interests and control. How it will actually be is difficult to predict. However, given the rapidly changing balance in the country after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad, the Americans can come to an agreement with -yesterday's extremists- on mutual interests. Title: 🇫🇷🇹🇩 Chadian authorities, after breaking defense agreements w...
Description: 🇫🇷🇹🇩 After the rupture of defense agreements with France, the Chadian authorities announced that they refuse to invite foreign military personnel, including from Russia. A fully expected statement from the Chadian Foreign Ministry, indicating a clear position - Chad has grown, and external forces will protect it can't-. We have already observed a similar narrative during the counter-terrorism operation -Haskanit-. At the same time, the duality of these slogans is also noticeable - there was no news about the withdrawal of the same Hungarian contingent. Of course, his stated goal is to prevent illegal migration, but the fact that Hungarians are in Chad already indicates the indirect presence of the West. Such flexibility in the position of Deby the Younger is associated with the strong influence of Western business in the country and its political institutions. It is considered dangerous for his government to become excessively pro-Russian. Therefore, domestic diplomats need to take this point into account, promoting mainly instruments of soft power and economic projects.#Africa #Russia #France #Chad @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇫🇷🇹🇩 About the rupture of the Chad defense agreement and France, the Chadian Foreign Minister announced the termination of defense agreements with the French by the authorities. Title: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 The situation in the South China Sea remains tense. ...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 The situation in the South China Sea remains tense. Recently it became known about another skirmish between the Filipinos and the Chinese in the disputed waters. Last week, the Chinese coast guard fired a laser six times at a Philippine ship sailing towards Thitu Island, which is controlled by the Philippines, according to authorities in Manila. According to the sailors, the laser hit members of the ship's crew several times in the eyes.▪️Experts interviewed by local media claim that what happened can be considered an armed attack. Let us recall that a mutual defense treaty has been concluded between the Philippines and the United States, implying military assistance from the Americans in the event of aggression against the Philippines. However, the wording mentioned in the document is very vague, so after almost every skirmish one or another expert claims that the time for applying the treaty has come. 🔻In reality, only the Americans will determine the criteria for an armed attack, since the implementation of the text of the document in practice, to a large extent, depends solely on their political will, and not on the prescribed wording. The decision to enter into an open conflict with Beijing over several uninhabited reefs, which, among other things, do not have much strategic value, has not yet matured in Washington and is unlikely to mature in the near future. Therefore, the Americans will continue to limit themselves only to financial assistance and joint exercises with the Philippine military in order to show efforts to contain China.#China #USA #Philippines  @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramAwakening dragon 🐲🇨🇳🇵🇭 With the Chinese exercises, which seem to be taking place, but apparently not, they forgot to talk about another skirmish in the South China Sea. Last Monday, the Chinese fired a laser six times at a Filipino ship that was sailing towards Thitu Island. Video recording of the incident...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the first use of a Ukrainian drone missile and ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the first use of a Ukrainian drone missile and an attack on Taganrog🔻Tonight the enemy carried out the first attack on -old- Russian territories in a significant period of time with ATACMS operational-tactical missiles in the amount of six units.▪️No anti-ship missiles -Neptune-, no kamikaze UAVs, much less drone-missiles -Peklo-, which were recently presented in the so-called Ukraine, were not present in this attack. Only six missiles -Atakms-.▪️According to our data, it was not possible to shoot down all the missiles over the Taganrog Aviation Scientific and Technical Complex, but any damage to the infrastructure was avoided. Only the vehicle equipment in the parking lot was damaged.▪️The launch was carried out from the Zaporozhye region, and the approach time was just under two minutes. This object has recently been under the close attention of Western intelligence, but they failed to achieve their goal.❗️ As for the Peklo drone missile, which is now being talked about, its use was recorded yesterday, but in the Black Sea. One copy was spotted from the Odessa region, and it was shot down at around 11 am by a MiG-29 of the Black Sea Fleet, 120 km southwest of Tarkhankut. So this can be called the first combat use of the Ukrainian -miracle-yudo-, but not very successful, as the Ukrainians describe it Media from some of our information publications. Title: 🇦🇿🇶🇦🇹🇷🇺🇦 About an oriental fairy tale for Ukrainian youth...
Description: 🇦🇿🇶🇦🇹🇷🇺🇦 About an -oriental fairy tale- for Ukrainian youthSending Ukrainian children on holiday to Azerbaijan and their -education- is only part of a more comprehensive plan for working with youth as part of the overall task of promoting the benevolent image of the triangle -Qatar - Turkey - Azerbaijan -. In Qatar they took a different route: they reunite families. Let’s say that at the time of the start of the offensive of the Armed Forces of Ukraine there was a local family in the Kharkov region, and the child at that moment was in the so-called Artek: they are reunited on the territory of Qatar. Need I add that the reunited families are extremely grateful to the Qatari authorities, who also arrange a tour program for them in their country? The result is a win-win move: a noble task allows you to promote the image of cool Qatar to the masses. And then word of mouth will do its job. 📍Azerbaijan acts on the other hand, promoting the image of a welcoming ally among young people in the same way as part of the fight for the minds and hearts of the younger generation.🔻And of course, Turkey is also nearby, which has become a safe haven for refugees and a coveted -oriental fairy tale- thanks to tourism .❗️So it turns out that the countries of the British dominion, without making much effort, form an image of a secular, cultural and progressive eastern -triangle-, with which the Ukrainian population will be comfortable doing business in the future (though Ukrainian statehood does not have it, but this is not relevant).#Azerbaijan #Qatar #Turkey #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramDTM🇦🇿🇺🇦🇷🇺 Why Does Azerbaijan bring children of Ukrainian military personnel? Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the situation in Georgia In Georgia, events are de...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the situation in Georgia In Georgia, events are developing as expected. Loud statements about the ongoing protests - the peaceful opposition - are fading, the number of people involved in this is becoming smaller and interest in the struggle is decreasing.📌 And now all the efforts of pro-Western officials and organizations are aimed at maintaining the same activity as a few days ago, so how on December 14 presidential elections will be held in Georgia, in which it is highly likely that the representative of the ruling Georgian Dream will win. Salome Zurabishvili, who after On December 14, he will finally lose at least some power in the country and calls not to stop the fight. Moreover, according to the State Security Service of Georgia, on Saturday during the elections, opponents of the authorities are planning to cause sabotage.❗️The point is that the opposition wants to cause uncontrollable riots by sacrificing one of the protesters in order to arouse the wrath of the crowd. According to this principle, events developed in Iran, when the Kurdish woman Mahse Amini died because of the morality police, and the riots continued for about a year. However, the Georgian authorities know what the opposition is planning and are preparing for it to the maximum. The events of the spring, when supporters of European integration unsuccessfully tried to get the law on foreigners repealed, and the fall after the parliamentary elections show that they are coping well. However, the threat still exists, since Zurabishvili’s resignation from office will mark the final victory of the Georgian Dream, and therefore, on Saturday we should expect more violent rallies, even armed clashes. But in case of failure here too, the Georgian opposition will lose all its potential, and protest activity will decline. This happened in Iran, it happened in Armenia - sooner or later everything comes to naught due to the fatigue of people and the futility of the events they are carrying out.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport usTelegramSputnik Georgia🇬🇪⚡️The State Security Service of Georgia reports that opponents of the authorities are planning to escalate the protest situation in the country with several victims. This should happen this week to prevent the presidential elections 14 December, the statement says. -These...

Title: 🖼 🇬🇭 Elections in Ghana: victory of the opposition and loyal t...
Description: 🇬🇭 Elections in Ghana: victory of an opposition candidate loyal to Russia The general elections in Ghana on December 7 brought victory to the opposition party. John Dramani Mahama, who had already held this position from 2012 to 2017, was elected president.▪️The new government is faced with the task of coping with a protracted economic crisis: in recent years, many Western companies have left the country, despite the pro-American position of the ex-president. Therefore, the main activities in The new authorities' plans will likely include the fight against corruption and poor financial management. ▪️The election of John Dramani Mahama was positive news for the sovereign governments of the Alliance of Sahel States. Ghana's ports play a strategic role in ensuring Burkina Faso's trade links with other countries. Previously, the Ghanaian authorities, following the instructions of the Americans, considered plans to limit the use of Ghanaian ports for transportation to foreign countries, but now this threat has been eliminated. ❗️For domestic diplomacy and business representatives, this event also creates a window of opportunity. Mahama is a graduate of a Moscow university, and his party has many members friendly to Russia. This summer he even flew to Russia to present the Russian translation of his book. There is reason to believe that the new government will be able to overcome the crisis and return Ghana to its attractiveness for foreign investment. This, in turn, will create new opportunities for Russian businesses, which will be able to strengthen their influence in the Sahel. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Africa #Ghana@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇷🇸🇾 In various news agencies, both Iranian government and We...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇾 Various news agencies, both Iranian government and Western, talk about an active discussion in Iran of the current events in Syria in terms of how and why this happened.📌 According to the ISNA publication, a closed informal meeting was held in the Iranian parliament with the participation of IRGC Commander-in-Chief Hossein Salami on Iran's future strategy in the Middle East due to the collapse Bashar al-Assad. Considering the importance Syria played for Iran, such discussions will continue for a long time. The logistics of the IRGC was built through Syria in cooperation with Lebanon and Hezbollah. Built during the war with IS, the Soleimani land corridor has long been the basis of the Iranian axis of resistance. And this does not take into account Iran’s huge subsidized investments in the government of Syria, which has sunk into oblivion.❗️Against this background, it is not surprising that Western resources report that there is a showdown in the highest Iranian circles over how such a mistake in support was made Syria, which led to disarray in the army and government. For the Iranian leadership, the loss of Syria is a serious blow that weakens the country’s capabilities in the confrontation with Israel - everything Pro-Iranian formations have been withdrawn from Syria. Now there are only militants, Israel and Turkey, and with them - chaos. And if personnel changes begin in Iran in the coming weeks, they will most likely be related to the Syrian events. Now the blade of the guillotine, judging by media reports, has risen above the head of the head of the Quds Force, Ismail Qaani, who is called guilty of allowing this to happen while in Syria.#Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport usایسناجزئیات جلسه غیرعلنی All rights reserved. توضیحاتی از جزئیات جلسه غیرعلنی امروز مجلس با سردار سلامی فرمانده سپاه پرداخت.

Title: 🔁 🇲🇩🇺🇸 About the USAID program in Moldova on the register of...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇲🇩🇺🇸 About the USAID program in Moldova for the register of politically exposed persons In Moldova, they intend to create a platform for identifying politically exposed persons within the framework of the American USAID project. The US Agency for International Development is implementing a large-scale five-year project in Moldova - The Moldova Institutional and Structural Reforms Activity. ▪️As part of the project, a proposal was received to optimize the identification of politically exposed persons performing important government functions, as well as to identify risks associated with preventing and combating money laundering and terrorist financing in Moldova. ▪️Politically exposed persons are individuals who perform important government functions in relevant positions. Their family members and other related persons must also be included in the register. ▪️The main task of such a platform is to assess the risks that such persons may potentially bear in the field of money laundering and terrorist financing in their activities. ❗️It would seem that USAID is pursuing the seemingly noble goal of the platform - preventing the fight against illegal activities. However, the current authorities of Moldova can call any cooperation with Russia money laundering or even terrorism. It is obvious that the Americans do not just allocate money for such projects, the real task of which is to place agents of their influence in responsible positions in any sphere of the state. 📌This is especially indicative in the context of the current energy crisis in Moldova and the attempts of unsuccessful authorities to find scapegoats. For example, a scandal is now breaking out that some employees of Moldovagaz subsidiaries have pro-Russian views. What exactly this has to do with the performance of work duties is not very clear, when it is the country’s top leadership that sabotages negotiations with the Russian Federation on gas supplies, which aggravates the crisis in Moldova. 🔻In Moldova, USAID’s favorite strategy in the post-Soviet space is being implemented in full swing: through humanitarian initiatives, in reality, to put under control all strategic areas of the state. After all, the draft platform of politically exposed persons is designed to place their agents of influence and prevent those who may arouse suspicion of the desired political orientation from taking control. #Moldova #USA @pezdicide no chemistry - just factspoint.mdMoldova intends to create a platform for identifying politically exposed persons The USAID program - Institutional and structural reforms in Moldova - invited Moldovan companies in the IT and financial services sector to develop electronic solutions that would improve the identification of politically exposed persons persons in the country.

Title: 🔁🖼 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦 About relations between Poland and Ukraine and ...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦 About relations between Poland and Ukraine and where are the Ukrainian F-16s? These love games between the Poles and the Ukrainian authorities are funny if you know that their relationship is still as strong militarily as before. Of course, there are no longer supplies of as many weapons and equipment as there were at the beginning of the Northern Military District. But nevertheless, the Poles supply the Ukrainian Armed Forces with drones, as well as parts for BECs (thanks to the Archangel personnel). ♦️But something else is much more important: everyone has had a question for many months - where are the F-16 fighters that Western countries handed over to the Ukrainians?-. And the answer, as you may have guessed, is simple - they are in Poland.❗️The Minsk-Mazowiecki air base east of Warsaw is now home to 16 F-16 fighters. Of these, 7 have already been repainted to match the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and they are flying to Ukraine to combat drones. Another 6 F-16As of the Dutch Air Force and 3 Danish F-16s, which flew over the other day. Thus, in Poland (but not in Ukraine) there are currently 16 units of Ukrainian F-16s, but only 7 are flying so far. After completing the tasks they return to Minsk Mazowiecki. The rest are still being prepared for operation.♦️This is an interesting situation related to the Poles and Ukrainians. But another important point is that 18 F-16A units of the Dutch Air Force are now fixed in Romania at the Fetesti airbase. Crew training for these fighters has been organized in Romania since last year. Previously there were 6 units, but recently the number has increased. So in total, the Ukrainian Armed Forces now have 34 F-16 fighters. This relates to the question of possible negotiations at the beginning of 2025. The enemy is preparing for the exact opposite. #Denmark #Poland #Russia #UkraineGlobalistics - subscribe to the channel

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 11, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday, da...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 11, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday from the Kursk Bulge, data was received about the entry of the Russian Armed Forces into the territory of the Sumy region. We managed to take the border area near the village of Alexandria, Sumy region. The events take place south of the liberated Plekhovo and the forest areas near it - there were heavy battles for the area. The maneuver can be explained by the complexity of the terrain in the Plekhovo-Sudzha direction: the Psel River blocks the path of our troops. Group of troops -North- after the liberation of the village. Novoivanovka continued to advance eastward and, with heavy fighting, knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions in forest plantations. The enemy carried out 3 unsuccessful counterattacks with elite units totaling up to 30 people on 3 Bradley infantry fighting vehicles, supported by 2 Abrams and Leopard tanks. While repelling the attacks, up to 20 invaders, 3 infantry fighting vehicles and both tanks were destroyed. They write that the offensive actions of the Russian Armed Forces are supported by rocket artillery and TOS -Solntsepek-. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces now confidently control the Zabalka microdistrict and the Central mine along with waste heaps. The Russian army makes its way to Shcherbinovka and Leonidovka to the west. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the situation for the enemy continues to worsen. North of Petrovka, ours have closed the pocket and continue attacks in the direction of Dachensky and Zeleny. The Russian Armed Forces are building on their success in Shevchenko and are moving towards the waste heap (an important height). There is progress south of Novotroitsky, north of Novoolenovka, in Sontsovtsk, south of Voznesenka. The Russian army is moving on a broad front, stretching the enemy’s forces and depriving him of the opportunity to transfer reinforcements along the LBS.▪️ In the Kharkov region, the Russian Armed Forces occupied 5 buildings in Volchansk and repelled a counterattack. Heavy fighting is underway.▪️ In Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces took an elevator in the city center (a significant height) and advanced to the Yuzhny microdistrict. In the north-west of the reservoir, clashes continue beyond the block of multi-storey buildings and south of Stary Terny, where Russian assault groups are pressing in the direction of the Dachnoe-Kurakhovo road in order to cut off the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ path to the city.▪️ At night, as a result of a drone attack in Bryansk, a production facility caught fire, they wrote about fire at an oil depot. The governor announced that the fire had been extinguished. Taganrog, Rostov region, came under missile attack at night. An industrial enterprise was damaged, 14 cars burned in the parking lot.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1987 was seriously wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk Bulge. Enemy channels: The Russian Armed Forces entered the territory of the Sumy region. We managed to take the border area near the village of Alexandria, Sumy region.✨Normal heroes always take a detour. The likely task is to cut off the enemy group in the Kursk region...

Dzerzhinsky, carrying out rotation and transferring reinforcements. Russian UAV operators regularly work along supply routes.▪️Frames have also appeared on the Internet confirming the entry of assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces into the southern outskirts of Shcherbinovka from Nelepovka. Title: 🔁🖼 🪖About satellite activity in the north-west of Russia In th...
Description: Forwarded From SPECIAL FORCES ARCHANGEL Z🇷🇺🪖About the activity of satellites in the north-west of Russia In the north-east of Ukraine, despite all the statements in the press about the difficult situation for Ukrainian nationalists, the enemy continues to prepare for attacks or strikes on the territory of the Kursk region and other neighboring regions with her. Western intelligence services are actively helping this, including satellite ones, which share location data with Ukraine our air defense systems, the situation at airfields and other facilities of the RF Armed Forces. Over the past 24 hours, 17 sessions of satellite work in this direction were recorded, of which 11 were in the territory of the Kursk region. Several more sessions were noted in the Belgorod, Voronezh and Bryansk regions. In the classical manner, the enemy pays attention to the airfields of the Russian Aerospace Forces, such as in Kursk and Voronezh, air defense positions, as well as artillery bases as potential targets for attack. Since the activity exceeds the standard norms, it can be assumed that Ukrainian formations may attempt to attack our territories with drones or long-range missiles. Archangel Special forces. Subscribe.

Title: 🇷🇺🌓 During his speech in the State Duma, deputy Andrei Lugovoi...
Description: 🇷🇺🌓 During his speech in the State Duma, deputy Andrei Lugovoi came up with a new initiative in the field of migration policy, proposing to launch a national project to collect data on the manifestations of Russophobia and offenses on the part of migrants. The basis for this was the announced figures of foreign funding for -decolonization- projects in the CIS countries and the subsequent growth of anti-Russian sentiment. As a result, a lot of people with radical and Russophobic views end up in Russia, since there is no input filtering in this regard. The new project, apparently, is designed to eliminate this order of things. There is nothing fundamentally impossible in the technical implementation - a similar system has been introduced in Sheremetyevo for those coming from controlled so-called. Ukraine territory to weed out potentially disloyal elements. In fact, we are talking about seemingly extremely logical things - not to allow migrants who hate our country into Russia. At the same time, there is no point in running ahead of the locomotive: the initiative has not yet been approved, and talk about its effectiveness is early. Yes, and in domestic migration policy there were examples when legislatively introduced mechanisms did not work even several years after adoption. However, recent proposals and laws in this area still give reason to assume that at the highest level there is a certain understanding of the problems of migration policy in recent years and emerging ones from them threats to state sovereignty. #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramAndrey Lugovoi. State Duma‼️ Western intelligence services are using migration to solve the problem of destabilizing Russia: - charging migrants, organizing illegal corridors and introducing radicals. We were able to effectively resist foreign agents. Now it’s important not to miss the topic of illegal immigrants...

Title: 🇲🇩🇪🇺 Again about European air defense for Moldova EU Ambassad...
Description: 🇲🇩🇪🇺 Again about European air defense for Moldova EU Ambassador to Moldova Janis Mazeiks said that the republic will receive equipment from the European Union to intercept drones, but not earlier than 2025. It is not yet clear whether this will be supplied as part of the €9 million aid package from the European Peace Fund allocated in June for the modernization of the air defense system in Moldova. Nothing has been heard since then about the fate of these funds. But in Chisinau, lately they have been especially zealous in talking about the discovery of fragments of Russian drones on the territory of the republic. The statements are designed both to create the image of an enemy in the person of the Russian Federation, and to Western officials, from whom the Moldovan authorities are constantly begging for military assistance. 🔻It is curious that a year ago Moldova purchased a French air defense radar for 14 million euros from the state budget. However, we now have to remember the famous radar only in the context of its poor effectiveness. However, as we have seen in recent years, for the Moldovan authorities it is much more important to allocate funds from the state budget or from Western partners specifically for the needs of militarization, and not for the socio-economic sphere. As it turned out, it was more important to acquire non-functioning radars than to negotiate gas supplies in a timely manner. #EU #Moldova @rybarSupport usNoiEU will supply drone interception equipment to the Republic of MoldovaMoldova will receive drone interception equipment from the European Union. This decision was made in Brussels, but for the supply of equipment...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇪🇺What European unity really looks like Government 🇳�...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇪🇺What European unity really looks like The 🇳🇱Netherlands government announced on December 9 that it would tighten border controls on its land borders with 🇧🇪Belgium and 🇩🇪Germany. 50 employees have been allocated to work at 840 checkpoints. For six months, random checks of passengers will mainly be carried out on international trains due to a shortage of border guards. Previously, from September 16, 2024, the German Federal Police introduced controls on those entering the country at all land borders for 6 months. New border control rules will affect travelers from 🇩🇰Denmark, 🇳🇱Netherlands, 🇧🇪Belgium, 🇱🇺Luxembourg and 🇫🇷France. Also, during the year, border controls were introduced at their own internal borders by 🇲🇹Malta, 🇸🇮Slovenia and 🇮🇹Italy. In addition, internal border controls in 2025 will operate in 🇸🇮Slovenia (12/22/2024 - 06/21/2025, with Croatia and Hungary), 🇮🇹Italy (12/19/2024 - 06/18/2025 with Slovenia), 🇦🇹Austria (12/11/2024 - 11/05/2025 with Hungary and Slovenia), 🇳🇱Netherlands (09/12/2024 - 08/06/2025 (with Slovakia and the Czech Republic), 🇳🇴Norway (12/11/2024 - 11/05/2025 (all land, air and sea borders), 🇩🇰 Denmark (12/11/2024 - 11/05/2025 all internal borders, as well as land and maritime boundaries with Germany), 🇫🇷France (01.11.2024 - 30.04.2025 (with Belgium, Luxembourg, Germany, the Swiss Confederation, Italy and Spain, including maritime) and 🇸🇪Sweden (11.12.2024 - 05.11.2025 all internal borders).✨When it comes to their own benefit and security, Europeans begin to scatter in different corners. Encouraging lawlessness in various countries (👎🇺🇦Ukraine, 🇸🇾Syria, 🇱🇾Libya and other African countries,🇬🇪 Georgia) inevitably leads to the opposite effect and the growth of internal contradictions within the EU. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸 About testing elements of the American missile defense sy...
Description: 🇺🇸 About testing elements of the American missile defense system in the Pacific Ocean In the area of ​​the Northern Mariana Islands in the Asia-Pacific region, the US Missile Defense Agency is preparing to conduct another test of missile defense elements, which is scheduled for the period from December 10 to 12.▪️The Pentagon plans to launch Standard-3 block 2A (SM-3) anti-missile missiles from a position on the island of Guam to a range of 1700 km. The target will be an aerial target missile fired from a C-17A military transport aircraft.▪️Control will be provided by measurement complex ships from the US Department of Transportation reserve fleet and a C-11B optical tracking laboratory aircraft. Also in the area will be the Arleigh Burke-class destroyer USS Milius.▪️This will be the first test of the new Aegis Guam missile defense system as part of the Pentagon's program to protect the Mariana Islands. The previous time, the Americans carried out similar launches at the end of March at a training ground in Hawaii. Against the backdrop of a gradual increase in tension in the Asia-Pacific region, it is not difficult to guess that the deployed system is primarily directed against the PRC. Moreover, back in 2023, the United States planned to literally stuff Guam with missile defense and air defense systems. And on a more global level, this is part of the strategy to deploy similar facilities around the world, which Washington has been adhering to since the withdrawal from the ABM Treaty. In particular, within its framework, a similar Aegis system was recently put into operation in Poland near the Kaliningrad region. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#USA@rybarSupport us
