Title: 🇦🇺 Australia is beginning to prepare for the upcoming parliamen...
Description: 🇦🇺 In Australia, they are starting to prepare for the upcoming parliamentary elections in May 2025 - however, in a rather peculiar way. Instead of meaningful election campaigns, the Russian interference card has begun to be played with renewed vigor in the information space. Now journalist Semyon Boykov is called a potential threat to Australian democracy. Since 2022, he has been living on the territory of the Russian consulate in Sydney, where he was granted diplomatic asylum. Boykov is suspected of plans to undermine the sovereignty of Australia. At the same time, Australian officials complain that he does this while right in Sydney, but they do not allow him to leave the country’s borders. Boykov himself has stated many times that he is ready to pack up in 10 minutes and leave if he is guaranteed exit.🔻The fact that, despite all the suspicions, a pro-Russian foreign agent is not allowed out of the country seems paradoxical only at first glance. Now Prime Minister Albanese and his colleagues benefit from having such an ace up their sleeve: if something doesn’t go according to plan in the elections, there will be someone to blame. deal with the pro-Russian journalist Semyon Boykov, who 2 years ago received diplomatic asylum on the territory of the Russian general. consulate in Sydney.-Consulate…

Title: 🔁🖼 Militants - Hayat Tahrir Al-Sham - continue to expand the zo...
Description: Forwarded From UNFISHThe militants of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham continue to expand their zone of control in the provinces of Hama and Homs. There are more and more confirmations that terrorists have captured the village of Salamiyah, as well as from Izz Ad-Din and several villages west of Ar-Rastan and Telbisa. At the same time, reports of fighting within the borders of the city of Homs have appeared. According to anti-government media reports, the militants are opposed by Hezbollah units from the Ar-Radwan detachment, which were previously deployed from Lebanon. There is no objective evidence of similar resistance from the Syrian army - the same resources that were recently thrown about the fierce counterattacks of the SAA are written victorious reports from Aleppo, Hama, Daraa and Es-Suwayda. Such reports lead to tragedies: for example, residents of Christian Mharda fell for the statements of pro-Assad channels that there was no threat, and did not evacuate. And in the morning they woke up to the fact that HTS militants had entered the village.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: breakthrough to Shevchenko situat...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: breakthrough to Shevchenko situation as of 17:00 December 7, 2024 While the offensive of Russian troops on Kurakhovo is moving to the final phase, to the north the Russian Armed Forces are gradually creating conditions for the subsequent assault on Pokrovsk.🔻On the approaches to Mirnograd the Russian Armed Forces are fighting in forest belts in the Grodovka area and Nikolaevka. There is a chain of Ukrainian Armed Forces strongholds there, the capture of which will open the road to Luch (Promin) and Moskovskoye.▪️South of Lysovka, Russian troops advanced in the area of ​​the M-30 highway, occupying a stronghold east of the road. Probably, the further goal is to break through to the southern outskirts of Dachensky and eliminate the pocket formed in the area of ​​the highway. 🔻To the west, Russian troops are building on the success achieved after the liberation of Petrovka and Novoalekseevka. At the end of November, units of the Russian Armed Forces reached Zheltoy and latched onto the private sector, repelling counterattacks and destroying several units of enemy armored vehicles. ▪️The offensive towards Zheltoy proceeded in parallel with the advance in the area of ​​Vorovskoye (Yuryevka) and Pustynka. The attack aircraft attacked from Grigorovka and Novoalekseevka, forcing the Ukrainian Armed Forces to retreat under the threat of envelopment. As a result, by November 30, most of Pustynka was liberated.▪️Later, the Russian Armed Forces cleared Zheltoye, occupied most of Novopustynka and reached Shevchenko on the southern approaches to Pokrovsk. And by December 7, the assault groups had counted the northern outskirts of Novotroitsky and almost completely captured a large stronghold of the Ukrainian Armed Forces east of the village. In Pokrovsk itself, the situation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces is also getting worse. Enemy media resources report an increase in the intensity of Russian UAV strikes in the area of ​​the M-30 Pavlograd-Pokrovsk and T-04-06 highways, along which the garrison is supplied. And the other day, the Russian Armed Forces hit a diesel locomotive east of the city.❗️Residents of neighboring Mirnograd report that over the past three days, the Ukrainian Armed Forces have blown up piledrivers in the territory of at least two large mines - -Stakhanov- (-Capital-) and -Central-. This can probably be considered a preparation of future Ukrainian forces to retreat from the city. This is not the first time the enemy has used scorched earth tactics in the Donbass - previously in Kurakhovo, where the Ukrainian Armed Forces destroyed the chimneys of a local thermal power plant and blew up a dam. Title: 🔁🖼 🇪🇺Why did the EU gain access to cheap agricultural product...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇪🇺Why did the EU gain access to cheap agricultural products from Latin American countries? On December 6, President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen and the heads of the MERCOSUR countries (🇦🇷Argentina,🇧🇷 Brazil, 🇺🇾Uruguay, 🇵🇾Paraguay) signed an agreement on free trade, which opens up access for cheap Latin American agricultural products to the European market. For European farmers, this means practically destroying their existence in unequal competition. As a result, farmers’ protests may soon cover the whole of Europe, which has not previously led to radical consequences for European bureaucrats. Despite the obvious corrupt interests of Ursula von Der Leyen and her colleagues, the decision is not without military meaning. As European politicians say, Europe will go to war with Russia by 2027-2029. Based on this, access to cheap Ukrainian agricultural products, as well as energy and fertilizers from Russia (12% of world production), and other suppliers will likely be blocked. At the same time, the share of imported fertilizers in EU consumption is about 32% of demand. The largest fertilizer producing countries in the world are 🇨🇳China (up to 30% of the market), 🇺🇸USA (13%), 🇮🇳India (10%), 🇨🇦Canada (9%), in the context of a large-scale military conflict they may also stop altogether supplies of this important component of agriculture, without which almost nothing grows in Europe. In the EU countries themselves, due to rising energy prices from 2022, their own production is stagnating and coming to an end (up to 20% of capacity is idle). Under these conditions, the MERCOSUR countries can supply to the EU at least 4.68 million tons of beef and 170 million tons of soybeans (more than 50% of world production). The merger also accounts for 34% of global corn exports. Opportunities for increasing production also exist and are conditioned only by current needs.✨Together with the intensification of the construction of logistics routes to the eastern flank of NATO⚡️, we are increasing military budgets and stimulating a multiple increase in the production of military products, the decision to create additional conditions for ensuring food security, also on a safe away from places of possible hostilities, is part of military preparations against Russia. Two majors

Title: 🔁🖼 Meanwhile, the situation in central Syria continues to deter...
Description: Forwarded From UNFISH Meanwhile, the situation in central Syria continues to deteriorate. To the northeast of Damascus, militants claim control over the once Christian city of Al-Qaryatein and the adjacent mountain range. It is still unclear which group is operating in this area, and whether the information is generally true - no footage of objective control has yet surfaced . However, if confirmed, it can be argued that the militants have another enclave 70 km from Damascus. The highway from the capital to Al-Qamishli remains blocked. At the same time, movement towards Damascus itself from the south and east has not yet been observed, but in current realities it rather looks like a matter of time. ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🖼 🇰🇷🇺🇸🇯🇵 About American activity off the coast of China Si...
Description: 🇰🇷🇺🇸🇯🇵 About American activity off the coast of China Since we are already talking about the fact that Americans are the main troublemakers in the region, it is worth talking about two more new exercises of the United States and allies that began the other day.🔻US Marines and the Japanese Air Force in the north parts of the island of Honshu, as well as over the coastal waters of Hokkaido, until December 12 Tactical aviation exercise - Kunren Iten - Ten F/A-18C Marine Corps fighters from Iwakuni Air Base are being recruited from the United States. And from the Japanese - eight F-35A. They are practicing launching missile and bomb strikes against ground and sea targets, repelling air attacks from a mock enemy.🔻But on the same day, a larger event began. The armed forces of the United States, Japan and Australia will conduct an exercise on the territory of the Japanese islands until December 14 - Yamasakura-87 - in the event of a crisis situation in the region. According to the plan, the allies are conducting an exercise on the plan for China to launch an operation to seize Taiwan. As part of the response from the leadership of the United States, Australia and Japan, in response to the actions of the Celestial Empire, it decides to provide military assistance to Taiwan. About 7,300 military personnel will take part in the exercise (USA - 1500, Japan - 5500, Australia - 300). By the way, units of the 1st Infantry Division from Brisbane arrived from Australia, deployed by C-17 transport personnel. The main maneuvers will take place on the territory of the training grounds -Asaka-, -Somagahara- (both on the island of Honshu), -Oyanohara-, -Hijudai- (both on the island Kyushu) and -Ukibaru- (Okinawa). They will organize imitation attacks on Chinese targets.❗️ Based on this activity, which has not decreased over the past months, it can be stated that the situation in the Asia-Pacific region is already far from the stability that existed previously. The Americans are training, the Chinese are doing it in return. And other countries are looking at this and are also taking action. Title: 🇫🇷 About the political crisis in France Events in France contin...
Description: 🇫🇷 About the political crisis in France Events in France continue to develop rapidly. On Wednesday, parliament announced a vote of no confidence in Prime Minister Michel Barnier: 331 out of 577 parliamentarians voted for his resignation. Thus, Barnier lasted less as head of government than all his predecessors.▪️The resignation of the Barnier administration means that the state budget for 2025 year remains inconsistent. According to French law, in this case, all expenditure items will be discussed and adjusted monthly. However, President Macron said on Thursday that he intends to form a new government as quickly as possible and do everything possible to complete budget agreements on time. ▪️Against the backdrop of the increasingly aggravated situation in parliament, his plans seem hardly feasible. Macron himself is adding fuel to the fire of disagreements between the parties, putting more and more pressure on the right (who inappropriately took up too many seats in the June vote). The President has already blamed the National Rally Marine Le Pen for the government's failures (the Prime Minister, it turns out, had nothing to do with it at all) and did not invite party representatives to a meeting with parliament.▪️ In the context of the collapse of the government, as expected, protesters against the deal with Mercosur farmers were joined by civil servants. They demand the repeal of unpopular measures that Barnier lobbied for - in particular, increasing the duration of unpaid leave for public sector employees. In the short term, no certainty is expected in French domestic policy: some experts predict several difficult weeks for business and citizens. Meanwhile, national media comment on the increasingly aggravated crisis with extreme restraint and prefer to focus on the opening of Notre Dame Cathedral. Moreover, it seems, according to journalists, the presence of Trump, Prince William and Biden’s wife at the ceremony should evoke much stronger emotions in the French than, in fact, the restoration of one of the symbols of the capital. As they say, they forgot to ask the French themselves.#France #protests@rybar together with @fifthrepublicSupport usTelegramRybar🇫🇷 About the political crisis in FranceIn France, the political crisis is gaining momentum - but, unlike previous months, when the causes of instability were either internal or external problems alternately, now the situation is heating up for both at once...

Title: 🇷🇴 Yesterday in Romania, the Constitutional Court annulled the ...
Description: 🇷🇴 Yesterday in Romania, the Constitutional Court annulled the results of the first round of the presidential elections, despite the fact that it approved them just a few days ago. Now the electoral process will be started anew: Parliament will set a new date for the elections, and candidates will again have to go through the nomination and registration procedure. The reason for the sensational decision of the Constitutional Court was suddenly declassified by the Romanian intelligence services, which the current President Klaus Iohannis recently presented. ❗️In Bucharest, Russia is accused of interfering in the elections and financing the election campaign of the first round winner Calin Georgescu on TikTok. As evidence, the intelligence services point to social network accounts to which they donated more than 1 million euros to promote Georgescu. ▪️Even the pro-Western and pro-American candidate Elena Lasconi, who was supposed to participate in the second round, said that the Romanian state had trampled democracy. ▪️Another candidate from the first round, George Simon, called what was happening a coup, but for some reason he called on people not to take to the streets, since -the system must fall democratically-. ▪️The decision was fully supported by the current Prime Minister Marcel Ciolacu, who lost the presidential election, finishing third. The politician claims that the results are distorted by Russian interference. ▪️By the way, on Monday the Constitutional Court of Romania ordered a recount of votes and at some point Ciolacu came into second place. Apparently, then they did not dare to rig the elections and left first and second places for Georgescu and Lasconi, confirming the results. 🔻However, after a few days the situation changed dramatically and in Bucharest they decided to take the most shameful measures. It is unlikely that mass protests will break out in Romania after such arbitrariness of the authorities, because the protesters will not be supported by Western governments, such as, for example, the opposition in Georgia. ❗️It is noteworthy that the parliamentary elections in Romania were won by the current ruling coalition led by Prime Minister Colacu. However, the potential non-systemic President Georgescu frightened the West so much that they decided not to risk it. After all, at stake is the question of who will lead a large NATO outpost on the Black Sea, which plays a large role in logistical support for the Kyiv regime. #elections #Romania@rybarSupport uswww.digi24.roCurtea Constituțională a anulat alegerile prezidențiale și a decis că tot procesul va fi reluat de la zero. Principalele reacțiiCurtea Constituțională a decis vineri, în unanimitate, anularea alegerilor prezidențiale, urmând ca procesul electoral să se reia în integralitate, potrivit unui comunicat al CCR. Guvernul va stabili o nouă dată pentru prezidențiale.

Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week November 30 - December 6, 2024▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched strikes on the capital of the Palestinian enclave. The largest number of hits occurred in the central and southern regions of the city. ▪️The most active fighting continued in the border Beit Lahia. Against the backdrop of constant Israeli strikes and raids, thousands of residents were evacuated from the city along the Salah ad-Din highway. ▪️Clashes also did not subside in the neighboring satellite city of Gaza - Jabaliya. There, Kamal Adwan Hospital came under IDF fire several times, and several employees were injured. ▪️At the same time, the Israelis destroyed the Auni al-Hartani school, where refugees had previously taken refuge. It was blown up using remote-controlled vehicles that planted explosives. ▪️Palestinian formations were also active. They launched missiles towards Erez. The ammunition launched by Hamas was successfully intercepted, and its fragments fell in open areas.▪️In the center of the enclave, Israeli troops worked on settlements controlled by the militants. Palestinian forces responded with strikes against the positions of the Israel Defense Forces in the Netzarim corridor.▪️In the south of the Gaza Strip, the Israelis carried out engineering work in the so-called. -Philadelphia Corridor-. At the same time, several IDF hits hit the expanded humanitarian zone.▪️In the West Bank, Israeli security forces arrested about 100 local residents. All of them were accused of having links with Hamas, but most of them were later released. #video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁🎬 The incredible happened: the tetralogy -At the Edge of the A...
Description: Forwarded From Realdoc The incredible happened: the tetralogy -At the Edge of the Abyss- is now not only the first documentary film about NWO on online platforms. In addition, he was the first to enter the top 10 in ALL online cinemas. Many colleagues considered this absolutely impossible. Viewers constantly write about how the film shocked them, completely changed their understanding of what was happening and caused emotions beyond the bounds. And at the same time, everything was filmed in a frighteningly artistic way. There are no indifferent people. The third film, Access to the Sea, is also difficult and frank. You will see how, after continuous assaults, the guys experience psychophysiological burnout, many are wounded or killed. But they continue to clear the captured houses, capture the enemy (this process was filmed from the inside!) and, according to the order, make their way to the Sea of ​​Azov. -If they tell us to storm, we’ll go for the assault. This is our land,- says the hero of the film, yesterday’s miner with the call sign -Der-, back in 2018, defending the approaches to Gorlovka. And he keeps his word. You will also see the tragedy of the Mariupol people: here the grandmother is looking for her brother among the dead bodies, still hoping that he is alive, but here is the family in the basement, and its head says: - [Zelensky] promised to jail corrupt officials, but he jailed the war! -Look, don’t turn away: WINK (4K available) KION (4K separately here) OKKO (4K, works in the CIS) Kino1TV DROM (works in the returned territories) Every Friday there is a new episode. And for the film to rise higher in the top views, we need your help, dear friends! Repost and forward this post to ALL friends, colleagues, admins (and similarly, a post on VK). Title: 🔁🖼 So, what is known by the end of the day? Syria still exists ...
Description: Forwarded From FISHER So, what is known at the end of the day? Syria still exists as a secular state. In the province of Hama, militants are slowly expanding their zone of control. There is fighting on the outskirts of Homs. Syrians report fierce resistance and that the militants have not entered the city. How close to the truth is this? The question is open. And maybe even with an asterisk. In Raqqa and Deir ez-Zor, Syrian troops are handing over positions to the Kurds on the western bank of the Euphrates. It is mentioned that the Syrian administration will continue to operate in Deir-e-Zor and other settlements. A hint that Syrian state power in this region remains. Meanwhile, from the desert there are reports that militants, the so-called. -Free Syrian Army - supported by the United States, are moving towards Palmyra and Es-Sukhne. There is no evidence of this yet, but communications in this place are extremely poor, and therefore objective control footage is unlikely to appear until the entire situation is resolved. Well, or until the terrorists take Palmyra for the third time. In the provinces of Es-Suwayda and Daraa, everything is bad. The formation of local militants occupy populated areas one after another, organize anti-Assad rallies and generally just enjoy life. Meanwhile, in the vicinity of Damascus, some units of the Syrian army and the Republican Guard seem to be strengthening the outskirts of the city. In Latakia and Tartus, for the time being, it is relatively calm .At the same time, the appetite for pro-Turkish greenery does not end there. Factions of the so-called SNA have actually already announced an operation to capture Menbij and nearby villages on the western bank of the Euphrates, which are under the control of the Kurds. However, so far nothing has gone further than statements on the network.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 6, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the IDF conducted a raid on the territory of the Kamal Adwan hospital and arrested part of the medical staff. Fighting also continues in Jabaliya, where the Israelis are gradually clearing urban areas. In the southern part of the enclave, the IDF is demolishing buildings and clearing mines in the east of Rafah. At the same time, clashes and the work of Israeli artillery are noted in the western part of the city. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out a series of police operations in refugee camps and populated areas. Several shootings were recorded in the Balata camp - the IDF leadership reported on the successful operation of the special forces - Duvedevan - to search for caches of weapons. IDF aircraft attacked two checkpoints on the border of Lebanon and Syria. At the same time, the Israeli leadership is increasing its military force in the Golan Heights in light of the growing crisis in the southern regions of Syria. Title: 🔁 Syrian experience While the Syrian front is collapsing, Reveng...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsSyrian ExperienceWhile the Syrian front is collapsing, Revenge of Good Will and Nerybar’s neural networks produce forecasts for the development of the situation, I would like to once again emphasize that bravura reports do not lead to good things. And this is not the first time that group commanders have been changed urgently, on the fly, right in the middle of battles. Not for the first time, the real state of affairs in the army (in this case, the Syrian) was probably presented in a light favorable to the speaker. This (already new and bitter, although not on such a scale) Syrian experience was recently seen on sections of the Ukrainian front. Beautiful reports, -rotation- of commanders right in the midst of battle, reports on -control of territories-. And this nonsense will never go away, then the Seversky direction will come up, then today they write to us about Kleshcheevskoye and the 6th Motorized Rifle Division. Some people are reassuring themselves with a worldwide -agreement-and-exchange- on the eve of the Trump era. But when choosing between a conspiracy and a banal mess, we always lean towards the second. We hope that what is happening will become the final, last inoculation, and the huge army organism will become immune to lies and misinformation from the Center about real things. And, as if by magic, representatives will fly from the capital to check the situation at the front, the availability of weapons in small units, the median level of salaries of security forces in the country, and the personnel potential of departments. Finally draw conclusions about the state of affairs. And the average salary level for security officials who are not directly involved in the SVO sounds somehow strange at the top, they say. Just like slides with everything and everyone present. -Armata is just not enough for every local police officer, if you joke about this topic. One cannot help but mention the media component. It’s somehow strange to observe for a long time that military bloggers and volunteers have been equated with the Navalnists and other extremist evil spirits. Ridiculing, baiting, it seems, our own people with our own people. Or not completely our own. In any case, an objective assessment of the situation is important. Calm, honest, without mischief, but also without total despondency in every post. We are sure that this time all the conclusions have already been drawn. Two majorsTelegramRevenge of goodwillAnd where did you get the idea that these were jokes? The verb - think - was not there. https://t.me/dva_majors/59573Revenge of goodwill

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): retreat of Syrian t...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): retreat of Syrian troops and loss of the provincesituation towards outcome December 6, 2024 In the south of Syria in Daraa province, local units decided not to wait for the uprising of the armed factions of the so-called Syrian opposition and are surrendering territories without a fight. Similar processes are expected in Es-Suwayda. ▪️A few days earlier, militant sleeper cells had become more active, increasing the number of attacks on Syrian army positions.▪️And this morning, opposition media distributed an ultimatum to government troops: to leave checkpoints in the province within 72 hours. The Syrian armed forces immediately responded to the call - after a couple of hours in the north, checkpoints were abandoned in the settlements of Jasim, Inhil and Sleiman, which became an additional motivation for the militants.▪️On the southern borders of the province, attacks on checkpoints, seizures of Syrian intelligence (mukhabarat) branches and increased anti-government demonstrations continue.▪️A symbolic episode was noted in Bosra al-Harir: militants captured a Syrian army tank during the day - the first during the current phase of the conflict in the region. By evening, reports had already appeared about the capture of 12 military bases, including armored ones. Considering the current weakening of the defenses of the Syrian Arab Army (SAA), they have neither the strength nor the desire to hold the south in the face of a ripe uprising of tribes and groups. It remains only a question time until this destabilization provokes a loss of control over the province of Es-Suwayda, where anti-Assad protests are already in full swing among the Druze factions and Sunni tribes. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #Der'a #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇷 On preparations for the impeachment of the President of Sout...
Description: 🇰🇷 On preparations for the impeachment of the President of South Korea The situation in South Korea on the eve of the upcoming vote on the impeachment of President Yoon Seok-yeol is developing rapidly. And if until recently there were doubts about the failure of this initiative, now everything indicates that the South Korean leader may still be removed from office as head of state. Let us remind you that 200 votes in parliament are needed to begin the impeachment procedure. The coalition of opposition parties has 192 seats, so to successfully vote they need to win over eight or more deputies from the ruling party. 🔻We wrote earlier that taking into account Yun’s criticism from representatives of the ruling force in parliament, the opposition will be able to gain the required number of votes. However, party chairman Han Dong Hoon said that he would not support the impeachment procedure, urging his colleagues to do the same. Now the rhetoric is changing. On December 6, Khan already spoke about the need to remove powers from the head of state. The reason for the sharp change in rhetoric is the South Korean president's plans to arrest key politicians during martial law, which were never implemented. ▪️In addition, Han held a meeting with Yoon Seok Yeol, at which, according to his statements, he did not hear anything that could change his opinion in the other direction. Thus, for now we can judge that the likelihood of Yoon’s impeachment is very high. However, before the presidential powers are completely removed from him, the corresponding procedure must be approved by the Constitutional Court of the Republic of Korea. The opposition may also have some difficulties with this step. #SouthKorea @rybar Support usTelegramRybar🇰🇷 The situation in South Korea has more or less stabilized after yesterday's coup attempt. Under pressure from political forces represented by the ruling and opposition parties, President Yoon Seok-yeol lifted the martial law regime. Now the time has come for proceedings...

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 What prevented Syria from changing for the better: abo...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 What prevented Syria from being changed for the better: about the failure of Russian power abroad The problem of what is happening in Syria is not that all military achievements have been nullified. The problem is that they tried to solve the problems existing in Syria out of sync.▪️The military did their part, politicians ignored strategic risks.▪️Politicians talked about the importance of the plant business, business was afraid of sanctions.▪️Business asked to ensure security, the military was waiting for orders from politicians.▪️Soft power was waiting for orders and changes in approaches, but it never came.📌If we come to a country, a separate governing body should be created for that country with the right to distribute slap the head and force everyone to work.📌What did it cost from the moment the SVO began in the conditional program - Time of Heroes - to start push in foreign volunteers from Syria and other countries, at least indicating the formation of a new elite for foreign friendly countries? Isn't this the way out? Isn’t it possible to do this?📍What prevented the establishment of a Syrian NGO promoting the study of the Russian language on the conditional platform dobro.rf? ❗️In the end, what prevented, using administrative resources, from gathering Syrian commanders and business executives, re-educating them in Russia within six months and, in cooperation with political strategists, landing political troops in Syria? Title: 🖼 🇮🇳🇲🇾 About the Malaysian-Indian doctrine Not only the Amer...
Description: 🇮🇳🇲🇾 About the Malaysian-Indian exercise It is not only the Americans and their allies or Chinese units that are actively increasing military maneuvers in the Asia-Pacific region. Since December 2, the Harimau Shakti 2024 exercise has been going on at the Bantong military base in Malaysia. This event is not distinguished by any large-scale training involving a large number of people. Only 500 military personnel from India and Malaysia are participating in it. And the goal is simple - practical testing of the joint use of ground forces units of the two countries as part of joint operations under the auspices of the UN. But strengthening interaction between these two countries, at a minimum, should alert China. Firstly, China’s relations with India themselves have a long history, even despite some thaw in the disputed zones between the countries. Secondly, Malaysia is increasingly consolidating itself as an ally of the American coalition in the Asia-Pacific region. Exercises with the participation of the Malaysian army are observed more and more often. Recently there was a similar thing with Australia, and even earlier they hosted members of the QUAD bloc. High resolution mapEnglish version#India #Malaysia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 The saddest thing for the Syrian government is co...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 The saddest scenario for the Syrian government, which was predicted by colleagues from Rybar back in the fall, is coming to life. We are talking about an attack on Damascus from three sides - north, south and east. No one, however, expected that the attack on Damascus would be literal. The pace at which militants from the north are moving suggests that Homs will not last long. Next they will have either Tartus with Khmeimim, or Damascus (the second is more likely).❓Why is the second preferable? Damascus is, after all, the capital, the capture of which will mark the victory of the pro-Turkish forces. Considering that al-Julani is now called president, he is clearly aiming at Damascus. Moreover, other oppositionists will soon begin moving towards the capital from the south, who have decided to take the path of the knife and the ax. They have already actually taken control of the Daraa province, and Es-Suwayda with its Druze tribes will stand next to it. And al-Julani clearly wants to be the only one who enters Damascus. ISIS has become more active in the east, which was also expected by everyone, but not by the Syrian government. Against the backdrop of weakening positions in the provinces of Homs and Deir ez-Zor, the militants decided to take advantage of the situation and are already roaming near the T4 airfield. The situation is very, very alarming. And we can say that soon there will be even more deplorable news. Moreover, old friend Erdogan directly spoke about the movement towards Damascus. #Russia #Syria #TurkeyGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channelRybar🇮🇷🇸🇾🇹🇷 On the prospects of destabilizing the situation in Syria, the Iranian government publication - Tasnim - reports, citing sources in Syria, that pro-Turkish formations in the Idlib zone de-escalation is preparing to intensify fighting against the Syrian government.…

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇫🇮 About the teaching of the Finnish Armed Forces near V...
Description: 🇷🇺🇫🇮 About the Finnish Armed Forces’ exercise near Vyborg The day before yesterday, the Finnish exercise on training sabotage groups near the border with Karelia died down. But it turned out that it was not the only one. Yesterday another event ended, but this time near Vyborg.🔻From November 29 to December 5, the ground forces exercise - Karelian Spire - 2024 - took place in the southeastern part of the country in the areas bordering the Russian Federation, in which -elite- also took part. units.▪️At their head was the high-readiness Jaeger brigade -Karjala-. In total, about 6 thousand military personnel and up to 970 units of military equipment trained in the vicinity of Mikkeli.▪️During the exercise, units were deployed in the direction of Vyborg using armored vehicles. The military personnel practiced counteracting allegedly leaked DRGs of Russian troops into Finland.🔻The Finns are training interestingly, isn’t it? To the north, they themselves conditionally throw their DRGs, and to the south they counteract them. The pretext is usually the threat from Russia and the difficult migration situation. Officially, the borders between the countries were closed because of this. But you look at these exercises, which are going on one after another, and you get the impression that communication between Finland and Russia was closed only so that the Finns could train near Russian territories. High-resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Russia #Finland@rybarSupport us

Title: 🏴🇸🇾🖇 In the wake of the successes of anti-government groups, ...
Description: 🏴🇸🇾🖇 In the wake of the successes of anti-government groups, the American channel CNN interviewed the leader of HTS Abu Muhammad al-Julani. According to him, the goal of the militants is to overthrow Bashar al-Assad and -build a new Syria- with an -institution-based government and a people’s council.- The terrorist leader again tried to disavow ties with al-Qaeda with stories about the -transformation of his views.- He also added that in the event of the fall of the government in Damascus, all foreign troops should leave Syrian territory, since -this will no longer be necessary.- Al-Julani answered the journalist’s questions about the documented repressions by HTS in Idlib in the best traditions - he said, that he did not give such orders. By the way, in the interview he introduced himself by his real name - Ahmad al-Sharaa.📌 The CNN interview is another element of the consistent legalization of HTS in the Western media field, which began several years ago. Al-Julani is portrayed as a pragmatic moderate Islamist who wants to build Syria for the Syrians and guarantee the rights of all religious groups. In reality, all such statements are not worth a penny, as can be seen from the example of HTS’s actions in Idlib - the killing of dissenters and the tightening of the screws continues , only gradually and without unnecessary noise. Moreover, the group will not oppose Turkish troops in Syria (at least at first). However, the media legalization of the heiress of the Syrian al-Qaeda and its leader opens up new great opportunities for the collective West to directly use the group for its own purposes. #media technologies #Syria #terrorism @rybarSupport usCNNSyrian rebel leader says goal is to 'overthrow' Assad regime | CNNThe goal of Syria’s rebel coalition, as it wrests another major city from government control this week, is ultimately to overthrow authoritarian President Bashar al-Assad, according to Abu Mohammad al-Jolani, the militant leader of the main group driving…

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (border of Hama and Homs provinces): ...
Description: ⚡️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (border of Hama and Homs provinces): advance of HTS militants towards Homs and into the desertsituation as of 15.00 December 6, 2024The situation on the border of Hama and Homs provinces continues to rapidly deteriorate. ▪️At night, landing operations were carried out by the 25th Special Forces Division (aka Tiger Forces) in the settlements of Khattab, Maardas, as well as in the vicinity of Kamkhana and the strategically important height of Zein al-Abidin. The Tiger Forces also managed to enter the Hama military airfield and level the front line north of the village. ❗️However, in reality, this did not in any way affect the advance of the militants.▪️The militants continue to move towards Homs along the M5 highway, simply bypassing the blocked areas. Night attacks on the bridge in the Ar-Rastan area did not lead to the desired result - the bridge was only damaged. ▪️Moreover, the militants are gradually expanding their zone of control in the vicinity of Ar-Rastan and Tell Bisa near the northern outskirts of Homs (these are the same areas from which militants were withdrawn during the de-escalation agreements, so the local population there remained among those militants who openly sympathized with the ideas of the Syrian revolution). At the same time, there are no credible reports of battles or any resistance from Syrian troops. ▪️To the east of Hama, militants claim control over several more settlements, in particular the strategically important Yttriya and the long-suffering Akkerbat, which was once liberated by the forces of the PMC -Wagner-.Cadrov, has not yet appeared from there, but given the fact that -forces The Tigers are now deployed in the north of Hama; they could have been pulled away from this area in order to try to level the front. ▪️Local sources also confirm the passage of militants in this direction and the transfer of equipment to this area, which, in principle, is quite logical, given that the gangs are moving through open areas of the desert.❗️The situation is rapidly deteriorating. Moreover, at this stage, there is a threat of a breakdown in communications in the Deir ez-Zor-Palmyra-Homs section, which will lead to encirclement and loss of control over the situation in the area of ​​the strategically important Tifora airfield, as well as a deterioration of the situation in long-suffering Palmyra. At the same time, the militants are placing a big bet on the semi-encirclement and coverage of Homs, which is the last stronghold that separates the militants from a breakthrough towards both Damascus and Tartus. High-resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru# digest #map #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the attempted BEC attack on Crimea By midnight,...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 We wrote about an attempted strike by BECs on Crimea. Around midnight, we wrote that the enemy was spotted near Crimea, where an unmanned boat of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was destroyed. But that was not all. Throughout the night, Russian sailors, pilots, Russian Guards and special forces repelled the attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces.🔻The first wave of BECs was recorded before midnight. Su-30SM naval aviation fighters of the Black Sea Fleet were sent to intercept them, which destroyed six BECs in the area 30-70 km from Sevastopol.▪️Closer to four in the morning, a group of BECs was spotted moving south of Sudak, Gurzuf and Cape Opuk. Then they checked in south of Cape Takil, and a Ka-52 helicopter was scrambled to intercept them, but they disappeared.▪️By 6 am, a group of boats appeared near the Kerch Strait. To fight them, Mi-8 helicopters and units ensuring the security of the transport corridor were raised.❗️However, the BECs were equipped with machine guns, which began to fire back at the Russian military personnel. As a result of the shooting battle, the BECs turned around and disappeared from sight, and the helicopters returned to the base.▪️But by 7 a.m., the BECs were spotted in the area of ​​the Butoma plant, and there, through the joint efforts of our units, three drones were destroyed. However, 4 BECs located south of the Kerch Strait turned around and left. After a two-hour search, they could not be found.🔻Such attacks by unmanned boats have not happened for a long time. And, apparently, the target was the Kerch Strait, and not Sevastopol. Six BECs destroyed near the city were at the crossing along with the others. In total, at least 13 units should have reached the Crimean Bridge, some of which performed the task of covering the attack BECs (we are talking about those armed with machine guns). Attack groups Now they represent a fairly well-coordinated structure, in which there are faster scouts, there is cover, and there are shock troops - those equipped with a larger warhead. Since the enemy did not achieve his goal, and from the number of funds involved it is clear that he has accumulated BECs, we can conclude that he will not stop there and the attacks may be repeated. High resolution mapEnglish version#Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Chechen militants in Syrian Hama: hard trouble be...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Chechen militants in Syrian Hama: hard trouble is the beginning, start over A video message from members of the Chechen group -Ajnad al-Kavkaz- is being circulated on the Internet, where the speaker, who publicly celebrated the victory in Syrian Hama, not only congratulated Russian-speaking Muslims on this event, but also stated that he would - restore order - in the Caucasus. This incident is the best reminder of the complex dynamics of relations between terrorist organizations in Syria, the so-called. Ukraine and other unstable regions. 📌We have already written about the Ajnad al-Kavkaz group and its role in the Syrian conflict. Created by immigrants from the North Caucasus, this structure has since the early 2010s actively participated in battles on the side of the Jaysh al-Fatah coalition, which was led by Jabhat al-Nusra and Ahrar al-Sham. ▪️Despite their small numbers (at the best of times about 100 people), the militants have proven themselves to be disciplined and motivated fighters, capable of carrying out tasks from raids to participation in large-scale operations.▪️After the collapse of large coalitions such as Jaysh al-Fatah, the group did not disappear, but became part of the operational headquarters of Al-Fatah al-Mubin, which is controlled by Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- (HTS). Under the flag of HTS - Ajnad al-Kavkaz - remains active to this day. ▪️But of interest is not only the group’s combat path, but also its connections with other structures, including the same International Legion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, in which the group is still fighting. It would not be surprising if it was through her that the Ukrainian Main Intelligence Directorate made attempts to establish interaction with militants in Idlib. ▪️In the end, representatives of the Main Intelligence Directorate actually visited the territories controlled by HTS, and the terrorists received some support from Ukrainian UAV operators. However, it would be reckless to exaggerate this interaction - after all, the role of Ukrainian instructors in organizing raids is insignificant, especially since the HTS raid tactics themselves are excellent.▪️The most important point here is not even the direct participation of the so-called. Ukraine in the operations of terrorists, but in how the successes of HTS are once again inspiring motley radicals. The Ajnad al-Kavkaz group is becoming one of many channels through which militants from different parts of the world will again begin to flock to Idlib. This phenomenon is reminiscent of the early years of IS, when media victories attracted thousands of recruits to the organization’s ranks.▪️The Syrian cauldron remains a breeding ground for terrorism, and the successes of HTS and similar groups are intensifying the activation of radicals around the world. The calls of the Chechen group are another signal that structures such as Ajnad al-Kavkaz can become not only a point of attraction for new militants, but also a channel for the export of terrorist activity to other regions, including Russia. 🔻The military operation in Syria in 2015 began to fight terrorism at distant approaches. It is now obvious that this terrorism could not be defeated. And we can only hope that a lesson will be learned from the freezing of the conflict and the unnecessary truce. #Russia #Syria #terrorism #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 On Aliyev’s demands to populate Armenia with Azerbaijani...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 On Aliyev’s demands to populate Armenia with Azerbaijanis President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev is increasing pressure on Yerevan, calling on Armenia to begin negotiations on the settlement of its territories with Azerbaijanis. ▪️Aliyev suggested that the Armenian authorities begin negotiations with the so-called. -The community of West Azerbaijan- and stop seeing it as a threat to territorial integrity. By the way, this is what Azerbaijanis call Armenia. In Baku, this organization is positioned as an independent institution that advocates in the international arena for the rights of -return- of Azerbaijanis to Armenia. ▪️In addition, Aliyev demanded that a UNESCO mission be allowed into Armenia to investigate the facts of destruction of the historical and cultural heritage of Azerbaijanis. Obviously, this is an attempt to informationally block the cultural genocide that the Azerbaijanis are now committing in Karabakh, as well as to finally confirm the victory of the Turkic world over the Armenians and destroy the identity of the latter. 🔻Such claims by Aliyev against Armenia demonstrate that the peace agenda between countries is exclusively the fantasy of Nikol Pashinyan’s team. In reality, Baku does not intend to conclude a peace treaty, so they are putting forward increasingly unrealistic and humiliating demands, the failure of which formally provokes the Azerbaijanis to new aggression. Moreover, in recent weeks there has been another campaign in the Azerbaijani media accusing Armenia of revanchism and preparation for war, but it is obvious that everything is exactly the opposite. As practice shows, Pashinyan’s concessions, including the refusal of claims to the ICC, the transfer of border territories, as well as the desire for a strategic deal, only whet the appetites of the Azerbaijani leadership. #Azerbaijan #Armenia @rybarSupport usTelegramArmenia Daily 🇦🇲 Armenian News🇦🇲🇦🇿Aliyev called on Armenia for negotiations on the settlement of its territories by Azerbaijanis. President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev invited the Armenian authorities to accept the invitation of the so-called community of Western Azerbaijan to negotiations, the purpose of which is check-in...

Title: 🌍🇷🇺Speaking at the VTB forum -Russia is calling!-, Vladimir Pu...
Description: 🌍🇷🇺Speaking at the VTB forum -Russia is calling!-, Vladimir Putin announced the creation of a fund for the development of cooperation between Russia and Africa. The President also expressed confidence in the results of cooperation between the Russian and African authorities. There was also an understanding of the problem of low trade turnover with African countries and hopes for its further increase in order to build mutually beneficial cooperation. The fact that such questions are again being raised at the highest level is good news. Now it’s a matter of concrete practice and the implementation of these ideas by the performers. And here it is alarming that in the perception of individuals, all talk about Africa has remained more of a fashionable trend than real politics. Therefore, I would like to see more concrete steps towards economic cooperation with Africa. Including holding intergovernmental forums similar to those held with Tanzania.#Africa #Russia@rybarSupport usTACCPutin announced the creation of a fund for the development of cooperation between the Russian Federation and AfricaThe President is confident that the result will be very good

Title: 🔁🖼 In southern Syria, the situation is also far from prosperous...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR In the south of Syria, the situation is also far from favorable. 72-hour ultimatums to Syrian government structures are already appearing in opposition channels: they must lay down their arms and leave the checkpoints in Daraa. In the north of the province, the sadyks have already begun to crack down: checkpoints have been removed in Jasim, Inhil, Sleiman, which the local reconciled greens and mob are very happy about. ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🇷🇴🗳🇷🇺 About manipulations - the Russian threat - before the ...
Description: 🇷🇴🗳🇷🇺 About the manipulation of the -Russian threat- before the second round of the presidential elections in Romania Romanian presidential candidate Elena Lasconi, before the second round, scares her voters with the -Russian threat- in order to enlist the support of anti-Russian politicians. She convinces the Romanians that they allegedly face a choice between -Russia and the EU-, and she represents the -European path-, unlike her opponent Calin Georgescu.▪️The EU is so concerned about Georgescu's possible victory that the current Romanian authorities suddenly -declassified the information- Romanian intelligence services about his election campaign on TikTok and, who would have thought, accused Russia of its illegal financing and interference in the elections.▪️ Against this background, Lasconi, the leader of the pro-European and pro-American party - Union for the Salvation of Romania - said that she had held negotiations with the President of Moldova Maia Sandu and the President of Georgia Salome Zurabishvili. Both complained about pro-Russian forces that were sabotaging the European path of the republics. Lasconi assures that this is a lesson for Romania. ▪️At the same time, Sandu’s office is actively promoting Moldovans with Romanian citizenship to vote for Lasconi. After all, the victory of Georgescu, who is skeptical of NATO, the EU, the USA and the Kyiv regime, will be a tragedy for the Moldovan authorities. It is obvious that Sandu, Lasconi and Zurabishvili represent the interests of Western globalists, so their common appearance in the media is not surprising. However, it would be a mistake to really perceive Georgescu as a pro-Russian candidate. Moreover, in Romania the parliament plays a big role, in which the ruling coalition will remain, leading the country along the current foreign policy course. Nevertheless, the political tension in Romania once again speaks of a deep political crisis in the EU and the fatigue of the population. The weakness of the current political elite is covered up by the already familiar scenario of the Russian threat. facă România cadou Rusiei-Elena Lasconi a lansat un apel clar către români, în direct la Digi24, afirmând că în alegerile de duminică se va decide drumul țării: -Rusia sau Uniunea Europeană?-. Ea a vorbit și despre desecretizarea documentelor CSAT, care au arătat că rivalul ei de...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 6, 2024 ▪️ At night - Ger...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors #Summary for the morning of December 6, 2024▪️ At night - Geranium - worked on enemy targets in Kyiv and the region, Mirgorod, Poltava region, reported explosions in Glukhov, Sumy region and Chuguev, Kharkov region.▪️ In the morning in the suburbs of Voronezh and districts region, several Ukrainian drones were discovered and destroyed. In the evening, information was received that two enemy UAVs had been shot down in the Black Sea area of ​​Cape Tarkhankut (Crimea). In addition, a few tens of kilometers southwest of Sevastopol, a Su-30SM aircraft of the Black Sea Fleet destroyed an enemy MBEC.▪️From the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports that there are fierce battles in the Sudzhansky region. Our assault units advanced into the forest plantations near the village. Malaya Loknya. By district In Martynovka our artillery is working closely. Aviation continues to iron out enemy positions with powerful aerial bombs. There is high drone activity in the Bolshesoldatsky district. Today in Goryanka one car was hit and there was a wounded person. The authorities are calling on the civilian population to stop traveling to the area.▪️ News is coming from the Kharkov region about the advance of the Russian Armed Forces in Volchansk, where heavy fighting has been going on for several months. 6 buildings are occupied.▪️ In the central part of Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces continue assault operations. The zone of control in the Zabalki microdistrict has been expanded.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are developing success, every day complicating the enemy’s position. Our units are conducting attacks in the direction of the settlement. Shevchenko, in the area of ​​Pushkino, Stary Ternov and Solntsovka.▪️ In the south of the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Army is still trying to close the villages along the river. Sukhye Yaly, attacking Uspenovka. The Ukrainian Armed Forces still have a corridor less than 2 km wide to withdraw troops from Vesyolyi Gai and Annovka.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction there are battles near Razdolny and Novy Komar, the enemy is counterattacking. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are strengthening the defense line and conducting remote mining of the area.▪️ In the Kherson direction, the enemy is expecting the Russian Army to cross the Dnieper, making statements on behalf of civilian officials.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces shelled Shebekino twice during the day. four civilians were injured. Near the village of Rovenek, Belgorod district, a moving car was attacked by a drone. In the Borisov region, in the village of Berezovka, three kamikaze drones attacked the private sector. In the Klimovoe farm, an explosive device was dropped from a drone on a private house. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk region. Cherkasy Porechnoye. Malaya Loknya. GuevoA unit of air controllers from the Smuglyanka detachment accurately adjusts strikes against the enemy invasion group. ✨Smuglyanka himself constantly says that he and his unit will make every effort...

Title: 🖼 🇳🇦 About elections in Namibia From November 27 to 30 in the ...
Description: 🇳🇦 About elections in Namibia From November 27 to 30, general elections were held in the southern African country of Namibia. As a result of the voting, the majority of votes went to the ruling party SWAPO (South West African People's Organization) since independence, and Vice President Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwa became president.▪️The elections were delayed for 3 days due to a shortage of ballots and late arrival of mobile phones groups into areas and malfunctioning identity verification devices. The delay in the election process caused a reaction from the opposition, which did not recognize the election results and promised to challenge them in court. Against the backdrop of a general decline in SWAPO's ratings, non-recognition of the results is not unusual. Still, the problems of Southern Africa, including Mozambique: colossal youth unemployment and a high level of inequality, did not bypass Namibia. At the same time, the ruling party managed to maintain its primacy due to the efforts of Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwa herself, who, unlike her party members, was not involved in corruption scandals and other intrigues.🔻The new government has already promised to create more than 200 thousand jobs, although without details. Most likely, the increase in employment will be associated with new infrastructure and mining projects. This includes possible interaction with Rosatom, whose representatives maintain ties with the Namibian authorities in every possible way. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#Africa #Namibia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 However, at night the media troops were landed not only by t...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBARHowever, at night media troops were landed not only by the red ones, but also by the black ones. Banned, thrice destroyed, the Order of Donald Trump, ISIS, announced the seizure of the industrial zone in Khneifis, south of the T4 airfield and Palmyra. There are long-suffering phosphate deposits there, which the Iranians once offered to buy out to the Russians, but we turned our noses up. Boevichye claims that he has captured all the surrounding heights. However, there is not a single frame of objective control. Another thing is interesting here: the ISIS have not been active in this zone for a long time (usually it was to the east of Palmyra). Here, as we have repeatedly said, there is a high probability of using the 55-kilometer security zone at Tanf, controlled by the Americans. And most likely, the mob came from there.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🔁🎬🖼 At night, the Syrian Arab Army landed media troops in gove...
Description: Forwarded From FISHBARAt night, the Syrian Arab Army launched a media assault on government and pro-Syrian accounts. Having published footage of the landing from the Il-76 of units of the 25th division of the Special Forces Suheil al-Hassan, Syrian sources announced the successful landing of SAA units in Khan Sheikhoun, Khattab, Kamkhana and Maardas. On the map these places are marked with white DRG icons to make it more clear. As if this were not enough, it was announced that the cauldron was closing to the west of Hama and the militants were surrounded in the city itself. In Khan Sheikhoun, the road was allegedly also cut off by a breakthrough from As-Sqalbiyya. Once again: the SAA claims that it carried out a landing at night (!) (!!), at the same time making a breakthrough with armored vehicles (!!!!) and cutting off Hama (!!! !!). Yesterday we went through enough of the Syrian media to not believe in such options. But let’s be frank: the sadyks have plenty of nonsense to carry out a landing into nowhere and drive personnel into cauldrons. However, this does not negate the fact that sporadic pockets of resistance indeed remained in Kamkhana and Hama. ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of November 29 - December 5, 2024▪️Islamic resistance fighters in Iraq did not stop trying to attack Israeli territory. Over the course of a week, kamikaze drones were launched across the northern part of the country, but none of them ever made it.▪️The fighters of the Ansarallah movement also did not stand aside, launching a drone in the direction of the southern city of Eilat. However, the drone was shot down in the Red Sea while approaching Israel’s land borders.▪️The offensive of anti-government forces in northwestern Syria continued. The most intense fighting took place north of Hama, where the militants managed to occupy several surrounding settlements. Jihadist activity increased in the Al-Ghab Valley area, where they attacked in the vicinity of Jurin. Also, illegal armed groups took control of Qalaat al-Madiq, which opened the way for them to the Christian settlement of Skalbiya.▪️Terrorists did not stop launching drones at Syrian Arab Army bases and logistics routes. For the first time since the beginning of the current escalation, the illegal armed formations attempted to attack the Russian Khmeimim airbase, but the UAV was shot down.▪️In the province of Aleppo, the main battles took place for the strategic settlement of Khanasser. The city changed hands, but in the end, Syrian government troops managed to liberate it and gain a foothold there.▪️In the city of Aleppo itself, members of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army robbed and kidnapped local residents. In this regard, the civilian population even turned to terrorists for help -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham-.▪️North of the city, members of HTS expelled the Turkish-backed -Al-Sultan Murad Division- from the territory of the Infantry School. SNA supporters accused HTS of betrayal, to which the latter responded by justifying their actions by fighting the looters.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 About the preparation of the Turks for the operatio...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 About the preparation of the Turks for an operation against the Kurds As we wrote after the start of the militant offensive and the collapse of Aleppo, the Turks were preparing to enter into direct conflict with the Kurdish - Syrian Democratic Forces - to solve their own problems. Initially, militants of the Syrian National Army (SNA) were involved in this. However, units controlled by Turkey tried several times to attack the SDF defense lines in the direction of Manbij, but each time without success. And yesterday there was even unconfirmed information about battles in the area of ​​the Kvayres airfield, that is, the Kurds counterattacked and were successful. Against the backdrop of the failures of the Turkish proxies, the likelihood of the deployment of Turkish troops increases. And it is indicative how actively the Turks have recently attacked SDF positions, using both artillery and UAVs, which hit both the rear and forward targets of the Kurds. Over the past two days, 30 drones have been observed (-Bayraktary-, -Akinci- , -Aksungur- and -Anka-), which operated along the border line, and the bulk of them flew in the area of ​​​​Manbij and Ain al-Arab, which was abandoned by Russian and Syrian military personnel.❗️Given the distance of the front line to Homs and the approach of HTS militants to Latakia, the Turkish authorities are well aware that they should not expect obstacles from the Syrian government and the Russian contingent - there are more important problems there. Therefore, no we exclude such a scenario that, against the backdrop of all the turmoil and total destabilization, the Turkish authorities will try to resolve long-standing issues with Kurds. But even with such chaos, one should not expect inaction from the Kurds. The Turks tried to do this for many years, but each time they returned with nothing. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #Syria #terrorism #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 While all attention is focused on Syria, Ukrainian forma...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 While all attention is focused on Syria, Ukrainian formations have reminded themselves of themselves in Crimea. About an hour ago, two drones were shot down near Cape Tarkhankut. In addition, a few tens of kilometers southwest of Sevastopol, a Black Sea Fleet Su-30SM aircraft destroyed an unmanned enemy boat. It is interesting that the number of assets involved is minimal. As a rule, the Ukrainian Armed Forces do this before more massive attacks, including missiles. Considering that there have been no attacks on Crimea for quite some time, and in recent days, satellites of Western countries have been looking for the location of air defense systems in the Kherson region and Crimea, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are preparing for an attack.# Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybar Support us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 5, 2024. Russian troops launched a combined attack on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in various regions of the so-called. Ukraine, while simultaneously repelling attacks by Ukrainian drones in several areas. In the Alexander-Kalinovsky direction, Russian troops advanced in the center of Dzerzhinsk, as well as in the Zabalka microdistrict in the south of the city. In the Kurakhovsky direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control southwest of Dalniy and started fighting in farms on the outskirts of Uspenivka. In the Vremyevsky direction, fierce clashes are taking place in the vicinity of Razdolny and Novy Komar, where Ukrainian formations daily counterattack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces.🔻Detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en) Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Vremevka #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #map #Kurakhovo #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): preparation o...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): preparation of the parties for the resumption of hostilities; situation for the outcome on December 5, 2024. The situation in the province of Deir ez-Zor remained relatively calm during the day; there was no information about battles along the Euphrates River. ▪️This was confirmed by the commander of the Military Council of Deir ez-Zor, Turki ad-Deiri, a pro-American Arab militia that is part of the Syrian Democratic Forces. He said they had suspended their offensive against government-controlled settlements in Damascus. ▪️The reason for this, as the militant commander said, was the limited support from the American contingent at the Conoco base, the inconsistency of their actions with the leadership of the SDF and the lack of military equipment: only 15 units were distributed to four attack areas. 🔻And although the last attack by Arab units of the SDF with air and artillery support from the US Armed Forces was a complete failure, they openly made it clear about their plans to take revenge. What may happen in the near future as the situation worsens in other provinces of the country. The Syrian military command is aware of this (which cannot be said about its awareness of what is happening in Hama) and has sent additional forces to the contact line in the form of regular troops of the Syrian Armed Forces, the National Defense Forces (NDF), and Shiite groups. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): ongoing attacks on ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): ongoing attacks on government targets situation to end December 5, 2024 In Daraa province in southern Syria, attempts by factions - the Syrian opposition - to provoke a rebellion continue. Local militant sleeper cells carried out several attacks on government positions. ▪️So, on the Damascus-Daraa road near the city of Izraa, a car with military intelligence officers was fired upon: two of them were wounded, one was killed. Opposition media accused them of collaborating with the Iranians. ▪️In the city of Aqraba in the north of the province, the checkpoint of the Political Security Directorate was already shelled. The militants used a hand-held anti-tank grenade launcher and small arms; there is no information about casualties. ❗At the same time, a video appeared on the Internet in which masked people announced the formation of an operational headquarters, which allegedly included several anti-government groups in the province. This suggests that the situation in Daraa will only worsen. Taking advantage of the collapse of the SAA's defenses, the sleeper cells will cease to be such and will move on to the open phase of the struggle with the central government. In turn, this will contribute to the deterioration of the situation in neighboring Es-Suwayda, where discontent among local Druze factions has been growing for several months (not without support from side of Israel) and Sunni tribes. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 5, 2024 Israeli troops launched another series of attacks on the Gaza Strip, resulting in the deaths of several dozen people. The most high-profile hit occurred at a tent camp in coastal Al-Mawasi in the south of the enclave. At the same time, IDF operations continued in Jabaliya, Beit Lahia and Rafah, where the Israelis traditionally carried out engineering work. Over the past 24 hours, there were no clashes with Palestinian forces there. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces conducted raids in more than ten settlements, detaining about 30 local residents. Major Israeli operations took place in the provinces of Jenin, Nablus and Hebron. In southern Lebanon, formal adherence to the ceasefire agreement continued, although the Israelis launched sporadic strikes, preventing the Lebanese from returning to IDF-controlled territory.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our private channel @rybar_plus_botHigh map permissionEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇪🇪🇺🇸 About NATO exercises in Estonia Against the backdrop ...
Description: 🇪🇪🇺🇸 About NATO exercises in Estonia Against the backdrop of -strange- incidents on submarine cables connecting Scandinavia with Europe, NATO is increasing its activity in the Baltics. In addition to talk of increasing the force at sea, the intensity of military exercises in the region is growing. 🔻The NATO Command in Estonia is conducting an exercise - Pikne-2024 - from December 2 to 15 in the northern and north-eastern parts of Estonia, as well as in the adjacent waters of the Gulf of Finland.▪️About 2 thousand people and 90 units of military equipment of ships are participating in it and boats from Finland, Latvia, Great Britain, France and Estonia. During the first week, Estonian military personnel, together with their partners, are working out plans for the use of units in combat.▪️During these days, the Estonian command warned about the movements of military convoys and low-altitude aviation flights along the northeastern part of the country, including near the Russian border.▪️ Major firings are expected in the second week, simulating strikes against the Russian Federation, although the Estonian leadership called the exercise defensive. In addition, Estonian and French sailors will organize patrols and blockades of the Gulf of Finland. Estonian military activity has not been surprising for a long time. The most important NATO soldiers have always been distinguished by loud statements addressed to Russia, and after Finland joined the Alliance, they even began to call for a blockade of the gulf and preventive strikes on the Russian Federation, which they are actually practicing during the exercise. High-resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Estonia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): the fall of Hama the...
Description: ⚡️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): fall of Hama situation as of 19.00 December 5, 2024 In Hama province, the situation has reached a catastrophic point associated with the retreat of the Syrian Armed Forces from Hama. According to the most conservative estimates, the territory controlled by HTS and other terrorist factions has increased no less than threefold.▪️ Almost all or most of Hama has come under the control of terrorists. Moreover, information is already being received about the further movement of the militants. In the area of ​​Salamiya, the local council of sheikhs allegedly decided to adhere to neutrality. The city of Akkerbat also fell into the hands of militants. ❗️From this we can conclude that a little more and the militants will be able to reach the T4 airbase along highway number 40. Considering its importance for pro-Iranian groups that use it to deploy their drones, the situation is depressing.🔻The scale of Syrian losses in the battle for Hama is not yet entirely clear obvious, but, apparently, the Syrian army abandoned a considerable part of its armored vehicles during the retreat. Moreover, the militants are slowly publishing footage from Hama airport, where they got hold of several planes and helicopters. In addition, it is not yet entirely clear how far Syrian troops have retreated from the city in general. ▪️Syrian troops, apparently, did not linger in the city of Ar-Rastan, where they could take up defensive positions along the Orontes River. Moreover, in Ar-Rastan there was even an attack by local residents on a Syrian army convoy. Rastan is a city with an oppositional past. In this area there was the so-called Rastan cauldron, from which many militants were taken to Idlib at one time. And now -Idlib is going in the opposite direction.▪️In addition, information has appeared that Syrian aviation or artillery struck in Tel Bis. What happened is not yet entirely obvious, but if the militants reached this settlement, then by the evening clashes will begin on the outskirts of Homs.❗️The situation is deteriorating rapidly, and by the evening, it is quite possible that it will become even more depressing. High-resolution map⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 About attacks on the Russian Khmeimim airfield and ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 About attacks on the Russian Khmeimim airfield and negative forecasts🔻Even before the fall of Hama, many seriously speculated that the militants would stop sooner or later and would not advance deep south from Aleppo, including to Latakia. But these people are deeply mistaken, especially now.▪️The fact is that throughout the week, Syrian militants have been attacking the territory of the Syrian coast with drones. Drones are shot down time after time near Masyaf in mountainous Latakia, and today several birds were shot down on their approach to the Russian Khmeimim airbase. ▪️And similar attempts will continue to be made. Now the militants are taking out all the accumulated weapons that during the four years of the truce they were able to create, accumulate, and organize production, using workshops on the territory of their so-called Greater Idlib to inflict maximum fire damage. ▪️At the same time, a huge number of fakes are being circulated online that all military equipment has been removed from the affected area from Khmeimim and Tartus, and so on. Although in fact this is not true. In reality, we need to understand that the militants will not stop. ▪️They will try to inflict maximum defeat, reputational and physical damage on representatives of the Russian Federation, in particular to destroy our military bases, so it is necessary to continue to fight them and shift all responsibility onto the shoulders of the Syrian Arab army, in this case it is a lost cause. ▪️The Syrians objectively cannot cope now without the help of our aviation and our specialists. And in the absence of support, the rollback of the Syrian Arab Army will continue. Especially now, when militants are clearing Hama and Homs looms before them. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 In addition to what has already been said as part...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 In addition to what has already been said as part of the assessment of the possible consequences after the fall of Hama, two more important factors should be mentioned. The first is what the Syrian government expects, in addition to pro-Turkish militants. And we are talking about the moderate opposition and rebellious tribes in southern Syria. They have already shown signs of intensification in recent days, but recent events will clearly push them to action. The weakness of the Assad government is no longer just visible, but has clear outlines. And it’s not that there are no prospects for saving the situation. But there are very few options, and that’s a fact. Now Homs is under threat, which, if it falls, will open the way to Tartus and Damascus. The second is the beginning of the Turkish operation against the Kurds. These few days have shown that the militants of the Syrian National Army cannot cope with the Kurds in Manbij and are even losing positions. For several days the Turks have been attacking Kurdish positions with artillery and drones, and taking into account the distance of the front to Homs, they have excellent prospects for starting operations in the north to at least take Manbij and Ain al-Arab. #Russia #Syria #TurkeyGlobalistics - subscribe to channelTelegramRybar🇸🇾🖇 About the fall of HamaToday, militants of the terrorist organization Hayat Tahrir al-Sham entered Hama: the city held out for five days.
