Title: 🖼 ❗️🇰🇷 Attempted coup in South Korea, the situation as of 21:0...
Description: ❗️🇰🇷 Attempted coup in South Korea situation as of 21:00 December 3, 2024 Today, immediately after the declaration of martial law by President Yoon Seok-yeol, the army of the Republic of Korea began to converge on the capital of the country. Eyewitnesses began to notice military equipment moving around Seoul. ▪️Meanwhile, security forces blocked the entrance to the parliament building, not letting in either deputies or ordinary citizens. Protesters gathered near the National Assembly. The first skirmishes took place right near the entrance to the building. ▪️However, the deputies still managed to break through there. According to media reports, there were about 190 people. The Speaker of Parliament was also seen in the building. Deputies have already held a vote in which they decided to lift the martial law declared by the president.▪️South Korean media report that the military personnel in and near the building are leaving. However, the authorities have not yet announced the lifting of martial law in the country. ▪️Against the background of what is happening, the exchange rate of the Korean won against the American dollar is falling. Bloomberg reports that shares of South Korean companies also lost value. The government of the country announced the use of all measures to stabilize the market. 🔻In general, of course, declaring martial law and using the army to deal with the conditional opposition is not something new for the Republic of Korea. It’s just that these measures were last resorted to quite a long time ago, and they were implemented by those presidents who are now considered almost dictators. And it seems that Yun Seok Yeol is actively trying to fit into their cohort. Tomorrow, most likely, a series of protests and rallies will sweep across South Korea for the South Korean president to resign from office, or for his impeachment. And all this will play into the hands of the opposition, which Yun called to fight, calling them minions of North Korea. High resolution mapEnglish version#South Korea@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): fighting north of Ha...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): fighting north of Hama and unclear situation in the citysituation as of 21.00 December 3, 2024 In Hama province, despite the difficult situation, a relatively stable situation was recorded in the vicinity of Skalbia, where the majority of the population is Christians and where motivated pro-government forces are stationed militia.▪️Events along the M5 highway are developing quite dynamically. Khan Sheikhoun, which serves as a logistics center for the militants, is constantly visited by the Syrian Air Force and the Russian Aerospace Forces. Despite this, the jihadists continue to bring reinforcements and armored vehicles to the city, including from among the Syrian army that was previously captured during the retreat.▪️Ads appearing on the militants’ resources online are looking for drivers of armored vehicles and heavy trailers. This suggests that the enemy will either take out these trophies or transfer them closer to the front line. Judging by how the situation is developing, most likely they will be involved in battles.▪️To the south, the parties are disputing control over the village of Suran. And although current personnel are still coming from government departments, it is unknown who actually controls the city at the moment. The militants are attacking in the direction of neighboring Taibat al-Imam, as well as Halfaya.❗️The main offensive vector - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - (HTS) looms northeast of Hama. Terrorists constantly claim attacks on Mount Zein al-Abidin and nearby heights. The base of the 87th brigade was also shelled, where, apparently, the SAA accumulated forces during the battles for Maar al-Shukhur.▪️Now this settlement is under the control of Syrian troops. As reinforcements arrived, the militants subjected him to a massive UAV raid, announcing the destruction of several pieces of equipment and later reporting an assault on the village. Moreover, our sources confirm that the Syrian Armed Forces began to withdraw from Maar al-Shukhur as darkness fell. The illegal armed groups claim that their troops are heading to the east, where the Syrian desert is located, but these reports are not supported by anything. If they are confirmed, the militants will actually reach the zone of activity of ISIS terrorists. There they will begin to sabotage the main roads, which will negatively affect the capabilities of the SAA in the area. An increase in the number of migrating militant groups in this part of the country could complicate the already deplorable economic situation, since gas and oil production plants are located in the zone of IS activity. Now, at the very least, they provide countries with energy resources. And this is at a time when the most combat-ready units of the Syrian Arab Army are now constrained by fighting in the vicinity of Hama, and therefore the ability to stop the jihadist forces in desert areas is, to put it mildly, meager. The best case scenario is to beat them up with the use of aviation. The news about a strike by a kamikaze drone of HTS on one of the bases of the SAR Armed Forces near Masyaf sounds remarkable. The curious thing is that the UAV signal reached the operators. This suggests that the militants have acquired high-precision weapons that reach an impressive distance of at least 40 km. High-resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 Oh well. On to pressing issues. It's difficult in Syria. The...
Description: Forwarded From UNFISHER Well, okay. On to pressing issues: It’s difficult in Syria. Spirits are trying to break into Hama, battles are taking place outside the towns to the north along the M5 highway. From the northeast, Ma'ar al-Shukhur changed hands at least twice, and Dusha drone activity is extremely high. So far there is absolutely nothing to oppose the Sadyks. Moreover, the spirits act competently, knocking out not so much personnel as equipment and supply vehicles.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🇫🇷 About the political crisis in France In France, the politica...
Description: 🇫🇷 About the political crisis in France In France, the political crisis is gaining momentum - but, unlike previous months, when instability was caused by either internal or external problems, now the situation is heating up on both fronts at once.▪️ As we wrote six months ago, in In the end, France found itself in an internal political impasse. Michel Barnier, who has held the post of Prime Minister since September, tried to take advantage of the absence of a leading force in parliament and push through decisions on social items of the budget without agreement with the lower house (the French Constitution allows this). As expected, parliamentarians were not delighted with such arbitrariness and initiated voting on a vote of no confidence in the government, which should take place tomorrow evening. It is noteworthy that in a fit of opposition to the Barnier administration, the left (-Popular Front-) and the right (-National Rally-) united, who recently denied any possibility of cooperation in a coalition.▪️Meanwhile, protests continue throughout the country: this time to Taxi drivers have joined the farmers, and next week employees of budgetary institutions can also support them. The demonstrations are caused by the European Union’s intention to conclude a number of agreements with the MERCOSUR member states. And if previously the activities of farmers were limited only to agreements within the EU, now they will also be required to take into account a number of Latin American countries. According to current forecasts, poultry and beef producers will be in the worst position. The decision may be made already during the MERCOSUR summit, which will be held on December 5-6 in Uruguay. Of course, no matter what happens in the coming days, it will not become an impetus for instant changes in the state. But in the long run, the only affected party were and remain the citizens of France, whose standard of living is naturally deteriorating both from strikes and from what is happening in the government. #France #protests@rybar together with @fifthrepublicSupport useuronewsFrench government faces collapse after PM pushes through budget billFrench Prime Minister Michel Barnier used the controversial Article 49.3 of the French Constitution to force the adoption of next year's social security budget plan. In retaliation, opposition parties from the left and far right are threatening his government…

Title: ↩️ 🇰🇷 From the point of view of possible consequences, this pre...
Description: Fisherman: ❗️🇰🇷 Martial law in South Korea: what are we talking about? The Korean Peninsula is once again in turmoil. Today, President of the Republic of Korea Yoon Seok-yeol announced the introduction of martial law in the country. Based on his statements, the reason for such measures was the activities... 🇰🇷 From the point of view of possible consequences, this presidential decision looks extremely dangerous for the entire South Korean Republic.❓What have we seen in recent days, weeks, months in the Republic of Korea? Were there any incidents, protests, riots? Absolute silence. Even tensions with North Korea have eased. Introducing martial law without any significant reason is a reckless act. And by talking about the imaginary paralysis of power due to possible impeachment, the president is undermining his position. Conducting impeachment proceedings is a constitutional right of parliament, and since the current head decided to go against this, then he is essentially taking the path of dictatorship. He simply did not care about the existing laws and decided that he could maintain power in this way. And this has already affected the exchange rate of the national currency, which has fallen sharply. Further, if the current situation and internal political struggle persist, shares of large corporations and industrial enterprises will go down, which will seriously affect the economy of South Korea. And this is only in the short term. #South Korea @rybarSupport us

Title: ❗️🇰🇷 Martial law in South Korea: what are we talking about? On ...
Description: ❗️🇰🇷 Martial law in South Korea: what are we talking about? The Korean Peninsula is once again restless. Today, President of the Republic of Korea Yoon Seok-yeol announced the introduction of martial law in the country. Based on his statements, the reason for such measures was the activities of the opposition, which controls the South Korean parliament. In particular, the president accuses her of threatening to paralyze power, since impeachment proceedings are being systematically prepared against him. 🔻Most likely in order to emphasize the seriousness of the situation, Yun called the local opposition North Korean communist forces, from which the country needs to be protected. The main purpose of such statements is to show that they pose a major threat to South Korea. In general, the introduction of martial law is a measure to circumvent parliamentary decisions. According to the country's law, the commander of martial law has authority over all administrative and judicial affairs in the area where it is declared. ▪️At the same time, the opposition is currently moving to the parliament building. Their goal is to lift declared martial law, which they have the authority to do under South Korean law. By the way, rumors about an impending martial law were spread earlier this year by representatives of the main opposition party, Toburo. At that time, many observers called such statements nothing more than scarecrows that were needed to undermine the position of the South Korean president. However, as we see, the rumors turned out to be true. 🔻It is unknown whether the opposition forces will be able to lift the martial law in the country, given that the parliament building is now blocked, and the deputies themselves may be arrested. However, if they still manage to do this, impeachment of the South Korean president will definitely not be avoided. #SouthKorea @rybarSupport us 기도-(종합3보)(서울=연합뉴스) 안용수 김승욱 김영신 곽민서 기자 = 윤석열 대통령은 3일 비상계엄을선포했다.

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇦⚡️About Western military-technical assistance to Ukraine...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇺🇦⚡️On Western military-technical assistance to Ukraine and likely plans for its use🇺🇸The United States is preparing to send Ukraine weapons worth $725 million, including anti-drone systems, Himars MLRS shells and anti-personnel mines.🇩🇪Yesterday , German Chancellor Scholz announced another package worth 670 million euros, which included 2 IRIS-T air defense systems, 10 Leopard 1A5 tanks, 60 infantry fighting vehicles and armored vehicles, 6 thousand unguided and 500 guided missiles. Two weeks earlier, the package included more than 300 reconnaissance UAVs, one TRML-4D radar, 3 Wisent mine clearing vehicles, 47 MRAPs, 2 Biber bridge laying vehicles, 8 Caracal landing vehicles, 6 M1070 heavy-duty trailers, 20 armored fighting vehicles, Pnz 2000 self-propelled guns and shells for them , 100 thousand HLR 338 sniper rifles.🇳🇱The Netherlands delivered 3 Patriot air defense missile launchers to Ukraine.🇸🇪On November 29, a moving column of Swedish PBV 302 armored personnel carriers was spotted on the German-Polish border, which were heading to Ukraine as part of the aid package announced by Sweden (a total of 250 units were promised. ). Earlier, on November 15, a train with 20 Bradley infantry fighting vehicles was recorded on the 🇷🇴Romanian-Ukrainian border. Also, a large number of equipment from previously announced or not yet announced aid packages could have already been secretly delivered to Ukraine by rail and sea. The emphasis is on strengthening the air defense system and increasing the equipment of reserve brigades. Against this background, Comrade. The Archangel of Special Forces reports the transformation of the 158th separate infantry brigade into a mechanized brigade, which indicates the growth of its combat potential. In addition, the 155th separate mechanized brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, trained and equipped in 🇫🇷France, is preparing to be introduced into battle, 2.5 thousand of whose military personnel recently began to return after training at French training grounds. ✨The specified data indicates the preparation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine of units numbering more than two brigades capable of carrying out offensive actions in individual, weakly protected areas of the front. Such an attack, despite its futility militarily, could become another attempt to obtain Russian lands as a subject for further bargaining in the negotiation process promoted by the West. All the talk in the Western media about the weakness of the enemy and the collapse of the front is a disinformation campaign to hide another provocation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Two major

Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 Meanwhile, in Aleppo, communications and the Interne...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 Meanwhile, communications and the Internet have almost completely disappeared in Aleppo - the work of the Syrian telecom operator has been stopped. However, starting tomorrow, the city will begin the transition to Turkish SIM cards, and all traffic in the occupied territories will be controlled by Turkey. In fact, the militants are already actively integrating the occupied areas. By supplying generators from Ankara, electricity problems are being solved there, and shops are already starting to pay in Turkish lira, the value of which is much higher than the local currency. As a result, the victory of the refrigerator over the TV occurs - in the eyes of residents, HTS look like those who brought uninterrupted power supply and gasoline. The number of sympathizers with the militants is growing, and in order to solve everyday problems, Syrians are ready to turn a blind eye to the establishment of Sharia law in Aleppo.📌 And here is a good question - what has been done on our part to combat such scenarios? It was impractical to completely solve all the problems with electricity and fuel for the corrupt government in Damascus, but it was not impossible to do this even in individual locations. Even last year, Prince Cherkassky proposed indicatively taking certain areas or sectors under economic control. For example, to ensure uninterrupted electricity and water supply in Latakia through the supply of pellet heat generators. As a result, the area around Russian bases would become islands of prosperity, which would not only help solve economic problems, but also lead to an increase in sympathy for Russia and an influx of loyal personnel. Later, the experience could be scaled beyond the coast.❗️And while someone continues to naively believe that the Syrians will love us anyway for past deeds, militants with the support of Turkey are actively using the accumulated socio-economic contradictions and taking away sympathy even among segments of the population disloyal to them Syria.#Russia #Syria #Turkey @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇹🇯🇺🇸 About cooperation between Tajikistan and USAID Not ev...
Description: 🇹🇯🇺🇸 About cooperation between Tajikistan and USAID Not even a week has passed since the news about the biological laboratory in Dushanbe appeared, as the Tajik authorities held a new meeting with the Americans. Minister of Health and Social Protection Jamoliddin Abdullozoda received US Ambassador Manuel Micaller and the USAID delegation. Abdullozoda noted that thanks to the support of partners, significant results have been achieved in the country’s healthcare. He emphasized that the department is actively cooperating with the United States through relevant agencies, including the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Apparently, Dushanbe does not realize at what cost these results can be achieved. Given the US deployment of infrastructure that poses a direct medical and biological threat to the region and directed against Tajikistan’s allies, it is doubtful that it is worth it.❗️But we decided to study how deeply Tajikistan’s cooperation with USAID is developing. We already did a similar analysis in 2022, and were unpleasantly surprised by the dominance of USAID and other similar organizations in Tajikistan. If you look at the map of projects in which the American USAID invested only in 2024, you will understand how much the presence of the structure subordinate to the State Department has grown in various sectors, ranging from education to the business sector. And they focus on small projects, mainly in villages and small towns. Somewhere they gave a grant to open a confectionery shop, somewhere they helped with the opening of a hospital, somewhere they provided drinking water. But this is exactly what ordinary Tajiks need most. And, by the way, from time to time they are helped by the Aga Khan Foundation, which has long been established in Tajikistan - the conductor of British interests in Central Asia. Its universities provide free scholarships to young people not only in Tajikistan, but also in Osh, Kyrgyzstan. And this is just the tip of the iceberg.🔻And since USAID is now closely involved in medicine (and this is directly related to the biolab), cooperation will strengthen. And remembering that USAID is looking for a medical adviser in neighboring Uzbekistan, nothing prevents us from opening the same vacancy in Tajikistan in the near future. High resolution mapEnglish version#Central Asia #USA #Tajikistan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): an attempt by...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): an attempt by the SDF to attack the positions of the Syrian Armed Forces. Situation as of 15.00 on December 3, 2024. Early in the morning, media resources - of the Military Council of Deir ez-Zor - - the Arab militia that is part of - US-backed Syrian Democratic Forces - announced the start of Operation -Battle of Return-.▪️The militants launched an attack on the positions of Syrian troops and pro-government tribal militias in the direction of several settlements in the vicinity of the city of Deir ez-Zor. They received limited support from US forces stationed at the Conoco gas field base.▪️The SDF initially had some success, causing damage to government forces. However, having failed to secure the support of the Arab tribes and after the SAR Armed Forces transferred reinforcements from the National Defense Forces (NDF), they lost the initiative and were forced to retreat, losing several fighters. The SDF press service stated that the offensive was undertaken at the request of the local residents of Al-Salhia , At-Tabiya Jazira, Khatly, Khsham, Marrat, Mazlum and Husseiniya, who fear the threat of the expansion of terrorist -Islamic State- (IS) due to the distraction of the Syrian authorities to the north-west of the country. In reality, everything is different: the leaders of pro-American groups in the Trans-Euphrates region have long been sharpening their knives on the lands controlled by official Damascus along the Euphrates. The Syrian authorities use them to bring cells of the Tribal Army into the zone of Kurdish control, which carries out attacks there. The reaction of pro-government Internet resources, which, since the transfer of some territories to Aleppo to the SDS, characterized them with rather neutral terminology, and after what happened this morning called the Kurds -separatist militias-.📌And although the offensive was repelled, the attacks are likely to continue in the near future: depending on the capabilities of the Syrian Armed Forces to improve the situation in Hama and Aleppo. Well, we previously reported that interested parties from this direction will also try to destabilize the situation in the Arab Republic. High resolution mapEnglish version #digest #DeirEzZor #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

In the last two They circle over Iraqi territory for at least three days MQ-9A Reaper from Salem Air Base in Kuwait and one RC-135. And over Syria (in the area of ​​al-Tanf, Deir ez-Zor and Hasakah) there were seven MQ-9A. They apparently monitored the activities of Iranian units and the Iraqi militia. But at the same time, information about attacks on them is not confirmed, although A-10 attack aircraft actually flew. American aviation was also actively working along the coast of Syria: several Reapers, MQ-4Cs and P-8A Poseidons. Considering the truce in Lebanon, it is clear for what purpose they are flying now. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Ten years ago, a presidential decree was signed, establ...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Ten years ago, a presidential decree was signed, establishing December 3 as the Day of the Unknown Soldier. The date coincides with the events of 1966, when, on the anniversary of the defeat of German troops near Moscow, the ashes of an unknown Soviet soldier were solemnly buried near the Kremlin wall. This day is dedicated to the soldiers of the Fatherland, those who fell in combat in the country and abroad. To those who have gone missing and lie in unmarked graves. Those who have gone into Eternity, whose name is unknown. But they remain in memory, passed on from generation to generation. And it is only in our power to make sure that the phrase -No one is forgotten, nothing is forgotten- is not just words. Art in high resolution#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Five days of unrest in Georgia - what are the results...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Five days of unrest in Georgia - what are the results?🔻For five days now, mass unrest has continued throughout Georgia, organized by pro-Western politicians and various non-profit and non-governmental organizations.▪️After unsuccessful attempts to take control of the parliament building, supporters of the so-called European integration - switched to more radical methods, including the use of cocktails Molotov.▪️Yesterday, President Salome Zurabishvili (whose second citizenship is French) went even further, calling not only students, but also schoolchildren to revolt. Some of the adults brought with them children aged about 10-12 years. ▪️Some universities, colleges and conservatories stopped their education as part of the strike and also held rallies. The main events took place in Tbilisi, but demonstrations were also observed in other cities.▪️At night, due to attacks on security forces, special forces were called in, who, with the help of water cannons and tear gas, dispersed the rioters throughout the night, who set fire to garbage cans and blocked the streets.▪️ Some of the rioters were detained. It is noteworthy that the most active ones wore masks and were the first to hide from the police. Probably, they are the ones who act as a kind of foreman who lead the crowd.▪️In the morning, representatives of educational institutions went on strike again. Students and teachers in Tbilisi, Zugdidi, Batumi, Rustavi and Khashuri demand the cancellation of the current government’s decision to suspend the EU accession process.❗️However, there are no prerequisites for achieving the goals. The government and security forces are successfully keeping the situation under control, knowing that sooner or later the protest potential will decline. And there were many examples of this. In Iran, demonstrations and riots lasted for about a year, and the protesters did not achieve their goals. The spring protests of disobedience in Georgia were also unsuccessful, despite the pressure and help of the West in organizing all this.🔻However, another problem may arise in Georgia: several channels of the Georgian Legion, fighting for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, reported the transfer of mercenaries to Georgia to help the opposition . But the ruling party knew about this back in the spring and was preparing for such a scenario. High resolution mapEnglish version #Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇬🇪 The Parliament of Abkhazia rejected the investment ag...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 The Parliament of Abkhazia rejected the investment agreement with Russia The Parliament of Abkhazia voted against the ratification of the investment agreement with Russia, which provided for the opportunity for Russian companies to implement projects on the territory of the republic. 📌The document was signed at the end of October 2024 and was supposed to be ratified on November 15. However, the day before, on November 11, protests against the agreement began in Sukhumi, which by November 15 escalated into an assault on the parliament building. After these events, President Aslan Bzhania announced his resignation, which parliament soon approved. Early presidential elections are scheduled for February 15.🔻And let us again emphasize the paradox of the situation: the republic, which exists entirely on financial support from Russia, refuses to open the doors to Russian investment. Moreover, provocative steps are being taken in Abkhazia, such as organizing an exhibition dedicated to the terrorist Shamil Basayev. Such actions not only harm the economy of the region, which, due to weak local governance, is at the same level as 20 years ago, but also undermine relations with the main donor - Russia. Abkhazia is effectively rejecting opportunities to improve its infrastructure and the well-being of its citizens. This case illustrates the problems of Russian policy in its near abroad. Over the years, relying on the -carrot- without using the -stick- has led to the fact that Moscow’s economic and political assistance has come to be taken for granted, and steps towards it have been taken for granted as weakness. Now Russia faces ultimatum behavior even from those who are completely dependent on its support.#Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇹🇲 About the visit of the American senator to Turkmenist...
Description: 🇺🇸🇹🇲 About the visit of the American senator to TurkmenistanPresident of Turkmenistan Serdar Berdimuhamedov received Senator from Montana and part-time member of the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Steve Daines, who just visited Tajikistan. Turkmen media routinely reported on the successful increase in cooperation between Ashgabat and Washington in a number of areas , especially noting the great contribution to the business council -Turkmenistan–USA-. But this was not the main track of Daines’ visit.❓The American senator came to Turkmenistan for the same purpose as he came to Tajikistan - because of minerals. And we are not talking about gas or oil. Nitrogen fertilizers have become the main exports of Turkmenistan to the United States in recent years. Ashgabat began producing them for export in 2018 with the opening of a urea plant in Garabogaz. And now there are rumors that there are plans to expand production. As the American ITA points out, Turkmenistan plans to increase their fertilizer production to 5 million tons per year. In 2023, it was possible to reach more than a million tons per year.🔻Turkmenistan is a convenient place for the production of fertilizers. To create them, you need natural gas, which is abundant in Turkmenistan, if you just look at the number of oil and gas fields and enterprises. Therefore, the enthusiasm of the Turkmen authorities is understandable (especially against the backdrop of interest in the Middle Corridor). Washington’s plans are also clear - this will increase competition in a strategically important market to the detriment of Russia, which occupies a leading position in it. Well, special attention should be paid to how actively Western countries began to court Turkmenistan, which is increasingly appearing in the headlines of newspapers and various publications, which clearly confirms the growing interest in the country as a raw material base of the West. High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Turkmenistan #Central Asia @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🇨🇳🇷🇺 About the possibility of laying a gas pipeline from ...
Description: 🇰🇿🇨🇳🇷🇺 On the possibility of laying a gas pipeline from Russia to China through Kazakhstan, Kazakh Energy Minister Almasadam Satkaliev said that the authorities are interested in the project of gas supplies from Russia to China through Kazakhstan and are ready to provide territory for the construction of such a gas pipeline. The words of the Kazakh politician are a continuation of what had begun in October, a discussion in which Russian Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak said that Russia and The PRC is considering a new gas supply route that could pass through Kazakhstan. The possibility of laying a gas pipeline was discussed back in 2020, but for economic reasons the choice was made in favor of Mongolia. However, due to the latter’s withdrawal from the project, Kazakhstan may again become a transit point. And Kazakhstan’s interest is quite understandable. Through transit, Kazakhstan intends not only to enrich itself, but also to gasify the border East Kazakhstan and Pavlodar regions. Now these regions are not connected to the main gas supply, so residents use coal and wood. The Kazakh leadership is trying to take advantage of the situation and is offering its territory for a project that promises great benefits. In the context of serious problems in the energy system and seasonal discontent of the population, such a project, despite the timing of its implementation, is needed by Kazakhstan, which in turn should be taken advantage of by our country. #Kazakhstan #China #Russia @rybarSupport usTACCAstana is ready to provide territory for a gas pipeline from the Russian Federation to ChinaRelevant the decision will be determined by the need to supply certain volumes of gas, said the Minister of Energy of Kazakhstan Almasadam Satkaliev

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 3, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 3, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops advanced to the village with heavy fighting. Novoivanovka, as well as in forests near the village. Malaya Loknya. In order to stop our troops, the enemy is actively using mortars and UAVs of various types and counterattacking. The Ukrainian Armed Forces conducted 3 unsuccessful counterattacks in the area of ​​the settlement. Daryino, Nikolaevo-Daryino and Novoivanovka. The main task facing the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Kursk region is to retain as much territory as possible until Trump’s inauguration and the start of negotiations, the enemy press reports. This confirms the unattainability of any military goals of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the region, emphasizing the political nature of Zelensky’s actions, who are killing soldiers for nothing.▪️ From the north of the Kupyansky direction, scant information comes about heavy fighting on the western bank of the river. Oskol, where our troops, having forced the water line, form two bridgeheads opposite Masyutovka and Dvurechny.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces are conducting heavy urban battles, the zone of control of our troops in the Zabalki microdistrict has been expanded.▪️ In Chasov Yar, fighting continues in the Oktyabrsky microdistrict and New. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction they are developing success towards the settlement. Shevchenko from the side of the captured Yellow. The plan of our command is visible to take fire control and then cut off the Pokrovsk-Kurakhovo road. Our troops are also moving west near the village. Pushkino.▪️ North of Velikaya (Big) Novoselka, the Russian Armed Forces continue to maneuver to envelop it from the north, which will also make it possible to take the garrisons of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the cascade of villages of the Vremevsky direction into the operational environment.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, the enemy is awaiting our large-scale offensive. The Ukrainian Armed Forces gathered many UAV operators and filled the air with drones, incl. with repeaters, increasing the range of your FPVs. According to estimates from the field, this allows the enemy to hit at a distance of up to 30 km. So, yesterday a civilian gas station in Tokmak was destroyed. The enemy knocks out any vehicles within the reach of drones, trying to hinder the activity of our troops. A similar build-up of enemy forces in the -small sky- is also observed in the Kherson direction. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Kolotilovka, Krasnoyaruzh district, a UAV attacked a moving car, a man was injured. Shebekino and Krasnaya Niva were under attack. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramDiary of a Paratrooper🇷🇺🪂 In the Tokmak area, an enemy FPV drone struck civilian infrastructure. The strike was made on a civilian gas station. Because of which a fire started and was followed by detonation of the main tanks with gasoline and diesel. Brothers, let's smash it to...

The Arab Spring or the events on the Ukrainian Maidan were relatively unexpected, but now , when the West acts according to the same scheme over and over again, you can prepare for this. Otherwise, the situation that arose in Abkhazia may repeat itself. Kyrgyzstan has more than once become the target of the activities of such structures, but in April, largely thanks to timely coverage of the preparations for the coup, the situation was quickly brought under control. But, as they say, or else will. Title: 🎬 🇮🇶🇸🇾🏴 On the reasons for the arrival of al-Hashd al-Shaab...
Description: 🇮🇶🇸🇾🏴 About the reasons for the arrival of Al-Hashd al-Shaabi in Syria. The spokesman for the Iraqi people's militia, Al-Hashd al-Shaabi, Muhannad al-Aqabi gave an interview to the publication Al-Mayadeen, where he spoke about the reasons for whom the group decided to help the Syrian authorities.🔻Main points:➖Iraq has extensive experience in confronting terrorists, and what is happening in Syria is dangerous for the entire region, not just Iraq. And the AKhaSh units specialize in the fight against terrorism.➖The scenario of past years should not be repeated, especially in Iraq. The country does not need terrorists who committed mass murders in Syria like IS.➖The actions of the militants are dictated from the outside. If they are fighting for the truth, then why did they not confront the massacres in Lebanon and Palestine? All because Israel is covering up the activities of militants.🔻-Al-Hashd al-Shaabi is the group that at one time played a huge role in the victory over the Islamic State. It was the militia fighters who were at the forefront of the fight against terrorists, operating in the thick of events in Iraq. This is how they earned their status and reputation. The possible consequences of what is happening in Syria are extremely serious, so the Iraqi units decided to help their neighbors. The events around Aleppo have already given impetus to other forces: in the south, rebellious tribes have raised their heads, and in the deserts in the east they are talking about ISIS. It is obvious that in the event of even greater destabilization in Syria, the situation will also affect Iraq. In addition to terrorists, Iraq will be one of the first countries to which refugees from Syria will rush, which will affect the economic well-being of Iraq, which has only just begun to recover. Their appearance in Syria, as well as the arrival of Seyyid Javad, will clearly help the distressed Syrian troops. At the same time, as we have already noted, Iraqi units operate separately from Iran, and they work within the framework of their own political track.#Iraq #Iran #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): militant offensive...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): militant offensive east of Hama, loss of SAA Qalaat al-Madykasituation towards the end of December 2, 2024The situation in Hama province was extremely difficult during the day and worsened by the evening. ▪️Militants last day began to transfer reinforcements to the area north of Qalaat al-Madiq and occupied Karakat, as well as Al-Arima. The enemy planned the attack on Qalaat al-Madyk for the morning of this day, and eventually carried it out, despite the strikes of the Russian Aerospace Forces. The first attacks by the militants failed, but by now the Syrians have confirmed the loss of Qalaat al-Madyk and that the fighting is actually already underway south of the settlement, indicates a difficult situation. Apparently, the enemy is approaching the Christian village of Skalbiya, which, if the militants are successful, will face a massacre.▪️In the area of ​​Al-Mughira and Berij, fighting also continues, as well as in the vicinity of Hamamiyat. Militants claim drone and anti-tank missile attacks on Syrian tanks. At the same time, the Syrians here, looking at the available information and footage, are still holding back the attacks of the groups.▪️The presence of militants remains in Kafr Zeit and Al-Latamna, and helicopters of the Syrian armed forces are using barrel bombs in Khan Sheikhoun and Maaret An-Numan. In Halfaya, Taibat al-Imam and Maardas, the situation is stable, the cities are under government control. 🔻At the same time, militants consistently claim and post footage of drone strikes on the territory of Halfai, Hama and the Hama military airfield. Also today, there were statements about the destruction of several tanks and other equipment, as well as one helicopter. The provincial capital was also shelled. In the Ba'ath region, five local residents were killed and three were injured. ▪️The most difficult situation is observed northeast of Hama, where large concentrations of militants are recorded in the vicinity of the village of Maar al-Shikhur and further north in Mrewada and Al-Mbattan. Apparently, they are trying to break through to the mountain range east of Hama, which could make it easier for them to fight further in the vicinity of the city.▪️At the same time, fighting continued in Fan Kubla throughout the day. Both Syrians and militant groups reported heavy fighting in the populated area. At the same time, no one has yet declared their control over the city. In addition, information continues to emerge about militants moving further east. However, for now they remain words without objective control footage. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Idlib #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇷🇸🇾🏴 About the arrival of Seyyid Javad Ghaffari in Syria...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇾🏴 About the arrival of Seyyid Javad Ghaffari in Syria🔻So, after several days of rumors and various news, information about the arrival of the Iranian general Sayyid Javad Ghaffari was confirmed, and this is really good news for the Syrian leadership.▪️Seyyid Javad took an active part in the fight against IS was the right hand of General Qassem Soleimani, killed by the Americans. After his death, it was he who was responsible for the operations - the axis of resistance - in Syria and Iraq. ▪️ He is a difficult person (and some of our team had the opportunity to get to know him personally), who opposed any agreements with terrorists and spoke about the need for the complete destruction of extremist groups , including in Idlib.▪️Because of his position in the administration of Bashar al-Assad and in Hezbollah, who sought negotiations, asked to remove him from operations in Syria, which caused him to return to Iran. But now, when the situation has reached a critical point, he was returned to help.❗️Why do we think this is good news for Syria? He is a member of the old guard of the IRGC and really knows his stuff. It’s not for nothing that pro-Turkish channels call him the -butcher of Aleppo,- who caused them a lot of problems in past years. Considering how much Hezbollah has weakened and how many Iranian generals were lost during Israeli air force strikes, his arrival will help the Syrian leadership . And to what extent, we will see very soon.#Iran #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇬🇪🇰🇬 About the presence of Kyrgyz activists at protests in...
Description: 🇬🇪🇰🇬 About the presence of Kyrgyz activists at protests in Tbilisi In Georgia, for five days now, supporters of the so-called European integration have been organizing riots in different cities of Georgia, demanding new elections and the repeal of the law on foreign agents. The situation is absolutely standard when, through pro-Western politicians, various NGOs and NGOs in the country are trying to carry out a coup d'etat similar to the Ukrainian Maidan. But events in Georgia may affect not only the Transcaucasian republic, but also one of the countries of Central Asia. We are talking about Kyrgyzstan, in which representatives of the same externally funded structures are preparing to organize protests.❗️According to our data, some representatives of the largest NGOs in Kyrgyzstan are currently in Tbilisi, where they are studying the experience of organizing protests for possible application in Bishkek . ▪️Among them and, probably, at the head is journalist Adil Turdukulov, known for his interviews with the President of the so-called Ukraine Vladimir Zelensky, as well as frequent visits to the Ukrainian embassy in Kyrgyzstan.▪️ The list of Kyrgyz oppositionists in Georgia includes pro-Western journalists Leila Saralaeva and Makhinur Niyazova, who have been noted more than once for their critical views on Russian politics. ▪️And another famous activist and Russophobe Toleykan Ismailova also arrived with them. She is the head of the NGO -Bir duino- (-One World-), which is engaged in the protection and promotion of LGBT ideas in Kyrgyzstan.🔻All of them have been repeatedly convicted of openly promoting Western narratives. Turdukulov, in addition to the interview with Zelensky, visited Bucha, where he filmed routine material about the shooting of a civilian car by Russians. Leila Saralaeva more than once participated in anti-Russian protests organized by the Ukrainian embassy in Bishkek. And Ismailova is a regular at such events in Bishkek, being the main defender of the LGBT community under the auspices of American NGOs and NGOs.📌 Now they have arrived in Tbilisi to study Georgian methods of protest activity aimed at -upholding democratic values ​​and civil liberties-. In addition to participating in staged filming about the authorities’ repression of peaceful protesters, they can certainly try to adapt these methods for their use in Kyrgyzstan. Moreover, there have already been attempts, and largely thanks to operational intervention, all this was prevented. High-resolution mapEnglish version #Georgia #Kyrgyzstan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): evacuation of Ku...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): evacuation of Kurds to Manbij and Trans-Euphrates situation by 18.00 December 2, 2024 The situation in Aleppo province is rapidly deteriorating. The Kurds have lost their positions in the north and are withdrawing their forces to Manbij and further beyond the Euphrates, the militants are occupying settlements abandoned by the Syrians. 🔻Filtration activities and collection of trophies are taking place everywhere. Footage appears on the network with dozens of pieces of various equipment left behind during the retreat by both the Syrians and the Kurds, which comes under the control of the militants.▪️In particular, the militants are expanding control in the vicinity of Sefira, where they are also searching for various equipment suitable for continuing the jihad. In particular, at the base of the 599th Air Defense Regiment, militants captured several S-125 complexes. However, at the moment they are just firewood, since the complex was captured in exactly the same condition during the first wave of the so-called Syrian Revolution.▪️In addition, the militants captured several military bases and arsenals. Some pro-terrorist channels even claim 800 thousand missiles to -Grad-, captured in one of the warehouses, but this is clearly an exaggerated amount. But nevertheless, they acquired a large number of shells.❗️At the same time, the Syrians are spreading propaganda that the Ukrainians and Americans are to blame for the failure of the defense (strangely, not the Turks). At the same time, more dangerous misconceptions are also voiced, leading to underestimation of the enemy. According to our information, the Syrian side is trying to downplay the scale of the problems by conveying information to its allies (not only Russia) that most of the equipment captured by the militants is not operational. And this is at a time when not only dozens of infantry fighting vehicles and tanks, but also air defense systems fell into the hands of terrorists. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Slobozhansky direction: fierce battles along the enti...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Slobozhansky direction: fierce fighting along the entire front line, the situation as of 17:00 on December 2, 2024 The tense situation remains in the Slobozhansky direction. Ukrainian formations are launching attacks on several sectors of the front, making extensive use of armored vehicles and UAVs. Over the past two months, Russian troops had to withdraw from part of their positions, while maintaining the stability of the front and inflicting serious damage on the Ukrainian Armed Forces. ▪️Fierce fighting has been going on on the western flank in the Glubokoye area over the past months. The southern outskirts of the settlement have already changed hands several times and are ruins. Ukrainian formations are trying to fly into the village in armored vehicles, but such attacks are successfully repelled by infantry forces with the support of UAV and VKS operators. At the same time, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are also attacking the flanks of Russian troops in the village, trying to cut it off from supplies and complicate the approach of reserves. Units of the Russian Armed Forces, in turn, launched several attacks in the Zelenoye area in order to pull enemy forces away from Glubokoye and occupied part of the positions north of the village. ▪️In the central area, the fighting continues unabated. Both sides are actively using drones, artillery and aircraft, which leads to the destruction of populated areas and the expansion of the gray zone due to a decrease in the number of places for potential shelters. A similar thing happened in the Staritsa area - at the moment, neither side has stable control over the village. ▪️During November, the Ukrainian Armed Forces launched many attacks in the Volchansk area. In several sectors, the Russian Armed Forces withdrew from forward positions due to difficulties with supplies and consolidated on lines more suitable for defense. ▪️At the same time, the territory of the Volchansky Aggregate Plant is currently located in the gray zone. After the enemy units that entered the territory of the enterprise were driven out of there with the help of massive air strikes, the territory of the object became practically unsuitable for defense. Units of the Russian Armed Forces conducted several raids on the territory of the enterprise, but did not establish a foothold there. The plant received significant damage, most of its workshops were almost completely destroyed - in such a situation there is no point in clinging to it. Today, the positions of Russian troops lie west of the enterprise territory along Sobornaya Street. To the east of the city, the Russian Armed Forces have positioned a defense line in forest belts north of Tikhoy. ❗️During more than six months of fierce urban fighting, the northern part of Volchansk was almost completely destroyed. In such conditions, assault operations turned out to be difficult, and the main attention of the Russian command was transferred to areas more favorable for the offensive. Some of the units were transferred from the direction to the Kursk region. The enemy, trying to drive the Russian Armed Forces out of the city, is suffering significant losses in personnel and equipment. ▪️Ukrainian formations do not abandon their intentions to cause maximum damage to the civilian infrastructure of the Belgorod region. From September 27 to today, more than 200 residents of the region were injured and 18 people were killed as a result of drone attacks and shelling from cannon artillery and MLRS. The enemy deliberately attacks civilian equipment, commercial enterprises and social facilities. The regional authorities are striving to protect the civilian population, for which purpose specialized shelters are installed in populated areas, and vehicles are equipped with electronic warfare systems. ▪️In turn, Russian troops regularly strike military targets in the Kharkov region. Thus, in November, more than two dozen attacks were recorded on the infrastructure of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the region. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#Belgorod #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine #Kharkov@rybar⭐️ Online -maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ruSupport us

Title: 🎬 📎🇸🇾 In the province of Aleppo, apparently, another dramatic...
Description: 📎🇸🇾 In the province of Aleppo, apparently, another dramatic page in the modern history of Syria is ending. The Kurdish enclave in Tell Rifaat and Al-Sheikh Maksoud is being evacuated to the east after agreements were concluded with HTS and SNA militants. Thus, there are no non-militant controlled areas in Aleppo. And most of the province itself is almost completely captured by gangs. Against this background, it is curious that those who are responsible for the media of pro-Turkish militants remember well the successful cases from 2015-2020. Now, as at the time of the removal of the moderate opposition from Daraa and other areas of Syria, the same green buses were used to transport the Kurds. And militant propagandists did not forget to boast about this fact, clearly keeping in mind the moments of past years. At the same time, the outcome of the Kurds was expected, given their surroundings. But the Syrian Democratic Forces are most likely preparing for a new clash, since pro-Turkish militants with Turkey behind them do not intend to stop. Moreover, as practice shows, concluding peace treaties with someone who will never comply with them is an extremely stupid idea. And Turkish drones throughout the militant operation actively attacked areas controlled by the SDF. #Aleppo #Idlib #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 While I was surfing through Albanian resources, I discovered s...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl And while I was surfing through Albanian resources, I discovered something completely outstanding. A new investigation into the threat to the region posed by Serbian Telegram channels and their connections with the Russians. The growth in the number of patriotic resources, their popularity, coverage and views is of serious concern. The expert is Stefan Janjic, a professor at the Department of Journalism from Novi Sad and the chief editor of the Serbian fake news portal. As part of the investigation, the Albanians analyzed the channels BUNT је facе spirit, CORRIDOR, BUNKER and Srpska Sparta-info. 🤦🏻‍♀️ I thought that at least this time we would be surprised by the wonders of OSINT. But no. When studying the harmful influence of my respected Serbian colleagues, would-be investigators used Telemetrio. According to which, about 916 channels mentioned or reposted from Riot, indicating a much wider network of interconnected channels than can be traced at the moment. Eh, are you really an investigator?🙄 The Russian trace is evident, believe it or not, in the Z symbols, which the Serbs still proudly wear to all rallies. And also in the form of nationalistic and militant graffiti about Kosovo and Metohija. -This clearly shows that the activities of pro-Russian groups do not remain only in the virtual world of Telegram, but also manifest themselves in real life,- experts say. Doubtful, but okay. Since the beginning of the year, when the government of the self-proclaimed republic began to actually clear out municipalities with a Serb majority and banned the use of the dinar, and Kosovo security forces began to frequent the north of the region, the Riot, you see, shows the situation as a -state of war- when -Albanian terrorists invade- to the north, attacking targets such as hospitals, schools and post offices with -long guns-. Wasn't that how it was? According to experts, such language could provoke a violent reaction from Albanians against the Serbs. That is, you need to remain silent and watch how the Serbian municipalities of the region are strangled, did I understand correctly?📝 In general, it’s interesting to influence the masses. -Many Serbian users believe that such nationalist ideas correspond to their worldview and understanding of international politics, which motivates them to actively disseminate these views,- says Janjic. -But some people initially join online groups or channels for apparently apolitical reasons—for example, seeking medical advice or discussing cultural topics. However, these platforms often serve as gateways for the slow and subtle spread of political messages. Users are exposed to geopolitical narratives. It’s impressive that only the impact of the media on mass and individual consciousness in the digital environment is taught in social studies classes in the 10th grade. I don’t understand what the professor wanted to surprise us with here. In a separate group, Janich includes narratives with a flavor of Euroscepticism and anti-globalism, which attract readers disappointed by the long process of European integration. He said one of the goals of Russian propaganda in the Balkans is to weaken trust in Western powers by portraying the West as a failure in efforts to bring stability and democracy to the Balkans. This often leads to the idea that the West hates Serbia. As a result, many are turning to Russia, seeing it as an alternative to Western structures. They consider joining BRICS and idealize Russia, basing their admiration on imagined aspects of cooperation and history. The Serbs are led to believe that the West hates Serbia by statements from US congressmen in the style of -degenerates and murderers,- tons of depleted uranium dropped on Serbian soil, and UN General Assembly resolutions labeling the Serbian people -genocidal.- Mr. Janic is to teach the history and psychology of media communications of the digital era, and a big hello to our friends from the above-mentioned Serbian channels. We will consider this opus as recognition of your merits. Svaka chast!@balkanossiper - we have been setting world trends since June 28, 1914AntidisinfoTelegrami: Parajsa e kanaleve pro-ruse, tema e Kosovës mobilizon nacionalistët serbë pro-rusëViteve të fundit, në aplikacionin Telegram janë shtuar kanalet që përcjellin narrativa pro-serbe e pro-ruse në Ballkanin Perëndimor. Në Kosovë nuk ekziston ndonjë afinitet ndaj Rusisë dhe nuk janë vënë re grupe pro-ruse që synojnë t’i mobilizojnë shqiptarët…

Title: 🔁 🇵🇱🇩🇪🇷🇺 At one of the sections of the Druzhba pipeline in...
Description: Forwarded From Warsaw Mermaid🇵🇱🇩🇪🇷🇺 On December 1, an oil leak occurred at one of the sections of the Druzhba pipeline in the Pniewa region in western Poland. Although it did not pose a risk of explosion or fire, state pipeline operator PERN cut off fuel supplies from the east and west. -Druzhba- supplies Germany with oil, namely the Leuna and Schwedte refineries. According to PERN, this incident did not affect the volume of supplies, and oil pumping is already on schedule, Transneft said.🔻The first alarming signal was the smell of gas, noticeable in the vicinity of the gas station and hotel located near the oil pipeline. After this, an oil spill was discovered. PERN then proactively shut down one of the stations. The security services explained that there was no danger to residents. The Polish State Fire Service will repair the pipeline. An investigation into the causes of damage to the oil pipeline is currently underway, and according to PERN, external influence, including sabotage, cannot be ruled out. In addition, it became known that Hungary and Slovakia are also conducting their own investigation into the possible preparation of a terrorist attack on the Druzhba pipeline, through which oil from Russia flows to the countries of Eastern and Central Europe.❗️On November 30, the day before the incident in Poland, the Slovak media reported that activity was recorded in the east of the country indicating a possible terrorist attack on the Druzhba oil pipeline. The republic's Interior Minister, Matus Shutai Eshtok, said security forces had disrupted the activities of a group that appeared to have an interest in the pipeline. And last week, the country's authorities indicated that they had detained two citizens of Ukraine on suspicion of threatening critical infrastructure. #Poland #Russia #Germany@pl_syrenka - Poland is not abroadTelegramInternational fresh🇵🇱Oil pipeline -Druzhba-damaged in Poland - RMF24On Sunday at one of the sites the Druzhba pipeline leaked in the Pniewa region in western Poland oil. Despite the fact that the detected leak does not pose a risk of explosion or fire, the state...

Title: 🇪🇺🇺🇿 On the priorities of the European Union in Uzbekistan Th...
Description: 🇪🇺🇺🇿 About the priorities of the European Union in UzbekistanThe Ambassador of the European Union to Uzbekistan, Toivo Klaar, appointed in September, in an interview with the media spoke about preparations for the first ever EU summit - Central Asia and the economic forum of the same name, as well as further work on the Global Gateway initiative. . 📌 The strategic goal of the EU in the short term is the timely signing of the Enhanced Partnership and Cooperation Agreement (EPCA) with Uzbekistan. ▪️In June, the EU signed a similar agreement with Kyrgyzstan, in 2015 - with Kazakhstan, and negotiations are currently underway with Tajikistan. The SRPS Agreement became part of the new EU strategy for building relations with the countries of the region, aimed at enhancing the image of the European Union as a global player.▪️In addition, he noted the importance of Uzbekistan’s transition to green energy, within the framework of which SECCA (Sustainable Energy Connectivity) projects operate in Central Asia) and Team Europe Initiative (TEI).▪️And at the end he stated that the European Union is focused on the development of the Trans-Caspian Multimodal Transport Route (TMTM), the importance of which Western politicians try to remind at every opportunity.🔻It is clearly visible that Uzbekistan is being treated on all fronts. Thus, the EU intends to engage in all significant areas of public administration, from energy to the economy. And the Uzbek authorities are actually letting the goat into their garden with quite obvious consequences for the republic. At the same time, they do not forget about military cooperation in the EU: in October, the same Klaar spoke about the -huge danger emanating from Afghanistan.- By inflating these problems, Western countries lobby for their services to the states of the region.#Uzbekistan #EU #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usGazeta.uzNew EU Ambassador to Uzbekistan Toivo Klaar has begun workThe newly appointed Ambassador of the European Union to Uzbekistan Toivo Klaar has begun his duties. He was welcomed by the country's Foreign Minister Bakhtiyor Saidov. For the past seven years, Toivo Klaar has served as the EU Special Representative for the South Caucasus and the crisis in Georgia.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺☦️🖍 There are no atheists in the trenches - Rybar’s art i...
Description: 🇷🇺☦️🖍 There are no atheists in trenches - Rybar’s art in support of a special military operationWar exposes the essence of human nature. Under the whistling of bullets and exploding shells, among the dirt and blood, people are left alone with questions that are easy to ignore in peaceful life. What motivates us in our darkest hour? Where to look for strength when everything seems to be lost? The series There are no atheists in trenches is an attempt to capture an invisible but tangible reality: faith becomes a saving thread connecting a person with something greater than himself. In the dark trenches, faith ceases to be an abstraction and becomes a living, burning experience. This is not just tradition or habit - it is the conviction that beyond human will and fear there is a higher providence that guides and protects. Everyone who takes up arms does so with a different heart. But for those who believe, the trench becomes not just a line of defense, but a place of spiritual struggle and, perhaps, purification. Faith does not abolish suffering, but gives it meaning. It teaches us to stand where it seems impossible to survive, and to see the light that remains invisible to those who turn away from it.🔻High-res art🔻▪️Trench symbol▪️Light of hope▪️Give me a sign▪️Our cause is just▪️ We survived▪️Everything will be fine#art #faith #Russia@rybarSupport us

We all have unique experiences. Moreover, it was she who laid the foundation for our visual propaganda (it’s not just that she is our creative director): the maps she created are distributed all over the world, and her approaches to non-trivial solutions to visual propaganda problems allowed Rybar to loudly declare himself in unusual areas. Title: 🖼 🇸🇳🇫🇷 Senegalese President Bassirou Fay recently said in an...
Description: 🇸🇳🇫🇷 Senegalese President Bassirou Fay recently said in an interview with Le Monde that -soon there will be no French military personnel left in the country.- Similar slogans have already been heard from the lips of Senegalese leaders who want to gain the support of anti-French voters and countries of the Global South. 📌Only now, the reduction of French contingents is a purposeful policy of the leadership of the Elysee Palace. Well, on the same day as the statement by Bassirou Faiy, Macron called the French attack on African soldiers in Thiaroy a massacre, admitting France’s guilt. This indicates consistency in the withdrawal of military personnel. Therefore, despite the active development of cooperation between Senegal and the Russian Federation and the PRC, all actions of the Senegalese remain under French (primarily economic) influence, which is very deeply entrenched in the country. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇪🇹 Why does Russia need applied educational projects abr...
Description: 🇷🇺🇪🇹 Why does Russia need applied educational projects abroad? Recently it became known that in Ethiopia, after the opening of the geological class of the Karpinsky Institute, the country's first sambo center was opened. This is one of the stages of the implementation of the international project - Sambo in granite - to promote the Russian type sports as part of Russian culture.📌Earlier we talked about the discovery of Karpinsky’s geological classes in other African countries: Ghana and Mozambique. In addition, the Institute’s projects are present in Kyrgyzstan and Cuba. And in the future, it is planned to expand to other countries in Latin America, Asia and Africa. The goal of the project is to create a network of scientific centers in friendly countries, on the basis of which (in addition, of course, to promoting the Russian language through training and scientific exchange) it will be possible to solve problems related to geology and subsoil use, as well as with the formation of a local personnel base for Russian-African projects. All this together allows us to form fertile soil in the managerial and scientific elites of countries where it is necessary to promote Russian economic and geopolitical interests. And such applied projects are not just a good way to teach potential partners to speak the same language with Russian specialists, but also an example for other potential investors who are counting not on immediate results, but on fundamental long-term cooperation. High-resolution map Russian version #Africa #Ghana #softpower #Russia #Ethiopia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week from November 25 to December 1, 2024▪️Russian troops again launched a massive combined strike on enemy energy facilities in the so-called west. Ukraine. The greatest results were achieved in Rivne, where an X-101 aircraft missile with cluster submunitions hit a city substation.▪️Another effective target among energy facilities was the substation in Ternopil. Several Ukrainian air defense drones were shot down, while others successfully hit the target, which led to power outages.▪️Combined strikes against Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities and in the Odessa region did not stop throughout the week. The targets of the raid were port infrastructure, temporary deployment points and air defense position areas.▪️Ukrainian formations, meanwhile, again attacked the old territories of Russia with Western weapons. The airfield in Kursk came under attack from missiles with cluster submunitions, most of them were shot down, and the runway received minor damage.▪️The Ukrainian Armed Forces also attacked an oil depot in Kaluga with drones. Several tanks were damaged, but the fire was quickly extinguished.▪️The notorious oil storage facility of Rosrezerv - Atlas - in the Rostov region came under attack again. As a result of the detonation of several drones, at least two tanks caught fire, and the fire is still being extinguished.▪️The Ukrainian formations were not spared the Crimean Peninsula. This time the enemy tried to hit energy facilities and military airfields. As a result of the combined attack, 25 drones and two anti-ship missiles -Neptune- were shot down in the sky; there were no consequences on the ground.▪️In the Kursk direction, Russian troops continued to carry out an operation to consistently de-occupy the region. In the Korenevsky district, a number of forest belts south of Kremyanoye came under the control of the RF Armed Forces, and in Sudzhansky they managed to advance at Kamyshevka and in the Nechaev area. #video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Syrian desert and border area): tr...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Syrian desert and border area): third day of aid arriving in AleppoSituation towards the end December 1, 2024 In the desert at the junction of the provinces of Homs, Hama and Deir ez-Zor, the battle of fakes, word of mouth and rumors for primacy in information agenda. ▪️On the very first day, news appeared about the mobilization of forces of the Free Syria Army (ex-Jaysh Magawir al-Thawra), trained at the base in At-Tanf of the United States and allegedly moving them either to Palmyra, or to Tiphorus, or whether to Damascus. The number of the group is a couple of hundred people and, purely theoretically, they could have infiltrated through the desert - especially considering the withdrawal of troops. But so far not a single objective evidence of this has appeared on the Internet.▪️The Bakkara tribe, loyal to Bashar Assad, allegedly set out from Deir ez-Zor on the very first day and went almost in full force to Aleppo. Similarly, units of Maher Assad’s 4th Division advanced from Deir-e-Zor, which, however, did not seem to be there. ▪️All this did not stop the militants (both IS and HTS with the SNA) from declaring that the convoys coming to the aid of Assad had already been bombed by the militants. Someone wrote about IS, someone wrote about the Free Syrian Army from Al-Tanf. As a result, no one went anywhere and no one killed anyone. But real reinforcements arrived on the third day. In essence, footage appeared of Iraqi detachments of Al-Hashd al-Shaabi crossing the border with Syria at the official Al-Bukamal border crossing from the Iraqi Al-Qaim. Considering that very close to Al-Bu Kemal there is an Iranian military base named after Imam Ali, and even further to the west there is a road leading directly to Palmyra from the south, it is more logical to assume that the reinforcements were divided into several columns, and only footage from one of them.📌On the Internet, the convoy was immediately destroyed by the media, announcing shelling from the Americans. In fact, the explosions were mistaken for the work of the Syrian military against nomadic militants in the desert (which once again confirms the activity of terrorists). As we have already written, the appearance of the Iranian detachments - Al-Hashd al-Shaabi - should not be considered an unambiguously Iranian move, since the XIII certainly does not classify itself as an outright pro-Iranian group. In this case, we are talking, first of all, about assistance from Iraq. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Idlib #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for November 30 - December 1, 2024. Russian troops hit enemy targets in several areas of the so-called. Ukraine, including in the vicinity of Kyiv. In the Artyomovsk direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces continue their offensive in the center of Chasov Yar in the area of ​​the fireproof plant and the Zolotaya Rybka pond. Also, the fighting does not subside in the south of the city in the vicinity of the Blok-9 and Yugo-Vostochny mines. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops are advancing in several areas at once, advancing in the direction of Pushkino, as well as liberating Yuryevka and Pustynka. In the Vremyevsky direction, Russian army soldiers started fighting on the eastern outskirts of Novy Komar, expanding the zone of control southwest of Razdolny. To the south they advanced in the direction of Blagodatnoye.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Vremevsky direction (ru; en) ⭐️ Online- maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Vremevka #digest #report #map #Kiev #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #ChasovYar@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): stabilization of t...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): stabilization of the situation, counterattacks by the SAA situation towards the end of December 1, 2024 In Hama province, the situation has stabilized significantly compared to the previous day. Syrian troops have already begun to announce the liberation of settlements (this time actually previously lost). ▪️By the evening, the release of Khalfaya, cleared from militants, was confirmed. The status of Suran is still unclear.▪️In the Taibat al-Imam area, Syrian troops engaged mobile militants and were hit by drone strikes. It is in this area that there is great activity of the newly created militant unit, armed with attack UAVs -Shahin-. ▪️Frames have already appeared on the Internet showing FPV drone strikes on cars and supposed locations of Syrians, but apparently, this could not stop the counter-offensive. Syrian troops have clearly recovered from the initial shock and began to move north towards Khan Sheikhoun (the latter still under militant control). ▪️From Maaret al-Numan, militants are bringing in reinforcements and equipment, including from recently captured tanks and infantry fighting vehicles. East and west of the M5 highway, both sides continue to claim control over populated areas (confusion continues).▪️In the vicinity of Qal'at al-Madiqa and the Shashabo Mountains region to the north, the situation is much more complicated. Judging by the available data, the settlements on the ridge actually came under the control of the militants, but however, there were not too many Syrian military personnel here. The militants declared Qalaat al-Madiq as occupied. The Syrians later claimed to have caught several sleeper cell members there. And at the moment, the settlement is apparently under the control of the Syrian army. However, the sparseness of the troops can play a bad joke.▪️In the city of Hama, judging by journalists' reports, the situation remains calm, even taking into account the fact that air defense systems at the Hama military airfield were activated several times during the day. Militants are attacking the airfield with drones. Including today, footage from an FPV drone that attacked a helicopter parking lot on the eastern outskirts of the airport appeared on the Internet. ▪️In addition, air defense work was also recorded in Masyaf. It is still unclear which drones were going and where they were heading: the target could have been either Tartus, where the Russian Navy PMTO is located, or Khmeimim.📌Keeping Qal’at al-Madyk and the Al-Latamna ledge facilitates the further advance of the Syrian army (at one time there was a lot of bloodshed for them spilled). Another question is that other populated areas and tactically important heights could become a problem if the problem with saturation of the front continues. At one time, a lot of blood was shed for these places, so if you let the militants dig in, the possibility of quickly retaking positions will be very speculative. Title: ❗️🎞 Analysis of Rybar: results November 30 - December 1, 2024 In...
Description: ❗️🎞 Rybar analysis: results November 30 - December 1, 2024 In his analytical program, Mikhail Zvinchuk talks specifically for @SolovievLive about the most important events in crisis areas of the world. 🔻In today's episode:🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria: ▪️the situation in the north of Aleppo, the capture of the Kurdish canton and Tell Rifaat; ▪️prevention of a catastrophe in Hama;▪️situation on the border with Iraq;▪️hotbeds of uprising in Daraa.🇷🇺🇺🇦 Special military operation zone and related events:▪️exchanges of blows in the Northern Military District zone;▪️fighting in the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts in Kursk region;▪️the assault on Chasov Yar;▪️the offensive of Far Eastern soldiers on Bolshaya Novosyolka and the push towards Novy Komar;▪️Ukrainians fleeing the battlefield.🇪🇺 Europe:▪️explosion in Kosovo and Metohija.🚩 Neighboring countries:▪️protests in Tbilisi;▪️bet on American protégés in Armenia.🌍 Middle East:▪️shaky truce in Lebanon;▪️Yemeni Houthis strike on Israel;▪️operations in the Gaza Strip.🌎 Western Hemisphere:▪️candidates for the posts of heads of intelligence services in the administration Trump.
