Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 The offensive of militants in northwestern Syria: the...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in northwestern Syria: the advance of illegal armed groups in the western part of Aleppowhat is known by the end of November 29, 2024 At the end of the day, anti-government formations managed to expand the zone of control and gain a foothold in the western part of Aleppo. From time to time, footage surfaces in which militants declare their presence in various areas of the city. The groups place an important emphasis on propaganda in order to reduce the already low morale of the SAR Armed Forces: this is facilitated by both the seizure of those areas that survived the 2016 campaign and and minute-by-minute injections into the Network of messages about the taking of more and more new positions.🔻Aleppo Province: And although even a time earlier the terrorists -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- (HTS) and allied groups managed to enter the western quarters of Aleppo (especially the Rashidin-4 area), information about the beginning of the main stage of the offensive in the city appeared a little later. This is connected with the capture of the settlements of Bashkatin by jihadists, Kafr Dail, and then Mansur, from where they entered the western part of the city, expanding the zone of control in the New Aleppo neighborhoods, Al-Shuhada and Al-Furqan. Among the objects taken was the Scientific Research Institute. It is worth noting the appearance of footage in which the presence of members of illegal armed groups was recorded in the northern and eastern parts of Aleppo. In fact, these turned out to be sleeper cells of militants, who, most likely, after reporting from the scene of the event, soon retreated from there🔻As for the northern part of Aleppo province, the expected ground operation of the Turkish Armed Forces against the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) and the offensive of the pro-Turkish factions -Syrian National Army- (SNA) on Tell Rifaat and Menbij have not yet begun. Periodic announcements SNA groups about increasing combat readiness have already become an object of ridicule. And the pop-up footage of large columns of moderates heading supposedly to support the Islamists in Aleppo, apparently, did not go beyond the Internet. However, this should not be discounted - now is the time to attack enclaves controlled by Kurdish militias perfect. Syrian troops are forced to focus on the defense of the administrative center of the province, while the SDF are left virtually alone in the face of Turkish aggression.🔻Idlib Province: As for the events near Saraqib in eastern Idlib, here government troops represented by the 25th special forces division are more or less holding out. It is not yet possible to determine the exact configuration of the front due to the fact that much less objective control footage is coming from this area. At the moment, it is possible to confirm the presence of militants in Dadiha, Talhia, Abu Kanis and Tell Karatina. Clashes are taking place in the area of ​​Khan al-Subl and Maaret Dibsana, from where, if successful, they try to advance to Tell Mardikh, where a hill is located, control over which will strengthen the combat capabilities of the illegal armed forces. High resolution mapEnglish version #Aleppo #digest #Idlib #map #Syria @rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 I saw that there are ongoing debates online about whether or n...
Description: Forwarded From Older than Edda I saw that there are ongoing debates online about whether or not the soldiers can be blamed for shooting at our reconnaissance drones, so I’ll probably add to what was said yesterday. First and most importantly, the personnel must be provided with information about how Leleka differs from Superkam, and Zala from Furia. This is easy to explain, the differences are very significant and even the dumbest can understand and remember them. Second. Air defense is always notified about all flights, I won’t say how and how they do this, but the system is clear, simple and reliable, although friendly fires do happen, but again due to mistakes on the ground. It makes no sense to comment on the fact that we were not warned by radio; to do so given the saturation of the first, second, third and subsequent lines of defense, as well as the number of rear areas and, most importantly, the number of units using reconnaissance UAVs (there are many of them and others), physically impossible, I’m talking at least about GrV -North-, because even though I’m a couch potato blogger, I’m still somewhat familiar with their system. Let me summarize. There is a completely rational and sensible system for identifying reconnaissance UAVs, that is, a direct and convenient communication channel has been established between air defense and air reconnaissance units. Everything else is work with personnel. A Supercam/Zala/Scat/Albatross landing is very clearly visible, it is radically different from enemy UAVs, and only a complete idiot can shoot at it (if the command has received information about the differences in the contours of the UAV). Moreover, all this shooting usually happens not at the front line, but 8-10 kilometers from it, where all these anti-aircraft gunners are sitting and pouring fire. Fortunately, for the most part they shoot poorly and the aircraft manages to land without damage. As for the punishment for such fire, I think it would be quite fair to make sure that the one who messed up - the anti-aircraft gunner - will replace at the forefront the one who was covered by the plane he shot down. That is, the conditional Zala could accompany the actions of Special Forces groups, could adjust artillery fire, which in turn covered either assault operations or repelled the enemy’s attack/led the CBB. Reconnaissance UAVs are the eyes of our army; without them it is blind and works by touch. Reconnaissance UAVs have difficulty -giving birth- to units who are not entitled to them according to the state, or have some other problems, turn to good people. There is a funny saying at the front: -fuck up a plane, get a machine gun.- It applies to UAV operators, but I think it would be appropriate to extend it to self-proclaimed -anti-aircraft gunners.- Yes, so that there are no misconceptions, all of the above applies to -large- UAVs; fire on FPV drones is a separate matter, and I perfectly understand those fighters who shoot at everything that flies and buzzes.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇫🇮 About the training of Finnish DRGs on forays into Rus...
Description: 🇷🇺🇫🇮 About the training of Finnish DRGs for forays into Russia. Hostile activity on the part of Finland towards us does not stop. In the coming week it will indirectly affect the Republic of Karelia. In the area of ​​​​the settlements of Kajaani and Vuosanka, the exercise -Kirves-24- will begin from tomorrow to December 4. ▪️2800 military personnel are taking part in it, including -elite- units of the Jaeger Brigade -Kainuu-, two MD-500 helicopters and an NH-90 regiment special forces -Utti- and about 600 units of military equipment. An interesting part of the exercise is the questions which Finnish military personnel plan to practice: in addition to offensive and defensive, they will play out the scenario of transferring personnel to the border with Russia.❗️ But even more important is that Finnish troops are learning to conduct an assault in small tactical groups and throw DRGs into a wooded area in the Karelian Republic. Considering the similarity of the terrain, this will not be a problem for them. This can be seen as another influence of the special operation on the nature of NATO combat training. In addition to the already obvious trends in the use of drones, the tactics of assault in small groups and the subsequent introduction of armored vehicles used by our troops are being trained. High resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Russia #Finland@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Artemovsk direction: successes of Russian troops in t...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Artemovsk direction: successes of Russian troops in the north of Chasov Yar and battles for the heights south of the city situation as of 20:00 November 29, 2024 In the Artemovsk direction, Russian troops are conducting a systematic offensive both in Chasov Yar and in its environs. Over the past month, the Russian Armed Forces managed to push through enemy defenses in several key areas and reached the approaches to the Chasovoyarsky Refractory Plant. ▪️On the northern flank in the Kalinovo sector, actions are limited to local attacks to improve the tactical position of individual units, as well as attacks on enemy positions and temporary deployment points. ▪️In the central sector of the direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from the Orlovoe tract. During a series of attacks, they managed to push the Ukrainian Armed Forces back from the territory of the abandoned Druzhba camp, and then cleared the entire forest area. At the moment, the front of the Russian troops rests on a dominant height in the north-west, as well as on a strip of land in front of the Chasovoyarovsky refractory plant in the west, which is being shot through by the enemy. ▪️The success of the actions in the Orlov tract allowed us to develop the offensive in urban development. For a long time, units of the Russian Armed Forces were sandwiched by the enemy on the territory of the destroyed Oktyabrsky microdistrict, unable to establish supplies through the Seversky Donets-Donbass canal due to the activity of enemy UAVs. Taking advantage of the confusion of the Ukrainian Armed Forces after their retreat from the tract, Russian assault groups broke through the enemy’s defenses. Advancing along Daria Skripnichenko Street with the support of armored vehicles, artillery and UAVs, they reached the southern outskirts of the refractory plant, and also reached the city park. ▪️An important defense hub for Ukrainian formations in the city is the Novy microdistrict, the supply of which goes through the Dolgoye-2 tract. Russian troops made several attempts to cling to the forest from the south in order to cut off the microdistrict from supplies. The armored groups came under concentrated fire from anti-tank weapons and UAVs and were forced to retreat. However, it recently became known that the attack aircraft still managed to occupy at least one key enemy stronghold in the north of the microdistrict, located west of the filtration station. Potentially, this could make it possible to take partial fire control over the delivery routes for ammunition and reserves running through the forest, which will create serious problems for the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison. ▪️In the south of the city, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting in the area of ​​the Blok-9 and -South-Eastern mines. The territory of the former was taken under partial control back in September, which allowed Russian troops to firmly gain a foothold on the Seversky Donets-Donbass canal. This, in turn, created the preconditions for a subsequent attack on the second mine in order to establish control over all key heights in the area. ❗️By November 12, Russian units, with the support of artillery and armored vehicles, not only knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the mine territory, but also reached the Kleban-Byk landscape park. ▪️The enemy brought reserves into battle and carried out counterattacks both in the area of ​​the landscape park and from the north, in the area of ​​the Dolgoye-2 tract. Units of the RF Armed Forces withdrew from the forest area, while at the same time preventing the Armed Forces of Ukraine from returning control over the height. Today, the mine is located in the gray zone, and there are oncoming battles in its area. ▪️On the southern flank, Russian troops knocked out Ukrainian formations from part of the positions between Kleshcheevka and Kurdyumovka. Advance groups advanced significantly to the northwest from Zelenopolye along the canal, creating a threat of encirclement of the remaining units in a small area of ​​the left bank. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#Artemovsk #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine #ChasovYar@rybarSupport us

It flew over Georgia for several hours and collected the necessary data about what was happening around. The installed ASARS-2B radar, which was equipped with the U-2S after modernization, allows this to be done at a distance of up to 300-320 km. In addition, the U-2S became one of the first American reconnaissance aircraft that were equipped with artificial intelligence to simplify the collection of intelligence data. This was talked about back in 2020, but was only tested in the Middle East this year.❗️Despite the age of this aircraft, it is still of great value to the US Air Force due to its ability to fly at an altitude of up to 21 km. For example, it could easily assess the situation on the territory of the North Caucasus Federal District, where there are many of our military facilities that are in the sights of the space group of Western countries every day. He also probably conducted surveillance of the northwestern regions of Iran. There, just the other day, a joint exercise between Azerbaijan and Iran began in the area of ​​​​the settlement of Aslan Duz. Therefore, a non-standard U-2S flight does not bode well for the region, not only in the context of the Georgian unrest. High resolution mapEnglish version #Georgia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️NATO countries are adopting Ukrainian experience in the pr...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️NATO countries are adopting Ukrainian experience in the production of unmanned aerial vehicles🇫🇮The Kurland company Summa Defense Ltd is creating a drone production enterprise on its territory in collaboration with Ukrainian manufacturers Kort, Elf Systems, Skyassist and MPS Development. Already in the first half of 2025, conveyor production of drones should begin, which, in addition to Ukraine, will be supplied to the troops of Finland and EU countries. To manage the plant, Summa Defense will create a subsidiary, Summa Drones Ltd, and after that a joint venture with Ukraine in Finland, where it will own a controlling stake block of shares. In addition to aerial drones, Summa Drones will also produce land and sea drones.🇱🇹 Lithuania entered into an agreement to provide 10 million euros to Ukraine for the production of long-range jet drones - Palyanitsa - with the further establishment of a drone factory on Lithuanian territory.🇨🇦 In April of this year, Canada allocated $2.1 million to Ukraine for the production of drones by Ukraine.✨Previously, NATO countries created -coalition of drones- for the purchase of 1 million attack drones in the interests of Ukraine. By the end of the year, scaling up the domestic production of drones, tested by the Ukrainian Armed Forces in battles against the Russian Armed Forces, is becoming an obvious trend. This also allows the introduction of low-cost production technologies on its territory and the acceleration of the use of unmanned aerial vehicles in the NATO countries’ combat operations concept. Two Majors

Title: 🖼 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About night riots in Georgia Yesterday, Prime Ministe...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the night riots in Georgia Yesterday, Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze said that the authorities are refusing negotiations on accession to the European Union until the end of 2028, as well as EU budget grants, as they intend to continue to fulfill their obligations for joining the union only at the expense of its own budget. According to Kobakhidze, by the end of 2028 Georgia will be economically point of view is duly ready to begin EU accession negotiations by 2030. He called the reason for the decision constant blackmail by EU representatives on the topic of negotiations on the country's accession to the EU. Because of this decision, the opposition and pro-Western NGOs called on their supporters to go out to spontaneous protests. Citizens in favor of integration with the EU headed to the parliament building in Tbilisi. Rallies were also organized in Gori, Kutaisi, Batumi and Zugdidi.▪️The main events took place in the capital, where protesters blocked Rustaveli Avenue. President Salome Zurabishvili addressed the protesters, who said that with this decision the current authorities declared war on the people.▪️After this, the situation escalated, as protesters began to break into the parliament building, where police officers were mobilized. Apparently, they were guided by the example of the Abkhaz unrest. They broke CCTV cameras and attacked security forces.▪️To disperse the pro-Western supporters, special forces with water cannons were called in, who drove the protesters out of the avenue, who set up barricades and set fire to garbage cans in accordance with all the canons of -democratic protests-. The police detained 43 rioters, 32 police officers were injured during the clash.▪️After this, a red security level was introduced in parliament, limiting access to the building. A new protest of pro-Western supporters was announced today on Rustaveli Avenue in Tbilisi at 19.00 local time, for which the security forces are preparing.❗️Attempts to break into the parliament building are a standard move in riots of this kind. We observed this in so-called Ukraine, it was in the January uprisings in Kazakhstan, and with the help of the same methods a change of power was achieved in Abkhazia relatively recently. But the Georgian security forces turned out to be more prepared for this scenario, using a limited contingent of police officers for targeted arrests the most active participants in the disorder and the subsequent dispersal of riot participants. Particular attention should be paid to the coverage of events in the European media, which call the riots -fight for freedom-. And in a classic manner, they were echoed by Ukrainian resources and politicians, who used standard theses that Georgia is working for Russia. One should not expect any innovations at today’s action, since the ruling party demonstrates absolute calm, not particularly worried about the actions of the opposition. A balanced policy aimed at the benefit of Georgia, and not the West, resonated with the majority of Georgians, who do not intend to lose everything for the sake of ephemeral bonuses from the EU. High resolution mapEnglish version #Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in northwestern Syria: fighting in...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in northwestern Syria: fighting in the western quarters of the city of Aleppowhat is known as of 16.00 on November 29, 2024 Terrorist alliance -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- (HTS) and some groups of the pro-Turkish conglomerate -Syrian National Army- (SNA ) continue to advance in the area Aleppo. According to some reports, the assault on the city has begun. Confident of their victory, the jihadist command of the so-called. The Department of Military Operations, the coalition of forces participating in the offensive, announced the evacuation of some areas of Aleppo. At the same time, the civilian population is leaving the city under the control of government troops.🔻Aleppo Province:▪️Anti-government forces after the capture of Khan al-Assal advanced in the western part of the city of Aleppo, in particular in the Rashidin-4 area. The Military Technical Academy named after Hafez Assad. Military personnel of the ground forces were trained there.▪️Successes of the militants were also recorded southwest of the administrative center of the province: there, members of illegal armed groups occupied several settlements, including Tell Karatin, Jop Kass, Al-Bawaibah and Qusaybiya.▪️East of the Ikard base, Islamists also were successful, capturing the settlements of Al-Eis, Tell Barna and Az-Zeitan. The target of anti-government groups was Al-Khader, in the area of ​​​​which all local roads intersect. According to preliminary data, the strategic city has already fallen.❗Meanwhile, in the north of Aleppo province, Turkish-backed Syrian National Army groups are still preparing to attack the cities of Tell Rifaat and Menbij. The Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces are stationed there, but there is also a limited presence of the Syrian Armed Forces. If pro-Turkish forces occupy Tell Rifaat, this will actually open the way for them to Nubl and Az-Zahra - Shiite enclaves located north of Aleppo. From there they will be able to start moving towards the northern part of the city of Aleppo, making the task easier for their allies in the Syrian revolution. Idlib Province: The situation in the east of Idlib is less dire. There, terrorists - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - and other factions (including those formed from foreign jihadists) set their sights on Saraqib, where the defense is held by soldiers of the 25th Special Forces Division (ex-Tiger Forces) Suheil al-Hassan. However, even in Due to the presence of units of the Syrian army that have been tested in many battles, it is not possible to talk about complete protection of the populated area. Title: 🇷🇺🇦🇲 About Vladimir Putin’s statements on the situation in Ar...
Description: 🇷🇺🇦🇲 About Vladimir Putin’s statements on the situation in Armenia and the reaction of the Armenian information field. Yesterday at the CSTO summit, Russian President Vladimir Putin separately focused on the topic of relations with Armenia. ▪️Representatives of Armenia did not come to Astana for the summit, but the day before they said in Yerevan that they did not object to the adoption of the planned documents. ▪️Putin noted that the difficult relations between Armenia and the CSTO are rather dictated by internal political processes in the republic itself. The President of the Russian Federation also responded to the claims of the Armenian authorities about the alleged inaction of the CSTO regarding the situation in Nagorno-Karabakh. The events in Karabakh have their own specifics, but are not related to the Organization, since Armenia itself never recognized the independence of the republic and did not include it in its membership. ▪️Putin believes that Armenia may in the future return to full-fledged work in the CSTO, since Yerevan did not announce its withdrawal from the Organization.🔻The main pro-government channel of Armenia predictably criticizes all theses, blaming Russia for all the troubles. The Armenian media unsuccessfully dispute the main argument that the complex relationship between Armenia and the CSTO is the result of the republic’s internal political problems. However, the rating of Nikol Pashinyan’s government is rapidly falling, and the main reason is the events in Karabakh and the problem of refugees. Yerevan did not recognize the independence of the republic until recently and denied the presence of the Armenian military there. Pashinyan does not recognize the Karabakh government in exile and is not ready to fight for the release of the military-political leadership of the republic from Azerbaijani prisons. And all because they will find authority in Armenian society and pose a threat to its power. To justify the internal crisis, it is easier to find an external reason, so the shadow falls on the Russian Federation and the CSTO. In addition, Pashinyan’s policy is greatly influenced by Americans and Europeans, for whom ousting the Russian Federation from Transcaucasia is their main goal. Anti-Russian rhetoric is the key to continued Western support for Pashinyan, including by pouring funds into his team. At the same time, Yerevan has so far softened the rhetoric regarding the CSTO, although back in September Pashinyan stated that the Organization allegedly threatens the security of the republic. After the American elections, the Armenian authorities took a wait-and-see attitude, not least of which is the warming of relations between the Russian Federation and Georgia. So far, Pashinyan is trying to sit on two chairs: trade turnover between the countries is reaching record numbers, but politically in Yerevan they are trying to distance themselves. #Armenia #CSTO #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇰🇿🇺🇦 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a press conference at the CSTO summit in Astana. 🔻Foreign policy: ▪️Russia and Kazakhstan can increase cooperation in nuclear energy. ▪️Russia and Kazakhstan need to do everything to strengthen...

Title: 🇨🇳🇯🇵 Chinese and Japanese authorities continue to try to redu...
Description: 🇨🇳🇯🇵 Chinese and Japanese authorities continue to try to reduce the degree of tension in relations. This week, a business delegation from Japan arrived in Beijing, where they met with Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng. During the negotiations, the Chinese politician expressed hope that Japanese business circles will further deepen cooperation with China. And the representative of Japan stated the need to overcome difficulties in bilateral relations. And although Japanese businessmen visit Beijing and other Chinese cities quite often, against the backdrop of statements by the leaders of the two countries about their intentions to develop stable ties, such meetings are worth watching closely. 🔻Relations between the two countries have become quite tense over the past few years. Important reasons for this development of events were Japan's participation in the American policy of limiting the export of semiconductor equipment to China and Chinese military activity in the region. However, now, according to statements, there is a need to restore relations. First of all, according to observers, this is due to the desire of the Chinese authorities to establish contacts with American allies on the eve of the new presidential term of Donald Trump. Perhaps Beijing believes that stable bilateral ties will encourage Japanese politicians not to participate in all the anti-Chinese projects of the new president. However, it is not yet known whether such a result will be achieved, given that the policy of the authorities in Tokyo most often follows the position of the Americans. #China #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News+China shows support for Osaka Expo, vows safety for expats from JapanChinese Vice Premier He Lifeng showed support for the upcoming World Exposition in Osaka and pledged to ensure the safety of Japanese nationals in China as he met Wednesday with a business delegation from the neighboring country, the group says.

Title: 🔁🖼 North of Serakib, the situation continues to deteriorate. Mi...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBARK north of Serakib, the situation continues to deteriorate. The militants are expanding control west of the M5 highway, claiming the capture of several more settlements. More and more footage of captured equipment from the settlements taken yesterday is appearing on the Internet. Moreover, the tanks and infantry fighting vehicles are at least on the move, and at the maximum - with a full ammo, because the militants also got more than one or two warehouses.

Title: 🇬🇧🇮🇩 The new President of Indonesia continues to actively bri...
Description: 🇬🇧🇮🇩 The new president of Indonesia continues to actively bring the country to the international stage. Prabowo Subianto recently returned to Jakarta after a long trip to various countries including China, the US, the UK and Brazil. We have already written about the results of his visit to Beijing, where the parties signed an agreement regarding the South China Sea. However, another important place for the Indonesian leader was London, where he met with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer. 🔻At the negotiations, judging by the content of the joint statement, they talked about UK assistance in projects in the green energy sector. However, defense cooperation was also discussed - Prabowo and Starmer agreed to cooperate on expanding the capabilities of the Indonesian coast guard. Although this agreement was included in the section on sustainable economic development, the initiative clearly appeared in the context of the current situation in the South China Sea. Moreover, the parties plan to increase their partnership in the field of defense and security. 📌 Yes, the Indonesian president and Chinese leader Xi Jinping announced the start of resource development in the disputed waters, but this does not mean that the dispute between the countries has been resolved. Therefore, Indonesia actively accepts support from other states, even if the actions are aimed at containing China. Neutrality and balance are at the core of the foreign policy of the Jakarta authorities, and there are no prerequisites that the situation can change in any particular direction.#Great Britain #Indonesia@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usasianews.networkIndonesia President Prabowo returns from first foreign trip as presidentThe two-week journey involved visits to six countries.

Title: 🔁🖼 At night, the beast, having gained a foothold on the territo...

Several missile attacks followed in the Hamdaniya and New Aleppo areas. In the latter, track battles broke out at night. Against this background, the evacuation of area 1070 is underway. At least some of the families of SAA servicemen were removed from there.

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria: a tale of unlearned lessons and walki...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Crisis in Syria: a tale of unlearned lessons and walking on rake The collapse of the front in Aleppo province was caused by many factors. Oleg Blokhin described the situation very accurately: this always happens when pride prevails over reason, and degradation is chosen instead of development. This applies directly to the Syrian army. After the ceasefire in the spring of 2020, there was a massive -relaxation-, exacerbating previous problems. The military leadership began to revere the laurels of past victories, as if the threat of war was gone forever. There was no talk of introducing drones or correcting past mistakes - why, if they already considered themselves winners? As a result, it turned out that there was no fortification and minefields again, and the density of troops was extremely low due to -dead souls- and fake reports.🔻Part of the problems are due to the severe economic crisis. Salaries are pitiful, motivation is low, and the fighters preferred to engage in trade, subsistence farming, or looting simply to survive. However, the reason for the crisis is not only the US sanctions, but also the ruling circles in Damascus: after the ceasefire, they decided that the previous methods, in many ways, had become the cause of the civil war were true. The cleansing of the corrupt state apparatus did not happen, and the mukhabarat began to fleece the impoverished population with redoubled force. But the local elites seemed to be convinced that someone else would solve their problems, perceiving a return to the Arab League as a guarantee of investment from the Gulf countries. The entire dialogue with the same Kurds and other parties was conducted from the position of the winner in an unfinished war.📌 It ended naturally. But who said that this story is only about Syria? Of course, the scale of the disaster is incomparable. But we still have problems with fraud and ignoring reports, including on the number of personnel. So far, no one is in a hurry to solve the total failure of communication and control of troops through Telegram, Discord and Starlink (but at least the responsible officials have been sent to jail for embezzlement cases). Alas, the division of the skin of the unkilled bear continues, as well as the blind faith that some areas will be obtained for free by some overseas order. And in this, the highly wise husbands and goal-setters are helped by an army of experts, who love to explain all problems with agreements of the oligarchs.❗️The inability to learn from mistakes, pride and arrogance leads to the fact that laughter at the fleeing Syrians is replaced by tears from the footage of the fall retreat of 22 near Kharkov , clumsy attempts to declare everyone in dispersal of fakes about the invasion of Kursk region, as well as stories that -worthless-, -barefoot- and -starving people- can’t do anything. I really want to believe that the current Syrian lesson - through unpleasant pain - will be learned. #Russia #Syria@rybarSupport usTelegramOleg Blokhin

Title: 🎬 🇪🇺🇪🇸🇺🇦 Interesting news came from Spain: the police of t...
Description: 🇪🇺🇪🇸🇺🇦 Interesting news came from Spain: police in the city of Algeciaras arrested drug dealers who were transporting prohibited substances from Morocco. The nuance is that they did this with the help of Ukrainian-made drones. The drones were brought from the so-called territory. Ukraine by motor transport: judging by the video, these were devices of the VACA BSh-20 type. One UAV can carry about 10 kg of hashish over a distance of 50 km, which exceeds the width of the Strait of Gibraltar. This is one of the consequences of the drone revolution, when even relatively large drones are becoming more and more accessible. Now criminals are actively starting to use them: it all started with the smuggling of packs of cigarettes, and now we are talking about organizing drug trafficking. At the same time, it is not at all surprising that Ukrainian-made drones appear in history: as practice shows, the Kiev regime does not disdain even the most dirty deeds, just to snatch crumbs from the table. Be it open cooperation with Al-Qaeda or a service to drug traffickers. And if you remember that from 2022 with the so-called. In Ukraine, a lot of criminal elements from pickpockets to telephone scammers entered the EU uncontrollably; it was a matter of time before Ukrainians entered the top in migrant crime in some countries. And Europe is waiting for a lot, a lot of similar news.#EU #Spain #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇷🇨🇿 About the deployment of Czech military personnel in Maur...
Description: 🇲🇷🇨🇿 About the deployment of Czech military personnel in Mauritania The North Atlantic Alliance, in addition to using Hungarians for its purposes in Chad, is involving more and more Eastern European armies in Africa. Here in the Czech parliament they decided to extend the mandate for foreign operations until 2026. In addition to the standard strengthening of the presence in the Balkans and the Baltic states due to the Russian threat, the point about the deployment of 30 special forces troops in Mauritania is interesting. The reason for the deployment of military personnel is the growing illegal migration through Mauritanian territory and the possible spread of terrorist groups. But there is also an increase in Russian and Chinese influence in the Sahel.▪️Of course, the Mauritanians are showing interest in investments from Russia and China and are participating in various African forums. At the same time, the agreements concluded several years ago with the North Atlantic Alliance make it one of the key points of Western military influence in the region. This is expressed both in participation in American exercises and in frequent visits of NATO military leaders to the country. In addition, in matters of weapons, the Mauritanian army relies on Western partners.🔻NATO’s motive for sending a contingent of Czechs to the country is most likely similar to the reasons for the appearance of Hungarian military personnel in Chad. This is something of a temporary solution in the interests of the West in the country while the larger players in Washington and Paris resolve bureaucratic issues before deploying their own troops.#Africa #Mauritania #Czech Republic@rybarSupport usmocr.mo.gov.czPoslanecká sněmovna schválila působení českých vojáků v zahraničních operacích do roku 2026Poslanecká sněmovna schválila působení českých vojáků v zahraničních operacích do roku 2026. Současný charakter bezpečnostních hrozeb klade důraz i na působení českých vojáků tam, kde je to důležité pro ochranu českých občanů a pro bezpečnostní zájmy České…

Title: 🔁 🇧🇾🇪🇺 Activation of Belarusian human rights defenders on th...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇧🇾🇪🇺 Activation of Belarusian human rights activists on the eve of the presidential elections Belarusian oppositionists in exile created the so-called. -an expert mission to observe the 2025 elections, entitled -Human Rights Defenders for Free Elections- and have already released the first report on -observation- of the preparations for the elections. The authors of the initiative are the Belarusian Helsinki Committee, which is supported by EU money, and the human rights center -Viasna- . By the way, among the partners of the latter is the Bysol Foundation, which supports Belarusian mercenaries in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The organizations operate as part of a larger organization called the European platform for democratic elections, which includes pro-Western human rights organizations from countries of Eastern Europe and the former USSR. After 2020, the Belarusian oppositionists, to justify their existence during each campaign, issue similar reports in which they justify without any there are strong arguments for the undemocratic nature of the elections.❗️Such observation will not have a significant impact on the organization, conduct and results of the elections, like all previous times. However, European officials need such reports to justify restrictions and sanctions against Belarus. So after the presidential elections we should expect a new wave of sanctions against the Belarusian leadership. #Belarus #EU #foreign agents @pezdicide no chemicals - just facts It’s clear the situation before the elections * 2025. The first report of the campaign - Human Rights Defenders for Free Elections - The expert mission to observe the elections * 2025 was organized by the Belarusian Helsinki Committee and the Human Rights Center - Viasna - within the framework of the campaign - Human Rights Defenders for Free Elections. The mission collects and analyzes information about the election campaign from open sources...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 29, 2024 ▪️ The past 24 h...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of November 29, 2024▪️ The past 24 hours were characterized by a combined attack on the facilities of the military-industrial complex of Ukraine and the enemy’s energy infrastructure. There were multiple reports from the Ukrainian authorities about the loss of power to hundreds of thousands of subscribers. In total, 100 missiles of various types and 466 UAVs have been used in recent days. Yesterday - 90 missiles and 100 drones. Against this background, the Supreme Commander warned of his readiness to again use the Oreshnik IRBM in a non-nuclear version, but with an active warhead (the strike on Yuzhmash, the media reported, was -blanks-). ▪️ However, the enemy is escalating the conflict, trying to improve negotiating positions before Trump comes to power in the United States in view of the possible start of the negotiation process, which Kyiv is increasingly leaning toward, unlike Moscow. So, this night in the north-west of the Rostov region more than 30 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed. In the village of Masalovka, Kamensky district, the roof of a private house was damaged, and there was damage in Dyachkino, Tarasovsky district. In the Kamensky district, rescue units on duty are extinguishing a large fire at an industrial facility, 109 people and 38 pieces of equipment are involved. Several drones were shot down over the Bryansk and Voronezh regions.▪️ Heavy fighting is taking place in the Kursk region. The Russian Armed Forces are carrying out a fierce and bloody battle near Martynovka; they write from the ground that it is too early to talk about widespread success in this sector of the front. The group of troops -North- reports that there are advances in the village. Novoivanovka and in forests near the village. Malaya Loknya, fierce fighting is taking place near the village. Plekhovo. In the area of ​​the village In Nikolaevo-Daryino, a missile strike from the Tornado-S MLRS hit a large deployment point of UAV units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.▪️ In the Kharkov region, there are battles for every house in Volchansk (they report the liberation of four buildings in the city). The enemy is trying to transfer reserves across the river. Wolf. Fierce fighting near the village. Liptsy.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the southern part of Nelepovka to a depth of 250 meters, the enemy admits. South of Toretsk, our troops passed through a forest plantation in an area up to 1.2 km wide to a depth of up to 650 meters.▪️ From the Pokrovsky direction we are receiving data about a decisive 3 km push by our units from Petrovka to Zheltoy. ▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are consolidating on occupied lines in the Ilyinka area (south of the reservoir), battles in the Berestki area, and the ongoing battle in Kurakhovo.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front in the Orekhovsky direction, positional battles continued north of Rabotino and in the Malaya Tokmachka area. LBS without significant changes. Counter-battery fighting is underway on both sides. A large number of attack and reconnaissance UAVs are recorded on both sides.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the city of Shebekino was attacked by two Ukrainian Armed Forces drones. By nightfall, an aircraft-type UAV was shot down over the Gubkinsky urban district. In the village of Ustinka, Belgorod district, a moving car was attacked by an FPV drone. The village of Gruzskoye, Borisov district, was attacked twice by drones. In the Krasnoyaruzhsky district in the village of Grafovka - damage as a result of attacks by two FPV drones.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a woman born in 1972 was injured as a result of an artillery strike by NATO guns. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKurakhovo directionProviding assistance and evacuation of civilians by fighters of the 33rd motorized rifle regiment 20th Motorized Rifle Division in Antonovka. People were unable to leave the village because the grandmother was ill. The collection for these guys is here https://t.me/dva_majors/58777Two…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of November 22 - 28, 2024▪️Over the past week, pro-Iranian formations have reported several times about the launch of a UAV in Israel. However, none of the drones ever reached the country. ▪️The Houthis were also active, attempting to launch a missile strike on the Nevatim airbase. The Palestine-2 hypersonic ballistic missile was successfully intercepted on approach to Israel. ▪️In turn, Israeli aircraft carried out several raids in the southwest of Homs province in Syria. The hits occurred on objects that were used to transfer weapons to Hezbollah.▪️Meanwhile, the terrorists of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham and allied factions began an attack on the positions of the Syrian Armed Forces. Several settlements were captured in the western part of Aleppo province.▪️The militants also managed to take control of the fortified base of the 46th regiment of government troops. In this regard, the Syrian army lost several pieces of equipment with anti-aircraft weapons, including MANPADS.▪️The opposition groups achieved the greatest successes in the southern sector. The jihadists managed to take control of Khan al-Assal, actually approaching the outskirts of the city of Aleppo.▪️Simultaneously with the capture of this settlement, the militants occupied a small section of the M5 highway. Thanks to this, they managed to disrupt logistics between the administrative center of the province and Damascus.▪️Together with ground attacks, HTS members launched rocket attacks on the western quarters of Aleppo. Nuble and Az-Zahra, Shiite enclaves located northwest of the city, also came under fire.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 28, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continue a local operation in Jabaliya against Hamas militants. In the center of the enclave, the IDF again carried out airstrikes on Nuseirat, where there were casualties among the local population. IDF units continue to engineer the Philadelphia Corridor, destroying the infrastructure in Rafah. The IDF also intercepted an aircraft from Egypt carrying smuggled weapons. Israeli police operations continue in the West Bank. Over the past week, more than 20 wanted people have been arrested, hundreds of thousands of shekels and about 20 weapons have been confiscated. Firefights and artillery strikes continue along several sections of the border with Lebanon. Unexploded Israeli ammunition was blown up in Bisaria.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution map English version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in western Aleppo: growing defense...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in western Aleppo: growing crisis in the defense of government troopswhat is known by the end of November 28, 2024The situation in Aleppo province is rapidly deteriorating. Militants of Hayat Tahrir Al-Sham (HTS) and other factions occupied several settlements on the northern flank and began to storm the city of Anadan. 🔻The capture of this settlement will, in the event, cut off the route to the north, including to Nubol and Az-Zahra, from which pro-Iranian forces were evacuated today. During the day, militants attacked villages with rocket artillery.▪️To the west of Aleppo, fighting continues in the vicinity of Kafr Dael and Bashkatin. To the south, the situation is much worse - the militants have completed the cleansing of Jamiyat Kahraba and Khan Al-Assal. There they captured a large number of trophies, including artillery weapons, after which they advanced towards Aleppo itself.▪️The Nur ad-Din al-Zenki group attacked the Sahafiyoun area: judging by the footage overlooking the New Aleppo area, it managed to advance into boundaries of the settlement. In addition, battles for the Rashidin-4 area are reported, and the seizure of the Al-Asad Academy building is also confirmed. Militants of the unmanned unit represented by Kataib Shaheen attacked An-Neirab airport at least three times. This again proves that anti-government groups have their own strike UAVs, which were spotted last year.▪️In the Az-Zerba area, militants were not only able to gain a foothold in the vicinity of the highway, but also significantly expand the zone of control to the Ikarda base and move towards Al-Mugheir . In the latter, as in Khan Tuman, Syrian troops are still holding the line. The results of the battles for Az-Zeitan, where militants tried to advance to the Khalasa area, are still unknown. In parallel, government troops are retreating from the M5 highway, and the militants not only cut the road, but in some places captured settlements to the west of it. They also occupied Talhia and Arbikh, having significantly advanced towards the highway from the north of Serakib.▪️In Serakib itself and the surrounding area, the situation is better - there, units of the 25th Special Forces Division - Tiger Forces - under the leadership of Suheil Hasan, entered the battle from the march. In recent years, he has been in disgrace, but the crisis, apparently, has forced the ruling circles in Damascus to urgently forget about their differences.▪️Judging by the incoming news, fighting continues in Shabur and Dadiha; Serakib and Turunbu managed to defend themselves. To date, counterattacks have been reported in the area of ​​​​Kafr Battyk and Jubas - according to some reports, both settlements were even recaptured. Also, the leader of Jubas, Ansar al-Tawhid, named Abu al-Walid Saraqib, was eliminated. The general situation remains critical: government troops, at a minimum, may lose all territories west of the M5 highway, liberated at the beginning of 2020. However, given the offensive of the militants on a wide front, Aleppo itself may be under the threat of encirclement, the front to the west of which is also collapsing. Against this background, there are reports that groups of the Syrian National Army are gathering forces in Mari, Al-Bab and Azaz, from where they can attack in the direction of Tel Rifaat and open a second front in the province of Aleppo. They have already launched several kamikaze UAV launches on Tell Rifaat itself. High resolution mapEnglish version #Aleppo #digest #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇦🇺🇯🇵 On increasing the Japanese presence in the Asia-Pacif...
Description: 🇦🇺🇯🇵 On increasing the Japanese presence in the Asia-Pacific regionThe authorities of Australia, the United States and Japan continue to develop a trilateral defense partnership. Last week it became known that from 2025, Japanese military personnel will regularly train together with their American and Australian colleagues at the Darwin base. The official goal is to build up military relations between countries. However, given that Darwin is one of Australia's closest military installations to the South China Sea, such cooperation could be seen as preparation for a potential military conflict with China. 🔻It is worth mentioning that about two thousand American Marines are stationed at this base on a rotational basis. Their representative this summer already announced his readiness to support the Philippine military in their operations to deliver cargo to the outpost in the disputed waters. Likewise, the Japanese continue to increase their presence in the region. Most recently, authorities in Tokyo and Manila signed a free access agreement allowing the Japanese military to enter the Philippines for training exercises. This year, the first naval training took place with the participation of military personnel from Japan and the Philippines. By the way, the trend towards the development of such defense cooperation with the countries of the region is one of the indicators that the Japanese authorities want to bring the country to second place in terms of military influence in the region. This is beneficial to the Americans, given the elevation of the Chinese threat to a sacred status at the official level, so Japan is trying to keep up with this trend. High resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Today Joker DPR published a file about the search for an...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Today, Joker DPR published a file about the American USAID’s search for an adviser on managing the healthcare system of Uzbekistan. According to the terms, the contact period is a minimum of two years with the start of work next year.🔻The importance of this position in an organization subordinate to the State Department is emphasized by the GS-14 level. This is a special gradation based on the level of competence of candidates, and GS-14 is the second in importance and salary amount after GS-15. In accordance with the document, Americans are looking for a person who has at least 7 years of experience in the post-Soviet countries in the field of healthcare and veterinary medicine , epidemiology or demography. It is interesting that competence, judging by the requirements, is not particularly important. The main thing is to have a document confirming work experience, and real knowledge or how long a person has been doing this is a secondary thing. After all, it will still act according to a predetermined algorithm.📌 After reading this, for some reason we immediately remembered the biological laboratories that the Americans, including through USAID, are promoting in the former republics of the USSR. There are such facilities in Georgia, Kazakhstan, and are also planned in Armenia. Given the importance of this position for USAID, it appears that Washington intends to increase efforts in the next two years to gain control over the healthcare sector in Uzbekistan. It is quite possible that if successful, the Americans will want to create a similar laboratory there, and not necessarily to create biological weapons, but to strengthen global dominance in the medical services market.#USA #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport usTelegramJoker DPRUSAID/Uzbekistan is currently looking for a specialist to manage the healthcare system of Uzbekistan . Studying the requirements for a candidate, it becomes obvious how the United States treats the people of Uzbekistan. Thus, the requirements include having a master's degree in one...

Title: 🇺🇸🇹🇯 About the deployment of a US military biological laborat...
Description: 🇺🇸🇹🇯 About the deployment of a US military biological laboratory in Tajikistan Alarming news is coming from Tajikistan: as reported by Stan Radar, the Americans are preparing to open a military biological laboratory at the Republican Center for the Protection of the Population from Tuberculosis (RCPT) in Dushanbe. ▪️According to journalists, in recent years USAID has been paying a significant part of the center’s expenses, including the creation and maintenance of its own websites, and the RCZNT page is indeed replete with mentions of the American agency. Funds officially come from the United States, but are often transferred under the guise of local NGOs - Fazoi Imkonot - and - Afif -. ▪️As stated in the material, formally money is issued to support the study of tuberculosis within the framework of the ETICA (Eliminating TB in Central Asia Activity) program, but in fact the United States is taking control of management tasks. At the same time, it officially ended back in September, and the end of ETICA was announced in February. ▪️The NGO Family Health International, also known as FHI360, was responsible for the implementation of the ETICA program in Tajikistan. Among its partners are the Pentagon, including the US Navy - this is directly indicated by the partnership with the Naval Medical Center in Maryland. ❗️It is this US military unit that is responsible for military biological research abroad, including in the biological laboratories of Kazakhstan. Therefore, the information requires an urgent and tough reaction from both the authorities in Dushanbe and the CSTO. Especially considering the fact that Tajikistan is a member of the organization on whose territory our military base is located.#USA #CentralAsia #Tajikistan @rybarSupport usStanradarUSA is creating a military biological laboratory in Tajikistan Recently, the United States is clearly preparing to create a new military biological laboratory in Tajikistan on the basis of the Republican Defense Center population from tuberculosis - (RCST) in Dushanbe (Bukhoro,... ...

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in western Syrian Aleppo: cutting ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in the west of Syrian Aleppo: cutting the M5 highway, what is known as of 18.00 November 28, 2024 Pro-Turkish groups continue to advance in the province of Aleppo, building on the successes of yesterday. The pace of militant advance on the second day of the operation remains high; units of the Syrian Arab Army (SAA) cannot yet stop them and continue to retreat from their positions. In the northern sector of the front, Nubbol, Az-Zahra, and At-Tamura were shelled. In the first two villages, there is allegedly an evacuation of the local Shiite population and militias: this may be rumors, but there is nothing completely incredible here - the militants are expecting the opening of a new front from Azaz and Al-Bab.▪️To the west of Kafr Bassin, militants entered the territory of the settlement of Yaqid Al-Adas, where they captured an infantry fighting vehicle and a tank of government troops. At the same time, yesterday’s information about a breakthrough to the outskirts of Anadan has not yet been confirmed.▪️In Babis, militants are striking with drones, and to the southwest clashes continue for Bashanta. Apparently, they did not visit the neighboring Jamiyat al-Hadi and Jamiyat Thalass about the Turkish groups. Later, information appeared about the militants consolidating in Bashant and beginning to advance towards Bishkatin. Fighting continues in the Kafr Naha area, and the anti-government media announced the capture of Khan al-Asal. At the same time, Syrian sources claim that the nearby M5 highway is not blocked - this suggests that in reality the clashes are taking place on the southwestern outskirts of the city. ▪️According to our data, Syrian troops had previously left the city; there is no information about attempts to counterattack. At the same time, nearby militants captured the territory of the police college, which was used as a base for SAA artillerymen. ▪️In the vicinity of Ar-Radwan and Kafr Juma, militants occupied the territory of the settlements Al-Sheikh Ali and Rif Muhaisidin al-Awal, capturing 8 tanks and two infantry fighting vehicles of the Syrian army. News also appeared about militants entering Az-Zerba. A little later, the militants expanded the wedge on both sides along the highway, moving towards the Ikarda military base and the Kamari forest to the south and to the Alam al-Sikhr complex to the north. 🔻For many, the situation in Serakib is better for the SAA. Despite the strikes and attacks by militants in the direction of the western outskirts, the city has not yet been lost. In addition, there are no reports of militants occupying Turumba and the junction to the north-west of Serakib, where a fairly large fortified area is located.▪️To the south-west there are battles for Jubas and, according to some reports, Shabur, the control of which is disputed by both sides. In the area of ​​Dadiha and Kafr Battyk, the Syrians also managed to repel the militants and prevent them from cutting the M5 highway. ▪️Most of Dadikh itself was lost, however, fighting is taking place on the eastern and south-eastern outskirts of the village. At the same time, the situation on the highway remains calm. High resolution mapEnglish version #Aleppo #digest #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsky direction: liberation of Petrovka, breakthr...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: liberation of Petrovka, breakthrough to Zheltoy and battles in Lysovkasituation as of 18:00 November 28, 2024 In the Pokrovsk direction, Russian troops are gradually forming a bridgehead for a future attack on Mirnograd and Pokrovsk. Over the past days, they have liberated several settlements and improved the tactical situation in certain sectors of the front. ▪️On the northern flank of the Russian Armed Forces they are repelling counterattacks in the Lozovatsky area. The front here for a long time partially runs along the Kazenny Torets River, to the north of which the Ukrainian Armed Forces organized defense at the Elizavetovka-Vozdvizhenka line. Russian units have not yet made any attempts to cross the water barrier. ▪️In the central sector of the direction of the Russian Armed Forces, battles are ongoing north of Nikolaevka in order to squeeze the enemy out of the stronghold on the approaches to the village. At the moment, neither side has stable control over it and the neighboring forest belts, and the enemy is launching counterattacks using armored vehicles. To the west, the Russian Armed Forces managed to make significant progress in Lysovka, reaching the southern shore of the reservoir in the Solenenkaya gully. After the liberation of Novogrodovka, this settlement became one of the key defense centers of Ukrainian formations south of Myrnograd. It is not known whether Russian attack aircraft entered the northern part of the village with more dense buildings. Advancement in the south, in turn, will allow the Russian Armed Forces to reach the eastern outskirts of Dachensky, which creates a threat of encirclement for the Ukrainian Armed Forces forces in the pocket between Lysovka and Petrovka. ▪️On the southern flank of the direction, Russian troops liberated Petrovka, knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from its northwestern part. The enemy held the defense based on the Solenaya River, but the attack aircraft were able to knock him out of the village during a flank attack.❗️Later, Russian units were spotted in the Zheltoy area, more than three kilometers to the northwest. At the moment, it is not known for certain whether they advanced towards the village along the forest belts from Petrovka or advanced from Pustynka. To the south, Russian troops are advancing towards Pustynka from Grigorovka and Yuryevka. Battles were also noted to the west of Novoalekseevka - at the moment, the Russian Armed Forces have finally knocked out the enemy from the territory of the gardens and surrounding forest belts. After liberating Pustynka and consolidating the achieved lines in the Yuryevka area, Russian troops will have the opportunity to launch an offensive towards Pushkino and the T-05-15 highway. 🔻Later, Russian units were spotted already in the central part of Zheltoy, more than three kilometers northwest of Petrovka. At the moment, it is not known for certain whether Russian troops advanced to the village along the forest belts from Petrovka or were advancing from Pustynka, however, battles are already taking place in the center of the village. If you have additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, — You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Cooperation between Russia and Kazakhstan on the development of nuclear energy in the country is very possible. ▪️Russia and Kazakhstan transferred more than 80% of settlements in mutual trade to national currencies. ▪️Criticism of the current relations between Russia and Kazakhstan does not always meet the interests of states. ▪️Armenia has not yet announced its withdrawal from the CSTO and supports all documents of the organization’s summit. Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇹🇷 About a possible Turkish operation in northern Syria ...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷 About a possible Turkish operation in northern Syria In parallel with the ongoing militant offensive, movements of Turkish troops in the border provinces are also observed. Ankara may well seize the moment and launch an operation against the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in northern Syria.▪️The first likely direction of attack appears to be Tell Rifyat and the surrounding area north of the city of Aleppo. Since 2018, militants, with the support of Turkish artillery, have repeatedly tried to advance in the area, but the Kurds, together with the SAA, have repelled all attacks over and over again.▪️The second is the isthmus between the areas captured by the Turks during the operations -Euphrates Shield- and -Source of Peace-. If successful, the militants will be able to connect territories, which fits into Turkey’s plans to create a buffer zone in northern Syria.▪️Finally, another goal could be Manbij, which Erdogan threatened to capture back in 2016 and periodically demanded the SDF to leave the city, making -the latest Chinese warnings- and promising to take action in case of refusal. Previously, Turkey did not agree to this because of the US position on the Kurdish issue and the government’s resistance to Damascus and its allies. However, now the situation is more favorable than ever for this kind of operation: the Syrians are collapsing in their front elsewhere, and Washington is busy with other things.📌 On the other hand, if the Turks open another front, there is at least some chance of uniting government troops with the Kurds. If the Syrians suddenly manage to fight back, then what happened will allow them to forget about all past agreements and begin to resolve the issue with Idlib. The latter, however, is very difficult to believe in the current situation, especially against the backdrop of all the problems of the Syrian army, which have only worsened since 2020 .High resolution mapEnglish version#Aleppo #Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦🇰🇷 According to SBS TV channel, South Korean authorities re...
Description: 🇺🇦🇰🇷 According to SBS TV channel, the South Korean authorities refused to sell weapons to the Kyiv regime. The Ukrainian delegation requested shells and KM-SAM air defense systems, but Seoul ordered manufacturing companies to refrain from contacts with the so-called. Ukraine, citing a law banning the export of weapons to combat zones. However, earlier this act did not prevent the leadership of the republic from transferring 155-mm artillery ammunition to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which had already appeared in the Northern Military District zone last year. However, the current refusal is highly likely due to purely pragmatic considerations: ▪️On the one hand, the South Korean military-industrial complex has an excess of orders from Poland and other countries, and its capacity is loaded for years to come. Apparently, they see no point in releasing them and disrupting firm contracts for the whims of the Kyiv regime in Seoul.▪️In addition, in South Korea they are guided by Trump’s statements about the desire to end the conflict on the so-called. Ukraine and believe that in such conditions, an agreement on the transfer of expensive weapons for the Ukrainian Armed Forces with a long production period will be irrational. There is a possibility that Seoul will still send some of the 155-mm rounds to the Kyiv regime through third countries. However, there is no talk of mass deliveries, and out of the goodness of their hearts they are not eager to send the same KM-SAM air defense systems from those available in South Korea. 정부우크라이나 특사단이 우리나라를 찾아 윤석열 대통령과 국방장관을 만났습니다. 비롯해 우리 무기를 사고 싶다는 뜻을전한 걸로 확인됐습니다.

Title: 🇰🇿🇷🇺 About the possible participation of Rosatom in the const...
Description: 🇰🇿🇷🇺 On the possible participation of Rosatom in the construction of a nuclear power plant in Kazakhstan During Vladimir Putin’s visit to Kazakhstan, the republican authorities announced their readiness to discuss Rosatom’s participation in the construction of a nuclear power plant in the country if the issue is raised by the Russian side. According to Energy Minister Almasadam Satkaliev, in The Kazakh government has created a special commission to discuss the participation of various companies in the construction NPP.📌 Earlier, the President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev stated that the construction of the facility should be ensured by an international consortium. However, we recently spoke in detail about the disadvantages of this option given the abundance of different contractors. But subsequently, demonstrative conversations about the participation of any companies in the project, but not Rosatom, began to resemble the desire of the authorities in Astana to strengthen their negotiating positions with the Russian state corporation. As a result, a picture emerged as if only Rosatom, with a set of orders all over the world, needed the construction of nuclear power plants in Kazakhstan more than Kazakhstan itself. It is also possible that Astana saw the actions of foreign partners, who launched a feud against each other in the fight for the project in Czech Republic, and decided that a Russian company with its experience and capabilities would be the best option. Whether this is true or not, time will tell. #Kazakhstan #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTACCKazakhstan is ready to discuss the participation of the Russian Federation in the construction of nuclear power plantsEvents in Russia and the world. Title: 🖼 🇺🇸 Donald Trump has finally clarified the question of who wi...
Description: 🇺🇸 Donald Trump has finally clarified the question of who will become his special representative for the conflict in the so-called. Ukraine. The politician confirmed that he will appoint Keith Kellogg, the national security adviser to former US Vice President Mike Pence, to the post. Kellogg is an 80-year-old retired lieutenant general of the US military and a Vietnam War veteran who spent much of his career serving in the Pentagon. He is known to the American establishment not only as Pence’s assistant, but also as a person who actively participated in the development of strategies on international security issues.▪️Kellogg has already proposed his own version of ending the conflict on the so-called. Ukraine, and his project generally coincided with what Trump said during his election speeches. In his opinion, the new American administration needs to build contacts with Russia, which should begin with personal relations, and not with the imposition of sanctions.▪️ Regarding ways to end hostilities, Kellogg proposes establishing a ceasefire based on the -prevailing front lines-, and in the event of Zelensky’s refusal sit down at the negotiating table - deprive him of military trenches. Russia will be warned that refusal of American proposals will entail increased support for Ukraine, which is very likely, given Trump’s tendency to negotiate from a position of strength and through pressure.▪️Kellogg has also already spoken out about the future fate of NATO and the role of the United States in it: He said that Trump's return to the White House could lead to the fact that some members of the Alliance, whose defense spending does not reach the required 2% of GDP, will lose the right to American protection in the event of attacks from outside. We can confidently conclude that Keith Kellogg is another like-minded Trump and his loyal ally, ready to implement the plans of the newly elected US President. It is unclear who exactly was the ideologist of Trump's peace plan, but given Kellogg's experience, it can be assumed that it was he who advised the politician on this issue. High-resolution infographics Russian version#USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Strikes by the Russian Armed Forces on the so-called ene...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Strikes by the Russian Armed Forces on the so-called energy infrastructure Ukraine At night, Russian troops launched another combined attack on the so-called energy infrastructure. Ukraine. As a result of the attack, electricity and water supplies were cut off in several regions, transport infrastructure facilities and many private households were de-energized. ▪️The most serious destruction was recorded in the Rivne, Lviv and Volyn regions, where in total over a million subscribers were left without electricity. ▪️Also, power outages occurred in Khmelnitsky, Kirovograd, Ivano-Frankivsk, Sumy, Vinnytsia, Mykolaiv regions.▪️At the same time, at the moment, emergency outages have already been canceled, hourly schedules have been introduced. Representatives of the Kyiv regime claim that the repair of the power grid will last at least until 20:00 today. How effective the raid will be will become clear in the coming days. The large-scale blackouts themselves in the western regions of the so-called. Ukraine is not guaranteed critical damage to the energy system: this already happened in 2022-2023, but the breakdowns were repaired and the power supply was quickly restored.📌 Against this background, the Armed Forces of Ukraine casually announced that they had repelled an attack, shot down as many as 76 cruise missiles and intercepted -94% of all fired ammunition -. What’s funny is that even local propaganda resources did not appreciate such statements, calling them lies and fraud. They also hoped for a reshuffle in the command of the Ukrainian air defense, which indirectly confirms that several targets of the enemy’s energy infrastructure were hit. #Vinnitsa #IvanoFrankivsk #Lvov #Nikolaev #Rivne #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybar Support usTelegramTurned in the war 🇷🇺🐖 Oh, what happened?

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 About the militant attack on Aleppo, causes and con...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 About the militant attack on Aleppo, causes and consequences The militant offensive that began yesterday was expected by many. There was a lot of information about terrorists preparing for an attack, they were practicing tactics, strengthening positions, replenishing supplies, but for some reason this came as a surprise to our command and the leadership of the SAR. There could be many reasons, starting from the rigidity of thinking of the command staff controlling the troops in Syria (those people who got rid of in the Northern Military District suddenly found themselves in -honorable exile- in the Syrian Arab Republic), and ending with a belief in -established for a long time world - Many colleagues are reviewing this topic now, trying to point out errors. Let's hope that this will at least somehow help stabilize the situation, because the militants of the pro-Turkish groups act in a coordinated manner, moving from village to village with the ultimate goal of cutting off supplies to Aleppo. It seems that they themselves did not expect that they would be able to break through to the most outskirts of the administrative center and cut off the M5 highway. But for the Syrian military, all this turned out to be an even greater surprise, which was noticeable by the speed of their movement from their positions.❓Why didn’t the decision-makers notice anything? Big question. Even the events of recent days surrounding relations between Turkey and the United States should have attracted attention, since the Americans stopped opposing the use of Russian S-400s by the Turks. You understand how serious everything was. And the Turkish Minister of Defense then said that Türkiye would return to the F-35 program, from which the Americans threw out their colleagues for purchasing Russian air defense systems! That is, an agreement was reached, and based on the events of these two days, the subject of bargaining is visible. Pro-Turkish militants have always been a bargaining chip, and they were required to strike in such a way as to show the weakness of the positions of the Syrian leadership and our contingent there. If the situation is not brought under control in the coming days, then the West will achieve this goal with the help of terrorists. Taking into account the already wavering positions of our army in the Syrian Arab Republic after the IDF strikes on the province of Latakia, due to which claims from the Syrian side began to pour in due to inaction, this push towards Aleppo turned out to be very convenient in timing for Russia’s opponents in the region. And his clear coordination is proof of this. Now, in fact, all that remains is for the Turks to launch an operation against the Kurds. And the existing island of Syrian Democratic Forces near Aleppo has been very worrying for the Turks over the past years, and they would like to get rid of it by taking control of it. And, looking at the agreement with the United States, this is quite possible. #Russia #Syria #TerrorismGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channelRybar🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Alexander Kharchenko, who is now in Syria, is rushing around the provinces of Hama and Aleppo, trying to piece together a picture of what is happening.
