Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 About US plans to promote pro-Western parties in Armenia...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 About US plans to promote pro-Western parties in Armenia The press bureau of the Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) again reports on US intentions towards Armenia. According to the department, the State Department doubts the final establishment of Yerevan’s pro-Western course. That is why in Washington they are betting on the promotion of pro-Western parties on the eve of the parliamentary elections of 2026. These include -Republic - Aram Sargsyan, -In the Name of the Republic - Arman Babajanyan, -European Party of Armenia - Tigran Khzmalyan, -Christian Democratic Party - Levon Shirinyan . In the United States, they want to ensure the passage of parties into parliament to support the pro-Western path and control the executive branch in order to prevent a repetition of the Georgian scenario. Note that agents of American influence are also actively placed in the government and especially in the security bloc. There is also the prospect of holding early parliamentary elections as early as 2025, if Armenia concludes a peace treaty with Azerbaijan in the near future. 🔻For now, the Armenian authorities are sticking to their previous course, trying to please Western curators on publicly distancing themselves from Russia. For example, in Yerevan they are trying to ignore meetings within the CSTO and indirectly take part in meetings within the CIS, but at the same time maintain lively contacts within the EAEU. The Americans do not hide their intentions to completely break off Armenian-Russian relations. However, the attitude of the new US administration towards the South Caucasus will also play a big role. #Armenia #Russia #USA @rybarSupport ussvr.gov.ruForeign Intelligence Service of the Russian FederationOfficial server of the Foreign Intelligence Service of the Russian Federation on the Internet.

Title: 🇺🇦 In recent days, the thesis that the failure...
Description: 🇺🇦 In recent days, the Ukrainian media field has been promoting the thesis that the failures of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Donbass are a consequence of the supposedly huge numerical superiority of the Russian Armed Forces. The speakers talk about the ratio of forces of 1:7 and the need to call up 2 million people to correct the situation. In fact, with all the problems of the Ukrainian formations, there is no total shortage of manpower. There is also enough for fresh formations, which is actively facilitated by mass raids of the TCC in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. A similar situation arises with the equipment that the United States and other NATO countries continue to regularly supply to the so-called. Ukraine. For the same reason, recently the brigades of the Armed Forces of Ukraine with numbers from 155 to 159 again received the status of mechanized, although previously they were infantry due to a lack of vehicles.📌 Therefore, the recent statements of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Syrsky about the preparation of a new counter-offensive are not far from the truth. The enemy is accumulating forces for a new strike, which will most likely be timed to coincide with Trump taking office. The goal is to create the desired effect and try to justify the continuation of Western support. And all the stories of Ukrainian speakers about the supposedly huge numerical superiority of the Russian Armed Forces are aimed at at least somehow explaining the retreat in Donbass to the domestic audience. Especially against the backdrop of past propaganda theses of the Kyiv regime, which denied the possibility of such successes in the Russian Armed Forces.#mediatechnology #Ukraine@rybarSupport usRossiyskaya GazetaThe Armed Forces of Ukraine have calculated how many people Kyiv needs to mobilize for a counter-offensive - Rossiyskaya GazetaKiev needs to mobilize at least 1.8 million people in order to have the very opportunity for a counteroffensive. Ukrainian army serviceman Evgeniy Ievlev stated this on air on the Kiev 24 TV channel.

Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Alexander Kharchenko, who is now in Syria, is rushing ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Alexander Kharchenko, who is now in Syria, is rushing around the provinces of Hama and Aleppo, trying to piece together a picture of what is happening. In general, from the events of one day we can conclude that the militants were preparing for a new round of war, while the Syrian army and the group of Russian troops (forces) in the Syrian Arab Republic were in the happy paradigm of eternal peace. Alexander Kartavykh in impartial terms I have already touched on the topic of the fact that... not very pro-profitable officers have gathered in Syria. It’s clear why: truly talented generals and commanders are needed in the Northern Military District, so the Syrian sandbox was staffed not just according to the residual principle, but according to the lobbying-residual principle (-we send unwanted ones to become famous in reports from distant territories, -we exile short-sighted ones, so that they are forgotten, etc.). This approach - although it has a right to life - does not allow clearing the troops of outright tyrants, for whom the regulations are much more important than delving into combat reports and developing plans for solutions in case of militant actions. In the end, we have what we have: the M5 highway has actually been cut, the militants have either entered the western quarters of Aleppo, or are very close to them, and There are no combat-ready formations on Syrian territory. The Wagner PMC ceased to exist along with its paraformations, the Afrika Korps is concentrated on the Dark Continent, Suheil al-Hasan is removed from command, Hezbollah is defeated, and the effective commanders of the IRGC are either killed or on other fronts. But the militants have battalions with kamikaze UAVs and experienced FPV drone operators (what a surprise!). And barefoot bandits know how to use them much better than militias and regular army soldiers. They also attack at night and in bad weather conditions, intelligently using their own media resources to sow panic. 📌All this is a consequence of a systemic incorrect approach to both the positioning of Russian military force and diplomacy abroad, and the lack of a competent approach to events in Syria in particular. And in general, we can admit that northern Syria was presented to the militants and their masters on a silver platter.#Aleppo #Russia #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport usTelegramWitnesses of BayraktarMilitants dress in Syrian uniforms during the attack on Aleppo. They bring chaos to the defense, which they are hastily trying to restore. Such DRG officers are shot like dogs. Groups are small. These are not the main forces. I predict that the militants will stop at what...

Title: 🇲🇩 About the impending energy disaster in Moldova In Moldova, a...
Description: 🇲🇩 About the impending energy disaster in Moldova In Moldova, after the presidential elections and the referendum on European integration, they suddenly remembered pressing problems and started talking about the fact that the republic would face difficult times and an energy crisis. After all, another winter is approaching, which, given the course of the current authorities, does not bode well. 🔻Increasing electricity tariffs Prime Minister Dorin Recean said that Moldova is facing a very difficult winter. One of the reasons is the refusal of the Kyiv regime to continue the transit of Russian gas from January 2025. Transnistria may be without gas: the Moldavian State District Power Plant is located there, which provides 85% of electricity for Moldova. This may force the Chisinau authorities to start purchasing electricity from other countries, but at a higher price. Moldova has already recognized that stopping transit will lead to a humanitarian catastrophe. In Chisinau, at the suggestion of Gazprom, they sent a request to the Kyiv regime for negotiations to preserve gas transit in the PMR. Increase in gas tariffs The second reason for the crisis is another increase in gas tariffs. The Moldovagaz company handed over to the government a project that provides for an increase in tariffs by almost 40% from December 1. The adjustments are explained by an increase in prices on the European market, where Chisinau purchases gas through a gas pipeline from Romania (Iasi-Ungheni-Chisinau), as well as the need to minimize the tariff deficit for the supplier. At the same time, Prime Minister Recan argued in September that citizens would not face an increase in gas tariffs. Obviously, the topic was suppressed because of the elections. 🔻Negotiations with -Gazprom- Recently, the Minister of Energy of Moldova Viktor Parlikov went to St. Petersburg for negotiations with -Gazprom-. It is known that the parties discussed the possibility of an alternative route for gas supplies to the PMR through Turkey. But this path has intersections with the controlled so-called. Ukraine is a territory, which retains risks. The topic of Moldovagaz's debt to Gazprom was also raised. The 2021 gas contract provided for a debt audit, but later the Moldovan authorities, led by Maia Sandu, sabotaged the agreement. They conducted an audit unilaterally with the help of Western firms, which predictably did not confirm the debt. After this, public negotiations between the parties were virtually sabotaged. Sandu then called the problem of Gazprom itself the refusal to recognize the audit of Moldova’s debt. In Chisinau they claimed that they no longer depend on Russian gas and purchase fuel on the European market. True, this was a repurchase of Russian gas at an inflated price, but political slogans were much more important then. ❗️ It is obvious that Moldova will soon face another energy crisis due to Chisinau’s refusal to conduct a constructive dialogue with Russia in recent years. At the same time, it will be interesting to watch possible negotiations between Chisinau and the Kyiv regime on gas transit. After all, in recent years, Ukrainian grain and Western weapons have been driven through Moldova, to its own detriment. And the big question is how they will repay for such a service on the so-called. Ukraine.#Moldova #Transnistria #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport usNewsMaker-A very hard winter awaits us-. The Prime Minister named two reasons for a possible gas crisis. Prime Minister of Moldova Dorin Recean, at the beginning of the government meeting on November 27, warned citizens that the country was facing a very difficult winter. The head of government named two reasons why a gas crisis could arise and promised that the authorities will...

Title: 🔁 🇦🇲🇬🇷🇮🇳 About Indian weapons and the nuances of their ope...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇦🇲🇬🇷🇮🇳 About Indian weapons and the nuances of their operation While all attention is focused on Syria, which we will also discuss later, I would like to note a couple of points on military-technical cooperation between Armenia and other countries. It is not yet possible to confirm the S-300 from Greece, but interesting nuances have surfaced regarding India.📌 Despite the current attempts by the Armenian authorities to hide cooperation with India, information has surfaced online. Moreover, transport workers regularly make flights from India, bringing something to the Armenians. For example, the Pinaka MLRS have been in Armenia for a long time at the base in Gyumri, and they are idle. This is due to one important point: local operating conditions are not suitable for either the Pinaka or the ATAGS barrel guns. The equipment itself is crude, and the Indian authorities did not bother to provide the Armenians with their own specialists to service the artillery. The following situation arises: the Armenian specialists do not particularly understand it, the Indians do not help, since they are not ready for this, simply selling it to the Armenians. As a result, the Armenians test the equipment they receive and put it in the garage because it breaks down quickly and the wait for spare parts is long. And in order not to break it, it is idle. And in the price-efficiency ratio, they are literally golden in cost. Add to this the shortage of 155-mm ammunition, which is now hard to find all over the world, and it turns out that the Armenians bought weapons from India simply for intimidation. But they are not going to stop there. They also intend to purchase light transport aircraft from India. The Armenians now have only 3 Il-76s, of which only one flies. There are no spare parts, and nowhere to get them, since the Armenian authorities have cut off contacts with Russia. #Armenia #Greece #IndiaGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channelRybar🇦🇲🇬🇷 On the possible transfer of Russian air defense systems from Greece to Armenia The Greek publication Enikos claims that Athens intends to transfer Russian anti-aircraft missile systems S-300, TOR-M1 and Osa-AKM. Previously, there was talk of a possible transfer by Greece...

Title: 🔁🎬 Part of the humanitarian cargo collected...
Description: Forwarded From Colonel Trifonov In a store in Nizhny Novgorod, part of the humanitarian cargo collected by schoolchildren of the Rostov region for military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces performing combat missions in the area of ​​military operations was identified. The humanitarian aid was discovered by a resident of the Bor district. He purchased two camouflage nets from a commercial store, inside of which were parcels and letters written by schoolchildren from Novoshakhtinsk, Rostov Region, to fighters in the Northern Military District zone. As the store owner stated, he purchases similar goods through Avito, which means that identifying the sender will not be difficult .I believe that Rostov law enforcement officers need to get involved in checking this information, identify a traitor in the volunteer movements of the region and involve him in the most public way possible. criminal liability. And within the framework of the ongoing operational investigations, establish what other parcels and where this figure (or group) sent them, profiting from humanitarian aid. I believe that this vile business has been put on stream. Video is too big

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in western Syrian Aleppo: Islamist...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in the west of Syrian Aleppo: Islamists on the outskirts of the center of the province what is known by the end of November 27, 2024 By the end of the day, anti-government formations not only managed to gain a foothold in occupied settlements, but also continued attacks in the direction of the city of Aleppo, the administrative center of the province of the same name. ▪️After reinforcements arrived, the militants managed to break through the defenses of the Armed Forces SAR in Kafr Naha and Urum al-Kubra, and then expand the zone of control in the direction of Khan al-Asal (moreover, apparently, the settlement has already been taken by them). This actually opens up a direct path to Aleppo for Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) and other factions.❗️In addition, Turkish media claim that Syrian armed forces, simultaneously with the capture of Khan al-Asal, occupied a small section of the M5 international highway in the area, actually disrupting logistics between Aleppo and Damascus.▪️Slightly to the north, Islamists attacked a village Tower. With the establishment of control over it, the allied Hayat Tahrir al-Sham groups will be able to reach Kafr Dail, Mansoura, and from there launch an attack on the same Aleppo.▪️By the evening, reports appeared about the start of fighting in the Saraqib area, located in the east of the province Idlib. From its territory, the Syrian Arab Army constantly attacked HTS targets; the M5 highway also runs nearby. Its capture will significantly undermine the combat capabilities of the Syrian Armed Forces. Meanwhile, columns of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army (SNA) continue to enter from the north of the province to the fronts of its western part, more and more units of which are declaring their support for the operation of the Idlib brothers.📌 Against this background on the Internet they started talking again about the preparation of the Turkish Armed Forces for a similar operation, but against the Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in Tell Rifaat and Menbije. Most likely, Turkish troops will take advantage of the turmoil in Idlib to resolve their issues with the Kurds. Increasing attacks and shelling by Kurdish militias are cited as a reason. Thus, recently the SDF attacked the positions of militants - Ahrar al-Sharqiya - near the city of Al-Bab, which led to the death of 17 members of pro-Turkish gangs. As for the government troops, they have not yet put up fierce resistance, although in some areas they have been able to delay the advance militants. Now the Syrian media are writing about the transfer of reinforcements from the Syrian Armed Forces to the west of Aleppo. However, given the effectiveness of today’s moderate attacks, it is possible that in the near future they will go directly to the western quarters of the city of Aleppo. And at the moment, the main question is where the Syrian troops will be able to repel those who believed too much in themselves - the warriors of Sham -? High resolution mapEnglish version #Aleppo #digest #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 27, 2024. Russian troops struck targets in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine, including the Ukrainian Armed Forces missile complex in the south of the Odessa region. Ukrainian formations, in turn, carried out a massive UAV raid on the Republic of Crimea. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian units established control over most of Lysovka, reaching the southern shore of the reservoir in the Solenenkaya gully, and also completely liberated Petrovka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the RF Armed Forces, according to objective control personnel, completely liberated Berestki. To the south there are battles in Kurakhovo and at the Romanovka-Konstantinopolskoe line. In the Vremevsky direction, Russian attack aircraft have approached the eastern outskirts of Bolshaya Novoselovka and are actively using unmanned platforms to destroy enemy fortifications. To the west there are battles at the Rovnopol-Novodarovka line. A major power grid failure occurred in the Zaporozhye and Kherson directions, affecting the population of both regions. In parallel with this, shelling of civilian infrastructure by the enemy does not stop. A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Kurakhovsky direction (ru; en) #Timepiece #digest #report #Zaporozhye #Crimea #map #Kurakhovo #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #Kherson@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 27, 2024 Israeli troops, in the usual manner, struck various areas of the Gaza Strip: the most concentrated hits occurred in the capital of the Palestinian enclave and Nuseirat, where there were casualties. In the north of the enclave, IDF units also carried out an operation in the Al-Sheikh Radwan area: they surrounded the Auni al-Hartani school and arrested the men there. All detainees were taken to an unknown direction. In the West Bank, traditional raids by Israeli security forces took place in several settlements. One of the operations was in Idna, where the house of a local militant accused of killing three IDF soldiers was destroyed. In southern Lebanon, a ceasefire came into force this morning, leading to a massive return of evacuated Lebanese to their homes. At the same time, against this background, Hamas also expressed its readiness to sign a similar agreement on the Gaza Strip in exchange for hostages. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🪖Most likely, the Turks will soon also launch an operation ...
Description: Forwarded From ARCHANGEL SPECIAL FORCES Z🇷🇺🪖Most likely, the Turks will soon also launch an operation against the Kurds. This photo appeared on the Turkish segment of the Internet, and it is signed as the transfer of a convoy of military equipment of the Turkish Armed Forces to the Salamah checkpoint on the border with Syria. The publication Aawsat confirms this information, saying that the Turks sent reinforcements as part of Operation Euphrates Shield to begin with attacks on -Syrian Democratic Forces-. Now the convoy is moving towards the city of Maryamin in the north of Aleppo. Yesterday, a column of Turkish armored vehicles in the amount of about 50 vehicles, including artillery and tanks, passed through the Kafr-Lusin border crossing. The strengthening of the Turkish group is associated with an incursion of Kurds from the SDF into positions pro-Turkish Syrian National Army on Monday, after which the Turks increased the number of attacks on the Kurds. Archangel Special forces. Subscribe.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the combined strike of the Ukrainian Armed Forc...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the combined strike of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on Crimea and SevastopolAt the moment when the offensive of pro-Turkish groups in the Idlib terrarium began in Syria, Ukrainian formations tried to attack the Crimean peninsula and Sevastopol.🔻In several waves, the enemy from the Odessa region launched 26 drones, the target of which was three airfields - Belbek, Kacha and Novofedorovka, as well as the Saki Thermal Power Plant.▪️At around 8.30, MiG-29 fighters of the Black Sea Fleet shot down three drones west of Cape Tarkhankut. The drones were intercepted over the sea, where the debris fell.▪️Then, for almost two hours, the 31st Air Force and Air Defense Division shot down raids by UAV groups near Saki and Sevastopol. Air defense crews destroyed 19 drones on approach, three more were suppressed by electronic warfare.▪️At the time the air defense was operating against the UAV, Ukrainian formations alternately launched two anti-ship missiles -Neptune-, which were also successfully intercepted over the sea off the northern side of Sevastopol.▪️It is noteworthy that 26- The drone was located at a distance from what was happening. And after the units of the 31st division finished their work, the UAV turned around and flew away. Apparently, he was supposed to record arrivals, but nothing happened.❗️The day before, four reconnaissance aircraft were operating in the Black Sea region, two of which were long-range radar detection. Taking into account their specifications, they ensured the identification of targets before the raid. Well, we must not forget that after such massive UAV raids, an equally massive missile strike occurs. Two Neptune anti-ship missiles are more like testing our air defense, and then larger attacks should be expected. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Militant offensive in western Syrian Aleppo: further ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 The offensive of militants in the west of Syrian Aleppo: further collapse of defense what is known as of 20.00 on November 27, 2024 The offensive of a conglomerate of Syrian groups in the west of the province of Aleppo continues: alas, Russian troops were drawn into another round of the internal Syrian conflict.📍 A group of workers working near the front line Russian specialists got into surrounded during the collapse of the front, one of them died, the rest, according to preliminary information, managed to be pulled out (a separate low bow to the promptly worked evacuation group). The information disseminated on the Internet about the capture of certain three Russian officers has not been confirmed at this stage.▪️During almost 10 hours of the offensive, the militants managed to get closer in different areas to a distance of 8-9 km from the western outskirts of Aleppo. The offensive at this stage is in the best traditions of the raid of Ukrainian formations in the Kharkov region in 2022: maximum advance along the main road directions without consolidation in populated areas in an attempt to capture as much booty as possible and mark new borders.▪️Among the advancing groups there are no only terrorists from -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham-: confirmed participation of Uighur militants from -Islamic Party of Turkestan-, which traditionally operated much further west (in the north of Latakia), Uzbek militants, the bulk of whom operated on the border with the province of Hama, as well as parts of other groups. All this speaks of the planned transfer of a significant number of combat-ready units, which are also involved in a -psychological- attack on the Syrians: foreign fighters have always been perceived as the most dangerous by quite timid Syrians.▪️Apparently, in some areas the Syrian army with allies managed to stop the advance of the militants: footage of destroyed enemy armored vehicles is published on the Internet. The terrorists have not been able to develop an advance north from Al-Sheikh Aqil and have not yet been able to break through the defenses near Kafr Nakha and east of Anjara.📌In the information space of Syria, as before during any exacerbations, there is almost complete denial of the loss of settlements and calls - not to believe enemy propaganda -. Such lulling words have long ceased to work: information resources of militants are taken on a massive scale, with the active involvement of bloggers and propagandists who try to write stand-ups and record short videos from literally every piece of the area, savoring success in every possible way.🔻The transfer of fire brigades to the site - the same 25 divisions (former Tiger Forces) of Suheil al-Hassan - not yet visible, therefore, more likely In all, the militants will be able to further expand the breakthrough area, taking advantage of the total unpreparedness of the Syrian Arab Army for defense. Air strikes by both the Syrian Air Force and the Russian Aerospace Forces are now clearly on an insufficient scale to stop the militants’ breakthrough to the west of Aleppo. High resolution mapEnglish version #Aleppo #digest #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation in southern Lebanon: the first day of...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation in the south of Lebanon: the first day of the ceasefire After the ceasefire agreement came into force at 5.00 that night, the situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border was relatively stabilized: in general, the parties ceased hostilities, and no massive strikes were recorded. At the same time, Israel managed to violate the truce several times: several artillery shells fell in the area of ​​​​Marun ar-Ras, Khiam and Kafr Kila. However, this has not yet led to an aggravation, and the Israel Defense Forces stated that the target was suspected persons who entered areas closed by the Israelis.🔻Despite statements by IDF spokesman Avichai Adrai that Israeli units still remain in the territories of the South Lebanon, citizens of the Arab Republic publish footage of local residents returning to occupied cities. It is worth noting that a few hours before the deadline After the signing of the truce, Israeli troops launched concentrated attacks on several Lebanese cities, including the southern part of Beirut, where one of the leaders of Hezbollah's aviation unit was killed. The fighters of the Lebanese group responded with rocket salvoes at settlements in northern Israel.▪️As ​​for the mood of the civilian population on both sides of the barricades, an interesting picture emerges here. The Lebanese, despite all the devastation, perceive the signing of peace as actually a defeat for Israel, which failed to achieve Hezbollah’s withdrawal across the Litani River and the creation of a buffer zone.▪️Israeli citizens were divided on this issue: looking at the return of Lebanese refugees to their homes, as well as flags of the Shiite group flashing in the frames, some wonder - why did you start? Such sentiments are also fueled by far-right politicians like Itamar Ben-Gvir. The Palestinians’ reaction to what happened is interesting: according to Western media, the Hamas movement welcomed the ceasefire and thanked Hezbollah for its support. The group also expressed its readiness to sign a similar agreement in the Gaza Strip.🔻As we wrote earlier, no matter the outcome, the Lebanese-Israeli front remains a rather hot spot. Even if the parties have agreed on the need for de-escalation, this does not mean that an armed conflict will not start again in the near future: many reasons for this can be found. The Lebanese will not sit still and will take advantage of the respite to restore their combat capabilities. Well, the ultra-Orthodox Israeli authorities, not without reason, will see this as a threat and will accuse Hezbollah of preparing to resume attacks on Israeli territory. In the meantime, while the truce is in effect, the Israeli government will focus its attention on other areas that pose no less a threat to the Jewish people. This is both the same Palestinian West Bank, where Hamas cells operate, and long-suffering Syria. High-resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇬🇷 On the possible transfer of Russian air defense from Gre...
Description: 🇦🇲🇬🇷 About the possible transfer of Russian air defense from Greece to Armenia The Greek publication Enikos claims that Athens intends to transfer Russian S-300, TOR-M1 and Osa-AKM anti-aircraft missile systems to Armenia. Previously, there was talk of the possible transfer by Greece of the so-called S-300 air defense systems. Ukraine. In exchange, the Greeks plan to spend $2 billion on the purchase of Israeli air defense systems until 2026. ▪️The media note that the deal is being promoted by the French, who are trying to gain a foothold as the main arms supplier to Armenia. The Greeks will not transfer the systems for free, especially since Armenia approved an increase in the defense budget by 20% in 2025. ❗️One of the main reasons for the transfer of Russian air defense systems is the presence of Armenians with experience in their operation, as well as access to the necessary spare parts for their maintenance. Perhaps, the announcement of this reason looks very comical, given the rhetoric of the Armenian authorities and the media under their control that they no longer need Russian weapons, and any non-Russian ones are better. But suddenly it turned out that it was most convenient for Armenians to use Russian weapons. Let's see what amazing arguments the pro-Pashinyan media will now come up with. #Armenia #Greece #Russia #France @rybarSupport usenikos.grΦεύγουν οι S-300: Στην Αρμενία τα ρωσικά όπλα της ΕλλάδαςΦεύγουν οι S-300 και άλλα δύο ρωσικής κατασκευής οπλικά συστήματα, που χρησιμοποιούντο για την αεράμυνα της χώρας και δίνουν τη θέση τους σε ισραηλινής

Title: 🇨🇫 On the lifting of restrictions on the export of diamonds fro...
Description: 🇨🇫 An extremely important event for the Central African Republic occurred in mid-November: the Kimberley Process abolished all restrictions on the export of diamonds from the Central African Republic that had been in force since 2013. This happened after many years of efforts by Russian representatives who actively lobbied for this issue on the sidelines and on international platforms, for which CAR President Touadera recently expressed a separate gratitude.▪️First of all, it is worth noting the role of the Wagner PMC in restoring control over the national territory. And on the diplomatic front, it was domestic workers who collected the entire documentary base for making this decision.▪️Among other things, when the mandate of the chairman of the Kimberley Process passed to Russia in 2021, our diplomats planned to lift the embargo even then. True, the opposition of the West (especially the French), and the continued control of armed groups over some fields prevented these plans. However, the key factor influencing the lifting of the embargo was the interests of the current chairman of the organization - the UAE. After the CAR army, with the support Russian specialists drove the militants out of the fields, the Emirati authorities decided to strengthen their economic ties with the central government. If local gangs had managed to stay in their homes, no one would have lifted the restrictions. The illegal traffic of diamonds and gold is beneficial both directly to the Emiratis, who regularly find themselves in case studies and scandals, and to European exchanges, where blood diamonds are resold. Therefore, it turned out that the last fiddle in the decision-making was played by the change in the general course of various influential players in the market precious metals. #Africa #Russia #UAE #CAR@rybarSupport usTACCKimberley Process lifted all restrictions on diamond exports from CAREThe embargo on diamond exports from the CAR was introduced in 2013

Title: 🇲🇩🌐 A meeting will be held on the observation of elections and...
Description: 🇲🇩🌐 About monitoring elections and referendums in Moldova On November 28, a meeting of the Constitutional Court of Moldova will take place to approve the results of the presidential elections. Its result is already obvious, since earlier the Constitutional Court approved the results of the referendum on European integration. We have already written about a lot of violations during the organization of voting. Moreover, re-elected President Maia Sandu entered into a public conflict even with pro-Western observers, demanding absolute support for her own candidacy. But there are serious questions about them too. 🔻Composition of observers More than 1000 observers from 6 organizations participated in the national observation of the referendum and elections, and more than 500 from 51 organizations participated in the international observation. About 90% of national observers were sent by the Promo-Lex Association, which in fact is not national. Its activities are funded by the American USAID, the EU, the Soros Foundation-Moldova, the German Marshall Fund of the USA, the British Government, the International Organization of La Francophonie. Moreover, almost half of the international observers were sent by the OSCE Office of Democratic Institutions and Human Rights (ODIHR).🔻The struggle of narratives of observation missions ▪️ International organizations have launched a struggle of meanings and narratives. Thus, the National Democratic Institute of the USA, the International Republican Institute of the USA and Promo-Lex, together with Sandu, made identical statements about massive bribery of voters, which led to such modest results for the authorities in the referendum and presidential elections. Obviously, this was an attempt to justify itself to Western sponsors for large funding for the promotion of democracy, but the result was on the verge of failure. ▪️The OSCE ODIHR, in turn, did not note any facts of mass bribery of voters. At the same time, even after observing the local elections in 2023, the mission noted the high political bias of the Central Election Commission and recommended changing its composition. As a result, the elections and referendum in Moldova, using yet another example, showed a clear discreditation of the institution of monitoring electoral processes. After all, even international observers, who by design should not be interested in the outcome of the elections, in fact defend a certain candidate instead of impartially assessing the process. #elections #Moldova @rybarSupport usTACCCC of Moldova will make a decision on the results of the elections on November 28. The meeting will also decide on the approval of the presidential mandate

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾 The offensive of militants in the west of Syrian Aleppo...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾 The offensive of militants in the west of Syrian Aleppo is known as of 15.00 on November 27, 2024. The ongoing offensive of Syrian militants (both moderate pro-Turkish ones from among the SNA and HTS terrorists) continues. ▪️In a few hours of attack along the main road Aleppo - Darat Izza, the militants managed to advance through several settlements: the distance to the western border of Aleppo is already less than 9 km.▪️Not only armored vehicles are used, but also suicide bombers, which once again emphasizes the nature of the actions of the moderate opposition .▪️Among the attackers there are outright radicals - the same Nur ad-Din al-Zinki, which was marked by the murder of minors. 🔻The collapse of the Syrian defense is due to the low quality and near-zero density of troops in this area. Despite all the warnings, the SAA did not take measures to strengthen the border. Although there was more than enough time. Title: 🔁🖼 🇹🇷🇵🇰Turkey and Pakistan will build a joint military plan...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors🇹🇷🇵🇰Turkey and Pakistan will build a joint military plantThe Turkish military-industrial company Repkon and the Pakistani Wah Industries Limited (WIL) entered into an agreement to build a plant in Pakistan for the production of 155-mm artillery shells with a capacity of 120 thousand units. per year, as well as explosives and laser guidance devices. It is significant that in 2022 and 2023, 155-mm ammunition of Turkish and Pakistani production was actively supplied to the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Earlier, in October of this year, the Repkon division in the US received a contract from the US Department of Defense for creation of lines for the production of 155-mm shells in Mesquite (Texas) with a capacity 30 thousand units per month, and in November - for construction in Graham (Kentucky) and launch of a plant to produce 2.3 million kg. TNT per year.✨In 2023, global military spending increased by 6.8% and reached a record of 2.443 trillion. dollars. Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇴 On the importance of the elections in Romania for the ru...

However, for Sandu and company in the second round, a victory is necessary for the leader of the Union for the Salvation of Romania party, Elena Lasconi, who supports a partnership with NATO and the United States. 🔻A possible victory for Georgescu could introduce unpredictability into relations between Chisinau and Bucharest. In the meantime, the current authorities of Romania are doing their best to support the process of the notorious European integration of Moldova, through which the Romanians plan to absorb the neighboring republic. For Sandu and her entire team, this is the most desirable scenario. So for the Romanian citizens at the head of Moldova, the presidential elections in Romania are a continuation of their own struggle for power and resources. #Moldova #Romania @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇴⚡️Unexpected results of the presidential elections in RomaniaAccording to preliminary data, after counting 98.66% of the ballots, first place with 22.59% was taken by independent candidate Calin Georgescu, who was previously a member of the far-right party - Alliance for unification...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Resumption of hostilities in Syria: a couple of yea...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇸🇾 Renewal of hostilities in Syria: a couple of years have passed, the number has changed, nothing has changed. These images capture the victorious flight of the Syrian Arab Army from positions in the west of Aleppo province: today pro-Turkish groups from the conglomerate - the Syrian National Army - and terrorists -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - began an offensive on the axis Al-Sheikh Aqil - Qabtan al-Jabal and Anjara, immediately capturing forward positions (and supposedly the villages themselves, but so far there are no objective control personnel). Over the past two months, both our team and specialized officials who are involved in intelligence and information work on Syria systematically conveyed, both publicly and through closed communication channels, the full extent of information that an offensive preparing.🔻What was known?▪️The militants carried out a transfer to the village of Kafr Taala, building up their group. In the border areas, alerts were raised and movements to forward positions were carried out (yes, we are now talking about militants who can’t do anything).▪️Several control points were created (aka operational rooms), three offensive areas and three sectors were assigned responsibility (therefore, another vector of attack, as we assume, will be the Saraqib - An-Neirab section and the M4 highway).▪️Engineering of the area was carried out and deployment of firing positions by forces of both -moderates- from the -Syrian National Army- and terrorists -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham-. Particular emphasis is placed on Saraqib and the surrounding area. Blood collection points were organized in advance. 📌As if this were not enough, Turkey announced its unpreparedness to normalize relations with Syria, shifting (naturally) all the blame to Damascus.❗️As a result, this morning the operation -Repelling Aggression- was launched by pro-Turkish groups (-Al-Hamza Division-, - Jabhat al-Shamiya-, -Division Sultan Suleiman Shah-) is justified by the need to stop -inhumane bombings-, -return homes to refugees- and -restore justice-. In the Syrian Arab Army, of course, everyone was immediately defeated and killed (this again raises the question of the inertia of local information structures), but the footage of fleeing Syrians speaks for itself. 🔺In the context of growing anti-Russian sentiment among the population of Syria itself against the backdrop of the lack of a clear Russian position on Israeli air strikes, it would be very great if Russian negotiators and military personnel, as usual, resolved the situation and used the fact of rescue to remind the Syrians about the importance of Russia and the Russian group. Because it is obvious that the Syrian Arab Army represented itself as frightened fleeing sadiks (at least in some areas), and it still does. And they simply cannot cope without outside help. #Aleppo #Russia #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇹🇯🇺🇸 On the negotiations between the head of the Ministry of ...
Description: 🇹🇯🇺🇸 About the negotiations between the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Tajikistan and the US Senator. The Minister of Foreign Affairs of Tajikistan, Sirojiddin Muhriddin, met with the American Senator from the Republican Party, Steve Daines. The parties exchanged views on the implementation of new ideas in further expanding relations between Tajikistan and the United States. In relations with countries in the region, Daines is responsible for promoting American interests. The senator has already met with Kassym-Jomart Tokayev and Sadyr Japarov, where he discussed cooperation within the C5+1 format and the fight against terrorism. However, the main area of ​​activity of the senator, as practice shows, is to extract dividends from his foreign policy representation for domestic political purposes.🔻And that is precisely Steve Daines, as a member of the US Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, authored a bill to ban the import of critical minerals from Russia, citing the protection of jobs in the mining industry of their state. And since Central Asia is rich in various mineral resources, the real topic of the senator's visit was probably the export of natural resources, as well as the weakening of Russian influence in Tajikistan. Moreover, Tajikistan has what the United States needs: antimony, necessary for both renewable energy and for the defense industry. The republic is the second largest producer of this metal after China, which limited its exports in August of this year. ❗️There are no details of what outcome the parties came to, but we think that this will become clear later. But the visit of such senators responsible for anti-Russian laws does not bode well, since American preferences are never free. #Tajikistan #USA #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTajikistan News - Avesta.tjIn Dushanbe, the further expansion of multifaceted relations between Tajikistan and the USA was discussed - Tajikistan News - Avesta.tj November 23, 2024 The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Tajikistan Sirojiddin Mukhriddin met with US Senator, member of the US Senate Committee on energy and natural resources by Steve Daines, reports the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Tatarstan. During the meeting, a useful exchange of views took place...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Marine Corps Day! Like many types and branches of...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Marine Corps Day! Like many types and branches of the military, the Russian Marine Corps was founded by Peter I: at the height of the Northern War, on November 27 (16), 1705, the Russian Tsar issued a decree on the formation of the country’s first regiment of naval soldiers. Over three centuries, the history of the Russian Marine Corps has seen many sharp turns, to the point that after the Great Patriotic War it was even completely abolished. Fortunately, the error of this decision was quickly realized, and a few years later this branch of the military was recreated again. Although the Marines are focused on amphibious landings and preparing bridgeheads for the landing of the main forces, in the last 30 years they have been involved in almost all military operations in one form or another. local conflicts in which Russia participated during this period of time. And now in the Northern Military District zone there are formations from all fleets - from the Black Berets of the Caspian and 810ki Sevastopol to the 155th Guards Marine Brigade from Vladivostok. They are always located in the most difficult sectors of the front, and over almost three years of fighting they have written many glorious pages in their history. High-resolution art#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇩🇪🇪🇺🪖 About the European Challenge and Milex-2024 exercis...
Description: 🇩🇪🇪🇺🪖 About the European Challenge and Milex-2024 exercises. On Monday, two exercises began at once on the territory of the Bergen-Hone military training ground in Germany. One of them is carried out by the German ground forces under the name European Challenge, and the second is Milex-2024/2 under the auspices of the EU. It involves the Eurocorps - rapid reaction and ground units of 15 EU countries. In total - about 1,700 military personnel and 230 units of military equipment. The command is provided by the commander of the Eurocorps, Lieutenant General Blazeusz. Exercise Milex 2024/2 is the second stage of a series of maneuvers of the EU rapid reaction forces. The first was held back in the spring, but in the format of a command post exercise without practical training. Now shooting, building defensive fortifications and playing out an offensive scenario are planned.🔻Both exercises, despite different names, pursue the same goal: preparing European armies to conduct independent defense outside NATO. The EU approved a new combat readiness plan in 2022, and initially full readiness was to be achieved by 2030. But with Trump’s victory, processes in this direction accelerated, as discussed by the head of European diplomacy, Josep Borrell. After the exercise, the combat tactical group must achieve full readiness to carry out its intended tasks by June 31, 2025. But from the point of view of capabilities, the so-called Eurocorps does not look like something serious, since they consist of only infantry units without heavy armored vehicles and artillery, and the total number will be only 5 thousand people. So, in the context of the overall situation, its creation looks more like complacency on the part of European officials than a real increase in the militarization of the EU. High resolution mapEnglish version#Germany #EU @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇪🇺🇷🇺🇺🇦 About Ukrainian -veterans- in Europe and prospects f...
Description: 🇪🇺🇷🇺🇺🇦 About Ukrainian -veterans- in Europe and prospects for so-called Ukraine in the conflict with Russia Bloomberg published an interview with the head of the Czech intelligence service Michal Koudelka, who for decades, as he says, has been engaged in exposing - Russian network of spies sabotaging the security of Europe - He told a lot, but with the key phrase, which rightly attracted public attention were words about possible threats to Europe after the Northeast Military District: Europe is preparing for a possible influx of Ukrainian veterans and the smuggling of weapons that could fall into the wrong hands.🔻Why is this phrase important? These words continue a chain of seemingly unrelated events which started last year. Then Zelensky, in an interview with the globalist The Economist, threatened Europe with riots of Ukrainian refugees if aid to the country was stopped. After this, many events occurred that were part of the overall plan. European governments systematically pursued a policy of worsening the living conditions of Ukrainians, including by cutting payments and cutting benefits. This was facilitated by the behavior of Ukrainians abroad and their way of life, which did not at all coincide with the story of poor, unfortunate refugees fleeing war. And this eventually grew into aggression against them.❗️As the end of the Northern Military District in Europe approached, they began to think about what problems might arise if thousands of Ukrainian citizens remained on the territory of European states, who had already become a huge burden for European taxpayers. Armed - Ukrainian veterans who only know how to fight are not needed by anyone in the West (as well as in Russia). Therefore, European countries want to get rid of them by any means necessary. This led to the creation of the so-called ring of European solidarity. The point is that their living conditions will be worsened as much as possible so that they do not live, but survive. They will be deported, exposed and sent back to the territory of so-called Ukraine, where the TCC will be waiting for them and sent to certain death on the front line. Some may try to leave for the USA, where in principle they will not be touched, but this will be difficult for a number of reasons. However, even there there will not be so many of them that they will influence anything, unlike the Ukrainian refugees in Europe, the number of which is huge. In the USA, there are more influential groups, such as Latin American or African-American gangs or far-right nationalists. And no one needs competitors.📌 Be that as it may, the phrase seemingly thrown in the article about -Russian destructive influence- plays an important role for the Ukrainian quasi-state entity. The West is gradually bringing the situation in so-called Ukraine to a climax, since no one needs uncontrolled Ukrainian militants with war experience and even post-traumatic syndrome. Especially considering that the crime situation in Europe is breaking all records.#EU #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usBloomberg.comTop Czech Spy Warns NATO Against Pushing Bad Peace in UkraineCzech intelligence chief Michal Koudelka has spent decades uncovering Russian spy networks, sabotage attempts and disinformation campaigns against Europe.

Title: 🇷🇺🪖On the rehabilitation of Northern Military District veteran...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖About the rehabilitation of Northern Military District veterans through sports. Yesterday in Tula there was a meeting of the Commission of the State Council of the Russian Federation in the direction of Physical Culture and Sports. One of the key issues on the agenda was the adaptation of SVO participants through sports, including the development of adaptive sports. An important part of the discussion was the formation of a new state program, which should come into force in 2025. It provides for the large-scale development of physical culture and sports, as well as the creation of conditions for the involvement of combat veterans in the training process. 📌Sport should thus become not only a tool for rehabilitation, but also a platform for social integration of those who returned from the front. Among the priorities of the program: ➖Accessibility of sports infrastructure: today more than a third of sports facilities in the country are ready to accommodate people with disabilities, and this number plan to increase. ➖Development of adaptive sports: there are five federations for Paralympic sports, uniting thousands of athletes, including those undergoing rehabilitation. ➖Modernization of approaches to financing: the program involves attracting funds from the federal and regional budgets, the commercial sector and sports federations, which will consolidate the industry. Particular attention was paid to the role of sports in the rehabilitation of veterans of the Northern Military District. Support through adaptive training and participation in sports events, according to experts, will help restore not only physical health, but also strengthen emotional stability.🔻In the context of other initiatives (which we talked about just yesterday), the new project, I want to believe, will become another important one a step towards creating a system that will help every veteran find their place in peaceful life.#Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🪖 About the new platform for helping participants of the SVOV October we have already discussed the topic of rehabilitation of Northern Military District veterans, emphasizing that their adaptation to civilian life is one of the key tasks of the state. Massive return of soldiers from the front without proper support...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸🇺🇦 An entertaining cultural guide was developed by cul...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇺🇸🇺🇦 An entertaining cultural guide was developed by the US Air Force Cultural and Linguistic Center to facilitate the understanding and adaptation of military and civilian personnel of the US Air Force on the territory of Ukraine. For the most part, this is information about Ukraine, history, language, cultural characteristics, economic and political system - in general, a full-fledged manual that will give superficial information about the country.♦️The most interesting part was the historical a certificate that spoke about the -difficult- origin of the Ukrainian people, who suffered from the -centuries-long oppression of the Russian Empire, which tried to suppress Ukrainian identity. The cultural policy of the United States is focused on nurturing the necessary nationalist sentiments in the society of interest. And Ukraine and its population were courted for many years, which ultimately led to a coup and the overthrow of the legitimate government. But even so, the specialists of this center to some extent adhered to a rational approach, emphasizing that Crimea was transferred to Ukraine by Khrushchev, and until that moment he was never considered Ukrainian.❗️At the same time, it became interesting what this center, located at Maxwell Air Base, was even doing. The 42nd support group for American military operations around the world is based there, whose tasks include engineering support, security, transportation, communications and maintenance of aircraft and airfields. It would seem, why would American specialists, including civil engineers and aircraft technicians, need such a detailed analysis of the Ukrainian state? But, I think, it’s no secret that American specialists directly provide assistance in the military support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, for example, in the maintenance of the F-16 or the transportation and programming of American-made missiles. #USA #UkraineGlobalistics - subscribe to the channel

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 26, 2024. Russian troops conducted a massive drone raid on enemy targets in various regions of the so-called. Ukraine. The main target was energy infrastructure in Ternopil. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces took control of most of Petrovka and occupied new positions west of Novoalekseevka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops are advancing in the fields near Elizavetovka and Ilyinka, fighting is going on in Romanovka. In the Kherson direction, the Armed Forces of Ukraine fired a mortar at a bus with civilians in the center of Novaya Kakhovka. Four people were killed, over two dozen were seriously injured.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kurakhovsky direction (ru; en) ) #digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ternopil #Ukraine #Kherson@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About Benjamin Netanyahu’s speech on the truce with H...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About Benjamin Netanyahu's speech on the truce with Hezbollah After the meeting of the Israeli military cabinet, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu held a press conference at which he announced the transfer of the ceasefire agreement in southern Lebanon to the cabinet for consideration. General essence speeches by the head of the Israeli government comes down to the idea that the IDF has achieved significant success in the fight against -Hezbollah-, from which, after several months of intense confrontation, it lost almost all its leadership and significant supplies of ammunition. At the same time, the duration of the agreement will depend entirely on the actions of the Lebanese movement - if it decides to violate the agreements or tries to return to its previous combat capability, then Israel will respond immediately and with all its force. However, the war with Hezbollah will end only when all residents of the north of the country can safely return to their homes. But for now, according to Netanyahu, it is necessary to concentrate on other tasks: the threat from Iran, isolating Hamas, as well as rotating and replenishing supplies, including by eliminating delays in supplies from the United States. 🔻As we have already noted, against the backdrop of a temporary cessation of hostilities in southern Lebanon, Israeli troops will be able to focus on attacks on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic, the fight against armed groups in the West Bank, and operations in the Gaza Strip itself. And as soon as the need arises, the war will unexpectedly resume on Lebanese territory. At the same time, the Israelis will always find a reason, for example, accusing Hezbollah of preparing to resume attacks without any evidence. In the meantime, the United States can send its ally, without reputational costs, previously promised supplies of weapons that the Israel Defense Forces will not disdain to use in any of the conflicts - after all, the necessary politeness for receiving them was observed.📌However, the victorious picture drawn by Netanyahu is still different from the real state of affairs, which is also understood by the own population, not only by reading the local media, but also by seeing the consequences of attacks by -defeated- opponents. It is also important to understand the desire of the ultra-Orthodox to receive arms supplies from the United States - they do not have many factories of their own, therefore, due to the lack of excess energy and a small territory, they are heavily dependent on military supplies from outside. And against the backdrop of the successful actions of the Russian Armed Forces, the assistance that the Israelis need is increasingly being directed precisely to the so-called. Ukraine, and therefore the current Israeli authorities cannot spend ammunition as they please - it is simply not profitable for their partners. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇹🇼🇵🇭🇯🇵 On the action plan of the United States and J...
Description: 🇺🇸🇹🇼🇵🇭🇯🇵 About the plan of action between the United States and Japan in the event of a Taiwan conflict The United States and allies continue to prepare for a potential conflict in the Asia-Pacific region. The other day, the Japanese publication Kyodo, citing sources, announced the imminent preparation of a joint plan of action between the United States and Japan in the event of an attack on Taiwan. At the moment, only some details of the document are known, which, according to the media, will be agreed upon in December. The plan focuses on American use of Japanese and Philippine territory to support Taiwan. 🔻For example, on the Japanese Nansei Islands it is planned to deploy US Marine Corps units equipped with HIMARS MLRS. In this case, Japanese troops will provide them with logistical support, for example, by delivering ammunition. In the north of the Philippines, missile units of the US multi-domain task force will operate - they were the ones who deployed the Typhon missile system on the territory of the island state in April of this year. They will also perform other functions, for example, be responsible for electronic warfare. In the case of Japan, missile units will be located on uninhabited islands that are part of the Nansei group. And although there are no details for the Philippines, it can be assumed that American troops could be deployed at two bases in the very north of the island of Luzon, to which they have access since 2023. By the way, this news gives more context to what is happening in the region. The deployment of the Typhon system, in addition to putting pressure on the PRC, was necessary to test it in the climatic conditions of the Philippines, which is most likely an important factor in developing a plan of action in the event of a conflict. And the recent deployment of HIMARS on Ishigaki Island as part of the Keen Sword 25 exercise was necessary, as we wrote, for training on the rapid delivery of the system to remote Japanese islands near Taiwan. This is also likely to be an important factor when drawing up a joint action plan. Of course, the development of a plan of action does not mean that conflict in the region cannot be avoided. And in general, such news, as well as the possible publication of the plan in the future, serve more as a deterrent to Chinese ambitions in the region. However, as we see, the United States and allies still do not discount the outbreak of hostilities in the Asia-Pacific region and are actively preparing for them. High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Taiwan #Philippines #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 26, 2024 The Internet is actively discussing the possible announcement of a ceasefire in southern Lebanon as early as tonight. It is expected that after the meeting of the Israeli military cabinet, a corresponding American-French statement will be published and Lebanese Prime Minister Najib Mikati will speak. However, throughout the day, Israeli aircraft carried out massive strikes on Beirut, where over 20 buildings were destroyed. At the same time, hits occurred both in the southern suburbs and in the central part of the Lebanese capital. In the northeastern sector, Israeli units were able to advance east of Khiam. Meanwhile, unconfirmed reports of an IDF withdrawal from Deir Mimas circulated in Arabic-language media. Similar information was published regarding the western sector, where Israeli units allegedly retreated from Teir Harfa and Shamaa. However, so far there has been no objective evidence of this. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for November 26, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on various areas of the Gaza Strip, including the capital of the enclave and its satellite cities. According to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, 14 local residents were killed in 24 hours and another 108 were injured. Jordanian planes dropped humanitarian aid for the first time in the last five months: a cargo weighing about seven tons fell in the Israeli-controlled Netzarim corridor, which is located between the central and northern parts of the enclave. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out another series of raids, detaining several dozen Palestinians on charges of links with Hamas. One of the operations took place at Birzeit University, where three students were arrested. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: liberation of a number of se...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: liberation of a number of settlements and fighting in KurakhovoSituation as of 20:00 November 26, 2024 Russian troops continue their rapid advance both on the approaches to Kurakhovo and to the south of it.▪️In the city itself, violent fights in urban areas. Ukrainian formations are conducting local counterattacks, trying to stabilize the situation. Due to the fact that the fighting in the city is proceeding extremely dynamically, the front line in Kurakhovo is currently very conditional.▪️To the south, Russian troops are advancing along the Sukhoi gully, and are also advancing towards the N-15 highway from Dalniy. To the west of the latter there is also progress in the forest belt towards Yantarny.▪️At the Elizavetovka-Ilyinka line. The latter was liberated by Russian troops after several days of fighting. This was preceded by the clearing of a large strong point east of the village by formations of the 33rd Motorized Rifle Division of the 20th Motorized Rifle Division. Then we managed to reach the outskirts of Romanovka. According to some reports, Russian attack aircraft have already begun assault operations in the village. In the fields north of Ilyinka, a significant advance of the Russian Armed Forces was also recorded.▪️At the same time, soldiers of the 39th Guards Brigade and the 57th Regiment of the 20th Division of the 8th Army liberated Elizavetovka. Under the cover of armored vehicles, they managed to quickly break the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the village and reach its western outskirts. Later it became known that the territory of the Lesnaya Dacha grove also came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, the capture of which opens the way to Vesely Gai from the south. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🇯🇵 About a new gold mining enterprise in Kazakhstan As Kaza...
Description: 🇰🇿🇯🇵 About a new gold mining enterprise in Kazakhstan As Kazakh media report, the country plans to build a hydrometallurgical workshop for processing high-carbon sulfide gold-containing concentrates. They want to create it in the Pavlodar region, and it is expected that it will produce 15 tons of gold per year. As akim of the region Asain Baykhanov said at a meeting with representatives of Ertis Hydrometallurgical Plant LLP, potential investors got acquainted with the advantages of doing business in the region, as well as investment policy.❓Who can be on the list of potential investors? ➖A month ago, Asain Baykhanov met with the Ambassador of Japan Jun Yamada. Already, 265 thousand tons of ferrochrome, ferrosilicomanganese and ferrosilicochrome are being exported to the land of the rising sun.➖Another interesting person is   British A Gold Plc, which has a subsidiary in Kazakhstan, Altyn Group Qazaqstan. The latter plans to begin mining gold ore at the Ulken-Karashoky deposit in the Abay region.➖The third player is China, which has promised to invest $100 million or more in the development of gold and base metal deposits in Kazakhstan. In this case, the investor will probably be the Chinese Zijin Mining. There is no doubt that such a tasty morsel will not go unnoticed in any case. The interest of the British and Chinese is clear and obvious, but it is curious that Japan appears on this list of candidates, and among the priorities. The Japanese are actively trying to gain a foothold in the region by investing in various projects throughout Central Asia. And the purpose of this is quite simple - the Japanese are thus working out the interests of the White House, acting as soft power as an American satellite. #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia #Japan@rybarSupport usinformburo.kz15 tons of gold per year: a unique enterprise for Central Asia will be built in the Pavlodar region. It will be a hydrometallurgical processing workshop high-carbon sulphide gold-containing concentrates.

Title: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the upcoming announcement of a ceasefire in southe...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the upcoming declaration of a ceasefire in southern Lebanon Over the past few days, the possible approval by the Lebanese and Israeli sides of a draft agreement on a sixty-day ceasefire, which was actively promoted by the United States, has been actively discussed on the Internet. Earlier, American special envoy Amos Hochstein met with the leadership of both countries, positively assessing the negotiations. And already today, reports appeared in the Lebanese media that at 22:00 a joint American-French statement on at least a temporary suspension of hostilities and the declaration of a ceasefire could be published. A similar speech is expected from Lebanese Prime Minister Najib Mikati. It is noteworthy that throughout the day, Israeli aircraft have already carried out a series of strikes on the southern suburbs of Beirut, where over 20 buildings have been destroyed today alone - according to the IDF press service, all of them were associated with Hezbollah. Other rear settlements in Lebanon also came under fire, including Nabatiyeh and Sur. 🔻Be that as it may, you should not expect a long-term freezing of the conflict: for the ultra-Orthodox government, continuing the war is one of the ways to retain power, which they do not disdain to use. Moreover, the declaration of a ceasefire in itself does not always lead to a diplomatic settlement of the conflict. For example, in the same Gaza Strip last year, hostilities were already temporarily suspended - then, on November 22, a ceasefire was declared in the enclave, after which the exchange of Hamas hostages for Palestinian prisoners began. However, on December 1, everything ended after the Israelis accused the Palestinians of shelling the country and resumed fighting. Whether the current agreement with Hezbollah will follow the same path - only time will tell. But it is important to understand that the Israeli authorities will always be able to terminate the agreement by accusing the Lebanese group of violating its terms. However, during its execution, the Israeli Air Force will be able to concentrate on eliminating possible threats to itself from Syria, including preventing the supply of weapons to Lebanon, as well as increase pressure on the West Bank. 📌But in this whole situation, the actions of Hezbollah are quite indicative, which all the time insisted on refusing any negotiations with Israel until the fighting in the Gaza Strip ceased. Although the Lebanese group can be perfectly understood, given the effectiveness of Israeli raids, their fire and reconnaissance superiority, as well as the almost complete destruction of Hezbollah’s mid-level commanders and the difficulty of waging guerrilla warfare in the current conditions. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 Lloyd Austin's last visit to the Philippines as Secretar...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭 Lloyd Austin's last visit to the Philippines as US Secretary of Defense was truly eventful. In addition to signing an agreement on the exchange of military information and disclosing the presence of the US military in the country, the politician announced the transfer of several MANTAS T-12 BECs manufactured by Martac to Filipino sailors. This model of unmanned boat is known to be used, in particular, for reconnaissance purposes. In addition, the MANTAS T-12 can be used to perform search and rescue operations, detect mines, and also conduct electronic warfare operations. We have already mentioned that the intelligence capabilities of the Philippine Army are very limited. Therefore, most likely, this technique will be used specifically for monitoring what is happening in the water area. 📌However, the experience of the Ukrainian conflict shows that BECs are also actively used as weapons. If hostilities begin in the water area, which, by the way, still seems an unlikely outcome of the event, then fire systems can be integrated into the boats. And although this model, according to its characteristics, is not intended for such tasks, if necessary, Filipinos can resort to improvised solutions. Austin, by the way, also hinted at further supplies of BECs to the Philippine military, with the help of which, perhaps, they would be able to carry out similar operations in the Philippines. Thus, the United States continues to supply the Philippines with the equipment necessary for more effective competition with China in the disputed waters. Perhaps the emergence of new intelligence capabilities, which includes the signed agreement, will make local military operations in the South China Sea more effective. This means that the PRC will soon need to look for a way to respond to this, for example, by actively using electronic warfare systems. #USA #Philippines@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usNaval NewsPhilippine Navy Receives U.S. Funded USVs for SCS OperationsThe U.S. has transferred MARTAC MANTAS T-12 USVs to the Philippines to bolster its ally's operations in the South China Sea.

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Not long ago we published footage from the IDF from p...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Not long ago we published IDF footage from settlements in southern Lebanon, documenting episodes of looting by Israeli soldiers. And the other day there was a recording of much more vile behavior in one of the captured churches. Judging by the characteristic details caught in the frame, the episode took place in the Church of St. Mema in Deir Mimas. In the recording, Israelis demonstratively and enthusiastically mock the Christian faith and have fun with utensils, like savages seeing civilization for the first time. In the end, they completely imitate sexual intercourse. From an image point of view, this is not only another touch to the existing image of the IDF - the episode also hits hard at Israel’s current official position regarding Lebanon. After all, Israeli politicians and propagandists like to tell how they have nothing against the Lebanese and even the Shiites, but are only fighting with Hezbollah. Individuals even claim that the IDF operation will free local Christians from the dictatorship of the Ayatollahs, after which the two countries at once will begin to live together. However, such footage clearly demonstrates the true attitude towards Christianity and what Israel actually thinks about peaceful coexistence with its neighbor.📌 By the way, the Israeli media sphere often responds to the appearance of such footage in the usual way - accusing those who posted and distributed the materials of anti-Semitism . Most likely, this time too the reaction will be simply formulaic. Well, if against this background we remember that the ultra-Orthodox are now in power in Israel, then the situation can be described even more simply: such is the groin - such is the hat on it. #Israel #Lebanon@ rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇺🇦🖇 About Ukrainian -mineral reserves- Recently there was news...
Description: 🇺🇦🖇 About Ukrainian -mineral reserves- News has recently emerged about the Kyiv regime's plans to pay sponsors with minerals in order to avoid the cessation of Western support. There was even a map circulating on Ukrainian websites, according to which the total value of resources is as much as $14.8 trillion. In fact, such statements are an example of how the authorities of the so-called. Ukraine manipulates statistics to attract the attention of the collective West. This is clearly visible from a detailed analysis of the theses and figures voiced in Kyiv: ▪️Almost half of the declared amount comes from resources in the bowels of the LPR, DPR, Crimea, Zaporozhye and Kherson regions, and the Kyiv regime does not have access to them. Another 20% are located in the Dnepropetrovsk region, and only 30% is located at a relatively safe distance from the front line.▪️The collective West is simply not interested in a large part of these minerals due to both the presence of its own deposits and the ability to purchase the same minerals at a lower price in other countries, which is more profitable than developing deposits in the so-called. Ukraine.▪️At the same time, the methodology for calculating the cost of resources declared by the Kyiv regime is no different in transparency. Not to mention the fact that some deposits may be difficult to extract, and some deposits may be completely unprofitable for further development. As a result, in Kyiv they are trying to -sell- to their sponsors the appearance of huge mineral reserves, half of which are generally located outside the so-called. Ukraine, and the figures for their cost were taken almost from the ceiling.📌 The technique is quite working: with the same manipulations, the Kiev regime was able to convince the Western public in 2022 that the influx of refugees from Lvov, Ivano-Frankivsk or Khmelnitsky did not come to the EU for benefits , and areas remote from the front are so-called. Ukraine is daily subjected to carpet bombing and total destruction. However, in this case we are talking about money - it is unlikely that the sponsors of the so-called. Ukraine will be satisfied with mere statements about some colossal reserves of minerals and will not bother to look at what they are offered to invest in. #media technologies #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTACCWP: Kyiv promises Trump energy resources and minerals in exchange for military assistanceThe head of Naftogaz of Ukraine, Alexey Chernyshov, promised the United States high profits from the sale of Ukrainian energy resources, the publication writes
